paragraphs: Now everybody watching me, I want you to listen to my words. Listen to my words, the words of prayer to God for those that are wanting guidance, those who want to get to that place that God promised. Even in the days of Moses, when they were traveling, they didn't have to get new shoes or new clothes. They were in a state of renewal where they had no need whatsoever. I believe that that is coming upon us in this day and age. I believe that that is what God wants for His people, to be debt-free. How many of you really believe it? This day and this time of Jubilee - God showed me the days when Moses and the people had no need and when the time came he had to stop them from giving their offerings because he had so much. That is the kind of thing that I have seen with my eyes. That is the kind of things that I have heard with my ears. That is what God said when He said "death to debt." This nation shall enter into a period of time where they shall hear those words coming from the holy generation, from the chosen generation, from the royal priesthood.  Death to debt! Death to debt! Death to debt!

The Spirit of God would say today there is a recovery that is happening. If My people who are called by My name humble themselves, pray, turn from their wicked ways, I will hear from heaven. I hear not the sound of secular humanists; I hear not the sound of the religious system. Many churches today are being crucified between two thieves - an erroneous false religious system and man-made laws and secular humanism. This day the Spirit of God says for a season they shall have no breath.  I shall take the breath away from them and I will breathe into My people.  I will breathe into My people. I will breathe into their businesses; I'll breathe into their creations. I'll breathe into their industry and their artistry. I will breathe into My people and there shall be light that shall come forth, says the Lord. I am removing those who have a small structure for they cannot excel in the strength of its grounding. However their grounding is, so shall they be strong. There are many that have built their house on sand, says the Lord. There are many that have built their houses on sand, but there are My people, there are those that have built their house on the rock and therefore the storms have come and they have remained. Therefore the wind has come and they have remained. God says today you have the power to break the power of debt for there shall surely be a death to debt, says the Lord, for it is My will and I speak to you today in this year and this time of Jubilee.  It is time to step into it and receive this promise, says the Lord!

We're at the beginning stage of a reformation. People laugh at me when I say that. We're at the beginning stage of a recovery. People laugh at me but I say to you, for what purpose? Apostolic Christianity - to recover apostolic Christianity. We need to return to the basics, the foundation of our first century faith. Many Christians today are being defeated today in the arena of ideas - won't go into the marketplace because they don't have the basics worked out in their life. Let us return to the basics of the early church, for God says I want to give all these things that My people desire before that great and coming day of the Lord, before I take My people to Myself. I wish to sweep across every nation and present Myself one final time. For when I came the first time they could have received the Kingdom of God - Israel - but they rejected Me. And therefore there is a return of that kingdom, says the Lord. This day you sense the presence of My kingdom! Then believe Me that I can clear the debt and I can cause you to be free to once again dance and to give and to rejoice in the Lord who made you, says our God.

When God tells me something in my garden when I pray and He whispers words like, "I want My people to receive from My hand, but I must receive from their hand first that which they have prepared to give to Me." You know, I wrote you and said I heard about the Jubilee. Many are talking about Shemitah and the fact that there is going to be judgment; there's going to be evil cast upon our nation and there will be a time of judgment and there has been judgment. But have we forgotten that there are a people that live in the nations of the earth called the Christ people? And He has looked upon them - listen to me. And that's why I wrote this to you, because I can only see the blessing upon God's people, Shemitah. I mean I'm serious.  We are hearing about the crash of the economy, and it looks like it, doesn't it? We're hearing about tidal waves or at least tsunamis on the east coast. Now we hear about a big earthquake in California. Please give Him a break.  Give God a break please. I want to tell you something - what brought one of the biggest earthquakes was when two great men were together in prison and at midnight they began to praise Him and the earth began to shake and what took place as a result of that earthquake t?  There was great deliverance and the warden said, "What shall I do to be saved?" I want everybody watching me to say those words: "What shall I do to be saved?" We want to hear that coming out of the mouths of atheists, agnostics, young men and women all over the world.  Sitting in our presence today is a young man, Chase, who is about to shake this world in the industry and show them the principles of the kingdom. There is another young person, there are many that are sitting present today that God has chosen to invade the industry, to go into the slums of the heart and to give them life, to go into the slums of the heart of those who have said "we give up," and to give them hope and to give them life. Are you one of those people today?

Capetown, did you hear the word of the Lord?  Did you hear as they sang that God would bring to the country so much peace? Yes, there will always be war, there will always be friction, but are we supposed to live in one season only? Did I not say there is a time for war and there's a time for peace. This song that was sang today was regarding South Africa. Capetown! You have been set politically to raise the standard, to raise a standard that they may see the standard. Why would I abolish a church? But I shall perform and have performed surgery.  Neville, Neville, Neville, this is not the end. This is a time of rejuvenation. Every seven years the body is rejuvenated and sheds.  You've been shedding and shedding and shedding and so there is a new skin.  There is a new sound; there is a new life. There is a new source, a new style, a new system that is already being set for you to set in motion for you to set in 2016. Not any earlier, Neville; not any earlier, Wendy.  2016 - I have set it as My own calendar for what I want to do in Capetown and what I want to declare and say to political leaders and to those who are in spiritual office.  God says there are watchmen on the wall.  Hah! What? What of the night, O watchmen? What of the night, O watchmen? Why are My watchmen in the wall in Capetown not watching in the night? For I say what of the night, O watchmen? For God said, I have set you to watch in the night, to be watchmen on the wall, so that you would bring safety. Oh no, it's not just Capetown. There are many other places, but God said so as I've rejuvenated and there's a new skin so I shall set things in standard and people shall say, "Let us go to the house of the Lord. Let us go and bless them." For God said you speak about favor? This is a favor that you have prayed for. Now your time of war is coming to an end. Now your time of friction is coming to an end. Now your time of hurt and pain has come to an end.  Even though they shall try and come back, I shall slap them down and say enough, you cannot return! And therefore the Lord blesses you, Wendy and Neville, with this word: I have set Capetown as a standard. I have set that nation as a standard to the rest of Africa to show how I can bring them back, for there is a resilience amongst the people of God that I shall prove to Africa says the Lord!

Where was I when this nation began? People lived in their fields, prayed to their God, gave their hands, their feet and then their blood for this nation that I call precious, My darling America. I was there as they stood as families together watching loved ones die. I was there. Hear the notes of the violin, for they played and brought sounds from nations in Europe, Britain, and then created their own sound. America, you have imitated nobody for I created you unique. Where were they when men stood together and signed the Declaration of Independence? Where were they when they said, "Under God, One God." I was there, says the Lord And today there is still a remnant that will not bow to the naturalists, to the secular humanists, to the atheists. No, it is not time for the destruction of this nation. There will come a time where the wrath of God shall be poured out upon the nations of the earth but today I will bring recovery and restoration and once again America will sing My songs and pray My prayers and declare under God we stand, says the Lord.

Do not be afraid of North Korea, do not be afraid of Iran; do not be afraid of the nations, for in 2016 everything will change says the Lord. There will be a sound of liberty from the White House, There will be a sound of prayers from the White House. Pennsylvania Avenue shall be surrounded by people that will pray and ask Me to intervene and I shall, says the Lord. So what is the foreboding sound? It is the sound of the enemies of America living in America. Those are your greatest enemies - who call themselves citizens, who call themselves citizens but they are enemies of the cross and enemies of the nation and they shall be dealt with. You want judgment, says the Lord? Watch. Watch the atheists. Watch. You want judgment? Then watch those that have risen up against Me and said perhaps we shall embrace Baal-Allah. Perhaps we shall embrace that religion. Maybe we shall embrace Sharia law. Ha! I laugh at you because the spirit of Elijah is in this nation and Jezebel shall not stand, says the Lord.

Blow the trumpet, blow the shofar! Blow it! For there shall be a combination of the sound of Israel and the sound of the United States of America - a new sound, and I will take the Spanish music and I will take the Latin and I will put it together and a unique generation will begin to rap and begin to sing with the combination of the sound of Israel and the sound of America and the sound of Central America and the sound of South America says the Lord!

The Lord God of Israel is a jealous God. I am the Lord Your God. I am a jealous God. I will not allow the idols of Baal-Allah, the idols of the Middle East - I shall not allow these idols to be worshipped. This is a time for sobriety, to be sober. Why? Because men have been blinded. There has been poverty, religious poverty, and yet there is a sound. We pray, Lord, as you came to this nation centuries ago, give us one more chance. Have mercy upon us! Have mercy upon us! Give us one more chance and we will arise, and we pray this in the Name of the Lord God of Israel, Yeshua! Yeshua! Yeshua!

I have something about the "David" kind of leader - President - that's coming up. I'm forbidden to share the entire thing because I now have more and as we get closer and closer to the elections, I'm seeing more. There is going to be a very nasty revelation that's going to come out that's going to knock one person completely out but I don't want to say too much now. But I'm just telling every one of you that we never know when it could actually be spoken, when God could actually use me to speak it out.

Today I pray that the Holy Spirit would speak to every person all over the world. Some of you seeking direction - some of you are fearful. I get letters every day from people that are fearful, but the Spirit of God said, why have you chosen fear? What is it that causes My people to look to fear, to say we must go back? God's Spirit says to America and to the nations of the earth, do I stand fearing? When I spoke to Joshua, I said do not fear. When I speak to you today, many have said "What about the tsunami that is coming to New York?" God said, there is no tsunami coming to New York at this time. I am the Lord the Creator. The earth obeys Me and I have set certain things to happen, but at this time, God said, no tsunami. I will show you that there shall be a spiritual tidal wave that shall lift the people to a higher place. Enough of this fear mongering, says the Spirit of God! Look at Israel as they are now being rocketed because of hand shaking with Iran, your enemy. But God says, they have not shook My hand! They have not taken My hand in a covenant. Only those who have taken My hand in a covenant shall see the release of My glory in this end time and it is coming, says the Lord. It is coming like a mighty, rushing wind. As it was in the day of Acts on the Day of Pentecost, so it is coming again that My people may breathe the breath of God, that the paracletos may once again stand as the Comforter of mankind. I will not hold back, says the Lord. This is an hour where triumph shall be heard from the north to the south and to the east to the west, says the Lord!

The Spirit of God says, what has happened that there was a contagious disease when the hands of the people of America clasped the hands of those in Iran. There was a transfer of a leprosy. Hear the word of the Lord today! In this nation, a leprosy is spreading. Many know about it; many have run away. They say, "We cannot stop the contagion. We cannot stop for it continuing on." Primeval darkness heard the Almighty decree, "Light be!" and immediately light was. Let me say something to you- the word of the Lord Jesus is equal in majesty to that ancient word of power, "Light be!" The word of Christ has as much power as those words, equal in majesty; redemption like creation has its words of might. Jesus speaks and it is done. He approached a leper and the leprosy yielded, not through human remedies - but it fled at once when Jesus said, "I will." Can you hear Him say to you in America, "I will," to the leprosy that you desire to be destroyed? This diseased place, no hopeful signs of recovery - nature contributed nothing to its healing but the unaided word of God affected the entire work at that very moment, right there and then. This very moment in time, Jesus says these words to the people of this nation: "I will! I will!" As He spoke to the leper, there was an exchange that took place and they broke through the law. Hear what I'm saying, what the Spirit says. They broke through the law. They did not break the law; they broke through the law. The ceremony - it was not for a leper to touch Jesus or to get close to Him. The law said that a man could not touch a leper. Jesus touched the leper and the Bible did not say that the touch of Jesus healed the leper but it says, "When He spoke these words the leper was healed." When Jesus spoke, the leprosy left but Jesus chose to touch the leper and break through the ceremonial law and thereby receiving the Levitical curse upon Himself. Before Jesus got to the cross, He already received the leprosy from that man because He was going to take leprosy from this world.

The Lord's Spirit says to me to tell you, do you believe that I can remove the leprosy from your home, that I can take the spirit of this thing that is eating away at your eyes and your ears and your hands and your feet and destroy the power of leprosy? If you believe it, God says, today I will enter into the nation and into your homes and I will break the power of leprosy for these are My words to you: "I will! I will!" says the Lord.

You know what leprosy does? It eats away; it destroys - even in the eyes, it caused blindness because there's no moisture in the eyes so the eyes can no longer open and close and what happens is they go blind because of that. A blindness has entered the nation. But God spoke to me clearly. He said if My people who are called by My name would humble themselves, turn from their wicked ways and they would call upon Me today, I will come into their homes. I will break the power of this thing that is eating away at this nation and the core of this nation. And I will bring America together with Israel again and I will see it and I will bless them. But today, as you stand like Elijah the prophet, before the great rain came upon Mt. Carmel, he first went to a woman's home and she blessed him and he blessed her and there was an abundance that began to happen in her home. So God wants you to do it on behalf of this nation and the nations that are represented. And today as we bless Israel, your prayers are being placed right before God today in the name of Yeshua I make that declaration and I bless Him.

The nations, the nations are in uproar, as we all know. But the Spirit of God has spoken clearly. These are His words: the earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof. And yet you see the fear and the trembling from My people. What is this! What fear would be instilled in you by the media that paints the pictures of doom, gloom - the prognosticators of this time? And they say, "How shall we rid ourselves of ISIS and pacts made with Iran, our enemies?" (Holds up cell phone) The Spirit of God says this will do it. This tiny instrument that people use every second - I shall do something that shall expose what is taking place in Iran, Iraq, throughout the Middle East, but Iran specifically. There shall be an exposure and they shall say, "Such a tiny thing brought the truth out and such a tiny thing brought down that which was supposed to be upright," and yet they are presently at this very moment pacting together with Russia and laughing at this President and laughing at this nation. God says I will have the last laugh. Why? Because, as I have said throughout the summer, there shall be one exposure after the other.

And then I suddenly saw a word that I don't enjoy speaking. That word was "revival." And I said, Lord, what do you mean "revival"? He said, Kim, the people are praying for North Korea, Iran, China, yet the church is growing in China faster than anywhere else in the world; yet the church in Iran, underneath, is greater than the church in the west. No, this nation needs revival. God says, they have died and said "the naturalism, the naturalism, secular humanism." I'm exposing them one minute at a time, and even as you have seen the truth about the little children that are being destroyed and how they laugh about it, God said today I show you that I am about to pour upon My people, those who have given, those who have sowed, and those who have stood the test of time, I'm about to pour upon them unimaginable favor, says the Spirit of God. I will heal bodies like I've never healed before. I will raise even the dead - as they've said it cannot happen, I will do signs and wonders. Not signs and blunders, but signs and wonders, says the Lord, as this earth has never seen. I will begin in China, then I will move through Iran and the Middle East, and then I shall flame this country again under the leadership of a righteous President, says the Lord.

The Spirit of the Lord says, I hear what you are saying. I hear you are saying you will take it back. But do you realize that I'm taking it back, says the Lord? It's not just you, but it is I that is taking it back, says the Lord. For yes, I've watched as the soil and the elements of this nation and the world have rebelled and said, "We wish to erupt; we wish to shake." And I have stopped them for there has been one that I have stopped the latter part of last year, says the Lord, that would have destroyed buildings all up the Pacific Northwest, all up the Pacific Northwest. But I stopped it. I said, "No, you will not." For there shall arise leaders that shall speak the truth in this nation and I will give them one more chance, says the Lord. And because of that, I have extended My period of grace and I will remove from this office those who have corrupted the truth and lied and spoken to their enemies at the gate as if they were their friends. This has insulted me, says the Lord. Therefore, I will give you peace, I will give you righteousness and there shall arise men and women that shall pray in the White House and they shall bring the latter rain into this nation and onto the earth, says the Lord. All I want you to do is shout and these walls will come down, says the Lord.

A promise has come to me very clearly that over the Middle East and specifically over Iraq and those regions, something has opened up. Now, somebody says, "Well, what does that something mean?" It means there are people, not praying in America necessarily, but in Iran, in Iraq, in those regions, God has heard the prayers of the Christians on that territory where there is blood being shed. As a result of it, and this came to me, just came to me two days ago, three days ago, that there will be provision for the world because of what's opened up over the Middle East. Now that sounds crazy, I know, because there's so much wickedness going on with the leaders there. That doesn't matter. So God spoke about the fact that there would be blessings that would come as a result of their prayers being answered. As a result of it, there will be a surrender. There will also be a financial issue concerning the dinar that I clearly heard because of this opening up as well.

So the angel of God appears to Gideon and Gideon hears the promise where God says, "I'm going to free you from the stronghold of the Midianites after seven years." After seven years of America being under the cloud of judgment and depression and America being for seven years in a state where it has had no freedom and no liberty, that is coming to an end. That is the promise that God has just given.

The Spirit of God is speaking now over the region of Iraq, over the region of Iran, over the regions of the Middle East and southern Asia. The earth has shaken and shall shake again. But God said I am speaking that I may release resources, and there will be a grave surrender that will take place in the months to come. I want to free you, every one of you, My people, to be able to stretch out their hand to the lonely, to the hungry, to the poor, and feed them and clothe them. This is My desire, says the Lord. Therefore, there shall be a break in the financial system in the Middle East, the dinar. And then he shall say, "Why? Why now?" And God said, when things seem at their worst, I shall bring it forth and I shall free them up. There shall be a prosperity in a place where you least expect it. The prayers of My people in Iran and the prayers of My Christian people that have come forth from Iraq and from Palestine - yes Palestine - and even those regions, I will hear their prayers and I will do something marvelous and will affect this nation, says the Lord. You put your hand in the hand of Iran? I say to you, I will remove the hand of America out of the hand of Iran, says the Lord, and I will free up My people for the promise is yes and amen. Yes and amen! Yes and amen! Yes and amen!

Something has opened up, and please hear me when I say this. Many people don't see it or even receive it because they say, "Oh, I've heard that before." You'd better listen very carefully because when God declares because of the youth and the prophetic sound in the youth, and there is, believe it or not. The heavens are opening up - not the old system of Eli the high priest, but a new system that will be set up as the result of God releasing a Samuel to the earth. Your children are important to God. You are important to Him. He's looking to your future.

What I'm about to share with you is something not to be taken lightly. In fact, I would encourage you to pray to God to show you what it is that could be affecting your life because of a national spiritual enforcement, and I'll explain that in a few minutes. In other words, when a leader makes a decision, it affects you; it affects your household. We must remember though that we have the power of the blood of Christ to put on our doorposts to protect us from any disaster that may come about as a result of decisions made by leadership - leadership that have no discerning of spirits. And I want to remind you that not every leader has a strong spiritual sense. You know, even leaders in Christian nations are tempted and what I'm about to share with you is the spirit that we are dealing with at this present moment. So before I share that with you, let's pray together.
(KIM PRAYS)

At this moment in time, obviously many are very discouraged by decisions made specifically by this administration and what I'm going to deal with today is the spirit of Jezebel. I know that this spirit has been referred to many, many times and it's almost laughable the way it's been misused. A wife who seems overbearing is suddenly referred to as the spirit of Jezebel; someone trying to control you - suddenly it's the spirit of Jezebel. Well, not always. That spirit operates by manipulation and intimidation and I'm going to share a little bit about Jezebel just for a minute so you can understand what we are warring against in this nation now. You know, Jezebel comes from the word "baal" or "ba-al" - "baal" we call them, but it's actually "baal-allah." And this word "baal" means master, possessor, controller; possessor of anything. If you look at Islam today, especially the radical aspect of Islam, you will notice that that is their main goal, to possess, to control by any means. It means possessor of anything - whatever they can possess, whatever they can control, they will. Now we know that each person has certain traits, vices and virtues, of course, that exist in their soul, and I want you to take note of this everybody. But each soul wants to co-exist, and co-exist means to exist together, Now this can be good or bad, but it's dangerous when there is bad or evil in a human soul because the mischief or the evil doubles and multiplies as they co-exist. And so when you have a group of people that agree together, whether evil or good, it multiplies. And so that's what we've seen at this present moment.

The name Jezebel means "non-cohabitant, without obligation." So Jezebel is a fantasy space; she's an effect, a lifestyle really, but very importantly, and please take note of this, this spirit, Jezebel, functions by seducing a weak being. It functions best by seducing a weak man. Now when I speak of weakness, please don't think I am speaking about intellectual weakness or physical weakness or whatever. This speaks of a weakness spiritually as well. Not every President has the discerning of spirits. Not every President is spiritually inclined; most of them aren't, in fact. And that's a danger is any nation because when they do not have the discerning of spirits (which I'll share on in a few minutes), then there will be havoc.

The daughter, she was the daughter of Eth-baal, the priest-king of Tyre and Sidon. She was married to Ahab, as most of you know, and the reason that happened was to rectify alliance between Tyre and Israel. And Ahab's father, Omri, sought to offset the hostility of Damascus toward Israel. This was around 880 B.C. And so provision was made for Jezebel to continue to worship her native god, Baal, in Sumeria, which was her new home. You can find that in I Kings 16. Now Jezebel also had a very strong, domineering character. She was self-willed, very forceful, and very importantly, a fanatical devotee of Melqart, the Tyrian Baal. You need to know this - from Tyre there was a Baal that she was devoted to.

Jezebel had a staff of about 450; of this, leaders, prophets - the prophets of Baal. She also had 400 prophets of the goddess Asherah. By the time Ahab was king, this is what she already had set up. So understand there were at least 850 prophets, prophetesses of Baal that surrounded her. And what she did was, she clamored for her god to have at least equal, or rights at least, with Yahweh. So she wanted her god, the god of Baal, to have equal rights with God, Yahweh, Jehovah, God of Israel. So this brought her into conflict with the prophet Elijah. Now we know the story of what happened, because the minute that started happening, Elijah got involved. And so there was a battle between God and Baal, which was fought on Mt. Carmel. Of course we know that God triumphed gloriously (in I Kings 18). Even so, this and the massacre of the prophets, which took place when the people of Israel realized that God was listening, when Elijah offered the great offering. But instead of diminishing her zeal, it augmented it so she didn't stop; she pursued the greatest prophet in the land, and that was Elijah (and you know the story).

The conception of an absolute monarchy was at variance with the Hebrew covenant relationship between God, the king, and the people. And she took the lead, even in the incident as you know of Naboth's vineyard, which was handed, which was actually very underhanded, but handed to her through unscrupulous action. And this affected the whole community as well as undermining the throne of Ahab. But what was the result? The result was a prophetic revolution and an extermination of the house of Ahab. So after Ahab's death, just so you know a little bit about Jezebel, Jezebel continued as a power in Israel for ten years in her role as queen mother throughout the reign of Ahaziah.

Now, something else I want you to note before I address you. In the letter to the church of Thyatira (this is in Revelation 2:20), this is what it says: "That Jezebel of a woman is the designation given to a seductive prophetess." Revelation 2:20 calls her "that Jezebel of a woman" and "the designation is given to a seductive prophetess," and listen to this, "who encouraged immorality and idolatry under the cloak of religion." This could refer to an individual or a group within the church but it indicates one thing, and one thing you need to know is very present - apostasy. So the sole goal of this spirit, the spirit of Jezebel, is to destroy any inkling of perception within a human soul, thereby causing the believer to run away, withdraw, hold back, fall back, and look back. And these are the things we're going to deal with because that spirit is attacking the church. That spirit is attacking you and it's attacking us, each and every one of us - and especially in America. It is causing the believer to want to run away, withdraw, hold back, fall back, and look back and not look ahead, or not even look into the present with perception.

And so those are the four things that I've been seeing taking place with many people - running away, withdrawal. Many of you listening to me now have felt that same thing - let's get out of here; let's withdraw at least. Hold back for fear of being arrested or something. Fall back, and then look back. As you know, Elijah the prophet, the greatest prophet at that time, when Jezebel spoke those words saying, "About this time tomorrow, I will make you like one of these prophets," under her control, what did he do? He ran for his life. He never looked forward, but he said to God, "Take my life, for I am no better than my forefathers." He was looking back and referring to them and then he said, "Take my life." Elijah, the very one who knew that he would be taken in chariots and would never taste death, or not at that time, was asking God to take his life through death. That's how severe the spirit is. That spirit is over this nation at this very moment. You say, "Well, Kim, what are we going to do about it?"

First of all, what I'm doing is I'm attempting to open your eyes to see from this very garden, in your homes at this time, what the spirit is and what the outcome is. Is it the end? Yes, it's the end times, most definitely, and I'm going to show you that we have to discern the times. So let's speak about the discerning of spirits because I'm going to release that on you through this broadcast, and we are going to bless Israel today because if Israel has ever needed support, strength, preservation, it's now. With the decision that has been made regarding Iran, can you imagine - this pact that has taken place with an enemy who hates America, an enemy who hates Israel and is bent on the destruction of Israel, is now released; that spirit has been released. And as a result of it, Israel will be targeted. We know Israel is always targeted, but targeted by Hezbollah in a very subtle attempt to do something, and it will be exposed and Israel will have to respond.

Now, the problem is America has spiritually declined, and I use the word "defaced." It has marked its face for a season, but there is an outcome and God has shown me that if we would pray with the knowledge that has been given to us by the discerning of spirits and by perception and by us helping and standing with Israel, that He would pour out of His blessing, and I say that with great passion, with great conviction, that this will take place. Now, there are many who don't believe that. There are many that are cursing America at this time because of its evil and because it's trodden into some crap and made some mistakes, suddenly we must cut the hand of America off so it will no longer reach out to the rest of the world. That is not the desire of God; that is not the will of God at this time, and you've heard me prophesy it and say it.

Come to the place of light. Come to the place of light. There is a city of refuge. The city of refuge is My Son, Jesus. Begin to praise Him and let the light that is in you come forth. Let the light that is in you begin to go and resurrect and destroy the powers of darkness, destroy the powers of darkness, destroy the powers of darkness!

Did Jeremiah sit with fine linen? Did John the Baptist come in with fine, royal linen? No, he had to go into the wilderness and come back to the royal palace. What is it? Where are My prophets today? They have numbered them; they have looked for them. I speak of senators; I speak of representatives. These are the people that they are focusing on now. Do the news media know about it? Look in your tunnels and look at your trains, for God says, where you think it's safe, it is not safe. Look in your buses and look into your forms of transportation, for God says where you think it's safe, it's not safe. Who but the Lord can help you? Who but the Lord can stand up and decide who shall die and who shall live? I shall protect Congress; I shall protect the Senate and I shall cause righteous decisions to be made in spite of those who sit in the White House and they laugh and they mock. God says, there shall be no more mockery for I am rising up and I'm coming down to deliver My people, says the Lord.

Kim speaking from his heart about the past several years

I had a dream early hours this morning. I was in a big house, many steps and Vladimir Putin was in the house and he had anger like I haven't seen and he was wanting to murder. That's what I felt - I didn't hear him say it but he had murder all over his heart - murder all over his eyes and extreme anger. And I don't believe this was a normal dream, it was a spiritual dream given to me by God. And Putin came - he tried to kill somebody, I don't know who it was, he tried to murder somebody or get someone murdered. And then he came and sat on a chair and suddenly there was a white cloth placed over his face. And it wasn't clean, it wasn't a pure white cloth, it wasn't clean, it was dirty, but you could still see it was white. And it remained over his face. I saw him underneath the cloth and he had this very sarcastic smirk on his face as if he'd accomplished something. And so the Spirit of the Lord began to speak to me as I had been told earlier this month that there would be assassinations, and I'm not saying that he specifically was planning an assassination but it could be. In the dream I felt tremendous fear and rage at the same time coming from him. And in my dream, in my physical body I started suffocating and battling to breathe and forced myself to wake up push myself out of bed and was dizzy. And I know this was not a physical thing because I've experienced it before. and then I was taken to Cuba and I saw the face of John F. Kennedy and I sensed that there was a connection. People are rejoicing because of the apparent freedom and clean up of the relationship with Cuba, but not me. In my spirit I was concerned and so I forced myself to stay awake however I did fall back to sleep because I was tired, it was early, and during that time I dreamed again almost the exact same dream. And so I sensed that as I'm in my garden now that I should pray and I have prayed for Putin and I've prayed for Obama and I've prayed for this country. In the second part of my dream I was taken to a very desolate place - darkness - not occupied where there was something going on, something to do with weapons and I have not had clarity on where this place is and I'm praying today that he would show me what this place is so we can expose it and speak about it. So that is my revelation and I am praying for God's protection.

Is this the end? No! I see light in the nations. I see the Jews returning to their land from all over the world. Do not fear, says the Lord. If you fear, they will know it. If you fear, your enemies will know it. Do you remember when the spies returned from the land and they said we are afraid for the giants are in the land. They said these words: they said, "they saw us as grasshoppers, therefore we saw ourselves as grasshoppers. Therefore, they saw us as grasshoppers as well." We are not grasshoppers! We are giant slayers. We are Davids of this world! We are Davids of this world! We are the Davids of this world. We don't see the giants; we see the slayed. We see a mighty army being raised up. Arise in this meeting, O Lord. Speak to us and destroy the power of our enemies, I pray in the Name Yeshua!

And the Spirit of the Lord told me, it is impossible for the nations to conduct this kind of warfare without prophetic insight and wisdom. And so as He said those words to me, He said, I am preparing the world, the nations of the world, I am preparing them for the prophets. You may say, "well, there are plenty of prophets around." I want you to know that God is preparing the nations of the world for true prophets of God - not prophets that will prophesy the judgments that we continually hear about, God judging our nation and God judging America. Your voice shall be heard in the streets of America, your voice. Your heart has been broken, your soul has been hurt, but don't ever forget I am restorer and I will restore. I'll do it with My love

I hear the cry of those who are being sought after.  They call themselves ISIS, who have determined to wipe out My people on a mountain, in a valley.  God, You have already spoken for Your prophet to pray and now You are hearing a cry from the mountain.

I'm standing next to a man who's been hiding.  He's found himself a little mount. He's praying to God, hiding in Iraq, moving towards Syria.  Spirit, let Your cloud rest upon the prayer of Your saints.  I pray that You would hear the prayer of Your saints, Your people, crying out to You now.

That which can be shaken, let it be shaken.  You said if they could not escape from him who spoke from earth, how much more shall we not escape from Him who now speaks from heaven.  And yet once more I will shake.  I will not only shake the earth, but I will shake the heavens that that which can be shaken will be shaken - that that which can be shaken, will be shaken.  And that which shall stand shall stand forever.
If Africa has ever needed a move and a shaking, not just South Africa, but Africa!
Africa shall be saved!  Now Lord I pray that Your Spirit would move into Africa! Up to the north of Africa, to Egypt, to Israel, to Libya.  Do it Lord! For Your prophet said, God bless Africa!
God bless America! God bless Canada! God bless Europe! God bless Asia! God bless Your earth, Lord! Do something miraculous and globally shake, I pray!

God says, I look at the earth. I see on one side My people, and on the other side, My people.  Together.  Hatred, murder, and on that mountain, I watch as Christians, My people, are being slaughtered.  And then I look at Israel and I see slaughter, hatred.  Then I look at a man who has set himself up as a czar, Putin.  And the Spirit of the Lord says many are saying, "It is the end."  They said that 300 years ago.  And when I formed this nation, America, throughout the ages, they have said, "it is the end."  Where are the sons of Issachar, says the Lord, that would know the times and the seasons?  Oh, it's time for you to understand that the earth is raging, taking the blood of martyrs, and the blood is crying out to Me.  The children's blood is crying out to Me, says the Lord. Shall I be silent? No, I shall not, says the Lord. Therefore, for every child they have taken, I will raise up 100 to return and destroy the powers of that army, says the Lord of Hosts.

Vengeance is mine, says the Lord, and the prayers of the righteous shall be heard, even as Daniel was heard.  And the same angel that was fighting over the prince over Persia, the same angel that was fighting the prince of Persia, and after he turned to the region is now sent with the words of Daniel to fight and to bring down this spirit that has decided to take the blood of children.  It is finished, says the Lord.  I shall rise up and avenge My people, says the Lord.

A man by the name of Elijah knew it was time.  He stood before the king who was wicked and stood before the people who were divided in opinion and he stood before the prophets of Baal.  One man knew this was not the end. He said, "I will build an altar in the presence of wickedness so that the abundance of rain would come."  Men all over, prophets alike, were prophesying, "It is the end - it is finished. Jezebel has ruled and out ruled the prophets.  The prophets of Baal have taken over."  "Watchmen, what of the night? Watchmen, what of the night?" said the people to the prophets. And they were silent.  "This is the end," they said.  Elijah came and stood on Mt. Carmel and said to the people, you are divided between two opinions.  If you would just unite your heart, God will rid you of the wickedness around you and send to this dry land, rain; not only a little bit of rain, but an abundance of rain.  So today I stand on the soil, on the mount of holiness in the United States of America, to make that same declaration today.  It is not the end, but if you would remain divided, there shall not be a cloud in your sky to bring rain.  Therefore, do what the prophet says and said.  Cast aside two opinions and make your choice.  Is the Lord, the Lord God, able?  If He is, then say these words:  "As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord."

I had a dream about Putin.  While you're giving, just listen to this.  I saw a spider's web and the next morning when I went to pray - I'm very adverse to spiders and spider webs because I got bitten once on the nose and I had to have surgery, it was so bad, so I always look out when I go to my garden.  In fact, I have a stick and I just hit it before me.  The next day, after the dream, I hit down a massive spider that was in a spider web on my pathway.  And I couldn't see it, have you ever seen people that walk into spider webs but they're further away and they're going (waves arms)?  You can't see the spider web and you think, what's the guy doing? It's very funny. But I had this dream and the next day I almost walked into this massive spider web on my way to prayer.  And it was basically this:  I saw the spider, I saw the web and God spoke about Putin, and this is what came out of it.  Spiders feed and fatten themselves on flies.  That's how they operate.  Let me give you a little lesson in case you don't know because the Lord sat me down.  And I said, what does this mean?  And He said, the spider feeds and fattens itself on flies and other little things.  And a spider's web comes from the creature's insides, so it creates the web from whatever is inside the spider.  The bee gathers wax from flowers.  The spider sucks no flowers yet the spider is able to spin out its material to any length.  Just think about that.  But there's one thing the Spirit said to me:  "a spider's web is very frail, but it is cautiously wrought."  These were the words I heard Him say, I wrote it down, "but it is not enduringly manufactured."  Now God can only say it like that; I wrote it down as I heard it.  It is curiously wrought, the spider's web, but not enduringly manufactured.  So I'm saying, but what's that all about?  He said, "The spider's web is no match for a servant's broom."  I know that there are literally tens of thousands of you that are actually getting what I'm saying. It's not going to take a mighty army to bring him down.  It's not going to take weapons of warfare to bring him down.  For God said to me, his web is no match for a servant's broom.  Someone that is deemed as nobody, but it shall take a servant to bring and break the spider's web and it will come down with not much effort.

God is displeased with the stench of man's blood and brothers' blood.  Cain, Abel, revisiting the earth that the blood of Abel would cry out.  And they stand and they watch to see what the nation of America will do.  Princes of darkness have seen opportunity, as you know, but what is My thought about this, says the Spirit of God? Angels have wept again as they see the scarring of the earth, the tearing of the earth and blood being drained into it.  No!  Now shall I do what I did when I heard of the sin of Sodom and Gomorrah?  Shall we go down to see if the outcry is as bad as what it is?  And He went.  But first He went to see Abraham before He brought destruction to the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah and innocent lives that were there that were taken advantage of.  He first stopped at Abraham's house.  What say you, Abraham? Abraham stood and said, "Oh God, do not take the cities if there were just 100."  What say you, Abraham?  For whatever you say, I will do.  And so it is today.  I stop at Israel.  What is coming from the hearts of the people must be judged by the Lord, the judge who judges with equity.  Yes, Yahweh, Yeshua, must be embraced for it shall be His Spirit that shall bring the blood to an end and His blood shall spread throughout the earth, says the Lord.  And God says, two, two shall die.  Two shall die, says the Lord.  A short one and a not so short one (God's humor), for I have seen and I have heard the outcry from the innocent and their blood cries before me.  Therefore, watch as the summer months continue and the turmoil continues.  I said to you I will defend the righteous and so I shall and I shall defend Israel and ecclesia, My church, says the Lord.

And in the fall, in the fall of the west, autumn, I shall bring one fall after the other and dispose of those who have begun to eye My people to destroy them. Can you take from this earth what they have tried to take for over 3,000 years?  Must I laugh at you, says the Lord?  Never!  For Israel is forever and My people are eternal; therefore, I rest My case, says the Lord.

Where shall we run to?  Where shall we run to? We've run from our homes and our churches and our synagogues.  Is this the day, is this the time of the end? And who shall I listen to, says the Lord?  Who shall I listen to? I will listen to innocence.

Today we call to you, that Isaiah said because I love you, Zion, and because I love you and long for you, Jerusalem, I will not cease to pray for you and I will not cease to call for you;  that from you will come priests and kings and from you will come fruit and wheat and wine again. And no foreign warrior will steal your wheat nor your wine.  No foreign warrior will steal your wheat, your fruit and your vines for they are mine, says the Lord.

The nations are raging, not against a nation or even nations, but against the Lord God of Israel.  Israel is forever!  My people have always found a way of escape. Today I speak to the leaders that are standing in My way.  I will send a spirit upon those who are standing against My plan and My will.  Russia, Iran, Hamas, who have you reproached?  Who have you blasphemed?  Against whom have you raised your voice and lifted up your eyes on high.  You have done it to the Lord, the Holy One of Israel. You have said, "by the multitude of our missiles and our mortars and our rockets, our mines and our traps, and our tunnels, we have come to the height of the mountain and we will finally rid ourselves of Israel and rename it."  I say, Israel is forever!  There you've built yourself an underground Gaza, of which I have exposed, and your desire to have a final victory on Rosh Hashanah has been brought to nothing.  Israel, a Messianic prophet is about to speak to you again.  Do not be afraid of the words, which you hear, the words of blasphemy.  For hear these words of Mine:  Thus says the Lord, by the multitude of My chariots, I have come up to the height to the mountains and I will follow the tall trees for I have dug and drunk waters and with the soles of My feet . . . listen! With the soles of My feet, says the Lord, listen to Me; I will dry up all the brooks of your enemy's defense.  Therefore, enemies of My holy land and of My elect, I know your dwelling places.  I know where you're going out and where you're coming in and your rage against me and because of your face and your hatred that has come up to My ears, I will also put My hook in your nose and My bridle into your lips and I will turn you back the way that you came, says the Lord. Listen, much to your disappointment, says the Lord, out of Jerusalem shall come a remnant and they shall declare Yeshua, Yeshua, Yeshua, Yeshua, Yeshua, says the Lord.

I'm prophesying right from the beginning.  The Spirit of the Lord is upon me to make declaration to the nations of the earth.  Now hear me out.  The Spirit of God says, Putin, I speak to you now.  King Putin, you call yourself.  Do you really believe that I raised up a king in the 80's by the name of Ronald Reagan to pull down a curtain and to destroy a wall that divided for nothing?  Did you really think I did that in vain, for you to stand and raise a wall and a curtain again? No, no!  Putin, get out of My way!  Get out of My way, says the Lord!  As I hardened the heart of Pharaoh for the benefit of My people, so have I hardened your heart.  I'm hearing a sound in my spirit.  For the benefit of My people, ecclesia, My church, My holy ones, My elect, and My land of Israel, I have hardened your heart, Mr. Putin. You see, I said I would lift My hand off Russia, off Russia for a season, and I did, and look what is happening.  You are unbridled, King Putin.  You are unbridled now, but I want you to know what I historically did to kings who took power and abused them.  Ultimately, there will be freedom for the sake of My people.  Oh troublemaker who would stand and terrorize the world, My world, says the Lord.  Therefore, I'll put My hook in your nose and My bridle in your lips and I will turn you back by the way you came and those who have survived and escaped will bear much fruit, much fruit, says the Lord.  That fruit shall be in Ukraine.  That fruit shall be in the nations that you have encroached upon to take for your glory.  I will cause a remnant to be raised up and bear much fruit for My kingdom, says the Lord.

Now hear me, as I speak to this man who has raised himself up and to the men who have said "to the end of Israel" and "to the end of the Christians."  Do you really believe after thousands of years that you can remove from this earth My people and My Spirit?  For as long as My Spirit is upon the earth, My people shall reign, says the Lord. Israel is forever!  Israel is forever!  Israel is forever!

You hear me, everybody watching.  The Spirit of the Lord came upon me this morning.  He told us it would be a strange July.  He told us that in the summer He would test this President.  There is another one that's risen up; He calls himself King Putin.  I am not against a man and this is not my opinion, this is the word of the Lord. Now, Putin, I have sent, says the Lord, a spirit upon you that shall cause you to return to your land, away from a sovereign land, because of rumors that you hear, and I will cause you to fall by the sword in your own land, says the Lord.

I have a mantle, says the Spirit of God.  I have a mantle that I'm about to cast upon the nation and then upon nations.  This mantle shall cause the earth to shake and split.  This mantle that I cast, this cloth that I cast upon America shall cause upheaval.  It shall cause chaotic expressions from My creation.  It shall cause My creation to say, "what must we do to bring them to the attention of the Godhead."  The Spirit of God says do not fear people of the Living God, for fear will only draw your adversary.  But listen, when you see these things transpiring - Ukraine, Malaysia, Russia and even the United States of America - don't forget the Balkan district - for I am raising up sounds that are coming from nations, from islands, that'll cause the earth to tremble.  It is now not the time to give up but to stand, for Israel shall have victory and it shall be a quick victory, but I shall cast My mantle, says the Lord.

Strange, strange July.  Strange, strange.  We're standing in the middle of it.  We're standing in the middle of a strange July.  Did I not tell you, says the Spirit of God that I would bring about occasions, moments, from the earth, from the nations during July?  A test over this President is at hand.  I am watching you.  You have been raised up to lead the greatest nation on the earth.  Where are you?  I look for strength, says the Lord.  I look for strength when Russia has decided to be the chief super power, where are you?  They have already crept close to your borders, to your seashore in a way that you never thought would happen.  Where are you, Mr. Obama, whom I gave strength, power, when you were nothing.  Now where are you? It is time to stand and speak for your nation, for My people, for I am jealous of them, and woe to those who call good evil and who call evil good.  Woe to those who call pure impure and those who say peace when there is war.  Woe to you, for I stand, says the Lord, and I woke My prophet today to speak to the atmosphere and to the kingdom of darkness - they who are ready to terrorize My people with fear.  No!  I laugh at you.  No!  For there are people who are praying and there are prophets who are being fed by Ahab.  There are prophets who are being fed by kings in caves ready to emerge and rise up to the occasion.  Summer shall bring disasters, challenges.  Summer, oh summer.  I look at you, and winter on the other side and together you are embracing the tumultuous moments, the tests, but God says I will cause a David to arise.

And as I was praying this morning (this is me speaking), as I was praying, I was struggling.  There was a heavy cloud and I said, Lord, what is happening? The nations rage against Your people, the nations rage against Israel, the nations rage against the Christian, the ecclesia of the church whom You are building. Where are you? And He spoke then. Suddenly it came upon me, and He said, Samuel, go find David!  Samuel, go find David!  And suddenly I realized, there is a David in the midst of us whom God has raised up to lead the nation.  This is a test.  I will go and I will find for the Spirit of God, and anoint the David who shall lead the nation. Mr. Obama has done what he can do, but now, God says, it is a test for him.  Summer is your test, for in fall the outcome shall be as a result of your reaction and your responses to what I desire as opposed to the desires of the enemies of the cross and the enemies of the throne of Christ, says the Lord God.

When I first dreamed about you, America, I heard sounds that I had not heard on the earth.  Sounds of the trumpets, the flutes, of a people that celebrate the richness of their wounded land.  And I dreamed about you, I dreamed about possessing a people who would defend children, who would defend nations.  I dreamed about men who would stand in battlefields and pray.  I dreamed about songs that would be written about Me, about men who would fight for freedom, who would fight for races, who would fight for equality and for freedom.  America, I called you to be My shining light and now I see a candle that was once on a hill, a lamp, being covered. Am I to tolerate this if I indeed am the jealous God?  You shall have no other gods before Me, was My commandment to Moses.  For I am a jealous God, visiting the iniquity upon the third and the fourth generation.  But yet the blood of My Son cries out mercy, grace, and I hear it.  Yes, I will restore you and this light shall shine in this nation again as never before that the world may know who I am.

You spoke to us today.  You challenged our leaders, told of things to come long before they happened.  What of Russia?  What of Ukraine? What of America? What of Malaysia? I have told you, what of Israel? For what takes place with Israel will affect these nations, says the Lord.
I returned from Israel and saw before my very eyes, another, we saw it in the news, Malaysian jet shot down by terrorists.  You're going to find out Russia's behind it.
I just gave you a little key, a secret about a future prime minister, a prime minister that is going to raise up the youth.  His name is Mayor Nir Barkat.

Guess what, there are angels watching over you. Israel, there are angels that are watching over you! And though your enemies rise up against you, there are angels that are watching over you and they're listening to what people are saying about Israel.

Although, I must tell you, I think with the way things are going with medical science, I don't think there are going to be bald people anymore, in the future.  There's going to be no baldness.  People are going to laugh at the photos that they're going to see and say, "Oh, look how funny that was."  No baldness anymore; no cancer, a thing of the past.  Spoken clearly, a sickness of the past.   Wires; wires no longer.  Not one wire, can you imagine?  We're going to be laughing, saying look at those ugly wires that were across the stage.  We're all looking forward to the future! You don't have to go to heaven to be wireless.

Would the throne of evil, which creates - would the throne of iniquity which creates evil by law, have fellowship with you, God?  Never.  But the throne of righteousness and the throne of purity has fellowship with You.  I pray You would strike down the throne of evil in our nation, in our capital, now.  I pray, again I say these words, would the throne of iniquity have fellowship with Yahweh?  No.  The throne of iniquity that creates evil by law, the throne of iniquity that has endeavored to create evil by law, cannot have fellowship with the throne of grace in this nation.  You will not allow it.  Therefore, hear the prayer and the cries of your people today, I pray.  I pray today.

The Spirit of God just spoke.  The Spirit of God addressed the capital of the United States of America, and therefore it seems to me that there is a, I caught a glimpse of a throne of iniquity creating evil by law.  We've seen that happen with abortion, we've seen that happen with many things.  But let me say this to you today.  God said, would that throne of iniquity that creates evil by law have fellowship with Me at the throne of grace? Never.  Then who is it that is able to shake?  Who is it that is able to literally shake the altar and move heaven and open it up?  The saints of the Most High God; the people who understand righteousness, the people who understand what moves God.  And today I pray that Your heart would be moved to look at this nation on this 4th of July weekend. On this Independence Day, we will not forget the words of Lincoln that His holy word shall be embedded within the hearts of America and Americans.  We will not forget the words of Jefferson, and Lord, those who stood at the very base of this nation and remember that their words will not fall to the ground.  There is a throne of righteousness. There is a throne of grace that creates laws of righteousness.  Let it be, oh God, from this weekend, let something change that we may see it.  Let the summer be as the winter, I pray today.

The summer shall be as the winter, a very interesting remark made by the Spirit. We're getting a whole lot of stuff from the Holy One, how precious America is to Him, how precious this nation is to God, how precious are the prayers of our forefathers, how precious are the words and the laws that were created by our forefathers, not to be forgotten.  God is literally saying today, I will not forget.  And for some reason, it's coming before Him in the summer of 2014.  For some reason, this is coming to me from the heart of God in the summer of 2014 and the winter of 2014.  Display Your excellence, I pray oh God.

God is saying there is no fellowship with the laws that have been and that are being created for evil in this nation.  I can hear some of you saying, "Enough - we have seen too much!" But God has spoken that He would shake and that it would change.  It almost seems impossible, but I pray for this nation, that the United States of America shall not fall.

Now listen, and I hear the Spirit saying this to me, Kim, I desire the worship of My people, and I never expected this, but so what - I was in my garden praying this morning and He poured His Spirit upon me, and as He did, I knew today would be a very important day.  He just spoke.

Please listen to this.  Now, this weekend of July the 4th, let it be known to you that as you celebrate your independence but not your independence from Me.  As you celebrate your independence, before Me comes a sweet savor, a sweet fragrance that is moving Me to change things during your summer.  Now things have happened like this before, but I'm sensing a fellowship.  I know it's weird, but a fellowship that God wants to have with you this weekend, this 4th of July weekend.  I sense that He wants to have fellowship with you.

However America goes, the rest of the world goes. I'm telling you, He has huge plans but He has to strike down the throne of iniquity that is endeavoring to have fellowship with the leaders of the United States of America to create laws.  It shall not happen.  Now listen to me.  There may be one or two that they try to push through, but God is watching and some things are changing, even as you're going to hear from Sunil about Hobby Lobby and what has begun was seen by this prophet years ago.  It's huge, people.  Listen, it's not against a party or a belief system.  It's not against the President.  It's whatever He says must be spoken out.  God will not allow the throne of iniquity, God will not allow the throne of iniquity to have fellowship with the throne of grace.  The throne of iniquity that creates evil by laws, God has one law.  That law shall come into being.  We pray for it for America, we pray for it for our nation.  We call to You, Lord, this weekend of independence. We call to You once again to come and have fellowship with our nation, Lord God, and with the righteous leaders that You are raising up.  That is my prayer today.

I think one of the things that came to me while I was here, one of the things that came to me clearly was when the Malaysian airline went down.  And the Lord spoke so clearly to me that day.  It's going to be revealed, it's going to come out, but there had to be this terrorist group that came and which we've been sharing about.  I think the time is coming now.

The kingdom of darkness has looked upon the nations that have yielded Christ to the multitudes.  There are wells that a generation are going to dig, that fathers have been digging, and your enemy will say, "Your wells are stopped up and I have them by occupation. Laws have been made, so I have stopped up the wells."  So what, says God's prophet! We are digging new wells now and I will cause new resources to come from many different regions and areas, but the digging that is taking place are the prayers of My people, are the praise of My people, are the prophesying of My prophets.  As they continue, God says, wells shall spring forth. In the fall of this year, as you see great numbers falling, as you see great leaders (or they call themselves great) beginning to stumble and fall, remember these words:  the wells of life are beginning to spring up for this generation and for you, says the Lord.

There is land to be taken. There is land to be taken, that I have kept and reserved from nation to nation.  There is land to be taken.  There is debt to be destroyed and I have spoken before there is property, property, property that I have unleashed, unlocked for you My people.  The children of Israel, the first thing that I told Abraham, I will give you land, I will give you land to possess.  It has not changed says the Lord. There are enemies on your land that shall be destroyed today as you stand and make My word known says the Lord of hosts.

Angel's tongues singing.  There's a land that I called, America.   Land that I set aside for My light to be spread throughout the earth.  In one moment a celestial ray spread throughout this nation.  Can light go out?  Can light that I have sent be put out?  Never.  Though darkness has come, so My light has shone even greater.  I speak to My people, and yet the enemy has said, "the land which you must hope for is after your death."  Not so, says the Spirit.  For My people were told to take the land.  And He said these words; send men to look at the land.  To see it, to want it, to enjoy it.  And they went out and they took the fruit, the pomegranates and the grapes of the land and brought them to the people.   Look at what you're about to possess.  Look at the fruit of your land.  But alas there were those that stood and said, "but also on this land are giants and we are not able." The spirit of Caleb is once again upon My people.  Not the spirit of ten men that came back with fear.  That came back with unbelief.  That came back shaking.  That spirit has been defied by Me says the Lord and what has risen is the spirit of Caleb and the spirit of Joshua.  For this generation wishes no longer to hear about the giants in the land but the fruit thereof.  Caleb quieted the people and said, "Let us go at once for we are well able to overcome and posses the land." I speak to many that are watching all over the world.  He spoke to me as he does every week or shared with me that he wants to release property.

But there's one thing He said to me.  There will be a death in this country; it is the death of debt.  Some say, "How is this at all possible.  How could this possibly be?"  This is not for you to calculate or reason says the Spirit.  But if you would believe My word I will give you the land that you are seeing.

Because Israel, Israel, for what they have done to young men, what they have done to young children, this that has just happened, I will cause it to turn around.  For have I not said to My servants of old - Israel is forever!  Israel is forever!  I will turn this around, says the Lord, and I will expose hidden forces that have already planned many other attacks.  And because of what this President has done by releasing these that they say will do no harm because they will be watched, ha! They will not be watched!  They will draw out other groups to come and to demand from the United States of America and to demand from Israel.  But God said, I'm already turning things around and setting it up so that this nation shall rise above this. Israel, I told you from Mt. Carmel, (Mabit, Mabit), God is watching over you.  Therefore, I will reveal this in the next week, says the Lord, and show you that I will look after your children for they are the future of Israel and they shall not be touched, says the Lord of Hosts.

I speak not only of Israel but nations that have sought to bring My name to nothing.  Can you bring breath to nothing?  I am the eternal breath, says the Lord. I speak and it returns not to Me void until it is established, that which I've set it out to do.  Today I will expose, I will reveal, for you have entered into a time and a season of "undercover," where I will bring out from the covers the truth.  For there have been too many lies, one lie after the other, covered in high national positions that have affected the globe, that have affected the seas, that have affected the skies.  America, you're not as secure as you think you are.  But in My kingdom, there are people that are praying and there are prophetic words and the truth from My word that will preserve My nations for the purpose of extending My light to the next generation, says the Lord.

There are two "E's" that I see.  One "E" is the word "erupt."  The other is "earthquake."  Many are prophesying about earthquakes, but there is a national park where there is an eruption under the earth.  For it to come out, and many say, "it is just simply an eruption."  But it is not.  It is a sign that I shall contain that which would try and be destructive in this nation.  A volcano as a sign.  And then there will be another earthquake, says the Lord.  Keep your eyes open, for this sign is to cause the earth to yield of its produce that the great "E" may come forth rapidly.  This is My promise, says the Lord.  Therefore, take heed today as you come to Me and strike the rock. I will release that which has been held back from you and cause triumph to be sounded in your mouths, says the Lord.

I feel like there's going to be dancing all over Israel.  Even though they do tha,t because of an incredible victory that God's going to give them.  Because the enemy has endeavored to smother them to suffocate them.  I believe that there will be great rejoicing even during this summer because of what God is going to do when He is going to break the bones of those who would rise up again against His chosen people. This is His word and therefore we celebrate with them.

Summer - Summer reaches to spring and to fall.  I will be the mediator, says summer,  I will uncover, I will defend. My sun will shine. But yet beneath the earth, yet beneath the earth, there is a rage.  Eruptions, summer says, Why choose they me?  Why do the tornadoes, the hurricanes choose me?  I am summer.  I bring smiles.  I bring sunshine, I bring warmth.  Yet there is a tumultuous rendering that is coming.  I stand to protect spring but fall you are rebelling. Or is it that possibly the spirit of God will cause many to fall in fall?  Then there is the earth that wishes to tremble, shake for the nations of the earth stand waiting.  He is quiet, he shall not return. This God is too quiet.  But My mercy endures forever.  However there is an uncovering of great evil and I will start from the top.  I have shaken the Democrats and will shake the Republicans even more.  But remember when these tremors and when these tumultuous moments happen. Summer says, I will take it so that the fall can do its work in America.

I've been sent here for a reason.  I know that because I don't go anywhere unless I know there's destiny because that inspires me to prophesy.  And in standing here, I can sense that the Spirit of the Lord is saying, this nation is not going to go into captivity again and this nation is not supposed to be handcuffed again and their minds put into a control system that would take away their joy.  You can see it on their faces, and God wants people to smile and to be happy and have good relationships.  This is what I sensed many years ago and we're going to speak about that today.

God sent us a beautiful man, and I prayed for this, actually, before I got here, that I would connect with somebody that had the heart of God.  We hear all the time about it's the end of time, it's the end times, it's the end of time, and I say to people it's not the end of time.  Christ has a huge plan for the world, to revive and renew us and to show us His Son.  I sense that here in Ukraine.  I sense that His Son wants to be a part of this and He wants to manifest Himself, and not just through big mega-churches, but in the streets.  This is where it's happening.

I really sense that there's going to be an intervention.  I sense there's going to be a divine intervention.  In fact, I call it today from this very square, that there will be an intervention of God and so I pray that that would happen.
(KIM THEN SHARES ABOUT THE PROPHET'S BOOTS AND PRAYS OVER UKRAINE, THAT IT IS NOT GOD'S WILL THAT THEY BE DOWNTRODDEN)

You can go to any news media, people, you can go anywhere and hear whatever you want to hear. We are here to present the will of God.  What is the will of God? Every news media is telling you about the bad and the evil that's going on.  We can see it; it's here.  But what is it that He's telling me?  He's telling me that they will not go into captivity again.  Now, there'll be a short period where it seems like it's over, but I want to say to you, it's not.  It's not.  I am here for that purpose.
God has said, No more captivity for Ukraine.  No more captivity for Ukraine, and that's what we believe.

Am I, the Lord, to be insulted?  Am I, God, to be dictated to and told, "He is unable?"  What about Ukraine? What about Russia?  You think I have looked away?  No!  I have prepared to strangle, to throttle the princes who have raised themselves up and called themselves kings before their time.  This next week I will show you as a people that your prayers, your proclamations, your provision will make a difference.  This nation has stood through much but now I will rattle and shake each one of those who have usurped authority.  Many would say the nation is going down, but God said the only way down is up.  I will show you that I will humble My people in such a way that I will cause the bright and shining star of this nation to shine like it has never shone before.  And then I will take the people of Ukraine and I will remove them from the stronghold of that one calling himself "King Putin." King Putin, who are you?  Nothing without Me.  Therefore I will do it and I will do it swiftly and out of the ashes of Ukraine I will bring glorious light and My church will prosper and My light will shine in Ukraine, says the Lord.
(As Kim is praying for the nations of the world, He states:  Awake the glory of America, England, Ukraine, Russia, the East and the Middle East, South America, Norway, Sweden, then prays for Germany)

God says, Watch out, watch out for Germany. Watch out, says the Lord.  The enemy has endeavored to tempt her again, endeavoring to tempt Germany to join forces with the wickedness of this earth.  But there are saints in Germany; there are prayers coming from Germany as well, but yet it is being tempted at this hour to join forces or would stand and be passive.  How can you be passive when it was in your land that you saw anti-Semitism? How can you be passive when you saw in your land the oppression of the Jews?  And it is rising up again, where the Jews are being looked at, says the Lord, where Israel is being looked at for the Jews in Ukraine and the Jews in Russia and the Jews in Germany and the Jews in Europe.  God said, Would they go through a holocaust again?  No!  It shall never happen again, for God said, once is enough.  Now they have returned to My land and because they've returned to My land, I shall rule from Jerusalem and I shall rule from Israel, says the Lord.

He said to me, I will do something highly unusual and you keep your eyes open because this weekend he would do something.  He already started, before we even uttered a word, after we uttered those words, it started.  All over the earth, God began to move, but He started doing it because He's hearing at least 26,000 people stand before Him and lift up their faith.  For 35 minutes you praised Him; 40 minutes, you praised Him.  Now we're going to do something that will break every plague, force, curse that is coming to you or your nation.  You may have heard this before (goes into the story of David and the plague that come upon Israel because he had counted the men)
God has already spoken in the heavens.  Something highly unusual is going to start happening during the month of March.  Through these next few weeks, watch and it will manifest in your life as well.
He said to me in the month of March, President Obama is going to have the greatest test of his leadership thus far.  His test is coming now.  You must pray for him.

At around 2:03, Kim and Sunil were discussing the dream that Jane had years ago regarding orphans, thinking it was Serbia.  Kim proceeds to ask Sunil if Ukraine was a divided country?  Sunil said "No."  Kim then stated, "I think that may just happen."
Kim proceeded to ask Sunil if Ukraine was a divided country?  Sunil said "No."  Kim then stated, "I think that may just happen."

Many of you are keeping your eyes open for what's being exposed this week, revealed this week, emerging this week, very interesting.  And keep your eye on California, keep your eye on gold (and we have some truths about that); keep your eye on "David", we spoke about King David, many beautiful things that were shown to us.  Russia, Ukraine, as prophesied, what's happening now, Syria.  All of this is going to be released, or if you wish, exposed, and much of it destroyed in this year of 2014.

I want to give you another little signal that I didn't know about when I was prophesying (referring to last Saturday), but last night when I walked into the living room, I was on my way to the garden to do my evening prayer, I heard something being announced about a movie that's about to be released, Son of God. Do you know about that? I don't know when it's going to be released, what day, does anybody know?  Friday. When I walked by, the Spirit of God said, "Stop. Look at what's emerging this week." And that's another sign.  I know that's a little ambiguous, but please listen to me, what is being released and emerging this week, and these signs, are for us.  Keep your eyes open because, I don't know what else to say about it except that the Spirit said to me to just look at what's happening because this is the future of America, to bring restoration, spiritually, to this nation, and that's what's lacking right now.  Keep your eyes open because God has beautiful plans for our nation.

The Spirit of God says, My people have cried.  My people have cried out for an answer and this is what I have to say, says the Spirit of Life.  A veil has been placed upon this nation and I did it.  I did it so that for a season My people would wonder and faith would increase, for in darkness faith grows.  In despair, faith grows.  I did it.  But now, My fury has ended.  Hear Me, for I have found a man after My own heart.  I have found a man after My own heart and he is amongst you.  He is one of the brothers but singled out for Presidency of the United States of America.  But hear the transcription of God upon the heart of His prophet, how the gold has become dim, the stones of the sanctuary are scattered at the head of every street.
