You know what the problem with us is? We give up too easily because we heard a word and we don't see it manifested. He said go look a third time; the man went looking for a cloud somewhere on Mt. Carmel, looking at the sky. They hadn't had rain for 3  years. He came back and said 'nothing.' Elijah didn't stop and say, 'My God, what's happening?' He said, 'Go back, for that which you have never seen shall be seen today.' He didn't attempt to run back to the brook. He didn't attempt to run back to Zarapheth. He said I want you to look ahead because there's got to be a cloud in the sky because rain is coming. You know why? He said, 'Because I can hear an abundance of rain.' He didn't say he could hear a little bit. He didn't say he heard a drizzle. He said, 'I hear the sound of an abundance of rain.'

He goes a fifth time; he goes a sixth time then goes back to Elijah and says, 'I tried, but nothing. What must I do?' Elijah says, 'We've tried six, but I hear the sound of abundance.' How many of you hear the sound of abundance? And yet you've looked and there's nothing. Have you continued, have you pressed in? Have you continued giving and praying - because that seventh moment is upon us. That seventh moment is upon many, many businesses all over the world and many of you watching me that don't have businesses - that moment is upon you now. If I've heard it, you've got to see it before you can get it.

I prophesy to every one of you now that there is a realm of craziness and there's a word God has for you at this very minute to get this to happen. If for Jacob, why not us? If He could do it for Jacob, why not us? If He could do it for Isaac, why not us? You might say, the New Testament tells us we're supposed to be poor. Who told you that? It says that Jesus became poor that we might become rich in our souls, in our spirits, in our bodies and in our families, relationships and our businesses. We are a people that are going to make a difference in the world today. There's the word from God.

"...and today My word to you is let go and open your eyes, for today I will open doors and bring prosperity to your businesses, to your industry, to your ministry, to your artistry. Today shake off that which you have held onto for I open a brand new door for you, says the Lord.'

This is what I'm hearing: There are people that have stepped out before and it hasn't worked, so you're afraid. God says, don't fear, don't fear because I watched you as you took the step of faith. Today I'll honor that faith so take a step out of the boat and say, "Why not us?! Why not us?! Why not us?! If Moses could prosper, why not us? If David could prosper, why not us?! If Abraham could prosper, why not us? Why not us?! Why not us?!"
TEACHING ON JONAH AND HOW PEOPLE HAVE AN ATTITUDE TOWARDS GOD'S GRACE

Do you have an attitude against God's grace because He loves America? He loves England, He loves Australia, New Zealand, He loves Singapore.  He loves these nations and He's showing grace towards them and yet those that are acting against Him and rebelling against Him, He's dealing with, as He is dealing with Syria and yes, He will.   God says, Do not look at what is happening in Syria and America and Russia, China, don't look and say, God will do nothing because America will stand still.  God says, You don't even know what I have within Syria; you don't even know what I have within Iran; you don't even know what I have and what I've prepared already internally.  You see, people, we seem to think that unless America gets involved, and unless Israel attacks (which is very important at the time) that nothing will happen.  But God says, Don't ever forget that when Jehoshaphat stood and he got the people to praise and he got them to praise in the presence of their enemies, that God set ambushments against those nations so that they attacked each other.  God said, Watch and see what I do, for the noose is prepared for Syria; the noose is prepared for the nations in the Middle East that have defied the Lord God Most High.

Look at what's happening today with Russia; you see the Cold War era waiting to come back, a re-visitation of the Cold War.  How did God do it in the Cold War era at that time?  He had a Ronald Reagan, and it was Ronald Reagan that stood up and took away the tumor.

Now we see that this tumor is trying to grow again and trying to come back to where there will be this coldness between Russia and America, to try and bring back that era.  I see it happening.  To me, it tells me that there will be another kind of Ronald Reagan that has to emerge; that has to be raised up so this will take care of the tumor within the nations of the world. It's history repeating itself.  I'm telling you right now what is going to happen after Barack Obama, you're going to see what is going to start transpiring.  It may not happen in the very next election but maybe afterwards.  You'll see as this accumulates, this threat of war amongst nations, God will once again raise up a man that will deal with it.  That's what I'm looking to.    I'm saying all of this so you can see why I look at the seventh day, or the 7,000th year, as a year of restoration or a year of cleansing.  That's the bigger picture, but the ritual was that they had to be washed by blood.  In the offering and the sacrifice, he'd sprinkle blood over the leper and then they'd have to wash them in water.  Then there would be a seven-day period and then they'd be cleansed.  That's the ritual of the Old Testament.
Kim states:

It's like with Joseph they tried to put him in prison, they tried to keep him down but eventually he came out.  A really unusual thing is going to happen in Egypt because of this prophetic thing that I got about Joseph being in prison right now and trying to destroy it.  I feel like it's going to probably be some of those Coptic Christians that are going to rise up and have some really powerful influence.  How it's going to happen, who knows?  Who would have thought for a second that Joseph would wake up a prisoner and go to bed that night the right hand man to Pharaoh? So I'm really very excited to be on the border here, feeling like it's an enemy but you know there could be a friend there.  And even though it seems impossible who knows, let's see what happens.

dateLocation: August 26th, 2013 - the Sea of Galilee, Israel
paragraphs: The Spirit of the Lord says, I have watched and I have heard the prayers of My people.  You laugh with Me at those who would scorn and those who would say, "Israel you are done."  But I have hidden myself in certain nations, says the Lord.  Egypt - I have already placed another Joseph in the prison in Egypt.  It's too late, says the Lord.  There is a Joseph that I have placed in the very heart of Egypt and he is in prison, but God says, they will face the same consequences and Israel will be the ones that will take the spoil, says the Lord.

I have prepared the noose for Syria.  There is a noose and you know what I have said.  Now is the time and I will let a light shine on Israel and America and certain nations that have been weak and Russia shall be brought to shame for I shall pull her pants down and reveal her nakedness and her weakness, says the Lord.  But today in Israel, here is the good news, says the Spirit of God.  I will bring youth, young people, from the Middle Eastern nations and they will join hands and there shall be a covenant made between the youth of Syria and the youth of Israel and I shall raise up and put My Spirit upon them and they shall break the curse that has existed between certain of these nations.  I have raised up sheep in wolves' clothing and I will pay them back for what they have done to Israel.  Everybody in this house, say it again, Israel is forever!  Israel is forever!  Israel is forever!  Everybody raise up your mantles.  Raise up those mantles that you have in your hand!  For the generation that is upon us, God said, I will cause them to prophesy.  Your children shall bring the light into the nations.  When the Warriors raise their mantles, they do it with an attitude!   PROPHETIC SONG  Israel, Israel, I've gathered you under My wing. Jerusalem, Jerusalem, I came to you with My light, I came to you with My light. Know I gathered you under My wings.  Have I forgotten you, Jerusalem? Have I forgotten you, Jerusalem? Or have I watched you until this day? Israel, My love, My light. Have I forgotten you, Israel?  Have I forgotten you, Israel? Once again, I will gather you under My wings.

Russia! My Spirit has moved away for a small season.  Your ambition has offended Me, says the Lord.  Your ambition and your taste for power has offended Me.  Therefore, I will teach you a lesson, says the Lord.

Forget all these numbers they're throwing out there.  In the soil of this nation, and above and below, is enough to clear that debt (the debt of this nation) and put us in a place where we can say to OPEC, we have our own resources.  You've stolen from us for too long!

The nations are itching, the nations are hungry for war.  The nations are crying for war.  "Give us blood," they say.  "We want blood!"  Have you not had enough blood, says the Spirit of God?  Blood from children, and what has happened to My shepherds throughout the earth?  As Ezekiel saw it, and Jeremiah saw it, and as Christ saw it, the shepherds have scattered.  Where are the shepherds?  They have run from the intimidating force that says, "Give me a man!"  As Goliath stood, they stand and they prod. "Barak Obama, come, come and give us a man that we may fight and show you our strength!"

But the Spirit of the Lord says, I have young men and women, 16 yrs. old, 17 yrs. old, 22, 25, like David, and they do not want to hide under the armor of Saul.  God says, there is a new way and yet there is an old way.  I have a stone for this generation; I have the stone for this generation.  That stone is My Son.  That stone is the Rock, Christ Jesus, and that stone shall be given to the Davids of this generation and they shall bring down the force of hell that is crying from Russia, from Syria, from Iran, from all over the world, crying, "give us blood, give us blood, give us blood, give us blood!"  But the Spirit says, no, there shall be no world war yet, for I've yet to show you the manifestation of a rock in the hand of a generation that shall bring down the voice of hell.  This is My will!  Look for it, for it is coming, says the Spirit of God.

The Spirit of God tells the people watching, why fight and rage against each other?  The shepherds are scattered.  Why, when I stand and I watch My house become a den of thieves again.  Do not tell the people lies - do not misrepresent Me.  Rumors of war?  Yes, but I have yet to give you that which I have kept for last, the glory of God that shall cover the earth with knowledge and manifestation as the waters cover the sea.  It is yet to come before I return.  You are the generation that shall defy death.  And there were those that were lost in the battle, Gregory, a soldier to be multiplied throughout the earth, and many others.  The Spirit of God says, come to Me with tender hearts and let My prayer come to pass in John 17, I pray that they are one as You, Father, and I are one.  Let the spirit of unity come upon us today and let the fragrance of that unity come before the Lord as a sweet, sweet fragrance.

I want to tell you to pray for this government, pray for this country, pray for your safety, you see how easily, you see how quickly you can lose your defense. Here you have a person, Snowden, who's given out secrets. There is a breach in our human, carnal fortress and now everybody gets afraid. But you know what the Bible says? And I believe in this word, it says that we are protected as the people of God, as Israel, or ecclesia if you wish, which is grafted to the branch, to the tree. We're protected by the prophetic. That's what it says. In other words, when God speaks something, He is not a man that He should lie. And if He says something, and He promised it, will He not also perform it? If He said it, will He not also do it? That's what Numbers says and the Bible speaks about a protection that comes beyond our natural defense.

The thing with Snowden is going to end very, very abruptly and cause even more trouble. I want to document just a few dreams I had while I was in China.  One was about the Coptic Christians in Egypt and another group of Christians that I was very burdened for, and I have more about Egypt again.  The other one, I was doing a huge concert in China and I couldn't get the words and I was trying to find somebody to teach me the words.  There were children that we had on the stage and I couldn't understand why they were so friendly towards us and then I got a very, very clear vision about the year 2018 yesterday, which was the 18th, when I was in my garden.  The Lord said to me that on the 18th day of May, 2018, Israel was going to experience something of a great freedom and peace for a while and that we are to be there in May on the 18th.  I didn't realize then at the time while I was praying that was actually the 70th anniversary, I may have known it but I didn't think about it when the Lord spoke to me yesterday.  It was clear that He said we must do a massive gathering in 2018.  We'll do something before that, but He said to me, "I want you to fast like you never have before," and He gave me some instructions for five years, until the year 2018, on the 18th day of May.  Then He said something, He said China will even fight for Israel, fight for them.  I don't know if this is a war or what it is, but He said they must be very careful.  I'm saying that all now because I think that's in the future, quite a bit in the future, some of the stuff I got in China but only got clarity on it now when I reached the garden.  I just wanted to tell you about it.

Because we're in the region, I've been very super sensitive to the Spirit and the spirit world and my praying.   And while I was in China, I had moved down to Guangzhou, where we are now, and two nights ago I was awakened about four-something because I heard something.  I heard (Kim does a big sighing sound) and I got a fright.  It sounded like somebody right next to my bed, sighing.  I haven't got the interpretation for it, but I do know that it was not light; it was darkness.  It was almost like the enemy was breathing out, almost frustrated, not because I'm there but because God is confounding them all the time, these enemies.  There's a Spirit that Malech Yahweh is in China, in this region.  That's why I wanted you here (to Sunil) because I wanted my team to go to Korea; I want you to be on the border, as close as you can get, on the border of North Korea so that we can be there, we can report before it happens, because things are going to happen in the next few days.  So tomorrow, maybe even later on tonight, I don't know, we'll work out a flight, but we need you and the team to go there.  I have to go to Yong to see what's going on, the little boy with the tumor, otherwise we'd be with you, but we'll send you tomorrow with a team and you'll go there and report because you've got some stuff that's happened already.

God's Spirit says, Listen - here Me now. I have set aside a season during the summer shall be called the season of great harvest, shall be called the season of the one hundred fold. It shall be called the season where people went out and they picked of the fruit of their labor. This is a season, a time, where there will be a great harvest, says the Lord, where summer camps will be invaded by My Spirit, where summer schools will be invaded by My Spirit. I have set a time aside to invade schools and homes of children. I will raise them up, wipe their tears away, take away spirits of heaviness, and replace it with garments of praise, give them oil of joy for sadness, and to give them healing. This is a season during summer where I will bring a hundred fold upon My people who receive it and who declare it and who live it. I shall do it during the summer says the Lord.

Out of the bitter shall come sweet; out of the bitter shall come sweet. Out of the wrong shall come right. Out of the evil shall come good. There is no loss in the Kingdom. That which has been taken from you, I will give back during summer. Listen to me. I will give it back to you but I shall not hand back what was stolen two times, three, five, ten, but 100 times. If you can receive it, then do. If you cannot, then you will not receive it for that which was stolen from you, I wish to restore 100-fold. I know there are literally hundreds of thousands of people that will hear this that will suddenly say, "Yes!" And if you've heard it before and you say, "I've heard that before," remember that there are times that God sets aside to restore. That's right - a time for war and a time for peace; a time to die and a time to live. There is a time for everything. Now you're entering a time of restoration of your goods, your financial property, your homes - your relationships that have been stolen. " I will restore," says the Lord. Now everybody all over the world, lift your hands and say, "I receive it! The thief came to steal, kill and destroy but today I receive the life and the word of the Lord!"
Talking about going to China

We're about to leave for China and whenever God sends us on a mission there are moments of despair, especially when you are a prophetic voice, because you know that you have to deliver something. Bob Cathers came here and told me, "God's not sending you there to adopt another child, or another two children, only, or to visit the orphanages or the healing homes that you support. He is sending a prophet to China as a statement to do something." It's what He does. You don't have to say a word; it's the presence that God sends to a nation, forerunners. John the Baptist was a forerunner. I see that China is going to be filled with light. I have prophesied that for a season the United States of America and China shall be in agreement and in a pact. No, don't look at me and say it's not in the Bible . . . (goes on to discuss Genesis 26) By the way, this is one of the things He said to me today while I was praying. "I want to restore visions and dreams and signs back to My people in fullness. Many of you watching are going to receive signs from God if you believe it.

We're going to start the whole month of May, which is a week from now, as we end the 70th day, after the prophecy that I gave in November about January 21st, between 70-100 days, the python would be destroyed. If you've been suffocating at night, if it's been difficult to breathe, how many would relate to that? If anybody has found the last few nights that you've had bad dreams, nightmares, you find it difficult to breathe, you woke up anxious, I want you to know it's the end of an era of the spirit of pythos. (Invites people to watch this Saturday's Prophetic Alert). Don't miss it because you're going to find out that something miraculous is going to happen and this country is going to feel breath again. If you have had bad dreams, if you've had suffocation or you feel like you're suffocating and you've woken up anxious, very anxious, don't worry. It's the force that is desperate, trying to control your finances, your love, your relationships, your children, and that spirit of pythos is coming down.

Not only do I say it with faith, I prophesy it because we spoke it a few months ago and I want you to know that that is what is happening. If you've been experiencing this, I experienced it last night. I woke up battling to breathe. (Talks about taking a deep breath, etc.) If it happens to you, don't worry about it. You have spiritual warfare and you have the power to overcome this thing but you also have a prophetic word about what's going to happen at the end of this hundredth day. If you don't know what it is, join me Saturday, etc. You're going to sense the presence of God and the end of pythos, which means we're entering into the month of May free from suffocation. Believe it or not, take that as a word and a sign for you, summer is coming!

I want you to know, there's a global outpouring about to take place and God looks at the church, ecclesia, to see what they are doing. Judgment begins in the house of God. Then He decides how He's going to deal with the nation; He looks at the church first. We've got to stop these silly pity parties because it just takes you to a place of no vision, and that is what the prophetic is for, to give you insight and vision as to what's about to happen. Everything we spoke about since November last year is coming to pass. Even tragedies that are happening, out of the bitter will come something sweet. We're coming to the end of this 100-day period where He promised that the eggs of the python would be destroyed and that we would be entering into a new era of economic growth and spiritual growth, first of all, and watch what happens. It doesn't matter if you don't like Obama and his administration. God said, "I'm going to take charge because of what My people dictate, what My people say. If My people say blessing, I will bless. If My people say cursing, I won't curse." There you go.

God wants to bless but He's looking for an occasion to bless and the occasion of the people of God that have prophetic insight who speak it out. It's not just a matter of being positive. It's a matter of saying, "This is what I have seen and I refuse to say anything else than what I've seen." The Spirit of God has just said to me that the people that are watching need to understand that I cast a mantle upon this generation. I've cast a mantle of truth upon these people that would say YES to the Spirit of God. It is time for you to realize that the strangulation is not against you but against the spirit of pythos, which is divination. What is that spirit? There are spirits. There is darkness that is endeavoring to cover the United States of America, the United Kingdom, Europe, and all over the world, and God said, "It is not possible for it to happen if My people would rise up and take charge against the spirit of divination, which is lying, telling a lie about Me. It is misrepresenting Me. I am strangling it myself. As the people of God realize it is the end of a season. I want you to rejoice. I want you to take a deep breath now." This is the word of the Lord, now.

Take a deep breath! Blow it out! This is a spiritual action; this is a prophetic action. You're doing it like the prophet who lay on his side; the prophet who ate the scroll. Do it now! Breathe in three times and breathe out. This is the Word of the Lord. We didn't know what was going to happen because He didn't want to tell me first. The power of strangulation, the power of suffocation is coming to an end. You say, "Kim, I've heard that before." But those who believe it, those who believe it, shall have it. How do I strangle this force? By saying the Word of the Lord that has been spoken. It is your end; it is your end. I am going to breathe. My finances will breathe, my relationships will breathe, my spiritual life will breathe, my soul will breathe. I will breathe, my family will breathe. We will breathe freely because the breath of God is upon us now. Now Lord, I take authority over that one more time. I want you to breathe in, take a deep breath, everybody. Now breathe out! Like Jesus said, the wind blows where it wants to. No man can predict and say where it should go, which direction it should go. Wind of the Spirit, come, breathe, because that is what you came to do. There was a sound of a mighty rushing wind on that day of Pentecost, the day we approach, where once again the Spirit will breathe upon His people. Now Lord, free every person that has sensed a force of suffocation. Today I release them from that suffocation.

You may say, "Kim, I've got lung problems." Take it now; if it's physical, take it now. I mean this. I'm ministering a word from the Holy Spirit to you. There is breath available; it's around you, it's in your house. I told you there'd be a sign. There'll be wind blowing outside. You'll sense something now. I'm not making this up. Raise your hands; close your eyes. For every person that has suffered some time of suffocation; strangulation, battling to breathe in whatever area it is in their lives, barrenness, whatever it is, this month of April, You promised us You would open it up. As we come to the end of it, Lord open up the spiritual lungs, the lungs of the soul and breathe now. Close your eyes. Breathe upon each one right now. He sprung a surprise on me and started giving me the word about "now" suffocation is coming to an end. I've said that before in my teachings and it has in individual's lives, but this is more of a kingdom word, a national word, a global word for the people that have been struggling and suffocating, if you wish. That's the spirit that we're dealing with now. God sent His word but He's gone through all these different things to you. If somebody sends a package from Europe to you and there's a storm and the flight has to be delayed, you might say, "How can you relate that to God?" Why not? The angel had a word for Daniel and the angel came and 21 days after Daniel had fasted, the angel got there on the 21st day. But he said to him, "From the day that you set your mind to understand and to pray, the Lord heard you." That was 21 days prior to that; the angel got there 21 days later. I feel a word coming to me about this, that that word, that desire, that promise, that thing that you've prayed for is on its way. But the angel said to him, "The Prince of Persia has been at war with me and I've overcome him and now I have to go and fight the Prince of Greece." So I just want you to understand we don't know what's happening in the heavens. Keep praying, keep thanking, it's on its way. Everybody say, it's on its way!
PROPHETIC SONG
America, America, He's chosen you. He's chosen you; He's chosen you.
Do you remember your beginning? Do you remember where you started?
I was there in times of war and I was there when you fell down, America.

And I was there when you fell on your knees. Yes, I was there and lived it too. And I was there when you cried and I was there when you left and when you failed I was there and when you won, I was there. Will you remember Me when you come into your promise? Cause I'll be there through your pain and I'll be there when you fall. And I'll be there when you pray; I'll be there when you win.

I prophesy to this nation that the curse be broken that came between 70 and 100 days. The spirit of pythos, the spirit of suffocation, is coming to an end and we will celebrate that because he gave me the keys. (Goes into singing "He gave me the keys") I'm opening the altar for every soul, every life to commit to Him and I speak this word that God told me to speak.

On Codebreakers, we're going to show you today how just a few utterances from the mouth of God could bring about signs on the earth. Long before this month of April, He spoke of 70 to 100 days, what would happen. In November, I had a vision. I saw a python and God said between 70 to 100 days it shall begin, the strangulation and the destruction of this will begin and it is going crazy. It is manifesting throughout America because it is dying. You may not understand spiritual warfare and diablo and satan and demons and darkness, but it waits for an attraction. It waits for an invitation and as I've said, there has been great division. But also, it was spoken of that beginning January 21, there would be a period of between 70 and 100 days, the spirit of pythos will be destroyed if the people act accordingly. What you are seeing in America, maybe you call it terrorists, maybe you call it just incidents, it's not. This spirit is dying and doing its utmost to destroy as many states as possible, make its mark. It'll be leaving and we'll show that to you today.

I'm not going to do anything more until we come to this altar today. I wore this purposefully (jacket with wide gold bead trim on the sleeves, holds up forearms), it's the gold and I'll explain that in a few minutes because He spoke to me about watching the gold as a sign. Let me just be a prophet and wear that which was given to me, or made for me specifically for Israel. Israel is forever! America is forever! Let this fragrance come before You from the people of God that are giving, for those who are finding it even difficult as they take a step of faith and say, "Here it is; it's a fragrance to You. It's my thanks for the promise You have given to our land, to the people." As this nation mourns, there is hope for You have promised that it would happen.

As we are in this month of April, You said there would be openness, open, open. We've seen so many miracles and yet we saw the lashing of this power of hell to bruise our nation. As they watch all over the world, the Netherlands, Germany, Estonia, Belgium. Indiana, Indiana, Florida, Rocky Mountains, Mississippi, Louisiana. No! You shall not strike at them! Let the fragrance of this offering that comes from Your people. As David stood as the plague of death killed tens of thousands and he stood and he said, "God, take my life, but no longer take these people!" - as David stood, God spoke to him and this is what He said to him: "I want you to find a piece of land and an altar." Joab told David, he said, "Do not do this thing" (number the people) because his confidence was no longer in God but in the strength of his army, as this nation has been and many other nations. No, they're not coming from outside; they're inside. I prophesied that already, but we have the power to stop this plague. (goes on to read the story) I spoke it out, the curse that would come and that which would happen between the 70th and the 100th day, since the inauguration of President Obama and the reelection of Netanyahu, it is now. Over the Passover it started and we're almost to the 100th day, which is May 1st. The vision I had was between that period of time, the spirit of pythos would begin to die in this country.

What is pythos? It is strangulation, suffocation. Enough now, please, of us prophesying more doom to this country. I see the light! You see what's on here (holding up his forearms)? This is not real gold, but something the Lord said to me this morning, He said, I want you to take this jacket. It represents gold, and you hear me out, please. "Kim, what are you saying?" Watch the gold! "I don't know what you're saying." Keep your eyes open! It is a sign, not only naturally (materially, if you wish), but also spiritually. Many of you are saying, "I believe this principle that you're speaking; I'm going to do it today." He said, "Kim, I want to bless this nation." As much as there are people out there saying, "I wish it would just crumble because we don't like President Obama", stop it! This nation was raised up under God's hand for the prosperity of the earth, so they would give and help. God wants to put gold into your hands. This is not a prosperity message; this is the Bible. I'm asking God to watch you as you come and place your offering on the altar. There's always a way to give, people, but do it right now because the plague is stopping, the curse is being broken the python, which is a demonic force of divination, is being destroyed.

(starts singing "There's Gold in the Fire") Remember something, gold is purified by fire. Fire again upon the nation; purification and gold, which speaks of faith. I see an America filled with faith again. Do you see it? (sings "Gold in the fire") I feel that cancers are being broken; I feel that there are sicknesses and diseases that are being healed at this very moment right now. There is a man by the name of Mr. Clark and there is also another man by the name of Donald. You are both watching me, saying could it be that God is speaking to me? Yes, He is! Somebody, just a few minutes before you came on the show, you went out and you took the American flag and you said, "I'm proud of my nation." You raised it up, and God said, "You have been determined through your prayers to influence this nation." You're watching me; you're an influential person. The Spirit of God says, "Hear the word of the prophet to you as a king, I will open that door that you prayed about and when it comes time for the election, you will be elected." I'm speaking to someone in Kenya right now. You're shaking; you're literally shaking because in Africa that same spirit has said "I will take down good leaders and I will replace them with corruption," but God said, "I will smash them down. Kenya! Will you be a light to Ganda (Uganda?), will you be a light? South Africa, shall you once again yield the gold of my faith to the world? I say yes, oh yes, oh yes, oh yes."
DISCUSSING HIS FACEBOOK POST ABOUT AN ATTACK IN THE SOUTH AND SOMEONE NAMED "PAUL"

We now have heard by His prophetic wisdom that there are more attacks planned internally; I call them "lone wolves" that are out there to destroy and I saw the south. Today again, the Rocky Mountains, but He also said, pray that this will be exposed so there won't be any further death, unnecessary death. We're always going to be attacked, we can't always spiritualize it, but this specific attack came within the 70-100 days of the vision that I had. That makes a difference because that's the entire month of April. The 70-100 days is the month of April. Amazing! So keep your eyes open. When He speaks about gold, don't go out there and say we must all invest in gold, buy gold. Do it if you want, but there's a lot more to it when God says that. (Kim and Sunil go on to discuss how the python needs or is attracted to "dust.") What I said was, the nature of the python is it has no sight and has no hearing, or very weak, so its tongue detects chemicals in the atmosphere, specifically dust and its drawn. When there's movement, there's dust and it's able to attack its enemy. I related that to dust, man being made of dust, carnality, flesh. If you're living a flesh life or a carnal life, you're not in the Spirit a lot and some of the decisions you've made are out of flesh and out of reasoning, it causes this dust and causes this spirit to come to you.

That's why I said America is very divided and it's so sad. The political parties are divided, the senators are divided, the whole House, the church is divided, religion is divided. This attracts a spirit because that division is actually dust. At the first hockey game in Boston, you saw unity. It wasn't just patriotic unity, there was something there. You could actually feel it was spiritual. If anyplace needed unity, my God, it's Boston, and that region, the northeast that I spoke about. This unity, you could only have two people united together and God is there. That's a very important thing to understand. The Bible says, "Where two or three are gathered in My Name, united, I am there." That's all God needs is a little bit of unity to overcome the spirit of division which is caused by diablo, which I said is the devil. "Dia" means divide, and "blo" means to breathe, he speaks to divide and that's what he's done to this nation. But it's changing, and I'm praying within this period of time there'd be enough unity amongst religious and among some political leaders to where it'll come before the Lord as a beautiful fragrance and a lot of this will be negated and stopped.

I'm awake in California and I feel that this search for these "terrorists" will end soon. However there are lone wolf individuals who are trained to "cripple" various States in the USA. These States need to be protected. Their "souls" need to be protected. Their enemies are determined and motivated. I heard the name Paul.

I was lead to pray for various States and the South was a concern. Let's join together and pray for exposure. For God to expose the individuals who are plotting an attack in the South, the Mountains and against the innocent. There is a Cult that is ready to do anything to destroy our faith. They will be exposed. But will it be too late? We need to pray that God intervenes as He did with Saul of Tarsus. GO!

There is an urgency in my spirit because yesterday I was led to go into Beverly Hills, to a certain place and pray. During this time, I was in the presence of three different people within a 15-minute period. You're going to find this very interesting. Anthony Hopkins, then Sidney Poitier, and then Larry Flynt. There are times when God will wake me up and command me to go to a place and wait, and ultimately, through divine alignment, and being at the right place at the right time, God allows me to either pray for these individuals or just be in their presence. Yesterday was one of those days. During last night, I had many dreams. It wasn't so much who these individuals are, but what they represent. I'll share with you in a little while what it represented.

The first two men are 'Sirs' - knighted. One was born in England - Sir Philip Anthony Hopkins - and the other, Sir Sidney Poitier, born in the United States prematurely. He should have been born in the Bahamas, but he was born here. He was, notably, the first African American to win an Academy Award for Best Actor and appointed a 'Knight Commander' of the British Empire. Mr. Poitier was born in the 1920s and Mr. Hopkins was born in the 1930s. Then there's Larry Flynt. During my time of ministry in the 1990s and early 2000s, I was a prophetic voice to his family, and I'm not allowed to share the details today. However, as most of you may know, he is the president of Larry Flynt Publications, which unfortunately was listed as #1 on the list of the 50 Most Powerful People in Porn. Larry Flynt was born in the 1940s.

During an unusual visitation last night, in the early hours of the morning, which really drained me. I understand now how Daniel felt when the Spirit came to him - Malech Yahweh, the angel of the Lord, to reveal to him what was about to happen. I know that what's about to happen in America with three different groups is massive. That is why I cannot change my mind regarding God's hope and plan for this nation - plans for prosperity and plans for good because He's not finished with us yet.

God spoke to me and told me that each of these represented what I had heard in my visions in February, which you're going to experience now. Each one of these men represents 'firsts.' In other words, they did something that nobody else did. They were pioneers in their various fields. Sir Anthony Hopkins represents British aristocracy; he was once plagued, also, by alcoholism. Sir Sidney Poitier represents African American aristocracy. Larry Flynt represents the perverse generation who are spiritually impotent yet extremely powerful and influential. I say that because God doesn't only come to the healthy - He comes to the sick, whether you're an aristocrat or whether you're a pornographer. It makes no difference to Him; He's able. That's what He showed me as I was in the presence of these three men in a 15-minute period, really quite amazing. I'm not star struck in any way; in fact, they should be star struck and in awe when it comes to the prophetic word and to the light that shines through Jesus Christ. Sidney Poitier has my book, signed by myself. I don't need to tell you all that.

What is important today is that you sense and get caught up in that cloud. There is a cloud that is present. Christ was caught up in a cloud when He was taken on the Mt. of Transfiguration. This is not just super spiritual stuff. When I do get these revelations, it's very important that each one of you that follow and support and stand with me and consider me their spiritual leader, that you take note of this and not only listen, but open your heart spiritually because it will be transferred to you today, that I promise you.

I wept during the night as I was called to pray for these three powerful men. You've got to understand something - God loves them all. He loves them all and each group that they represent, there's a great need for an invasion of spiritual light. I'm talking about the light of Jesus Christ. It was revealed to me that a new breed of believers is emerging to take the baton and invade these kingdoms and I have a feeling that because I was so perfectly aligned yesterday to do this, to be prompted to do this, to go to a place where I had not planned to go, that it could be that we are going to experience something immediately. We're going to share with you what God has already shown me about North Korea and China and America. These are very important things to keep up with.

I was also reminded about Philip in the Bible who was directed by the Holy Spirit to go down and walk along the road to Gaza. He didn't know why he was going there but he was one of those men who was prepared to do whatever the Spirit told him to do. On the way there, there was the treasurer of Ethiopia, the right hand man to Candace, the queen of Ethiopia, in his chariot on that road. Philip was walking next to the chariot and heard him reading Isaiah. Next thing, Philip was in the chariot of one of the most powerful men in Ethiopia. Please notice, as well, an African man. And he revealed to him the truth of Isaiah, and as a result of it, the treasurer gave his life to Christ and became a believer. They stopped the chariot and he was baptized in water and as he came out of the water, Philip was translated to another place, something like 68 miles away. These kinds of unusual miracles are going to take place again if there are just some men and women that are prepared to go by the prompting of the Holy Spirit. If He says go, then you need to go. If he tells me to get in a car and go to an unscheduled meeting or place, then I'm going to do it. I've done it over the years but I'm wanting this to be transferred upon you so that these kinds of unusual things can happen again and again and again and we can get out of repetition of trying to win the lost in such pathetic ways. Many of us have tried, but God is releasing something, a new realm - actually, an old realm of evangelism that is coming back to a people that are stiff-necked. We're going to change that; we're going to be some of the first to do it.

The Holy Spirit spoke to me clearly today and with urgency to take you into these moments (referring to the vision he had in February). I felt the Spirit of God telling me that during the next 30-40 minutes, you will be drawn into the Spirit and what you'll do is you'll start tasting of the age that is to come. I'm not talking about after death; I'm talking about an age of great revelation, great prophetic expression, great freedom, spiritually. We're going to start tasting it today and it's present and about to be manifested. I believe your bitter is truly going to become sweet today. (Prays)

There is a warfare that is going on, a spiritual war that is raging.  Do not say this could not be possible. How do you know?  Have you been in the caves of darkness?  Have you been in the canyons of hell where they plot and they speak to bring down the people who are called by My name?  Have you been to the high place?  Have you, says the Lord?.  Do not say there is no darkness that can cover me.  Do not say that this darkness could never overwhelm me.  Yes it can.  There is a war that is raging this very hour.  They are causing a madman to see himself lifted up and high; lofty.  In North Korea, his hand shakes to throttle America, Israel, South Korea.  He has said, "I will make nations bow before me under my hand."  Therefore there is a war that is raging that this morning I caused my prophet to see and understand and to defy it by My word.  As I have spoken before, his hand trembles to send death to the coasts.  Oh people, pray, pray, pray, PRAY!  For I shall hear My prophets and I shall act swiftly, says the Spirit of God.

I have aligned; I have aligned them.  There is an alignment that they only hear the sound of authority that comes from God.  In the beginning did I say there would be light?  Yes, but what words did I use?  What language did I use?  Did I speak English?  Did I speak Aramaic? What language can contain Me?  Why would I be limited to a sound, to a language?  No, in the beginning, music spoke from Me.  The sound was music.  Light as it comes forth today to strike down that which would try and detune, cause My sound to be out of tune, says the Lord.

Father of Light, giver of gifts, truly, if man would understand the power of his spirit, the influence upon the universe of one single soul that carries Your breath.  You spoke, revealing to hundreds of thousands of people that which is happening in the heavens.  What else matters now?  Our problems, our woes disappear when Gabriel comes and stands.  Is this hour less than the hour of Daniel?  Is this time less than the time of Ezekiel, Isaiah, Elijah, Nehemiah, Nahum, John the Baptist? Let the spreaders of bad news be silent and let those that have insight to the Spirit breathe, live, live, live to declare with me throughout the globe, throughout the earth, He is alive and He has broken the power of evil for this moment again.

What I saw when I was captured and I went between time and space and eternity; it was like I was going through a curtain, through a doorway. Why did you send me to this nation, why did you send me to end my life in California?" And as I was praying, the Spirit began to show me things. I saw emblems for the prosperity of His people. Then he came again and he said, "O, highly esteemed, Daniel." When he came to Gideon, he said to him, "Mighty man of valor." I heard these words, good words, from Malech Yahweh; I heard these words coming from Him: "The angel of the Lord has been commanded by the light of the people who are praying; he has been summoned by the people and he is resting his feet upon nations while the battle rages, setting a flame to those who are ready. I heard him speak of this nation and other nations that he has chosen - Asia, singled out by demonic powers to cripple this nation. I say, "Ha!" The time is coming and now is where it shall be revealed, but how unusual shall it happen." I saw emblems; I saw two crowns. I saw two crowns, golden crowns, an investment. I saw two big leaves and they were blended together. And then something unusual happened. I was taken into the atmosphere and I saw the formation of a planet. I'm not even sure in my own mind what this means; I don't know, but I saw planets being formed, planets that were not that will be, and in their formation, a strange light and an energy. They shall say, "There is no such thing as that planet," but it is something that is being formed at this very moment for the purpose of My people. "You are that important to Me," says the Lord, "that I would do something that is not yet and bring from it and fashion that which will make you and your children prosperous. Do you believe that I'm able to do it?" Come on! It's beginning already, come on. It's beginning already throughout the earth! You're not even seeing it, but in the streets of L.A., the streets of San Francisco, I'm moving! My light is moving throughout the earth! Another Jesus revolution!

I hear the sound of fear. It is not amongst the angels of God; the hosts of darkness and evil and wickedness that have made plans, that have made plans for this time and this generation. Thus says Malech Yahweh, the angel of God. Not so with this generation! They shall go to the land of the Philistines to sharpen their weapons. From this moment until your eventual transition into Heaven, (God has saved the best till last), you will know unprecedented favor ... favor with God and man ... favor in finance and property ... favor with kings and princes ... favor over your enemies. (Psalm 91)  Your favor is not earthbound.  It is from Heaven to Earth ... favor as a citizen of Heaven living on Earth.   The Lord has a question for you that is designed to provoke a dialogue, a mutual conversation, between you and Him.  This dialogue will release you into a new encounter with Him.  You will receive a fresh spirit of wisdom and revelation that you may come to a place of refreshing so huge, it will encompass you and all who follow you.  Your favor will overwhelm the tribe that God has given you in the Kingdom.  They shall rise up to occupy a place in Christ far above all situations and issues.  They will learn that if they are in Christ, so are all their circumstances.  They will learn the stance that God requires in their circumstance.  In this new place that you have already encountered and entered, the question that the Lord would discuss with you is this:   "Kim, what would it take for you to believe that I AM unceasingly magnificent towards you?"   Come, talk with me and I will open you up to a place in Christ undreamed of by you.  It is unprecedented favor from Heaven to Earth.  You are entering Heaven by encounter and seeing rooms full of gifts and favor that are exclusively yours.

Favor unsought will come from men and governments.  The Lord says, "Talk to me about unceasing magnificence!  As we talk you will learn what you have been given.  All of Heaven is attracted to Jesus in you!  As you learn what you have been given, so the blessing on your life will move into unprecedented levels of provision and power."   Kim, wonderful to see and watch you today,  Graham Cooke

We need testimonies of healing from cancer that must come in so it can be repeated upon this life and the lives of many, many people all over the world that have received a prognosis about their future, about the cancer in their lives, or whatever it is. God says, "If you can smell poverty, then you are not smelling what I am, for what is coming to My nostrils," says the Spirit, "is a fragrance of prosperity and it begins by taking poverty out of your soul, by taking poverty out of your praise, by taking poverty out of your prayers, by taking poverty out of your knowledge, by taking poverty out of your speech. It's the law of attraction - a gravitation and doors shall open up to you. You shall see where to invest." And God said, "Once you've begun investing in the kingdom, I'll show you the places where you'll dig wells and they will say, 'This well belongs to me; that well belongs to him.' God says, "I'll cause you to dig your own well like Isaac did, and as a result of it, he had his own prosperity and he put his name there." God says, "I want you to put your name on your well and there shall be a well of prosperity that shall come forth even in the midst of poverty." This is the Word of the Lord. "And to you, Kim, you shall be one of the philanthropists that are prophetic in the kingdom of God and give, and give, and give!"

What's happening right now is that I'm taken beyond the veil.  I'm hearing so many sounds that I've never heard before.  Again, the elderly and the children, an amalgamation of the two voices.  It's the strangest sound; an old voice and a young voice, and it's together.  It's like there is no age in the sound.  I'm in the Spirit and very seldom does this happen to me but at least I have my composure, and this is important, for the few seconds (or whatever it was, I don't know even how long it was), I sensed, I heard (I couldn't see) sounds that I have never heard before.  It was not wicked; it was beautiful.  The hearts of the fathers back to the sons.  The Spirit of Elijah that is coming upon the earth, like we have never seen before.  Why do you think he wants to kill our children? A sound like we have never heard before; I have never heard.  I hope I live to see it, but there is something beyond this veil, a way that we could never imagine.  I pray, Lord, that each Warrior would receive just a glimpse of this future; that You will rain upon land, upon land, upon land, upon schools, colleges, prisons.  Let the church emerge, that we know about, that is in existence.

Now Lord, I'm back in the year 2013.  This was 2027.  Where will I be?  The children You've given us to look after and the many thousands and ten of thousands that we will reach? (Kim begins to weep)  I saw Emma!  I saw Emma! (weeping)  I saw Emma.  There will no longer be some of the diseases and the brain problems and sudden breakthroughs, forgive me, please. Somebody else must take over. When you're caught up in the Spirit, it's difficult to maintain your composure.  I caught glimpses of stuff, a president that we've spoken about; a young boy, 2027.  Lord, I pray for strength in every person's life right now.  I pray, Lord, our children, our grandchildren, our descendants will be blessed, that they will possess the gate of their enemies. America, you were chosen to take the light of the cross. You were chosen to take the light of the cross; You were chosen to take the light of the cross and spread it through the world. Because you are chosen, you are chosen, you were chosen To take the light of the cross to the world. You were chosen to take the light of the cross to the world. You were chosen to take the light of the cross to the world, And you're still chosen; you're still chosen. America, the light; America, the light is still in you."
KIM DISCUSSING THE COLORADO KILLER

The enemy has attempted to harm the soil and the soul of America by targeting innocent youth. Now remember something, this is the Year of the Youth. The enemy of the soul of America and Israel is desperate. He wants to destroy the soul of our youth. This tragedy, as we know, was absolutely senseless. However, I've said this and I wrote this on Facebook, out of the ashes of this kind of tragedy, God always arises and there's always divine retribution. The enemy knows that when God focuses on a certain gender or age group, he musters his finest officers to plot and attack against whomever God has focused on. Remember what happened with Gabby the beginning of last year when we prophesied about the Year of the Woman, the many great things that happened? Look now, how the enemy has seen the great things that God was doing and has been doing through youth, to reach the unreachable, and now his attack. And there's going to be another. So I want you to know that it's time for us to pray. Sunil asked me a very pertinent question, a very important question, "What should we as a people do when we hear such a word that you gave, that it's not over yet in Colorado? Should we have fear?" And I said, "The people of God do not have a spirit of fear, but be vigilant. Be watchful and pray for your protection, that not much harm will be done. Who knows what more could have been done? Twelve people were killed; that's enough. One person's enough. It could have been worse. And by the way, I feel like there are other things that this person had planned. Maybe our prayers stopped a lot of it.

This is for that one moment where I prophesied with my team on our instruments, as David did.  Do not harden your hearts against prophecy.  Do not harden your hearts because you do not see it happening immediately.  Do not harden your heart or despise prophesying when it comes from the Spirit of God, for in so doing you despise the promise of the Lord.  God will move when He wants to move, not when we decide it should be done.  God is the judge of the earth and God is the judge of the hearts of men.  God knows what is right.  "Now there are storms coming to this nation; there are storms coming to this nation.  There is a turmoil going on.  There are storms coming to this nation and some will look back and say, 'Could this be as bad as Katrina?"  God said, "I will protect; however, it is as a result of that which is taking place in the heavenlies.  The earth is responding; the earth is reacting, but there's also a man-made weapon, a vicious weapon to manipulate and to control certain portions of the earth.  It shall be exposed; however, there shall be death and there shall be loss of lives but I shall bring this to an end abruptly."  Do not despise when the words of the Lord come and these words are life.

"Canada, keep your sword; keep your shield in front of you.  Do not let it down, for they are focusing on you.  And even in the winter, there shall be those that shall say, 'What has happened to the Gulf of Mexico?  Wisconsin, Las Vegas, Colorado, you have held on as the fire has come, but this is just the beginning.  No!  Do not say it is judgment," for God says, "this is the earth that is responding, but I will destroy those who have eyed the nations that I have put My hand upon.  I will take them down as I have promised.  Now the time is coming; it is closer.  I need you to pray.  I need My people to pray.  Pray that I may take away this mass destruction that is planned," says the Lord.
(Goes into prayer, asks God to intervene for America and for Canada.)

I've been on a journey of visions, not all the time, but what God deposited in me is coming back to me.  There's been a tremendous amount of warfare around me, attacks in the night, not that it's anything unusual, but it has intensified.  I thank you, Warriors, for standing with us, for praying.  I carry a message.  There are many men and women that carry messages to the nations, but when you have access to the conversations of the enemy, you stand in a very volatile position and a very vulnerable position.  The enemy focuses in on you.  I pray for your protection, I pray for your agreement that the enemies of Kim Clement be held off.  Lord, I thank you for Your protection and for the people that You've surrounded me with.  Bless them; keep them when destruction comes, redeem their lives from destruction, I pray and I thank You for it.  (Prays that as he changes keys, that the Lord would change things in the Spirit and in the atmosphere for God's people.)

One of the things I wanted to tell you, when I was in the visions, I sensed danger.  Now we're going to show you a clip, a little portion of what I explained about the forest.  I was taken in the Spirit.  Sunil asked me earlier to explain this to you for those of you that don't understand visions.  It is exactly that, it is a limited access to something.  Sometimes I see very clearly; sometimes I'll have a vision like you saw me that day.  All the information is transferred into your soul, your spirit, but you don't know it all.  It comes out later, in stages, because you cannot contain all of that information.  You can contain it in your spirit, but your mind can only take so much.  So, a lot of it's coming back to me.  That's why I told you about the danger that I sensed when I was above the forest and got the letters "A" and "Q."  We're getting a little bit of understanding on that.  I was taken quite a bit higher after that, and I just caught a glimpse of that today.  What I sensed was danger and I saw the following things: woods (not wood, woods); I sensed fire, metal that was melting, great hailstones, and the smell of earth after being ravished by floods.  So I think there's a period of time where we're going to see this happening. But I knew that there was more, and there were signs of massive spiritual warfare over America and Israel and many other nations, and the termination, which does not necessarily mean the death of, three powerful political leaders who will be brought down and I'm hoping that some of them that we're going to speak about today are those.

I also heard when I was over the forest, words in another language. I couldn't translate it; I thought it sounded like Greek, but it didn't seem to matter.  I received the insight of what it was, and the words that were spoken were "Weather Warfare." After I heard those words, I was taken to a higher place and I heard some kind of explosion.  It sounded like it was muffled, almost like it was in the earth and then suddenly I was focusing on Canada, like you heard today; Las Vegas, Chicago, and then the Gulf of Mexico and the situation in winter.  I also sensed the fires of Colorado were just the beginning, not in Colorado, but of these outbreaks.  The fact is, this nation is crying out for a manifestation of God.  I kept saying though, "It's ok, it's ok, it's ok," because I felt like even though it was bad, it was ok.  Having said all that, you are now going to see some of the results of that and I will share more with you over the next few weeks as things come to me. Of course, the greatest is about the future of America and who is going to be our president and leader of this nation.

And then the Lord said something strange to me, and I didn't want to share it because I start breaking because the Spirit is an incredible entity and force in my life. He said, "Put your hand by your ear," and I went like this (showing how he put his hand by his ear) and I heard so many voices, loud voices speaking. I pulled it away and He said, "Put it near your head." Then I heard these words, I heard them in the Iranian language or whatever it is, saying "We've lost 78 of our, 75, 76, 77 - 78 leaders. Leaders in the armed forces have broken away, we have to kill, we have to destroy them. And I pulled it away and I was hearing the conversations of Assad and different generals about who was rebelling in their forces.

Please don't get me wrong. It's just that suddenly I would put my hand there and I would hear so clearly, so I know that something's happening where I'm being taken to another level of hearing for the kingdom of God and for these people. Keep praying with me because I'm getting an understanding of when God takes your hand and anoints it and many great things are going to happen. Whatever you put your hand to will prosper. Whatever you set your hand to. Many times in the Bible, they say about the hand. He is the shade of my right hand. Something happened to my actual hand and to my very physical body, as I put my hand closer it's like everything accelerates and I can hear. I had to share that with you, it's something that's happened to me and I wanted you to know about.
WHILE PRAYING OVER OFFERING

There's really something right around the corner for Alzheimers. I feel like this is a sign to us to really pray because I want to see an acceleration of his decline because too many people are being hurt and destroyed. That's what I heard. I heard - 75, 76, 77, 78, and they were saying, "That's too many, it's too many."

"I did not raise up this house likened unto those who kept the Ark of the Covenant in the house and the house became blessed.  For David said, 'There is a mountain that I have built so that the nations of the earth may hear the sound that I have heard.  I heard that sound,' King David said, 'when I was in the wilderness and when I cried out and I said, "As the deer pants for the water, so my soul longs after Thee." And so, America, your soul is saying, 'As the deer pants for the water, so my soul longs for You.'  I raised up this house and gave you what it takes to reach the world.  There is a new technology that is about to be released.  Ludicrous, they will call it."  But God said, "It shall cause My word to be sent within split seconds throughout the earth."

"You (to Mike Hayes) have been raised up," says the Lord, "with the technology that you have, to go to the capitals of the world; all over, the capitals of the world.  England, the United Kingdom shall never be the same again.  I will give you a castle and you will take it and say, 'This is what we are going to build so that those in England, those in Europe, will come and will proudly stand.'  "I will give you a castle," says the Lord, "and you will announce that the Lord Christ is in England, the Lord Christ is in Scotland, the Lord Christ is in Ireland, the Lord Christ is in Russia.  I will give you the capitals of the earth and you will watch it from Covenant Church and say, 'We are shaking the world! We are shaking the world! We are shaking the world!"

"There is a sound that has been kept," says the Spirit of God, "even for this hour. It has been hidden and it has been covered, but," God said, "it's about to be opened up to a generation who are crying out.  We have had a famine of hearing.  We cannot hear; we do not want to hear.  But that famine of hearing has come to an end.  Young men and women will cry out and say, 'We want to hear the sound.  We want to hear the sound of life.  We want to hear the sound of light.  We want the infilling of the Spirit.'"  And God said, "It shall not be as in the 1948 revival; this shall be the freshest, the newest thing that I shall do.  They shall stand and watch it on their screens and through the screen I will touch them.  They will feel the tangible presence of God coming through the screen, coming through the screen.  And they will say, 'We want it.' And the Spirit of God will fill you and fill this generation and they will shout the name of Jesus from north to south and from east to west," says the Lord.  There's so much more, but we don't need more.  It's being imparted upon you.  Let that Spirit fill you, the Spirit of knowledge, of wisdom, of revelation in the knowledge of Him.  Let vision multiply.  People are crying out, "It is the end; it is the end."  The Lord said, "That's when I begin to work."  (Kim turns to Mike Hayes)  The Lord told me to sow into what I just prophesied.  I don't know the details of it, but I saw these key capitals of the world, and being smart and excellent, and people will come and they will want to hear, and God will give you properties everywhere, but it will be broadcast on the big screen.  Like Matt said to me one day, "If Jesus was alive today, in this hour, on the earth, He would be using the technology that we're using, as you are.  I want to put my money where my mouth is so we want to start this offering today with a $50,000 deposit into this that I believe is going to happen.  There are many of you that understand now that this vision is far bigger than we could have ever thought about or imagine.

But you started to break up the fallow ground and it was hard and it was difficult and it was controversial and people didn't believe, but I believe God's got a scripture for you in Amos 3:8 where it says, "The Lion has roared, God has spoken and who can but prophesy?" So you have to let it go; you have to breathe like that. Your breath has to go in because it's "breathful" but it's also a "tornadic" force, it breaks up hard, religious ground.

People don't like it, they're jealous of it, they're cranky about it, but it has to be done if this nation is going to be broken up. So you broke it up a little bit and then they got even madder and so you realized that you had to go on and you had to do what you're doing on television today. It will be an $8M center but it will go even larger than that because He's taken you from national, now, to international prophet. I was saying that at Pastor Dick Brunelle's last Friday when we were ministering, that you were a national prophet, but actually He wants you to be, not wants you to be, you are, international, with what you're doing in a worldwide realm, and money is going to come to you from the Middle East, from unusual places, and you're going to dip your foot in the oil of Asher.

The reason I found that interesting, was today I'm going to speak on what's going to happen in the month of July.  I'm calling it "the month of multiplication."  When God gives a promise, you receive it or you reject it, one of the two.  There's no middle. So you either say, "I say yes to what I've just heard . . ." because in the vision I saw multiplication during the summer.

The prophetic word, when spoken, gives light in a dark place so that you can be led into a greater place.  So He spoke to me about the summer and the fact is that there is a month of multiplication.  In other words, He's going to multiply your talents, just like the young man wrote, multiply your wisdom, multiply your knowledge, multiply your finances.

When I was caught up in the Spirit, God said many things will be seen in the summer.  The effect that the global economic crisis is having on people all over the world, its affect on the United States of America (goes on to discuss).  I want the month of July to be one of your greatest months.  It is a prediction by church leaders that July is one of the worst months for the church.  I defy that today.  I say that there'll be a multiplication of knowledge, of joy, of wisdom.  There'll be a multiplication of finance and there'll be a multiplication of my supporters, givers.  It's a great year!   A great, great, great year, and the grand prize is going to be November! The grand prize is going to be November. We'll talk about that later, ok?

Can I just say something here again because I'm hearing this and I feel like if they, I don't know if this is the A.Q. but it certainly seems like it, if they try and touch Israel, which we know they're going to do anyway, that, first of all, God may kill him.  Did you say something about Assad? (to someone in studio) (Sunil says it was just in the news that Assad has declared all-out war against the rebels, meaning he will not withhold any weapon or any tactic to keep from gaining victory against the rebels; we may be seeing even more violence, etc.)  We may see a double death; I feel that.  It's time now; it's very close, anyway.

I'll start with some of the things I saw. I'm also going to tell you about Firepointe. It's very important that I share as much as I have seen since then. In other words, I saw a lot. It was too much for me to handle at once but God did that on purpose because He's revealing it to me as time goes on. At one point, I saw eyeballs and then I was aware that blindness, physical blindness, was a thing of the past. Don't say that'll never happen! People have said that in centuries past and it has happened, the moon, space, let's go on. Think about it for a minute. One of the things Elisha did was he was able to take from the earth, from the trees, and he was able to heal, take poison out of a pot, restore something that was lost in the water, and he did that because he understood the power that God had given to man to have dominion over the earth and over creation. I'm not saying you're going to go around commanding trees to bear figs but what I'm trying to make you aware of is that he has given us the power to see and to prophesy and to predict things that will come to pass but have got to be spoken first.

I almost was aware of a procedure, a fusion, that had baffled medical science that emerged and had taken away blindness on the earth so that there would be no more blindness. That was one of the things that I saw. There were visions, voices, vices and victors. I'm just throwing that in so you will understand that I saw the vices and I saw the victors. I saw the things that would grip people and how God would set them free. Hold on please because when you hear me speak now, you're going to be taken aback in some moments and worried in other moments but remember something I said to you, there was no fear. I was caught up for however many minutes it was , and in those minutes it's like millions of things were being thrown at me. So you and I have the right to request of God to take us to places, visions, to give us visions so we can see beyond the now. Don't ever forget, and consider this, that we, as servants of Christ, are stewards of the mystery of God. We are stewards of the mystery of God. There are mysteries that God has and ultimately reveals them at the right time. Everything in its time is beautiful. He reveals them at the right time. Therefore, judge nothing before the time. I'm encouraging each one of you, do not judge anything before the time, until God appears to reveal the mystery. He'll bring to light the hidden things of darkness to reveal the dark counsels of the heart. The reason I'm saying that, things are in the dark doesn't mean that it's wicked, but He'll bring out things that are in the dark and He'll bring them to light. There will also be a few exposures during the summer in high political realms. Let me just say this before I share any more.
READING FROM ACTS CHAPTER 8

The angel doesn't take him (Philip) there; the angel instructs him. When I was having that experience, I heard angels communicating with each other. I subsequently went back to Daniel and I noticed that there were angels discussing things together. Daniel was getting access to their discussions all about the end times. We're going to speak about Armageddon for a minute and about nuclear and about different atomic powers, but let me just say this to you, it's not that time. I'll reveal that to you in a minute. The angel spoke to him and said "I need you to go a certain way." (Tells the story about Philip and the Ethiopian eunuch and Philip being caught away and being transported or translated 43 miles in a second.) (Kim tells briefly when he was once translated many years ago.) What I sensed here, when I was having these visions, it was almost like I was taken, my spirit was taken to various locations to see various things. Let me share the visions with you so you can understand. I'm giving this to you about Philip to show you that these things do happen, even physically, he was transported. I believe in visions, I believe even in trances, Peter was in a trance in the day and he saw things, and an angel came and ministered to Cornelius and so on. It's very important that you understand that these things are available for us today. You qualify and I'm going to share what I saw in some of the visions.

I was suddenly aware of two angels, they were speaking to each other; they were not speaking English or the English language as I know it. They were speaking in another tongue. They were discussing the plans that God has for His people on the earth and for a number of nations. You saw what happened to me; I was picking it up and I heard them and I actually spoke the tongue that I heard them speaking. It was almost like I was standing there and then it came into my body and I was speaking their tongue and their language. I suddenly became aware of danger. It seemed like there were signs of war. What frightened me was that there was talk of a destructive weapon and I heard this: "They're looking in the wrong place. It's hidden." And so it was like I was catapulted hundreds of feet in the air and I was above a large forest. I think some of you even heard me say that. It was like I was hovering above this massive forest. The color seemed dusty with hints of yellow and - like mustard and yellow. It didn't seem like a normal forest and this country contained something extremely dangerous. I was aware of the fact that as a prophet in this age, I was in a similar position as Elisha was when he started seeing and hearing the plans of the enemy. Why not today? Why would it only be applicable thousands of years ago? The word is alive, Jesus Christ, the same yesterday, today and forever. Why not us?

And therefore, I'm praying and pressing in for more, for something greater, that the gift of prophecy through the prophet and prophetic people would not just be on the vein it has been, general prophecy. We have to be able to find where those kidnapped children are. We must be able to say, "Don't go to the psychics. Don't go to Long Island. I want you to come to the prophet. Come to the Den to find out what is hidden, and I'm pressing in for it. That's why I'm fasting and praying for a higher degree, above the natural, above that which we already have. I truly believe that God is imparting that upon each one of you so you'll be led by the Spirit. Angels don't necessarily have to guide you all the time. The Holy Spirit can guide you, but angels can also guide you to a place of great victory where you can be transported, not physically, transported from your situation to another situation. That's possible. The thing about it is that during this time the sensations in my body were changing all the time. One minute I wanted to cry; another minute I wanted to laugh. I could feel these feelings and I was seeing too much at once to contain it. You may be saying, "Why would God do that to you?" I loved it1 You have no idea how it feels to have your soul whole and full, so full that it's flowing. David said, "He anoints my head with oil and my cup overflows. I understood that. It was overflowing. It was beautiful sensations in my body, my soul, my spirit. Purity, power, in one amalgamation. It was just amazing that I was sensing all of this and yet I was saying, "What for?" And I heard children laughing and old people laughing, laughing like you've never heard in your life.

I don't shake easily but my entire body was shaking at this point. A lot of people didn't see that. Sunil saw it from the side, Miranda and Hannah. (goes on to describe) My entire body became an eye and an ear. My whole body became a force of perception.
