A couple of things that stood out to me when you were talking is you stated so much information was given to you at once, and it was quick. Just think about that. Has he not prophesied about this new technology, this Firepointe, and so much information coming in at one time. It's almost like you're being transported to different eras in time, like memories from the future, and different places.

Kim: It's true, that's what happened. It's like my whole being was prophetic Sunil: A lot was transferred to you in that moment, and even now, your life is like a living expression, a prophetic expression. You even refer to that story about Philip and the Ethiopian . . (Goes on to discuss the correlation between Kim helping the Ethiopian Jews today and the story of the Ethiopian and Philip. Sunil surmises the Ethiopian in Acts was a Jew because it says he had gone to Jerusalem to worship.) I want to read something to you because of something Sunil just said and these are things that are just coming to me now. As I said to you, the first thing I saw was the blindness gone, the issue of blindness, and I'm coming to the next now which is very important because I heard the angels speaking about Armageddon. I was thinking, "My Lord, is this the time?" I'll share something very powerful about it, a certain weapon, and I don't have the interpretation. That's why I'm opening up and throwing it out.

Please be active, get out there to my Facebook, and write in (asks for people to lend any insight they have). Kim goes on to talk about John on Patmos, and Ezekiel, and others who were transported. Kim goes on to describe how his hand was shaking, and how in the Bible, Daniel describes the same kind of experience, and how he felt something but he couldn't see it. The inside of his hand was burning and he said, "No, no." It seemed like something burned into my hand. I became aware, and here's what I want you to listen to me about because many prophetic teachers are teaching that it's the end of the world now. I've stood with what I've believed and what I felt the Lord revealed to me that it's not quite the end yet, it's the end of times but not the end of time. It's the end times but not the end of time. There's still something God has planned, huge, especially in the next seven years, which I've already told you about in my previous prophecies and teachings. I became aware of extreme heat and danger. My body became overwhelmed with radiance and fire and fear struck me for the first time. That's when I said, "It's ok, it's ok." It's almost like I was trying to tell somebody that was in this vision.

But fear struck me for the first time, was this nuclear? Was this atomic? What was this that I was feeling? Was I interceding on behalf of Israel and America? I believe I was, first of all. At that point, there were multiple visions and the question seemed to arise constantly, Armageddon, the slaughter of humanity. An atomic war that no one wanted but that no one had the wisdom to avoid. I need to say that to you again and I want you to listen to it because this is what I heard: "Armageddon, the slaughter of humanity, an atomic war that no one wanted but which no one had the wisdom to avoid." What were we to pray for? For wisdom. And the Spirit of the Lord, that's when He was showing me this weapon that nobody knows about or perhaps they are ignoring because it's not . . . . Sunil's going to help me now in a few minutes. Just bear with me.

Then I heard these words: "This is not that time, Armageddon, this is not that time." You can receive peace today; at this very moment. This is not that time, for the slaughter of humanity. The vision of wickedness and impending danger is due to some device hidden in a place unknown to the present intelligence. That's what I have to tell you, and maybe even ignored. In other words, "Oh, that's not important." This weapon is in a human mind and the weapon that is in this human mind came to me when I saw some alphabetical letters. I saw some letters. At first I thought it was A to Z. This is a puzzle to me right now, but God almost said to me, "Focus now on this so that the mystery can be unfolded. The letters were "A" and "Q." That's all I saw. And He said, "That's where it's at." Then I saw Russia, I saw Pakistan, and I saw a connection. That's all I saw there. I remember that but I didn't say it. It's important for you to take note of. Go out there and research. Sunil is going to as well.

The vision of fire and water: I was absolutely surrounded by evil and I felt as Daniel did, praying for his people. Let me just tell you what Daniel said. He said, "While I was praying, the man, Gabriel,", now remember, Gabriel is one of the most powerful angels, "whom I had seen in the vision at the beginning, being caused to fly swiftly." Now you think about God and time. Why would God need an angel to move rapidly? Because men have power to control things that happen on the earth because God put man on the earth so when things happen they can retard it, they can slow it down, or they can hasten it. So the angel was caused to fly swiftly, and it reached me about the time of the evening offering." (Kim goes on to speak on the importance of the evening offering and how every time we meet on the Den, we have an evening offering.) The angel was caused to fly swiftly so that the Angel Gabriel would arrive at the time of the evening offering because something connects with the supernatural, the Spirit, and us in this natural world, when the offering takes place. Why would God cause the angel to fly swiftly so that he would arrive at that specific time? (goes on to discuss this)
OFFERING

I was telling you how I got to that place, you've seen it already, where my innermost being felt like I was at the point of bursting. It was at this stage that I began to weep because what I heard was the most amazing thing. I wish I could have recorded it for you. It was profoundly beautiful; out of this world. I heard children laughing, what seemed like hundreds of thousands of children, then intermingled with their laughter, I heard the laughter of older people, and it was deafening. It wasn't giggles, it was pure, unadulterated laughter, but the sound was a mingling of these older and these younger because of, and I realized this later on, because of victory over physical ailments, handicaps, many different things in old and young. The children were laughing because of victory. The young will experience physical and spiritual breakthrough as has never been experienced in these next seven years. The old people were laughing with them as if they'd heard some exceptionally good news, and the laughter broke out into this massive applause. This is the strange thing, too, then I heard, coming from grass, stones, leaves, trees, rivers, seas, from all the earth, from human beings and celestial beings, "Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus."

It was the craziest thing and I mentioned that later on last Wednesday. I mentioned it because I heard coming out of the earth, was His Name. It didn't sound like His name. I knew it was His Name and I knew it was Christ Jesus, but it was absolutely amazing. Just over and over and over and over, and at that point, my eyes were so filled with light that I felt like I was being blinded. (talks about Saul of Tarsus) Another thing I saw, and I mentioned this before, was Egypt, Egypt on the brink. I saw God doing something massive in Egypt. Remember when all those people were crowded together and they were shouting, "Jesus, Jesus?" Then I saw this as well, Russia would yield. I didn't know what that meant, but I saw ashes and ashes and ashes, and then suddenly out of the ashes arose a charmer; a man, a serpent in a man, with seducing power as I'd not ever seen before. Keep your eye on Russia; watch what happens. God told me to pray for that. God showed me a leader in the Middle East with a weak eye, full of light yet hidden for a time, to be revealed as a voice of God in the Middle East. A young boy, slightly handicapped, being groomed for presidency in the United States of America.

I then saw, flashing in front of me, "Fire-point-E." This is all fresh and new, and I'm going to let Sunil take over at this point because I've given you what I can for now. I will write out many other things and I will not communicate it like this every time; I'll write it out and release it, whatever comes to me. But this is what I saw. We've been speaking about Firepointe and I want you (to Sunil) to share on this now because many are interested because God showed us about being debt-free. Many of you know about this and we're proclaiming it. It's going to happen. It's in this decade that it's going to happen, but it will be very quick. That's one of the things I noticed in these visions, that there was so much relief and so much joy and victory and happiness and laughter because of, (expression) "we're free." But I saw Firepointe again and it was going across and I caught a glimpse of it, but it was broken up into three sections: Fire-point-E. The E separately. Remember I spoke about the big breakthrough with the "Big E?" Never did I realize when I wrote Firepointe, when it first came to me, that it would also mean, it was Firepointe as well, but fire will point to E. (turns over to Sunil)

NOTE: This was a very unusual broadcast. Kim had an experience that was very rare and therefore the transcription reads a little differently. We left it just as it is and you'll notice he was seeing many things all at once. Some of it is difficult to read but we felt it was important to post it even though parts of it may not make sense. Please watch the broadcast from June 21st, 2012, where he took the time to explain what he actually saw on this day, June 13th, 2012.
DURING MUSIC, WHILE KIM IS PRAYING IN TONGUES

There's a conversation that is happening. I'm getting access. The hidden swords, the hidden spears, the hidden instruments to do damage, we will uncover. Angels sent, (begins speaking in tongues), these are tongues of angels. I'm hearing, I'm hearing, God has assigned a force to uncover weapons of destruction, mass; something new that shall be old soon, that the enemy has. Oh Israel, Israel, shall I call upon you again? Shall I call upon you again using a prophet with an ancient gift to bring it forth? Yes! They look at the wrong country. They look to the place that is obvious. This is what they're saying. "They've found another place, another soil, another place." It's in a forest, it looks like a forest and it stenches of wickedness. Speak, Spirit of God. Do not hold Your peace; do not hold Your voice.

They speak of joyful things, too. They speak of rejoicing amongst children, rejoicing amongst the aged. They speak, these angels of . . . . . . . It's ok, it's ok, it's ok, it's ok; there's no fear. But what year, what year are you speaking about? (Kim bows his head, covers his face with his hand, weeping and says, "Stop." Music continues playing. He lays his head in his arms on the piano, wiping his eyes and weeping.) I can't take anymore; my physical body can't take any more. It seems so much; too much. (Begins playing music, Hannah sings "Hear, Oh Israel, the Lord Your God is One God.")
AFTER PLAYING SONG, BRIEFLY LAYS HEAD ON PIANO AGAIN, THEN BEGINS TO SPEAK

This is very difficult for me because I was caught up for, you tell me how long, I don't even know. (Begins to pray) Father, we worship You now. We honor You, Jesus. We honor You, Jesus. Jesus. That's all I can hear them saying, over and over, over and over. Jesus on the earth. Jesus in the children. Jesus, Jesus, everywhere; Jesus everywhere. Jesus in America. I cannot give words to what I've experienced. I wish I could. I don't actually know everything. All I know is I heard the conversation between two beings and was caught up to where I couldn't take any more. There were too many words, too many pictures, too many surroundings and I believe He's transferred to me what's supposed to be spoken in the summer and transferred to me what is necessary to express in the next few months. All I know is He kept saying, "Do not fear; do not be afraid. Do not fear. It's ok; it's ok." And I saw a year, which I can't talk about now. It's very difficult for me to compose myself. (Hannah begins talking about a similar experience in Detroit in 1996 or 1997).

I cannot share everything. Obviously, it's a good thing because it feels right; it feels wonderful, and I did see and it was very, very clear. It was like I was standing with two people. I want to read this to you (reads from Daniel, "There is a God in heaven who reveals secrets . . . the message was true but the appointed time was long." Asks for people to pray for him, for understanding of the message and the vision.

Let me share something because we're speaking about angels. (talks about taking offering) Please hear me. What I've been caught up in is the future of out nation, the future of many nations, God's protection upon children and the elderly, which means something is going to come out. You're going to hear it today and Israel is His focus point, not just because God loves Israel. It's because He has something to come out of Israel, out of their intelligence, out of the ground, resources. It's literally still going to become a place that's going to protect and feed all the families of the earth, and you'll hear that today. (proceeds with offering)
AFTER CODEBREAKERS SEGMENT

I'm going to interrupt just for a minute here because of what happened to me earlier on, as you saw. I was caught up in the Spirit and I'm still yet receiving things. But I started remembering something that I heard God saying to me. I don't know if you at home can sense what we sensed here, but I'm sure you felt it, or you could even see it, the way it really was happening. I was going in and out of the present into the spirit world, which is unlimited, infinite, and I was feeling God's presence so wonderfully. At one stage I was saying, "I can't take any more. It's too much, my body can't take it." And then I heard myself saying, "I don't want to leave there, this place." And I knew I was in the total presence of God. You may say, "that's great for you, but what about us?" Ok, well let me explain this. I'm hearing things about the future, about summer, about America, about 2013, all kinds of things. I heard these words, and it's relating to what Sunil is dealing with right now regarding the heart and the child and the elderly person, as I said in the vision. I heard the sound of children, very happy; old people very happy. I didn't even know you were going to do this when you spoke (to Sunil), about the heart as a child.

The one thing I heard was, and I wasn't sure if it was God who said it, or the angel, or who it was, but somebody said, "If people on the earth could transfer from earth to heaven without death, there would be no people on earth." In other words, I think what He was saying to me was a person gets depressed; they know they can, sort of a suicide without dying. They would take the route of getting to the next place, and I'm not going to deal with the suffering aspect of it because most of us don't understand that, why that happens. But it was like He was saying to me, "If there was no death", in other words, if people could get to heaven without physically dying, there would be nobody on the earth, barely anybody, because people would choose or opt for that when they're depressed, when suicidal, when ill.

Imagine Elijah saying, "Oh no, Lord, I don't want to escape death and be taken on a chariot." He didn't; he chose to take it. All I'm saying to you is - this is what I'm going to say, then you can take it back from me (to Sunil). Death will always be there but life can be extended. Now why would God want life to be extended? Because there's something very important on this planet that He intends doing still before whatever Revelation and the books of the Bible speak about the end of the world, before that time. I think I'm so overwhelmed because I saw something that is yet to be clear to me, that still has to happen, that Daniel saw as well even though he spoke about it in a physical time that has things that have happened. I just want you to know that there is going to be an extension of life. I believe this is what we're dealing with here - that God wants man to live at least his 120 years. I know it sounds crazy. It's ok. But He has a reason for it and there's a development right now for life to be extended.
REGARDING THE SHEDDING OF INNOCENT BLOOD

What is happening now is that there is innocent blood being shed. And God says clearly and through me now, "Do you really think I will not respond to this that is happening? I'm already performing miracles where young kids that were supposed to die, I've protected them by the thousands and the tens of thousands. Those that have slipped by," God said, "each one has a voice that I will replace with two voices. Each one has a sound. Where there is one innocent taken, I will give two innocent back. Where one purity is taken, I will give two purity back." God says, "I will not look away from the shedding of blood; I will not look away from the sound that is coming from the Middle East. I will not turn away from it," says the Lord.

"Even in America, even in the countries, the nations in Europe where there is blood that is being shed," God said, "I will not hold back. I will not be quiet. I will hear it and watch what I will do with these young men and women," says the Lord. "They shall carry the sword; they shall carry the spears; they shall carry the answers, the medical answers. They shall go and use their abilities to bring about cures and bring about energy and bring about all kinds of things that will propagate the gospel and the good news and the Word of the Lord. Therefore, look now, look as I speak," says the Lord. "You will see things that you have not seen before and hear things that you've not heard before, for out of this death shall come life and out of the brutality," says the Lord, "shall come purity, and a sound shall cover the earth," says the Lord, "and the glory of the Lord shall cover the earth - the knowledge of the glory of the Lord shall cover the earth as the waters cover the seas," says the Lord.
PROPHETIC SONG

(Singing) I never want you to go away from Me, America. You were on your knees when you began. Where did you go, why did you fly away? Why did you go and run away from Me? America, why did you run away? But I will gather you together as I promised. Jerusalem. I will gather you together. I will cover you with My wings. I will bring you back to My altar. America! America! America! America!

(Speaking) God says, "I'll bring you back. You've run away from Me but I've seen and watched how you desired to come back to me." The Spirit of God says, "I'll draw you back to My nest and in this nation there will be fire, fire, fire, fire!"
(Singing) "From Israel to America there will be one sound, one voice. From Israel to America there will be one sound, one voice, one breath," says the Lord.

His omnipotence, his omniscience, God's omnipresence, His immutability, His infallibility - all are combined for our defense. "You cannot trust in your military; you cannot trust in your armed forces only. You have to understand, it's My omnipotence, My omniscience, My omnipresence, My immutability, My infallibility - this is your defense," says the Lord, "and I have given it to you. Therefore, rise up in praise, rise up in shouts, rise up in praise," says the Lord, "and I will fight for you during your summer," says the Lord.
PROPHETIC SONG FROM THE LORD

The vastness of Your grace, the beauty of Your face, draw me to You, draw me to You in the night. The vastness of Your grace, the beauty of Your face draw me in the night, I see You in the night and though the nation's in despair, the nation has nowhere to go, where is Your grace in the night? Do You remember, America, in the night? Once a mighty a mountain showing to the world the beauty of Your grace; don't leave us. In the light I come and sing; in the night they stood and fought. Will they fight again? Will they stand for righteousness of God once again? Will America shine their holy light once again? Show the world, show the world the beauty of Your face. Will you shine again in the night? Will you speak to them in the night? The vastness of Your grace, the beauty of Your face shine in the night. You are faithful to all, You never change Your mind; that's why I love you.
SONG TO KIM

"Kim, yes, I will return to this nation. Kim, I will return because you prayed. I sent you from Africa to cry out for America; I sent you with your wife and those who would go fight with you in the night. You called for the nation; from the beginning of time I sent you here and now you ask Me will I come, will I bless? Kim, yes, I will return. You went to China to pick the little children who would die without a breast, to feed them. Because you did this thing, many will come. They will draw the orphans as I did. Bring them from the night to the light, from the night to the light; from the darkness to the light. All alone never again because of what you did, taking them in. Hundreds will begin, then thousands will come. Take the orphans and lead them to My light." The vastness of Your grace, the beauty of Your face shining on us, Your holy nation.
PROPHETIC WORD

And the Spirit of God says this to you, "To My people who have heard the promise and have felt My presence, I say to you, what you bring to Me, what you lay at My altar as the evening sacrifice, I will receive it. As I received Gideon's sacrifice, as I received Hannah's sacrifice, I will receive yours."
PROPHETIC WORD ABOUT ITALY

(During song, "America, you are the light of the world." Hold it there; listen to me. If you want to pray for your country, try and fit it in there. Italy, Italy, let's sing to Italy, come on. They're being attacked right now. Began singing, "Italy, Italy, you are the salt of the earth; Italy, Italy, you are the light of the world." "I will stand with you, Italy; I will not let you go. You have housed religion. You have been there; the rise and the fall of leaders. Shall I raise up a good leader for you? Yes indeed, I will." Therefore, we pray for Italy, we pray for Europe - we pray, Lord God, for these nations. Release Your blessing upon them. Thank you.

Elijah saw the cloud the size of a man's hand. This is what happened, and it's important for all of you watching, for your own prosperity in the next seven years, starting almost immediately, that you listen and be patient. Remember what I taught you the other day; I said by patience you must possess your soul. In other words, don't let your soul get disrupted when something doesn't happen when you want it to happen. We heard about Firepointe; we heard about Ford - we heard about lots of things and some people are getting impatient (the Iraqi denar). These things happen in time. Obviously, there are moments where God says this is going to be released now, but this is what happened with Elijah. Elijah heard the sound of abundance. There were no clouds; there was no sign of abundance. He heard the sound; then he said to his servant, "Go and look until you see it." Here comes the optical fusion. The servant went looking six times. You know he could have come back the fifth time and Elijah could have said just forget it! Six times he ran back and forth, and Elijah said, "Go back." On the seventh - and you can take a little sign from this. I'm a little crafty sometimes, but I have to do it because I can't tell you directly because the law prohibits me from doing it on this show. Seven times; the seventh time he saw a cloud the size of a man's hand.

The reason I'm taking over here just for a minute is because I'm getting something prophetic. Sunil, maybe I can quiz you and see if you know because you're talking about the presence of God here in such a special way. It really does, it feels huge in this building because we have the unity of everybody, so feel their presence here, too. When Elijah went from the brook - now if you know the story, all of you - he was at the brook for 3 1/2 years. A few months ago, I prophesied the 3 1/2 years of famine in America has come to an end and the beginning of a seven-year period of acceleration. So, Elijah - the brook dried up; everything seemed to be at an end. That's where we're at - a lot of people. We're at a place where the brook has dried up; you've lost your job, you don't have much finances, you have a lot of debt - we understand. However, let's look at the sign, please.

Elijah himself was at a place where there was no provision - no food for him. The raven stopped feeding him; the water ran dry. Instead of him sitting there and moping, God says to him, "Go to a place; I've commanded blessing." So he goes to this town and there's a woman who's a widow that has no money, who's about to die with her last little piece of bread. That's God's way of doing it; He's connecting Elijah with an impossible situation so that she can be blessed. Now listen carefully; the reason I'm saying this is not for any reason but to let you understand when I start prophesying to listen to the little things that are coming out. So, what was it that he used? What was it that she was picking up to make the last meal, and what came out of it was flour, the wheat, and she had oil. Now let's just think about this - she's picking up sticks, dust from the earth, stones, all kinds of just junk and what we've prophesied about now, from the earth will come all these little things and come energy. In her energy, there was a mixture of all these little things so she could have her last meal. I found it interesting that from the earth she was gathering and she was almost at her end, and God is using this example how there'll be oil that will not run dry, that will not come to an end until the day the Lord sends rain to the earth. That was the start of it, where God said, "I'm going to bring a new source of energy," and then she was taken care of. Then he moved up to the mountain and called fire from heaven, the sacrifice was made, and then the seventh time, when the servant looked, there was a small cloud. What happened after that? He said, "Run like you've never run before because it's going to come quickly." My point to you is this; little signs that have come along the way, but when it begins to show - what Sunil is doing is showing you the little cloud the size of a man's hand. And he's saying, "It's going to erupt." I'm just showing you so you can see it because the minute the servant saw it, that's when Elijah said, "Let's go."

That's optical fusion we're talking about because the minute the servant saw what Elijah heard from God, that fusion brought about acceleration, and that's why I'm saying to you keep your eye open - the Firepointes, everything else. It's going to happen and God's going to prosper you as a result of it.

The Spirit of God says, "This day I wish to conquer your curses.  I wish to conquer things that have come against you.  I want your soul to be restored today.  Therefore, I will show you this day, in this next hour, how your curses will be broken - that which previous generations have done throughout the centuries and you have had to take it and live with it."  God said, "No, it is not necessary; it is not necessary for yesterday's faults and yesterday's sins to be in your basket," says the Lord, "to be in your home and to be in your blood.  Today I will give you the power to stop the curse and to stop the angel of death that is roaming up and down the United States of America and the nations of the earth, even in Israel today."  I declare the power of Your Word!  The Word of the Lord has come!  The curse shall be broken over the alcoholic, over the drug addict, over those who are poverty-stricken, Lord, over every sickness represented here today.  Arise, oh Lord!  Arise, oh Lord and stop the curse, I pray!
PROPHETIC WORD

The Spirit of God says, "Cast off the garments that you have carried - the garments of heaviness, the garments of depression.  They will be cast off today.  Cast off the garments of iniquity!  Cast off the garments of every curse that has come against you - indifference and division in this country."  I cast off the garment of division that has come against this nation!  Let the curse be broken and blessings come, blessings come, blessings come, blessing, blessing upon each home.  I thank you for doing that, Lord.

"I have promised.  I, Myself, have promised.  The people who have sought after Me - that I would fill those who hunger and thirst for My light and My righteousness.  Many are sick; many are in fear; many are depressed, for you have heard the words of those who have sat in high places - and yet I, Myself, have promised this nation and those who would call upon Me that I would come to them again and I would take the plows of those that have plowed in hard soil and hard ground and honor them during famine as they plowed.  And I will cause a massive harvest to come.  Curses that have come upon you from various sources, I, Myself, will break today.  For those who hear, that which came from many years ago and has held you down, I will break it today and I will show you how through my servant."

The Spirit of God says, "Look at Korea, the miserable pig that has stood and defied the nations of the earth."  And God says, "You think I cannot dethrone you?  In North Korea, keep your eye open," God says.  "Before the summer months, you will say, 'Look what's happening in North Korea.'  And this shall be a sign to you that I am causing leaders that have wicked intentions to be brought down.  So who will lead this nation?  Who shall I place at the helm?"  God said, "I have chosen Myself.  Yes, I've chosen Myself.  I, the Lord, will change the hearts of the people in this nation and they will be declaring, 'Enough is enough!  Enough is enough! Enough is enough!'"  "Keep your eye on the south of America.  Keep your eye on the south of America," God says, "how I'm going to reveal My light.  Young people, young Cubans, young Spanish people " young Hispanics " shall suddenly rise up and they shall say, 'Look, the Lord has delivered us from the wicked leader of Venezuela."  And God says, "Look how I take these young people and a new music arise, a new Latin music arise, comes forth, and this will infiltrate through the Middle Eastern music as well and go right into Israel and America and there shall be joyful sounds coming from the house of the Lord," says the Lord.
PROPHETIC SONG

America, I'll raise you up, I'll bring you back. America, America, I will not forsake you But you have forsaken Me. That is where I want you, that is where I want you, That is where I want you, that is where I want you, Right on your knees. That is where I want you, to be right next to Me.
PROPHETIC WORD

The Spirit of God says, "Listen to the Word of the Lord. The liberty that you feel in this building will be felt in the streets of America, in the streets of Jerusalem. There shall be a unity of the two nations. Spirit. Together they shall shout and make proclamation. 'We are tired of the oppression. We are tired of the dictation. We are tired of the lies.'" And God says, "Because of this unity, I will give land to Israel, not take land," says the Lord.
PROPHETIC SONG
Australia, New Zealand, we prophesy to you. Africa and China, we prophesy to you. Africa and China, we prophesy to you.
To the north, to the south, to the east, to the west, we prophesy to you, you will live. (3X)
America, you'll live. Africa, you'll live. Israel, you'll live.
PROPHETIC WORD

There is a thick presence of revelation knowledge. There is a thick presence of God's revelation and in the presence of revelation there is an absence of the strength of sin. I believe that as God reveals Himself today, that which has a stronghold will be broken. I'm not just talking to you; I'm talking to all over this nation and all over this world. 'Cause God says, "I've got a surprise up my sleeve in the Middle East. I said, I've got a surprise up my sleeve. It shall not happen to one, but simultaneously, I'll smash their heads together and the leadership and the heads of states shall say, 'Where will we run to? Where shall we go, for it seems like Israel is getting stronger and stronger and stronger. It seems like America is getting stronger and stronger and stronger.'" (starts singing) It seems like Israel is getting stronger and stronger and stronger. It seems like America is getting stronger and stronger and stronger. It seems like my house is getting stronger and stronger and stronger. It seems like my children are getting stronger and stronger and stronger. It seems like my church is getting stronger and stronger and stronger. It seems like my soul and spirit are getting stronger and stronger and stronger.
PROPHETIC SONG

I paid a price for something that I loved. I paid a price for someone that I loved. It was you; it was you that I loved. I paid a price for something that I loved. I paid a price for someone that I loved. Israel, will you give me a sacrifice? I looked into His eyes and said to Him, You're the only One to make them live. He looked into My eyes and I said Father, If this is what you want, I will go that they may live; That they may live.

Where do You want me to go? Where do You want me to go? Where shall I go to lay down my life? Where is the place You've yet to create, The place that will receive My blood? My Son, I will make a place; I'll call someone from nowhere, Then I'll raise up a man from the field, Then I'll give that nation My name, My name, Israel, My name, Israel.
I looked into His eyes and saw something. The Son of God had a tear in His eyes because He knew That one day, one day, I would turn away from Him.
Father, I've always seen Your eyes; Father, I've always heard Your voice. Will you say that You'll turn away; if that's what You want, I will go
That they may live, that they may live. Because He lives, I will live;
PROPHETIC WORD

Hear what the Spirit says tonight. "What you are entering, and it started in the month of February, you will smell it, you will taste it, you will feel it. The time has come for the outpouring of the latter rain. The time has come for the double portion. The time has come for an outpouring the earth has ever experienced, ever. And before they say, 'We will take all the nations of the world and we will make one nation and one world,' I will bring such an outpouring of My Spirit that men shall leap. They shall run, as Elisha ran, with an acceleration. There shall be an acceleration of miracles, acceleration of understanding, acceleration of knowledge that shall travel to and fro across the face of the earth. Young men shall rise up and they will do what Joel told them they would do - they will prophesy, they will have visions. Your children shall know that this is that time," says the Lord. "Look to the month of May, and then look to the month of October, and then look," says the Lord. "You will enter in and say, 'What has happened to the tyrants? What has happened to them in North Korea? What has happened to those that have said, 'We will raise up a generation of people that will not pronounce the Name of God properly.'" God says, "They shall pronounce My Name, every one of them. Jireh. They shall say, Shalom. They shall say every Name. They shall say Nissi. They shall say every name of God, and as they say it, I will pour out of My Spirit upon the musicians and upon the authors and upon the poets." God said, "You are entering in beyond the veil," says the Lord.

What has come before Me? There has been a stench. There has been a stench that has brought the people to their knees - in America, different nations that I have My eye on. No, I have not walked away from those that have been crippled and wounded in Syria, Iran. There are some that cry out to Me; young people that have said, 'It is enough.' I will raise up some of the greatest prophets from the soil and the ashes and the dust of Syria, that will come to Israel and say, 'We love you; we bless you.' This shall not be an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth. For they shall say, 'We shall follow the instructions and commands of Jesus: forgive, love one another.' A band of young people from Syria, Iran, and Afghanistan shall defy; they shall defy the Beast of the East. They shall defy Islam. They shall say, 'We will not be bashed down to a god that is dead. Young people by the hundreds of thousands shall flock, and they shall gather together, and they shall call out to Him."

And God said, "I will topple those governments and I will cause them to fall to the ashes. And Syria shall no longer be Syria and Iran shall no longer be called that name. For I shall take them and I shall bash their heads together. Is it not I," said the Lord, "that will stand for Israel and show My magnificence? Did not I say that I would show My excellence? Did I not say that I would be the Captain of the Hosts? Will I not be the one that stands behind My prophet, Netanyahu?" God said, "He shall be kept alive, for they have planned to assassinate him. They have a plan to kill him; they have a plan to take him in a very crafty way." But God said, "I will keep him, I will look after him. I will cover him and not one thing shall touch him nor bruise him," says the Lord, "for he is a voice to Me. And the voice of Esther is about to arise; the voice of Esther is about to arise." God said, "In the next few years, I will raise up a party, a party that I've told you about. It shall neither be Republican nor Democrat, and they shall be the American party and they shall stand for what is right." God said. "Watch Me, how I raise it up in this nation," says the Lord.
(Sings) Esther, Esther, we call your name. (4x)
PROPHETIC WORD

Pray with me; it's a spiritual thing. Right here - and I don't make up these things - there is an angel; angelic presence, carrying the future. Don't tell me they don't exist. They are messengers. They wait for the command of the Word of the Lord. Father, we want this presence to go throughout the Earth. I'm telling you, the future - so much dismay, so much arrogance, and so much hatred for God's Jews, God's people. Unusual, but it is a sign, for when the triumph comes, how great shall it be for the earth. In their demise, in their weakness, such greatness came forth. Yet when Israel is raised up for that season, how great it shall be for the heathen. How great it shall be for the nations."
(HANNAH SINGS)
Esther, come forth! Esther, come forth!
(KIM SINGS IN TONGUES)

We are making declarations - that though you are in a place of pain now, O Israel, we declare you shall be in a place of reign in about seven months from now.  We make declaration that just after the New Year, there'll be shouting and victory and there'll be shouts of praise in the streets of Jerusalem because we are conquering mountains and that mountain is going to be conquered for you as well.  As Jacob did, so we will do as well.  We will sow and we will multiply as a result of it.    That land we are prophesying over; that land we are praying for, Israel - that land was spoken to by God.  He said, 'Israel is forever!'  And the whole wide world except for America and a few nations want to wipe them out.  A new breed of Nazis has arisen that have genocide in their hearts - not just for the few in France, but they want the nation to be taken out.  Their desires have never stopped and God will not allow it because He gave a promise and said the land I gave to Abraham and Isaac is My land for My people.

A few nights ago, I became extremely restless and disturbed, and for a brief moment, I was blinded. I couldn't see prophetically; let me explain that to you. I don't live seeing the future every second of the day. I have to live in the real world. But I have an awareness of tomorrow and I have an awareness of the future - an awareness of destiny most of the time. But for a moment, I was blinded; I could not see prophetically. A prophet breathes the air of tomorrow, not the air of today. Even though I breathe natural air, my spiritual existence comes from breathing the air of tomorrow. That's how I survive and that's how most prophetic people survive. They cannot survive in the past or in the present. When the air of the future is not present, I become very distressed.

I became extremely distressed when I was blinded to the future for that one moment, because I knew I was in the Spirit. I couldn't understand being in the Spirit and not being able to at least get a glimpse of the future or hear something. But then I started seeing little shades of light. It was like light shining in a dark place. I was in a tremendously dark place with no light and then suddenly, there was a little bit of light, little shades of light. I realize that I was catching a glimpse into the future of this nation, of the United States of America.

I can tell you a few things that I encountered which I can now reveal and I'm glad I waited until today. The first night, I was handed a very strange looking food. I couldn't describe what it was, but I knew that in this food was truth. I'm saying food because I don't know what else I'd put in my mouth, although Ezekiel ate a scroll and that could have been what it was. I don't know and I'm not going to try and put myself in Ezekiel's place, but I knew it was truth. As I began eating it, I tried to spit it out because it was so bitter. This was in this vision. I was forbidden to spit it out. I knew it; I knew I'd be stuck - I could not do it. But as I continued eating it, I became more nauseated and suddenly, it became very, very sweet and it tasted like honey.

You may say, 'That's not reality,' but when I'm in a vision, that is reality. I don't often have visions. I get little mini-glimpses, but I was caught up. I've gotten caught up a number of times in the last 48 hours, especially yesterday. The one I'm going to share with you a little bit later on, after we've done some Code Breakers stuff, will shock you and I think will frighten some of you and that's why I said please don't stress. I know that you want to believe truth and I'm giving you what I heard, and I'm not a prophet of doom as you know, but of course we know that things are going to happen that are bad. Things are happening that are bad right now. My desire is to bring unity to your hearts so that we're all praying together for God's supernatural protection.

So, I ate this thing. It was extremely bitter; I was absolutely nauseated. But as it went down, it changed. The taste became very sweet and tasted like honey. I realized at that point that what is bitter, what is stressful, what doesn't seem right will turn out to be sweet. Now if we regurgitate or spit out the bitter - if I had spat it out - I would not have tasted the sweet. The insight I received as this happened to me was that out of the bitterness would arise something sweet. In other words, what's going to happen is going to make a lot of people bitter. Not only is it going to, but it is presently making them bitter. You may say, 'Kim, you're speaking about the President. I know you are.' Hold on, I'm not. I could be speaking about him but I'm not speaking about him at this specific point.

It is so difficult for people to comprehend that something bitter could become sweet. Look at history; look over the years. Study your Bible where things that were really bad turned to produce something good. Let me give you an example. (Goes on to tell story of when Saul was anointed King by Samuel. Saul was a vicious man, but what good came out of it? King David, from whose lineage Jesus would come.)

That's just one example of something that was bitter that produced something sweet. (Explains how David was formed by Saul and Saul had to drive the Saul out of David. We all have a 'Saul' that needs to be driven out of us.') It is very difficult for people to believe or comprehend that out of something they don't agree with or don't like can come something sweet. I think you know what we're talking about.

God must be blamed for all the bad that's happening because of the news media sharing their view about Obama's policies. By the way, I don't agree with a lot of them, so I'm standing before you saying that we have this idea that this President is from hell, from satan. But I have to remind you - and I'm not saying he's going to be re-elected - I'm just trying to tell you, something is about to happen that relates to a corruption. I will also relate something about Russia that was given to me 24 hours ago - what Russia will do and it will be a sudden happening. All of this compiled together will give you understanding of why we're at this place right now, a very difficult place.

Before President Obama was elected, I was in the same city and the same state he was in; I had no idea that it was going to be him, but on the platform, I gave a prophetic word about him being elected, him being chosen. I didn't like what I was hearing; not that I dislike him as a person or them as a family - I think they're a beautiful family. But I was excited because in 1998 I went to a special dinner with General Colin Powell; there were only a few of us together. I don't often share these things, but I'll do it today. In that meeting, I prophesied to him, 'You'll go back to the White House. You'll be back in Washington, D.C. I did not say he would be the President. He looked at me and almost snickered and said, 'That will never happen.' He went back. I believe he was with President George W. Bush. He was Secretary of State.

During that dinner, the Spirit of God said to me, 'In the new millennium, the first decade,' - and I did not prophesy this publicly but I have witnesses that were there. One of them is Peter Lowe. If you know who Peter Lowe is, he did many of the great 'Get Motivated' seminars and he invited me to meet many of the celebrities that were there. I've met Jerry Lewis and given him a word and many others. I told Jerry Lewis, by the way, when they said he was dying, that he would live for so many years. I just saw a documentary on him and he's jumping around; I mean, the guy is so full of life. At that dinner, I spoke it out. I said the New Millennium, the first decade, would produce or bring forth the first African American President. I'm not trying to get anybody to like him. I'm speaking on the basis of what did God have to do with this. If he placed the man there, there must be a reason. I have to listen and think if He spoke him into existence, my duty is to pray that whatever I got prophetically happens to the man during his term. That's my responsibility as a conservative but more so as a Christian and as a prophet. Listen to me - as I did for President George Bush. I cannot say, 'He's a Democrat so I'm not going to pray for him.' That's hypocrisy. God anointed Saul and there was a reason for Saul.

Now, out of the bitter came something sweet. That's just one aspect of it; I'm dealing with the President right now. It's difficult for people to comprehend this because of our prejudices, our bigotry, and the general influence on our opinions from secular news media and religious leaders. Before actually tasting the sweetness, I was overwhelmed by a strong presence of hatred and bitterness permeating from the citizens of the United States of America. When I sensed this, I sensed I was literally tasting the bitterness - not only what would come, but that which is present, and God was so grieved because this was not just unbelievers, but believers as well. I could sense this coming from unbelievers and believers so much so that I sensed God was severely grieved that politics and the economy and news media has put us in a position where we are completely corrupted in our hearts and bitterness is coming forth instead of praying prophetically, calling out to God.

I sensed corruption after that, and then an exposure of that by a strange happening, a strange turn of events. Now this is what I saw. At this point, remember we're speaking about a corruption that we don't know about yet and the strange happening or strange turn of events that will literally be the turning point in American history. I am saying what I heard. Please repent if your heart is bitter and you have hatred because it's not going to help you living like that as Warriors.

Let me share about the taste of honey - Judges 14 verse 1 (Reads the scripture about how Samson wanted a wife from the Philistines. His parents resisted, but they didn't know, as the scripture says, 'it was of the Lord.' It seemed evil, but God had a bigger plan.) God is up to something. God is up to something that is way beyond our natural comprehension. He is seeking an occasion to move against the Philistines because at that time the Philistines had dominion over Israel. (Kim talks about how God didn't wait for the most perfect time to send His Son.) Samson goes down to Timnah with his father and mother and came to the vineyards and to his surprise - and this is what God spoke clearly to me. To his surprise, a young lion came roaring against him. How many know, that's bitter, that's difficult. That's an attack; that's not sweet. And the Spirit of the Lord came mightily upon him. Hold on, this is lustful Samson. This is Samson who wants this gorgeous woman from another tribe, from another nation. Why would the Spirit of the Lord come upon someone that is breaking these rules?

The Spirit of the Lord came mightily upon him and he tore the lion apart as one would have torn a young goat though he had nothing in his hand. An attack; a vicious attack, a bitter moment. Samson's going to go through it again. Out of it, in the end, he will put his hands against two pillars. Led by a young person; the youth, this is the Year of the Youth. It's this year that it's all going to happen. Seduction, corruption, losing strength, losing his secret strength, his hair; going around in circles, doing the work of a mule. They laughed at him as his eyes were plucked out, and in that state, God's Spirit came upon him and a young man took him and led him to the pillars and suddenly the destruction of that enemy took place and that was the sweetest moment of all. I'm telling you what I got in the Spirit.

The young lion attacks Samson at a vineyard. Then he went down and talked with the young woman and she pleased him well. After some time, when he returned to get her, he turned aside to see the carcass of the lion - the bitter died - and behold, a swarm of bees and honey were in the carcass of the lion. That is what I saw; that is what I tasted. Out of the bitter came something sweet. Samson was so hungry that he had no strength left in him. He was so desperate, and the very same thing that attacked him brought life to him. The very same bitter moment brought strength to him, nurtured him physically and restored his strength. America, your strength is going to be restored. Out of the bitter, out of the attack, is going to come something sweet. Take it or leave it. You can go and listen to NBC or ABC. They cannot fathom it out; they don't know. They have to mock a man, a company of people, an administration, a Democrat. That's fine - they all have their faults. So do Republicans, but this is not about that. It's about, 'God, what are You going to bring out of this bitter moment in our lives?' I say something sweet.

So, he took some of it in his hand and went along eating and when he came to his father and mother he gave it to them. I don't know what he did with the bees because when you steal honey from a bee, you're in trouble. That may be a little message, I don't know.
CODE BREAKERS

What I'm about to share with you is not easy for me because I was very emotional when this happened to me because I haven't had this kind of vision before. I've had similar types, but I know you're going to be glued to the screen as I share this with you. In this one vision that happened yesterday, I saw what seemed like hundreds of angels in front of me, lined straight ahead of me. They were facing each other with their hands pointed like this towards each other (arms raised together in front of him). It was like a tunnel almost. I saw it clearly. I very seldom see this kind of thing but I saw it clearly and I was in absolute awe. Their hands were above their heads pointing upwards and towards each other. They made an archway so that people could walk through it but there was no one there at the time and it was very narrow, which I questioned. It was so far; I couldn't see where it ended. There was bronze-type carpet with some gold in the archway and I began walking through it because I knew that the Spirit was telling me to do that. So I walked, but to be honest with you, it was quite frightening because I was literally brushing against these beings as I walked slowly. It felt like I had been walking for about maybe twelve minutes or fifteen minutes and then I heard two of these beautiful beings whispering. Up to this point, I knew absolutely nothing, absolutely nothing. It was extremely quiet. So I stopped. It almost seemed like I was in the middle of this long tunnel with these angels, and I would walk by and I would feel this motion as if they were breathing on me or something. And I stopped in the middle and there were two angels, because I heard whispering. So I stopped in the middle of these two that were whispering to each other and I could literally feel their breath as they were whispering words that I at first could not understand. I was standing there and all I could feel was breath and it was coming into me. I didn't understand what they were saying and I listened and listened. Then suddenly for a moment I understood and this is all they were saying: 'Ezekiel, Ezekiel, Ezekiel, Ezekiel.'

I wasn't sure what they meant and why they were saying 'Ezekiel' to me, or each other. I didn't think for one minute that I represented Ezekiel. I wasn't even relating it to myself. All I understood them saying was 'Ezekiel, Ezekiel, Ezekiel.' It didn't even sound like 'Ezekiel;' they were saying it in another way, but I knew it was 'Ezekiel.' At that point, I felt completely faint and I fell on my face and I was weeping and overwhelmed by God's breath. That's the only way I can describe it. When this breathing came upon me, I felt the need to prophesy. So as they were saying, 'Ezekiel, Ezekiel,' then it changed - something else was said - but it was the breath that was taking over my entire being, all through me. But I felt the need to prophesy, so I began prophesying loudly. So loud - and I was completely oblivious to my surroundings - I was literally prophesying, 'These bones will live! These bones will live! Live! Live! Live!' . . . . over and over and over. I was aware of the presence of breath. That's all I can say. I wish I could tell you more, but it was breath; it was God's breath.

'Kim, what's that got to do with us?' Because we're in that moment. I was aware of the presence of breath and felt the urgency to prophesy to the breath. So I turned and I started prophesying to the breath, the air that was coming out of them. I started prophesying to it. 'Come from the four winds, oh breath, and breathe on these slain that they may live. Come from the four winds, oh breath, and breathe on these slain that they may live.' I understood then that Ezekiel had prophesied something, which I don't study much on because I don't understand it, but I felt that these angels were directing me to Ezekiel 37 and Ezekiel 38. It's a strange revelation, I know. But again then, I was caught into a maze of lights. I couldn't see clearly and I struggled to try and pinpoint exact objects; I couldn't see things clearly. But I had the definite sensation of great evil suddenly. This was after this moment; I was completely taken away from that and I was in the sensation, that's the only way I can say it, of great evil. I asked Joel to play for me because my heart is very moved and I've been in days of stress in this prayer time and in this time that I've been caught up in the Spirit and it really hasn't been easy. I had the definite sensation of evil, terrible evil, great evil.

A plot - and this is what I got; a sudden, wicked idea coming out of Russia. Then suddenly I heard, 'Ezekiel, Ezekiel.' And I said, 'Why Ezekiel?' Ezekiel was called to be a watchman on the wall for Israel. There are many watchmen; I don't say that I'm the only one, please. I respect the watchmen on the wall for Israel. But in the vision, I was instructed to prophesy to Israel and to America, to the dead bones to bring life. There were other small glimpses that I had, but they were not clear enough for me to articulate but they are slowly coming to me. The little glimpses are like snapshots taken with a camera in the dark and the light shines and you catch something. That's what I got. I will not even try and go to Ezekiel 38 yet or explaining it, but in looking at it, I realized the discussion about Russia needs to take place because I have prophesied things over the years and I think this is the time, or that whole region, that something is going to - an evil idea - is going to come out. We're in that time and we need to pray and I need to stand as a watchman on the wall for Israel especially. There are many others praying, please don't get me wrong, but we promised God - you and I - that we would take this month to bless Israel, to proclaim His blessing, to pray for. I've done that, and in so doing, God rewarded me by giving me days of intense insights and revelations. I've only shared a few with you. But it's our duty now to pray that He would have His way - what was spoken and His protection upon Israel. Out of the bitter must come something sweet.
BACK TO SUNIL TO FINISH CODE BREAKERS

'My kingdom is forever. What I created is forever. Israel is forever. My people are forever. There is eternity in your homes right now. There is eternity in your hearts. Today I will come into your homes and your lives and I will give you My forever, My power, My light, My life, My peace, My love,' says the Lord. Lift your voice and give Him praise!!

I see God really doing something on behalf of Israel. I don't know if you know this; I'll just mention this quickly. This is what's happening right now. God is favoring Israel. Everybody watching me, say that word out loud - favor. Today we have a word from the Lord; that word is favor. I decree favor for you. I proclaim favor for you, not because I feel like doing it, but because we just heard from God, that He has decreed favor over Israel, favor over His church, favor over His people.

I want to read what I read this morning. 'I have commanded those I've prepared for battle. I have summoned My warriors to carry out My wrath, those who rejoice in My triumph.' In other words, God said to me this morning when I was praying, 'I have commanded those that I have prepared for battle.' We're not only talking about a physical battle, we're talking about a spiritual battle right now - what's happening in Syria, Iran, and many parts of the world. You're going to see something erupt; God has summoned His warriors (that's you and I) to go out and pray so that you can carry out His judgment against those nations. Think about it. People are prophesying judgment against America and there are people in America praying for judgment to take place to those who are coming against Israel and against America. Turn your finger somewhere else; point it somewhere else. Stop pointing it to the nation that is blessing the world, even though there is evil in this nation. (Goes on to exhort about God opening up the heavens for Elijah after he offered the sacrifice.)

I want to read what else He said to me this morning. I have the Scripture where I saw this. 'Listen, a noise in the mountains like that of a great multitude. Listen, an uproar among the kingdoms like nations massing together. The Lord Almighty is mustering an army for war.' I have a feeling that Israel is going to be going to war and I have a feeling that God's going to fight for them very, very quickly. It's going to be suddenly.

He says this: 'Terror will seize them.' This is speaking about your enemies. 'Pain and anguish will grip them. They will writhe like a woman in labor. They will look aghast at each other, their faces aflame. I will punish that part of the world for its evil, for the wicked and their sins, and I will put an end to the arrogance of the haughty and will humble the pride of the ruthless.'
TALKING ABOUT ELIJAH BRINGING THE RAIN TO ISRAEL AFTER 3 1/2 YEARS OF DROUGHT

Do you realize that this 'crisis' that we've been in has been approximately 3 1/2 years. It's coming to an end. I'm not contradicting anybody; I'm telling you what I hear. God has plans for America. God has plans for the West; He has plans for the nations of the earth, that His great gospel would be seen, would be heard, would be tasted of throughout the earth, that His glory would cover the earth as the waters cover the sea, that the knowledge of the glory of God would cover the earth as the waters cover the sea. I want you to hear what I have to say. I'm hearing many of your internal dialogue, 'But God, I'm hearing it's the end,' If you're hearing that, then go with it, but what I'm telling you right now, He has one huge massive outpouring that is about to take place and you'd better be prepared for it! Just like when they came to Elisha and he said, 'even though you're in a valley.' They came to Elisha and said 'We've run out of water; our livestock is dying, our soldiers are going to die.' And Elisha said, 'Go and prepare yourself and begin to dig ditches so that you can contain the water that is going to be coming to you.' There wasn't even a trace of rain; there wasn't a cloud in the sky when they went to Elisha saying, 'We are stuck. We are about to go into a battle. It's the end for us.' Elisha said, 'No, you must prepare yourself for an outpouring.' So they began to dig big holes and ditches in the ground because the water was going to come but it wasn't going to come from the sky. It was going to come from Edom. It was going to come from a region of Syria. Listen to what I'm saying to you right now.

God has spoken this before, that our enemies will yield to us what we need. This is a word from God. Please listen to me. Many of you are concerned. You say, 'What's happening with Syria? Look at the mothers and the children dying.' You know it's wicked. God is bringing it to an end, but there's a word I got years ago, that America's enemies will yield to them and they will be prosperous. Their prosperity will not only come from their own soil in America, but from their enemies. This is about to happen.
