I can hear the sound of children; I can hear the sound of life in their voices. Can you hear the sound of laughter? Can you hear the sound of joy in tomorrow? They are tomorrow. I am tomorrow; you are tomorrow. You are My destiny; You are My dream, You are my source.
(That's what God says to you)

I can hear the sound of laughter; I can hear the sound of victory in your voices. I can hear the sound of brave hearts; I can hear the sound of heroes in your voices. You are tomorrow, you are My destiny. You are tomorrow, you are My destiny. My royalty, My holy priesthood, You are My destiny.
PROPHETIC SONG

I've given you the children; I've given you the future; I've given you the future to love. I've given you tomorrow; I've given you the sound of life; I've given you the children to nurture. I've given you the children; I've given you the soft of heart So that you can mend their hearts for tomorrow.

I've given you the children; I've given you tomorrow; I've given you the children to heal today. I've given you these children; I've given you tomorrow; I've given you the children to love. I've given you the children; I've given you the light of Tomorrow so that you may nurture them.

I've given you the children of another nation So that you may take them, give them to the Lord. I've given you the children; I've given you tomorrow; The broken hearted, the broken hearted that you may mend. I've given you the children to heal.
PROPHETIC WORD
'Surely they want your children; surely they want to steal the purity, the child-like faith. This is the year of the young people, of the children. I've given them to you,' says the Lord.
PROPHETIC SONG

I'm gathering people together That know Me, that love Me. I'm gathering them together, I'm gathering them and they will be one And nations they will know who I am. They will know Me; they will love Me, and they will serve Me. They will love Me; they will love Me, and they will serve Me. Together they will stand as an army, as one.

The broken-hearted shall be healed, the oil of the Lord shall heal them, But they shall love Me, they shall serve Me, and they shall know Me and be one. And they will love Me, they will serve Me, they will know Me and be one. They will serve Me, they will love Me, they will know Me and be one.
PROPHETIC WORD - Talking about Noah and the wind

I promise you by the Spirit of God that is upon me that there is a wind coming to pass over the earth - a global wind from the Spirit of God because the heavens are opening up for it and the waters will subside.
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS

Take this as a sign. When I was praying 3:00 this morning - I could not get to sleep - and I went to pray and God spoke to me and said to me, 'By the tenth month the waters would have decreased. The tenth month, the first day of the month, the tops of the mountains were seen.' Please listen to me. You're saying, 'Kim, does this mean October?' I don't know what it means. All I know is when I was praying He said, 'Take note of the tenth month,' and He said, 'What happened on the first day of the tenth month was the tops of the mountains were seen. The breakthrough would have happened by October.' The breakthrough for many of you would have taken place through the summer and your mountain would have been conquered - whatever is in your life that's been holding you back - and the tops of the mountains will be seen. What does that mean? The mountain you will possess, the mountain that will save you, the mountain that will rescue you, will be seen. You will see it this year! Yeah! You're going to see it this year!
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS - Talking about the raven and eagles

It's an amazing thing to see these two eagles (courting), and the raven decides to start trouble with them. And the raven goes out and starts interfering with this courtship. And as I'm watching this thing, the Lord says to me, 'That's exactly what the raven is. The raven is the beast of the east; the raven speaks about the beast of the east and how it's provided just a little bit so we could survive. But the time of the eagle has come where the eagle will be one, where the eagle will be courted. The eagle shall be one together. In other words, America will become united. You say, 'Kim, that to me is totally impossible.' I'm telling you from the Spirit of God that there shall be unity in the United States of America. If not, take 'united' out of it because God is bringing unity. It will never be perfect harmony, but there's a certain unity that's coming within the church and within certain groups where that unity will cry out to God and that unity will break the power of the raven (that's the Middle East) trying to tell us that we cannot survive without their oil, without their energy. Come on! We know that God has something for us and He's going to bring unity in this nation.
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS REGARDING THE COMING MOVE OF THE SPIRIT AND NEW UNITY

The Holy Spirit has been seeking for a place to rest His feet. The Holy Spirit has been looking for unity so He can light upon that place. There has been no place that He has found as of yet. There have been little moves and little revivals but this that I'm speaking about is a wind blowing throughout the earth, a wind blowing globally, a wind that will blow and stir up every nation. Even at this point, God is preparing Syria and Iran to have their heads shoved together because God said, 'Enough is enough!' The women started this and now young people are going to take it further. Watch Russia, watch China, watch these nations as God prepares the earth and the wind begins to blow so that the dove can find a resting place and so that the Holy Spirit can move like He's never moved before! I'm so persuaded by this that I know that what's about to happen is greater than we've ever seen. Don't give up now because the dove has found a resting place and will pour out of His Spirit.
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS REGARDING THE OLIVE LEAF BROUGHT BACK BY THE DOVE TO NOAH
There is an anointing that God is giving to us so that we, the earth, may shout out His praises.
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS REGARDING THE DOVE

I know it's speaking about Noah, but when I saw this, the Lord God spoke to me and said, 'Kim, you've entered into a season. If the people would just understand, there is a sound of abundance. The dove has been searching and looking for a place to put his feet, but it came back with a freshly plucked olive leaf, speaking about the anointing. The anointing is coming forth from the earth. Believe it or not - you may not have seen it, you may not have even perceived it, but it is there.
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS REGARDING NOAH AND ARK

Get out of the ark! I could preach a whole sermon on that. I'm just doing my best to let you understand prophetically what we're about to walk into. Be glad! Rejoice because the days of pain are coming to an end. We're always going to have problems in our life, but this massive attack against us is now behind us. The worst is behind us. Please remember what I said on New Year's Eve. Go out of the ark. Get out of the ark and take every living thing - why? So they may abound on the earth and be fruitful and multiply on the earth. God is releasing today and this year and this decade such a presence and saying, 'I want every living thing to be released.' You see people, on the earth right now there are those walking around but they're dead - they have no life, they have no future. And yet, walking on this earth are people that are breathing but they're also living, they're alive. They have zoe life, they have an abundance of life, they have expectation. They're anticipating a supernatural move of God. Those people must be released so that they may abound on the earth.
Talking about being on the internet vs. television
Even this morning as I was praying I saw something about this new thing that was going to come, an amalgamation or marriage of television and the internet.

It is the beginning of the year 2012. Again, I'm in my garden - a small secluded area that I cordoned off to pray specifically for Israel. Upon returning from Israel, I walked into this little garden, opened the gate, and said, 'Lord, where now?' The Lord spoke to me and said, 'The rest of your life you will be in this garden.' And God proceeded to tell me how it pleased Him for me to be in this garden, when I come, that He delighted in hearing from me from planet Earth.

That same day, a dear friend by the name of Steve Schultz sent me an email (without knowing what God had spoken to me about) that said God spoke to him and said that God was so pleased every time I came into the garden to pray, not only for myself and my family, but for my warriors and my team, my partners - those that He has given to me. And he said that God spoke to him and said that I should never sell this property and never depart from this garden - the very thing that He'd spoken to me that day.

As far as the fast goes, He spoke to me and said, 'I want you to continue this.' So I'm doing what I've basically been doing the last 21 months, continuing in this. 2012 is going to be very interesting for all of us. Why do I say that? Because I was in this garden praying one day and He spoke to me about the beginning of a seven-year period starting in 2012. Of course, you know, we decided to adopt children by the prompting of the Holy Spirit and went to Asia. And as I went to Japan, and stood on the soil and sent my messages to you from there, my broadcasts, standing in the very area where a town was destroyed because of the earthquake and tsunami, I spent some time with a missionary that we support there.

Then I left for China; very difficult, but very beautiful. During that period, I felt like the Spirit wanted me on the soil of Japan, China and Korea. While I was there, the very words I prophesied came to pass and Kim of North Korea died. When I returned from Asia, there was an earthquake in Japan on the first of January. All of this was very significant to me - not to say that because of my presence these things happened - but I did carry the word of the Lord to these nations and started prophesying about the amalgamation and unity of Korea.

So my heart is very moved today because I'm thinking about all of this, reflecting and realizing that we've already started our journey to 2012 and things are already beginning to happen. The Year of the Youth, the Year of the Child, the beginning of things that will happen through kids, and already kids are being attacked. Our children were attacked; we're having many on our team - their kids are being attacked - but it's good because we know that the enemy is afraid. I'm sure that all of you listening to me now will agree we're embarking upon a journey that will take us to a glorious outcome, a glorious destiny. We weren't placed on the earth at this time, together, to just go day in and day out hoping for a breakthrough; no, my friends. We are at the very brink of a breakthrough. Enough is enough; the worst is behind us.

So I encourage you from my heart today and I speak these words to you because I know that you're in the same place that I am. We wake up and we go to work and we come back at night. But there's more to this now. We've entered a season, and today the Lord spoke very clearly to me about February. I thought it would be January of 2012, the beginning of the year. But He said to me, 'Everything begins in February. There will be a death - and everybody will know about it - and then there will be life that will begin to manifest.' You see, people, God wants to show us His goodness. I was thinking, I was praying today, 'God, all we're hearing about is the bad, the pain, the suffering.' But we know there's another side of God. Moses was very frustrated because the people, the 3 - million Jews - all they could see was God's wrath, God's anger, God's judgment, and they were fearful. They ran away from the mountain, but Moses got to a place where he said, 'God, enough. Show me Your glory.' We have to see the glory of God. And God said, 'I will show you My glory,' and He did.

That's where I'm at right now. I'm standing before God saying, 'Enough. I want to see Your glory.' And I'm praying for all of you today that you would pray that prayer because we are going to see the glory of God. I love you and I look forward to many, many great years together and all of you receiving the breakthroughs that God has promised you. You were sent to this earth for such a time as this, to show the world light and to be an influence to the world. I love you.

Be exalted, O God, above the heavens. Let Your glory fill the earth; let Your glory fill every home, every person listening to me, those that You've given to me to support and to follow. Bless them, Lord God. Let Your glory fill their lives, their children, their homes, their work, their industry, their ministries, everything. Our hearts are fixed and our hearts are steadfast. We will sing praise; yes, we will sing praise to You. Now Lord, I give You thanks for them and I pray for Your blessing. Amen
PROPHETIC SONG

Debt, you're going to go, you're going to go as I proclaim the word that came to me a while ago. He said, "There will be a mountain that will come down. There will be no debt; there will be no debt to those who believe, to those who proclaim and say, 'Mountain go! Mountain go!'"

Who is going to take down the mountain? Who is going to prophesy and take down the mountain? Your sons and your daughters, they will bring down the mountain of debt. Your sons and daughters will bring down the mountain of debt. Say it! " My sons and daughters will bring down the mountain of debt." Mountain go! Mountain go!
PROPHETIC WORD AND SONG

For the Spirit of the Lord says, "Haven't I told you? I will do great things. I will do impossible things. Even though some of you find it so hard to believe, I will do it if you give me just a little bit of faith. Just give me a little bit of faith and I'll conquer the mountain." Listen what He says. "Just give Me a little bit of faith and I'll conquer the mountain. Just give Me a little bit of faith and I'll conquer the mountain." Mountain go! Mountain go! Mountain go!
Right now if you use your faith and believe what He said to you, your mountain will go.

There's a mountain I will conquer in the middle of the year. Starting right now I'm going to do what it takes. I'm going to prophesy to dead bones, shout until the walls come down. I'm going to prophesy to dead bones, shout until the walls come down. I'm going to prophesy to dead bones, shout until the walls come down. I'm going to prophesy to dead bones, shout until the walls come down.

Mountain go! Mountain go! Sickness go! Sickness go! Debt, I'm going to trample upon you this year! Debt, I'm going to trample upon you this year! Death to debt! Death to debt! Death to debt! Death to debt!

"Your sons and your daughters, they will prophesy like Joel. In the last days they will prophesy like Joel and Elijah, Elisha, Jeremiah, Isaiah, Daniel, Shadrach, Meschach and Abednego. They will bring down the beast of the East. I'm speaking about your children," says the Lord. "The children of America will do it," says the Lord. "The children of America will do it," says the Lord. In the last days they will prophesy like Joel; just like Isaiah, Jeremiah, they will do it - and just like Daniel, Shadrach, Meschah and Abednego, they will bring down the beast of the East," says the Lord. Mountain go! Mountain go! Mountain go! Mountain go!
PROPHETIC WORD

The Spirit of the Lord says clearly, and I heard the word, "This day in which you live, there are creatures of the night that have caused My people to fear, caused children to take their lives. Fear has been rampant. But in this year, beginning now, for it is being proclaimed now, there will be small windows of opportunity, like what I did with Ford. Small windows of opportunity shall become big but it shall only last for so long. Some of you are debt-free because you took advantage when the opportunity came. There are new wells that will be dug. These new wells will bring new resources to My people. This that happened in Japan the beginning of the year is a sign of the redundancy of the enemy. There shall be earthquakes, floods, that will bring damage to no one in My kingdom. I will slay a beast that has stood and watched over you to destroy you. They will come and they will cause the earth to shake, the mountains to erupt, but there will be no damage. The damage that was caused in 2011 shall not happen in 2012. I will prove it; I will show you," says the Lord.
PROPHETIC WORD

"This is the Year of the Youth. I told you about the Year of the Woman. Did you not see what happened?" says the Lord. "Did you not see what I did this year? It shall move from the older to the younger. Leaders will topple; kings will fall overnight. This shall happen throughout the East, the Middle East, and even in the West." But God says, "Enough of corruption. They have stolen, they have boiled My children, they have eaten them. This sacrifice is unacceptable. What I gave Daniel, I will give to them. Watch this year, for you will see your mountain conquered," says the Lord. "Whatever your mountain is," says the Lord, "I will give you the faith of a mustard seed, a small window of opportunity, new wells that shall be dug." And God says, "Within one day, for some of you, you will be free of your debt. This year is the Year of the Youth. I will take them and cause them to do what I told Joel. They will prophesy night and day and they will bring down the forces that have stolen what belongs to My people," says the Lord.
PROPHETIC SONGS AND PROPHETIC WORDS

Kings will demand an answer. (Sings) "Give me an answer to the dream for I'm lonely and I have no answer," says the Babylonian king. "I dreamed a dream and no one knows, they lied to me. Is there a man, is there a man that will give me the answer to my fear? Is there a man, is there a man that will give me an answer, for no one knows that I fear, fear those that I dreamed about. Enough is enough. Those fools that tell me they've dreamed. Is there a man, is there a man that will tell me what I dreamed about last night?

Is there a man that knows the Spirit o the Lord? Is there a man that will tell me what I dreamed 'cause I'm afraid, I'm afraid that tomorrow will bring a beast. Is there a man, is there a man that will tell me what I dreamed - just one man? They've lied to me. Enough is enough. I saw a east, I saw a beast. Nobody knows. I am that man, I am that man, my name is Daniel. Give me a chance and I'll tell you what you dreamed for the Spirit of the Lord came in the night. I had a night vision of a stone that became a mountain."

Listen to me for a moment. I'm doing something out of Daniel. I'm hearing the Spirit of the Lord tell me what he dreamed is beginning to happen now. Listen to me; this is very big. What he dreamed about is about to be manifest.

(Sings) "I saw a stone; I saw a stone, but the stone became a mountain on the earth. The stone was somebody I didn't recognize, but I knew that He was likened to what Shadrach, Meschach and Abednego saw in the fire - the Son of God."

The Spirit of God says, "The time that Daniel spoke about has begun. 2012, 2012 is the beginning of the revelation that Daniel received." I will read it to you in a few minutes. The Spirit of God says, "There are mountains, there are kingdoms that represent the kingdom of darkness. There are mountains that represent the kingdom of God. The mountain that represents the kingdom of God has just been a stone but is about to erupt and spread. Therefore, because this is happening in the Spirit, it shall manifest in the earth as well. Look to your mountains. Look to the mountains this year; the flourishing, look to the mountains of the East, of the West. Look to the mountains, for though they erupt, there shall be no damage. Japan was a sign of the kingdom of God. It speaks of the earth shaking but no damage, no damage to the cities or the towns. This is representative of the kingdom of God's eruption beginning in 2012," says the Lord. "I placed my prophet's feet in Japan, China, Korea. Watch how I show Myself through these nations," says the Lord.
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS

We are in 2012. God spoke about seven years and what He was going to do up until Israel's celebration. Seven years from now is going to be one of the most marvelous and most powerful and most unique outpourings of God's Spirit on the earth, starting with young men. I spoke about the woman last year. Look what happened, how I've been attacked and my family, right on New Year's.
TALKING ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED IN 2011

And as I was reflecting on this and thinking about it, the Lord said, "You know the trouble and the resistance and the attack - all of this that has come against you and God's people - He said, "This is over." There will still be little struggles and things you have, but this huge monster of resistance - He said, "The worst is behind us. It's over. We've entered into something brand new."
TALKING ABOUT RESTORATION OF OUR SOUL   (Talking about Psalm 23 and how the Lord spoke to us in 2011 about restoring our soul)
This year the Lord told me there's going to be a restoration of the soul of our families and the soul of our nation. That's very important and we're going to deal with that this year as well."

dateLocation: December 27th, 2011 - The Great Wall of China
paragraphs: When you think about walls today, there's a spiritual principle. When I sing my songs, my prophetic songs, a lot of them are about bringing the walls down and the Bible says that Joshua obeyed God and the walls of the city came down so that they could take possession. Usually when a wall comes down it speaks of taking possession. I've been feeling that - even standing here in China, and I've been to Japan, that there are, in fact, walls coming down, where cultural barriers are coming down and there's going to be an openness to God's word and God's power. In fact, Doobie was saying, and he has a lot of good observations, that it is very unnatural for the weather to be like it is. There is supposed to be snow, and cloudy. We have had sunshine from the time we got to Japan and from the time we got to China, it's just been beautiful. You can't always say it's a spiritual thing but in my case a lot of times it is because the Lord gives me a word, the heavens open up - who knows what's going to happen?

All I know is that the political ramifications of what's taking place now within China, Russia, against Israel - we know that there's a plot. We've also spoken about the fact that during December there are going to be a lot of things exposed. We're seeing it happening right now.

I believe that going into 2012, standing here in China at this Great Wall, that walls are going to come down and they're not going to come down by our own attempts or trying to do it ourselves. They're going to come down when we have that unity comes between us and we begin to shout together. That's going to happen on New Year's Eve. I've told you it's going to be about conquering the mountain. Don't miss it because we are going to conquer the mountain and walls are going to come down, I promise you.

It's day seven and I'm coming to an end of my time of seclusion and will emerge tonight at the Den. I need to share with you some of the things that happened. I was again awakened really early this morning and felt that God needed me to go out and pray before the sun came up. I love that psalm that David sang: 'Be glorified, oh Lord, above the heavens. Let Your glory fill the earth. Be exalted above the heavens. My heart is steadfast, oh God, my heart is steadfast. I will sing praise; yes, I will make melody and sing praises.' And then he said, and I love this, 'Awake, oh soul of mine; awake harp, lyre. I will awaken the dawn.' You know, there's something about being there just before the sun comes up.

Anyway, I was there, praying, and I heard God say this to me because the wind has been blowing tremendously here. He said to me, 'Jesus spoke a word and the storms came to an end.' We are in a very tumultuous time period in America and the world. And He said to me, 'If I could do it then I could do it now. Just peace, be still and it can be taken care of.' So I heard that and felt wonderful peace. God for some reason has chosen this month to do certain magnificent things, and keep your eyes open because it's already started. I'll share a lot of that with you tonight.

But before I let you go, I'm going to share something that He put on my heart that I'm going to release tonight in prayer upon you. You know He told me to take these seven days and separate myself and that he would speak certain things, which He did of course. So tonight, ending the seventh day, I will emerge. I haven't been out at all and I've been available to God all the time to pray and to hear from Him. I've stood and I've pronounced certain things - declarative prayer, which is proclaiming that which He has spoken. When God speaks something, it is your honor and your privilege to take possession of that. There's a difference between looking and seeing. To look simply means casual observation; to see is acute observation, to look further. I've taught you this before.

Things are being released in the heavens, so what I'm going to speak about is the 'tangible invisible.' What does that mean? It means that when God speaks something from heaven and it is released into the earth for the people to possess, it cannot be apprehended until it is comprehended, and that comprehension, that spiritual comprehension is to see. That which is invisible becomes tangible once you see it, and then you are able to possess it. A lot of people say, 'I've never really seen anything in the Spirit.' Most of you have but you don't know about it. Now that I've been teaching you, giving you prophetic teaching, a lot of you are seeing things, and you're not a bunch of crazies, either. You're seeing things by the Spirit and once you see it, you comprehend it.

God has released a lot of stuff and tonight I want to pray and release you to see further so you can literally possess what is yours. A great example of this is Caleb and Joshua and the ten spies. They were sent to spy out the land that they were promised by God to possess at that point. Just hear me out before I let you go. Ten of the spies went into the land and they looked and with casual observation all they saw were giants. All they saw was war. Joshua and Caleb looked further than the giants and they saw grapes, pomegranates, figs - a beautiful land that they could take possession of and prosper. The ten spies returned and they told the people what they saw. They said, 'Your future is war and giants.' Joshua and Caleb stood up and said, 'Not so; look what we have in our hands. We have taken hold of that which we comprehended. Here are the grapes; here are the figs.' Everything they had in their hands, they held up to the people and said, 'This is your future.' They had it; it was tangible, it was in their hands.

All that the ten spies had was fear; that's what they had, they had fear. They had nothing tangible to give the people to show them, just a spirit of fear. The result was that the promise was not possessed and of course the people of Israel went around for forty years, wandering in the wilderness because they could not see, therefore they could not apprehend; they could not possess. I refuse that; I refuse to walk around for another generation, forty years, before I can possess what God has promised for me now. Why should we, the people of God, listen to fear, that which is casually observed by the news media, by religious leaders. Why should we lose out on our promise because of these voices which are out numbering the voices of the prophets and many others that are saying, 'Listen, forget the giants; that's going to come to an end. You will overcome them. But what do we have? What have we brought from the future? We have the fruit of that land.

That's my message to you. Once you see it, you have the power to apprehend it, to take hold of it, and it becomes yours to possess. Tonight I'm going to release that and we're going to take possession and we're going to go through this month receiving and through the New Year, New Year's Eve, into the New Year, and we're going to conquer our mountain. What do you see? Join me tonight. There are so many things that we have for Code Breakers that you're going to hear about and be encouraged with and let's go into this month, now after my seventh day, with victory and tonight I'll give you a release, your sight. I'll see you there.

It is day four and today is very different. There's a lot of brokenness and I'm finding that I'm 'weepy,' which is sometimes a sign of joy, true joy. It sounds strange but it is the case when you have joy that sometimes tears come. There's also a feeling of humility. The fact that America and many of the nations that God is setting up to bless - they have been humbled, these nations, and we'll probably be more appreciative as the economy turns slowly around. I say slowly because it is the hand of God that has allowed this for a season, though I must say the kingdom of God has flourished; even though many have struggled, we've survived and it's at its worst now. That's what came to me as I'm praying and I have to share this with you because it's day four and it's regarding the economy. These are words that came to me: 'the plan of the enemy was to humiliate; the plan of God was to humble America and to humble many of these nations. Those who have been in strong positions financially and have been cocky and have held their head up and strutted like a peacock, now they shall be humbled and shall be likened unto the fox and there shall be no hole for the fox, no place to rest. These nations that have been proud and these nations that have said, 'We have control because of the oil and various other means,' the change will bring them to a place where they will look and say, 'Now it has come to us. Why? We looked at the west and we looked at the great eagle and we said 'It has fallen,' or 'It is falling.' Now it has come upon us for we thought we could trust in our soil, we thought we could trust in that, and in the resources that we had, but look - America and the nations have been placed in a position where they are now a resource that has overtaken and blessed them.'

So I heard these words: 'From a recession to a depression was the plan of the enemy, and that will not happen.' God said, 'I will save them from the ultimate, and that is a depression, and then out of the recession.' So the word of the Lord that's coming to me as I'm praying now and calling to Him is that there is a strategy that God has, and please don't take this wrong, and this is not only regarding the political aspect, for those that disagree with Reagan maybe, but the Lord spoke to me and said, 'I honored him, and so there will be a re-visitation of Reagan.' Now obviously this is not speaking about reincarnation, but there will be a spiritual re-visitation, and political, of Reagan, 'and I shall even place someone there that will have that in their heart. As I blessed Reagan and caused this country to come forth and be restored, so it shall begin. The era shall begin in the next seven years. Now look up, for your redemption draws near, and even though they shall say, and you will hear their words, 'This recession shall lead to a depression.' But what of, what of the Euro Zone?' God says, 'I spoke to you about a unity that shall take place. Now look up. Again I say to you, look up for your rescuer is near and the people of God shall be blessed for I will reveal secrets to them on how to invest and where to invest so that I can take them out of debt. The greatest investment that they can make,' the Lord says, 'is into the kingdom of God and into the destiny that is ahead. Therefore, do not sow in places where there is death. Death does not take place in the future; death does not happen in the future. Death always happens in the present. There is no such thing as death in the future; it takes place in the present and therefore sow into the future, those that speak of a future, those who speak of the good news of reaching the earth. That is the future.'

Now, these words came to me as I'm praying and I'm still here now. We had tremendous, tumultuous weather here yesterday; the winds blew greatly. Today there is peace. The sun is shining in this state, in any event. This is a sign to me, as I walk up and down this garden, these are good signs. These are signs for His people to rejoice and in the presence of the Lord there is fullness of joy. So as your prophet and spiritual leader to many of you, I tell you what He has shown me on the fourth day. Take note of this; pray it, for the will of God can only be brought about by the prayers of God's people, the people of Christ - the princes and princesses of royal blood. Those are the ones that God listens to. So I ask you to pray with me now and hear my words. The first investment that you make is into the kingdom of God and specifically into the future. The present often is death. People who do not proclaim what God has for them in the future are those that are dying and offer nothing. We do not sow into that which is death.

So, Lord, I encourage the people of God to sow and to give and Lord, in this state, they have heard the word of the Lord. I pray that they'd begin there, and Lord, open up the doors and show them where they should invest, where there's success, where there's victory, where there is growth, where there is progress. And Lord, many will make debt-free in the year 2012, many of them. Many of them, Lord God, will become millionaires. This is not an impossibility - and even some, billionaires. Why would I say these things? Because it is God's will to prosper, for once you are prosperous and you have humility, you have the kingdom of God and the progress and the advancement of the kingdom of God. That's what His word is, so I bless you from my garden.

As the winds are blowing in southern California, as I'm praying now, it is a sign because God did speak to me about the winds earlier and the fact that this would be a sign that southern California will actually be blessed, will be restored, or come back, and God will shine again on this state. Though great evil has come on this state - He spoke to me about this and said - even though great evil has been propagated from this state, once again He will restore it. There will always be evil. There is evil in every state in America; there's evil in every nation in the earth. Evil will not be wiped out until Christ returns. However, the dominion of evil will not stand here. Already God has judged many of those that have stood up and been arrogant in this industry.

So therefore, what I've received today now is, the winds are blowing very strongly as a blessing, as a sign that certainly He is, He is destroying certain levels of evil, certain levels of dominion and principalities in this region. Yesterday was a day where I spent a lot of time in spiritual warfare - hours, in fact. Today I'm sensing an excitement in the Spirit. I'm sensing anticipation. I'm sensing that the winds will not only blow in southern California, but in America. The winds of change are coming. That's what I'm hearing as I'm praying right now. The winds of change are coming. These are not just coincidences. All this - the weather patterns - has to do with what God is saying and actually doing right now. I'm continuing my prayer - southern California, California will be restored. God will not wipe it out and send it into the sea. That is His word and that's what He's saying right now. I will continue to pray for America and see what He has to say about this nation because there has to be a change of God. The winds of change are coming and let's see what takes place. It's very exciting.

Today you're going to hear three of my audio clips that I gave at the point in time when I actually got the prophecy.' It was very emotional.' When I tried to communicate after the third one, with my team, I started speaking and as I was speaking I suddenly caught a glimpse of what they wanted to do to the children.' So while I was trying to communicate with my team, telling them what I've been hearing, I broke down and cried and switched the phone off.' Now I'm not a cry baby, but when you've been caught up into the future and when you see and hear the wicked plans, the plans of wicked, wicked men, leaders, to even use children as a shield, it became so real to me that I broke down because I was getting the actual insight and vision while I was on the phone with them.' I had to get off the phone and then just broke down, and begged and said, "God please, spare these children."' I see this hatred of older leaders, political leaders, trying to use them, and I saw even through some type of substance, poisoning, through these children.' So I started praying against it thinking it was only the Middle East but realized this was a plot for American children, for the Middle East . . . .

Not all Middle Eastern people are Arabs and Arabs are not all wicked, but the extreme Islamists, as you can see, terrorists, even leaders, have a hatred for America and some of the free countries, Christian countries. There's such a hatred; it's almost supernatural. It's unbelievable.' I just sensed that they hate this nation so much that they want to get rid of the children.' Now we know that's not possible, to get rid of all the children, but I actually caught that while I was trying to communicate with my team from the garden.

There's going to be a plundering that's going to take place in a lot of these nations by wicked leaders - you'll see in the prophecy I got which you're going to hear soon about Iran and Syria - where it's going to be the young people that are going to stop this evil progression.' That's why it's so important that we take note of what they were saying and what they were whispering.' We prophesied that years ago and people refused to believe it.' It just seems like we think that Jesus Christ is confined to the west and this culture and that He has no place in those areas.' He's going to be taking over Asia; He's got plans - I even got a word, by the way, this was this morning, and please don't take insult to this anybody, Warriors, because I respect the presidency and the office of the President of the United States and pray for him every day, but I caught a mini-glimpse today of a pie, yes a pie, in his face, like somebody had taken a pie and shoved it in his face.' It was like the Lord was saying something was going to backfire really badly because of a bad decision that he's going to make in his political race or in his attempt to get re-elected that's going to turn, actually turn against him.' That's one thing.' The other thing I heard was "Burma."' I don't even know where Burma is; I just know it's a country, or maybe a city, I'm not sure.' My geography's not that great.' But I heard "Burma" and I heard something about that whole situation also turning around.' So I see God is going to move in Asia, the Middle East - America is going to have a fantastic move of the Spirit.' I've said that all along, but they have to be provoked, and this is what's going to happen.''

Please take note of this.' Make a note of it in your mind; you can write it down, that God is fighting for America and the nations that will stand with Israel.' Don't ever forget that because in this garden I got a very, very, very powerful prophecy about Iran, Syria, Israel and America and it's going to shake you.' I don't normally prophesy under that emotion but it's going to be very powerful.' But understand this, that God is fighting for this nation and the economy will return and will be stronger than ever before.' China came into this vision while I was there, and oddly enough - I make it a point of not sitting there watching the news all the time.' This is a fact; my wife will tell you this.' I prefer to get the news before the news, and that's what prophets should be doing.' So I don't know much about the countries and their economies and how they work and everything.' I remain ignorant for a good reason.' So when it came to China, I don't even know where it stands financially, but it suddenly dawned on me that there's going to be a change there.' This is what I heard:' 2, 3, 4, 3, 3, 4, 5 - and it seemed like it was economical positions. It's so amazing that God would plan it around this time - that he would actually put me, put my feet on the soil of the very places that I prophesied about years ago.' And usually when God does that, even though we're going to get adopted children and go to our orphanages there, and go to see Peter O'Neill in Japan, and our mission, and stand in the very place where the tsunami took place - I'm going to those places.

There is going to be a move of the Spirit like unto the Day of Pentecost.' (discusses how the Church has been scattered and broken because of the absence of God and the absence of the prophetic)' God is restoring that to His church right now.' God started speaking to me today in the garden about unity.' I suddenly saw what took place when Jesus rose again.' They saw Him, they touched His side; Thomas touched His hands and so on.' When that happened, suddenly there was a unity beginning to come back together again, but He had to send the Holy Spirit, the wind of the Spirit that would come only when they were united together on the Day of Pentecost. There in the upper room there was unity. Maybe there were only 120; maybe there were more. Those 120 brought about one of the most major moves of the Spirit on the Day of Pentecost where they scattered out, but for good purpose. This is what the Lord said to me - He said, 'Once you are united, even if it's just a group of people that are fully united and focused on God's intention, God's intention becomes their intention. When God's intention becomes your attention, when that takes place and there's unity, He can breathe on that unity and then people go out under the right spirit. They're not scattered with no purpose, but they are sent with purpose to the utmost parts of the earth.' This is what's about to take place in the church - in Australia, New Zealand, England, Indonesia, Singapore, America, Canada, South America. It's just amazing what I'm feeling. Even now I can sense the presence of God and how powerful this is going to be because just a remnant of people united together and saying, 'We do not believe that God has finished with us or finished with the planet Earth. We don't believe that. We believe Christ will be shouted from every region on the globe.' Every region will know the name of Christ Jesus.

If we can unite in this and realize that the savior of the world hung on a cross for the purpose of bringing salvation to the world, and the fact is that because He is on His throne right now, He is enthroned, we are absolved. We are pardoned souls and the rest of the world deserves to have that told to them - not only told, but shown to them by God's presence. There are people that He put together that are united and that unity is going to bring about the wind of the Spirit that's going to blow through America now, right now. The real wind is going to blow for a while and when that happens the wind of the Spirit is going to breathe upon the unity that God has brought. I believe with us, just a group of Warriors, a few hundred thousand of us, that He will do it with us as well.

Having said all that, the Lord's shown me, and I don't want to say too much because New Year's Eve is going to be, our big New Year's Eve meeting that will happen in the Den when I get back from China, is going to be fantastic and I'm going to make the proclamation there. But really what the Lord began to say to me, and I'm just going to share with you just a little bit, if you'll bear with me. (goes on to talk about John 17 and Jesus' prayer for unity for the body and how unity will cause the world to believe in Jesus Christ) Unity will enable God to release certain things in the earth. This is what I was hearing. Once we have unity, it enables God to release certain things on the earth, which will cause us to excel in the field that we're in and multiply our resources. The trouble is that we have been in a pathetic state of maintaining rather than proclaiming and then claiming what we proclaim. We don't want to be in a state of maintaining all the time. (goes on to discuss)

The time is 9:46 and I've just been caught up in prayer and had a vision.  In this vision I was taken up into the air almost, elevated above a country, seemed like it was Libya.  And then God's spirit spoke to me and said, because I was praying, I was praying for the generation that is upon us to come that they would also have a chance to speak the name of Jesus and to cling to Him and to be able to feel His presence and His salvation.  And they have not been given that chance in most of these Middle Eastern countries and many other countries.

And so the Spirit of God spoke to me and said, I need you to prophesy from this soil.   But I thought to myself, how can I do that, I'm not able to go there now?  He said by the spirit you have been taken there.  In any event, I was hovering over this land, it seemed like it was Libya, and then it seemed like it was Pakistan, I'm not really sure.  But in any event, I was in the one and then the other place at the same time.  And then I was lowered into a conversation of many, many, Arabs, young people, and there was this whispering. And I tried to get closer to hear.  And they were talking about Yeshua. And I felt like there was a rebellion that would take place where they would say you will not stop us touching Yeshua. You will not stop us saying His name.  You will not stop us.  And this revolt that was taking place, was because they were tired of being oppressed and forced to worship a certain way.  And hearing about the freedom that Jesus brings will cause these hundreds of thousands and then millions of young people to begin to call out to Him, praise Him, shout His name.

The corrupt leaders that have held onto power seemed to have been destroyed and I began praying and saying, yes Lord we need righteous leaders.  But then my prayer started changing as the Spirit of God began to pray through me and I groaned and cried for these young people.  God said, the people, the solders that went into that area, into the regions, Afghanistan and all these different places where they fought.  He said, I needed their feet upon the soil even though it was war.

There were many righteous young men, soldiers they were Christians, and God needed them on that soil to take possession and this is going to be the result.  Now there won't always be righteous leaders, we know that.  This week something's going to happen.  Or it's going to begin.  You may not even see it on the news yet.  You possibly could.  There will be a corrupt leader brought to nothing.  And another one then, but we have to pray that there will be a leader that at least has an open mind, an open heart to righteousness.  That's my prayer.

And so this is just the beginning of my seven days and this is what's happened. The vision was very clear; it just took a few seconds.  But I heard the conversations of young people huddled together planning on a change of music, a change of garments, a change of attitude, a change of religion.   And this uprising will bring about a global move of the Spirit in places that have never had a move of the Spirit - ever.  And even for this country as well.  They will be provoked to jealousy by the wondrous, wondrous move of the Spirit in these different countries that have never had it.  Once again America will rise up for it will not be provoked, it will not be inferior.  And so I ask the Spirit of God to keep moving as I pray this week.  I pray for all of you as well.  I'm praying for every one of you.  Please send me any need that you have.  Send it on twitter, or post it on facebook.  I will read it.  I am dedicated for the first seven days of December to do what I'm doing right now.  That is to spend time alone and be with God.  So I'm at a good place.  Please send them in and I will continue praying for you.  Blessings from my garden.

Regarding the prophecy that came a few days ago about England and the United States of America and the unique bond that would take place between the two nations, and the United States of Europe.  This is as a result of the economic crisis and America, England - there shall be a unique bond.  It shall be a financial thing that will strengthen these nations and salvage Europe.  The Euro . . . . so what I'm hearing is that this unique bond that I prophesied about is a financial thing and it looks to me like God will save the day for those nations.  China, unfortunately, has been a stronghold for too long and shall start to decline.  They cannot trust in horses and chariots; they cannot trust in their strength.  Who will they run to when their economy falls?  There's a distribution of wealth, for those that have held on to it, there will be a distribution of wealth and this shall bring about a recovery, so I'm praying about that now and that's something that I want everyone to agree with me on because you'll see it before your very eyes.  2012 - this is where we are going to conquer our mountain.  Whatever your mountain is, it's going to be conquered.  Death to debt.

December 1, 2011 - From The Garden (Iran and Syria)Regarding Iran and Syria:  Woe to those who make unjust laws and to those who issue oppressive decrees.  What have you done, depriving the poor of their rights and withholding justice from the oppressed of my people, making widows your prey, raping young women and robbing the fatherless?  What are you going to do in the day of reckoning when disaster comes from afar?  To whom are you going to run for help? Where are you going to leave your riches?  Nothing will remain but to cringe among the captives and fall among the slain.  Yet for all of this, my hand shall be upraised; judgment against you.  Woe to you, Iran.  Woe to you, Syria.  The rod of my anger in whose hand is the club of My wrath - you would run?  You would flee to another godless nation? Watch - I will dispatch you against the people who anger Me.  What would you do to seize the money, to seize the treasure, and to snatch the plunder and then to run?  Where will you run to?  Where will you go?  Would you run and seize all the images?  Would you seize the idols and run?  I will punish the kings of Iran and Syria and others for the willful pride of your hearts and the haughty looks in your eyes.  God says, 'By the strength of My hand I will do this.  By My wisdom, because I have understanding.  I will remove the boundaries of these nations.  I will plunder their treasures like a mighty one, like I did before as I subdued kings.'  Therefore God Almighty says, 'Your own warriors who were once sturdy, I will send a spirit of division, a wasting disease if necessary, but the light of Israel will become a fire, the Holy One a flame.'And Israel, what about you?  Have I not already spoken at the remnant? The survivors will not rely on any other nations.  They are self-reliant, for they rely on the Lord, the Holy One of Israel.  A remnant has returned, and they've returned to the mighty God, and though the people be like the sand by the sea, Israel - just a remnant - will stand up and watch the destruction of these that would come against them.Therefore, this is what God says:  'My people who live in Israel, who live in Zion, do not be afraid of Iran, do not be afraid of Syria, do not be afraid of Russia.  Do not be afraid of these nations who try and beat you with a rod and lift up their hands against you as Egypt has endeavored to and will.'  But God says, 'My anger against them will end this destruction.  I will lash them with a whip, like I did before.'  This is the word of the Lord.

Yes, you will. Yes, you will! The country will see it. The country will see it! The media will speak about this because God said that this country will be shaken by it. I feel like people need to know what was prophesied from Detroit - that the whole nation would be affected. From Israel - the whole nation of Israel would be affected - and the earth. And yes, it's going to be a shaking - it's going to be incredible. He's going to prove Himself.

I was there, prophesying. I was saying, 'God said that I am going to come and meet you face to face like I met Moses.' No unbelief, there cannot be unbelief, because what God wants to do that night will begin to happen in the churches in Detroit, from that very next day. Church should not be repetitious. It must be creative, it must be prophetic, it must be apostolic, it must be on the cutting edge, it must be in the highways and the byways, in the backstreet alleys. I believe at that time, I was picking up about an African-American president. So God - He said this to me: He will not leave in shame, and if he does, I will raise up another one, a righteous one, who will bring honor to the African-American people in the United States of America, as a president.

This is the beginning of 'Call' kind of events in cities. This is going to launch it and people are going to say, 'Come to our city.' You're going to have Macedonian calls. 'Please come to our city, come to our country.' I'm talking about The Call.

Let me tell you what I think about that. Whatever God has prophesied through me is what is going to happen, I believe anyway. A global economic crisis is upon us. It's not coming; it's upon us - but technology is going to be accelerated and will free us from this global economic crisis and take us out of it. That's what I'm sensing. That's what God is telling me. He's not finished with the earth yet; He's not finished with the nations of the world and I am here to encourage you. God is moving and you're a part of it.

2012, I believe, is the beginning of a global outpouring of the Spirit; in fact, not the beginning of it, the continuance of it, I should say, because the 25th of September 2011, in Jerusalem, it was very clear that as that mantle was cast, something began. Now from that point to the 70th anniversary of Israel, which is, I believe, 2018 - it's a seven-year period. You've labored in that region.  Pastor Maldonado, go to him.  God can open the door.  And Lord, I also pray that he'd get the power of Jesus and understand it.
So, Lord, we thank You now for Your love and Your blessing upon our homes and families, in Jesus' beautiful name.  Amen

As I was praying for the prophet, the Lord showed me something. He showed me a vertex. A vertex is a coming to the head of two angles. One angle is more advanced than the other. One angle is ahead of the other and the other angle has to catch up. Since 1994, prophet Kim has been that angle that has been ahead of us - that vertex that is literally plowing ahead at the speed of light. So when you first came here, you kept preaching about and prophesying "City of Light, Light, Light, Light." We weren't where he was. In the meantime, God has done something that is absolutely incredible. He has put on the heart of apostles and prophets and spiritual leaders around the country and even the world that God's about to do something in Detroit. Look out for Detroit. Detroit is on the spiritual map like no other city in the world for a variety of reasons. He prophesied that back in 1994; we weren't ready. He didn't back up. He's taken some blows because of it.

When you're on the forefront of virgin territory and you're confronting principalities and powers - not demons, never get them confused - he's taken some blows, not from demonic activity. This man can cast out demons in his sleep, on his lunch break, at a traffic light. But when you're talking about powers and principalities and rulers of darkness, the prophet has not just insulted them, he's assaulted them. There's been a striking back and every time they struck back to bring him down, he rose up. There's a rising up like we've never seen before. We're at the verge of this vertex where the one angle is ahead of the other. It's going like this, when I saw in the spirit today, and the other angle was lower. He has literally by the prophetic anointing released a dimension of advancement by plowing, prophesying, warring, singing, stomping, clapping, shouting, warring, year after year, month after month, day after day, and now it has opened up the heavens for others to hear. And now we are becoming satan's worst nightmare, now it's over. What does that mean? Here's God's word.

What that means is - are you ready for this. In Isaiah chapter 28 - the Bible speaks about the Lord of Hosts shall come and be a crown of beauty, or a crown of glory, rather, and a diadem of beauty. The Hebrew word "diadem" is tsephirah - it literally means a rotating crown. The rotating crown means there's a changing of the guard. It's a new season; it's a new era. There's a paradigm shift; things are no longer the same. The atmosphere has changed. Then he says, "He gives strength." Why is that so important? There's been an incredible attack. The times I've been with prophet Kim in a restaurant, riding in a car, or here in a service, the activity around him spiritually is absolutely incredible. I mean, it's crazy, because he carries something. And what God has done, He's made this ministry - and thank you sir (to C.L.) for your relentless bringing him in repeatedly, over and over and over again. You probably got some attack along the way as a result of that. But here it is.

Because of that relentless, antagonistic prophetic flow, it has literally opened up an era for us that we've never experienced before. Why is that so important? In the War of 1812, Detroit was the only city in America that was taken by the British; no other city was. That struck a blemish to us. Along the years since our founding by a man named Antoine de lamothe Cadillac, there've been all kind of corrupt leaders in the city, going back to August Woodward. Augustus Woodward was a shiester, and was literally chased out of town. The main street in our city is called Woodward Avenue. So in order to get all this corrupt spiritual activity out of our city, there had to come a plowing prophet who was willing to take the blows. This is that prophet.

This man of God stayed, and because you stayed, you will get paid. Because you stayed, you will get paid. For this payoff isn't just financial, even though it includes that. The word of the Lord came also saying, He's enlarging your borders prophetically. There are leaders that had no ear to hear you for years. I don't even know them - what they think, what they say. I don't talk to anybody, but I've heard their conversations in the spirit. Those voices are out there. God is shutting them down! Shutting them down! (everyone repeated a few times)

God said to me He's giving him strength because he's turning the battle at the gate. The reason why he couldn't come to the inner city to do this - he had to be - see, all city gates swing both ways. You couldn't be on the inner city side of the gates to do this. You had to be on the outside of the gate, but visit what goes on in the city. So God gives strength to those who turned this battle right at the gate, so there's activity, spiritual activity, that deals with homicide, poverty, fatherlessness, children abused, abandoned. Even though he wasn't always calling it out, he kept affronting the principalities and rulers. Why? Principalities rule and reign over municipalities. Detroit is a municipality. There had to be someone prepared to take the blows.

Back to the vertex. What he didn't do, you have to understand, he wasn't just prophesying. He wasn't just foretelling. Here's what God said. Since 1994, you have been forthtelling. TRANSCRIPTION OF TEACHING NIGHT VISION

What is night vision?  It simply means you have to watch what you say and what you listen to because that affects your vision.  When I spoke to you about the road to Emmaus, remember what I said - the disciples' conversation caused them to be glum; that's the word I used.  The Bible uses that word; they were down.  What happened was, their eyesight was restrained so they could not recognize Jesus.

Where did it all start?  They could not see Jesus.  Some people say that Jesus changed His appearance and looked different; but even so, there are two accounts - there is Luke and there is Matthew's account.  One account says He changed; however, in Luke's account, which I really like, it tells you that their eyes were restrained so they could not recognize Jesus.  He asked them the question, 'Why is it that you are so sad?  You are so miserable and down.'  Their negative conversation caused their eyes to be restrained so they no longer recognized Jesus.  When hopelessness comes upon you, when hope is removed from you, your eyes are restrained.  Your spiritual eyes can no longer see where He's working; no longer do we recognize where Jesus is.

Do you really believe that this entire earth, all the nations, are completely controlled by satan and that God is nowhere to be found?  How can we believe such a thing?  It's a lie!  God is the ruler of the universe and there are millions of Christ's people that are praying and making declarations.  Do you really believe that God is not listening to them?  No, He's out there.  We have restrained vision.  What blocks our spiritual sight?  What is it that blocks our spiritual sight so when darkness is around us, or economic crisis affecting our bank balance and whole life, or sickness, or whatever it is - blocks our spiritual sight and we can't see.  Why is it that during difficult, dismal times we are almost blind?  Listen carefully to me.  One of the greatest reasons is that our circumstances dictate our perception of the 'other world.'  There are two worlds:  the world on this earth that we live in, this natural world, and the other world, which is the kingdom of Almighty God.  Some say it's not present, but Hebrews says, 'since we are receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken.'  So if He says that, it means that we are constantly receiving information from the other world, power from the other world, which is present.

Don't tell me that we don't have a kingdom.  Jesus told us to pray, 'Your kingdom come.' Why would He tell us to pray on a daily basis, 'Your kingdom come,' if it's only going to come when He returns?  He didn't say to pray, 'Let the King come,' He said to pray for the kingdom to come and the will of God to be done on earth as it is in heaven.  Are you praying that?  I prayed it this morning when I got up.  I said, 'Lord, let Your kingdom be greater than it's ever been before in my house, in my life, in my industry, in my artistry, in my ministry, in my country, and in my community.'  I pray for it and I have faith to believe that it will appear.  I am receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken.  I'm training my Warriors that we are not going to only look out for the antichrist spirit, but we're going to look for Christ because He is also working on the earth.

One of the greatest reasons our eyesight becomes restrained is that our circumstances dictate our perception of the other world.  In other words, we only see this world; we only see the problems, everything that's dictated to us, and we no longer see the other world - the kingdom of God that is present.  Do you believe that the Holy Spirit is here now, today?  Don't insult Him by constantly honoring, if you wish, or exalting the spirit of antichrist and never exalting the Spirit of God because if He sent His Holy Spirit to be our parakletos, or our Comforter, that means He is ever-present.  So then what happened to Him when all this evil is going on? Suddenly we're talking about the evil, talking about the antichrist, talking about the bad spirits, putting fear into everybody so that people are trembling, and even profiting from their fear, as opposed to what I am doing today and others that are out there, saying 'He's alive, He's working, He's moving.  The Holy Spirit that was promised by Jesus is alongside of me guiding me, filling me, and performing.'

Why don't we see it?  Because we're blind.  Our perception is controlled by our conversation; our conversation is controlled by what we hear.  Make a covenant with your ears today.  Make a covenant with your ears.  Refuse to hear anything that is opposed to God's will on the earth and in your life.  Then make a covenant with your mouth.  Say, 'I will not speak of that which I do not understand.'  In other words, we're not going to speak something that is not aligned with God's will and the dictates of heaven.  The ruler of heaven is speaking, as Isaiah saw Him, and 'His train filled the temple.'  All the conversation of God was, 'Who will go for us?'  and the angel saying, 'Behold, the whole earth is filled with the glory of God,' and Isaiah is saying, 'Where?  I cannot see it.'  Why?  His eyes were restrained because he was a man of unclean lips; he was repeating the things that everyone else was saying, but the man of unclean lips is basically the one that has not aligned himself with what God is saying.

Isaiah realized that his lips were redundant.  He was not speaking what heaven was speaking; he was speaking what earth was speaking, and he said, 'I need a cleansing of my lips.'  Suddenly, a coal came from the altar and cleansed his lips and he began to prophesy.  This is what I'm trying to tell you today.  What are we saying?   Whatever you are saying is going to dictate your sight.  What we do is align ourselves with our circumstances or whatever we are being bombarded with.  Do you ever hear anyone speaking in contradiction to what is evident?  Very seldom will you hear people speak about the opposite of what's happening on the earth, contradicting what is evident.  You may say, 'Kim, that's not even scriptural.'  I'll prove to you that it is.

Elisha's statement in the presence of an entire Syrian army proves to be the height of ridicule.  'Those who are with us are greater than those who are against us!'  'What are you talking about, Elisha?  Don't you see there are tens of thousands that have come to take you out?'  Suddenly, the eyes of his servant are opened and what does he see?  The angels of the Lord surrounding who?  Elisha.  The angels weren't surrounding the army, they were surrounding Elisha.  The angels surround those who have a perception aligned with heaven - so 'those who are with us are greater than those who are against us.'  Those who are with us are greater than those who are against us! Those who are with us are greater than those who are against us!  I want to torment the forces of hell by saying 'you will not exalt yourself above His word, above the Spirit of God who is present - you will not!'

Elisha's statement is in the presence of an entire Syrian army, in the presence of satanic forces - demonic forces, like today.  Everyone is agreeing with the world, and moaning and complaining.  Whatever happened to Romans 8:31 - 'If God be for us, who can be against us?' Think about it for a minute.  Demon powers are watching and they're saying, 'Look at these idiots all complaining.  They're crowning us! But there's one little voice that we don't like.'  Elisha's sitting there and says, 'Hey! What about Elijah's statement in a massive famine, in the presence of the worshippers of Baal, in the presence of King Ahab, in the presence of everyone in a massive famine and economic disaster - 'I hear the sound of an abundance of rain.'  Everybody thinks he's lost his mind, but no, he carries the contradiction.  You carry the contradiction to the present circumstances.  That's what makes you a prophetic warrior.  If you don't carry it you are not a prophetic warrior because the prophetic warrior has a gift called foreknowledge.  He knows the outcome before the war even begins.  That's what I'm training you to do.  You may think it's insane - then this is insane (the Bible) because this is full of it, full of somebody standing up like a sore thumb saying, 'I don't believe that!'

Gideon was one of those miserable warriors doing the same thing, complaining and miserable because they'd been surrounded by the armies of the east.  They were stealing from him.  He had to grind wheat in a winepress, the right thing in the wrong place or the wrong thing at the right place.  Then an angel comes and speaks heaven's language.  'Hail, great warrior, mighty man of valor!'  He's looking around saying, 'What are you talking about?  Can't you see what's going on in the earth?'  'God has spoken differently, and by the way, Gideon, you had better do the same thing.'  The angel says, 'You're going to destroy this army.'  Gideon is so full of unbelief that he can't see it, so he goes and gets an offering and brings it to the angel and says, 'I have to seal this word; I'm giving an offering.'  The power of the offering.

So Elijah stands and says, 'I hear the sound of an abundance of rain.'  But Elijah has a little problem on his hands - nobody can see it.  So he says to his servant, 'Go and look, and when you do see it, run for your life because I don't hear trickles, I hear abundance, so it's already there.' Nobody has seen it, and until somebody sees what the prophetic hears and says, it's not going to happen.  Your responsibility, Warriors, is to see what God gives me and I speak out, for without your sight, your perception, it will take a long time to happen.  Now listen to this - he hears an abundance, not a little bit.  He doesn't hear trickles, he doesn't heard drizzles, he hears an abundance, which means in the spirit world, in the other world, it's already raining like crazy but it has to manifest in our world.  How does it manifest in our world?  It manifests in our world by sight, spiritual sight.  What did Jesus say to Nicodemus?  'Unless you are born again, you cannot see the kingdom of heaven.'  You call yourself born again, yet you speak all these miserable things?  They're in a famine but Elijah is screaming, 'there's an abundance!' His servant goes out six times.  Biblical numerology is very interesting.  Six speaks of flesh.  On the seventh time, he comes running and says to Elijah, 'There is a small cloud.'  Elijah says, 'You've seen it.  Now you'd better get moving because this is going to accelerate so quickly,' because the minute you see it - it doesn't happen slowly - it goes quickly.  It suddenly flows and flows and that's why they had to run because once the servant saw what the prophet heard and said, it manifested.
