Darkness is not always a bad thing, even though we know it is bad.  But in the Bible, darkness is not always portrayed as evil.  We know there is the kingdom of darkness and the ways of darkness, but then there are other darknesses, being dim-sighted.  We do know that the kingdom of darkness is evil.  We know that the way of darkness is wrong.  But sometimes in a dark place, the light shines brightest.  Peter says that the prophetic word is a light shining in a dark place.  There's the contradiction.  If you don't believe, you can find it yourself.  It's in II Peter 1:19:  'We have the prophetic word confirmed which you do well to heed as a light that shines in a dark place until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your heart.'

What is he saying?  He's saying that the prophetic word, once it is spoken and confirmed, then becomes a light in a dark place.  In other words, you are the light that shines during dark times.  It's a good thing. Things are bad at the moment.  We're all calling for Jesus to come back because everybody's in fear, but could you for one minute think that this is where His light is going to shine the greatest?  What I'm saying is that the light is the issue, not the darkness.  We're not saying the darkness is good, we're saying the light wants to shine in a dark time.  I'm not saying He caused the dark time, but that's the contradiction - you are the contradiction.  You should be defying what is happening today.  I'm hearing from people all the time who are saying, 'I am defying it.'

Let me read you something.  Do you remember me saying that God wants to make people debt-free?  I've read over and over, because I'm encouraging them to give, and give just what they can, and when they do it, God looks and takes it and rewards them with whatever promises have come out of His mouth. One of them is to be debt-free (reads letter from someone named Josephine who has become debt free).  Come on!  Don't you tell me God's not doing it.  He's doing it over and over.  I'm excited about it because I want you to be in the same position; I want to be in the same position.  Every possible opportunity that's presented to me, I'm sowing. (OFFERING)

(PROPHETIC WORD) You know what I'm hearing?  I'm hearing the Spirit say, 'Haircut.' Don't laugh, please!  'The haircut will bring about a change in the economy of Europe.'  That's all I'm hearing.  He says, the 'haircut.'  'And the euro shall fall somewhat, and the dollar - there shall be strength brought to it.'  And God says, 'I will move into Europe and certain nations shall say. 'we are crippled and bankrupt,' but God says, 'because of the haircut, there will be a change in the economy of Europe and it will be a positive for the United States dollar.' The haircut.  I have absolutely no clue what I'm saying, but God's in charge.  My dear Warriors, God is in charge.

(OFFERING, CONTD.) Now let me continue speaking to you about this very important fact.  What I'm going to share now is going to really, really touch you.  Let's speak about darkness, not in terms of sin, but in terms of dim-sightedness.  I've told you the kingdom of darkness is evil; the way of darkness is wrong.  But there are other statements, as in Psalms 18:11:  'He made darkness his hiding place, his pavilion round about him.'  Or, in Isaiah 45:3 - I love what it says here:  'I will give you the treasures of darkness and the hidden riches of secret places.'  It's not talking about evil there, necessarily, but he's speaking about secret places, mystery, something that has not yet been uncovered.  'Revelation' in the Greek means to 'uncover that which is in darkness, that which is hidden.'  I believe that every generation has to have a revelation of something that has been hidden through the ages for this specific generation, for the church at this time.

My desire is, 'Lord, what do you want me to discover in 2011??  I don't want to hear what they discovered in 1930, even though I'm affected by it today.  I want truth from the womb.  That which is in a dark place, in the womb, must eventually be born.  That's why I believe that what is happening, all the tumultuous weather, wherever it's happening, God wants to reveal something.  Remember, prior to a great revelation comes great demonic attack - great demonic attack, always.  Something big is about to happen; you all know that.  'I will give you the treasures of that which is hidden, the hidden riches of secret places that you may know that I the Lord, who calls you by name, am the God of Israel.'  I'm telling you this because if you understand He could be saying not only will He take the wealth of the wicked and give it to you, but this is a deeper thing -  that that which is hidden or covered or veiled must be unveiled by a prophetic generation that sees in the dark.  I can see the potential of something huge for the church and for the earth, but we've got to discover it.

There's another word for darkness, ___________, which also means 'blindness, dim or hidden from us.'  There is something that is hidden from us that we have to find.  Usually the prophets are the first ones to speak it out, and it's usually contrary to what's happening on the earth.  I believe that all sin removes the light from our eyes so that we are blinded or dim-sighted.  Last night Lewellyn and I were talking, and it was so beautiful to get back after I had separated myself for a time, and to be with him at my table outside.  We had our Bibles open and we were sharing, and he ministered to me about beautiful things, which I'll tell you at another time, but he was saying that one of the greatest sins is unbelief, disbelief.  Unbelief is what happened on the road to Emmaus.  After Jesus spoke to them, their eyes were opened; then He disappeared.  They didn't need to see Him anymore because their eyes were opened now, to be able to tell others.

Don't get me wrong.  I do believe that much of the evil that's happening is brought about by what the world sows, but remember that the other side of the coin is there is that which is hidden for this generation.  In Romans, it speaks about that which is hidden through the ages has now been revealed.  It's Romans 16:25, read it for yourself:  'Now to Him who is able to establish you according to my gospel and the preaching of Jesus Christ according to the revelation of the mystery which was in darkness kept secret in the secret place (according to Isaiah 45, darkness and the secret place) since the world began, but now made manifest by the prophetic scriptures,' meaning the scriptures contain the truth to what is hidden.  A lot of what's being revealed today wouldn't have made sense in 1945 or 1950 with their technology.

God wants us to be aligned with what's happening today so He says, 'there is a truth hidden for this generation.'  You've got to discover what the light is that He has.  Paul says 'my gospel' - in other words, how he preaches it.  The gospel is not going to change; it's good news.  With the good news comes the good news of what He is doing today.  What is He doing today?  What is He planning?  'I don't know.'  It's hidden from you, but you can see it.  Once your eyes are opened you're able to see beyond the veil.  It's made manifest by scriptures that are breathed upon by prophetic teachers.  I'm not talking about teachers of prophecy because a lot of them are just trying to get you to believe that this is the end time - 'let's load up and store up so we can be sitting there in unbelief.'  Let me just warn you, when you tell people that it's the end and that all these terrible things are going to happen and they don't, their love for you will turn into hatred and mistrust.  So beware.  I'm only going to say what I hear and I want you to do the same, prophetic teachers.  But be careful you don't make them think it's around the corner and fifteen years from now, none of it has happened.  Their love will turn to hatred and mistrust.  It may make you rich for a while, but all the people of God want to know is what is He saying today so they can be prophetically prepared in prayer and can know what God is up to.

Now, I'm going to finish with this.  Let's talk about the 'gift of guilt.'  Guilt is never a good thing; I believe that guilt is destructive, as darkness is destructive. However, guilt can work on your behalf in certain instances.  Guilt is the early warning sign of danger, the first indication that something is wrong; you're up to something that you should not be doing.  Uniquely in creation, humans have a complex method of registering moral failure. Blushing.  We are the only being - in the animal kingdom, no other being blushes but the human being.  We have a complex method of registering moral failure.  The guilty conscience presents itself as an inner voice, a most personal form of communication, and it can proceed to have a powerful effect on both your body and your persona.  Let me read you something that Philip Yancey, one of the greatest writers I've ever read, said.  I'm not trying to push a guilt thing; I'm trying to say guilt can work for you, a certain kind of guilt, to warn you that you're doing something wrong and it's going to be destructive in the end.  Pain does the same thing.

There's bad pain and there's good pain.  Hear me out, there's bad pain and there's good pain, and I'm going to end with something fantastic that you're really going to enjoy.  This is what Philip Yancey wrote:  'My own perspective on guilt changed when I worked with Dr. Paul Brand, the first person I met who championed physical pain.  As an orthopedic surgeon who worked with leprosy patients in India, Dr. Brand had made the startling discovery that all the manifestations of that dreaded disease, leprosy, came about as a result of painlessness.'  Leprosy came about as a result of having no pain.  'What are you saying, Kim?'  Let me explain something.  A tiny pain cell that makes people blink every few seconds, stops.  Do you realize that every time you blink it's because of a pain cell?  I don't know if you knew that.  What happens with the leper is that that pain is no longer there.  There's a painlessness, so they cannot blink anymore.  The tiny pain cell that makes people blink every few seconds falls silent in leprosy and the leprosy patient soon goes blind for lack of lubrication provided by blinking.  They go blind because there's no lubrication, which comes as a result of blinking, which comes as the result of a pain cell.

The contradiction!  We are experiencing pain right now which should be doing what?  Providing lubrication so that we do not go blind.  The whole world is crying out saying, 'things are going to end,' and the Christians are saying, 'yes, it's going to end.'  They're looking for somebody - people, ministers, leaders, Christians - to say it's ok, it's providing us with insight, perception.  The leper no longer feels pain in their toes or in their hands.  If they wore really tight shoes for a long time, and this actually happened, they no longer sense the pain and they lose their toes because of painlessness.  It works against them.  Philip Yancey continues, 'I began to view pain not as my enemy, but as the language the body uses to alert me when something needs attention.'

In contrast to God just hammering away at America and the countries in the world, the pain - all that's happening - should be providing spiritual lubrication for the eye to see and perceive and find what is hidden in the darkness for our good.  The very unpleasantness of that language makes it effective.  Guilt deserves our gratitude - a certain guilt.  You can't live under guilt, that's not what I'm saying.  It deserves our gratitude because only such a powerful force can nudge us towards reconciliation with those we have wronged.  Just think about it, and think about the sight you could be receiving if you're listening to the right voice.  On the road to Emmaus, they were miserable and sad; they were glum.  This is what Jesus said; let's look at it again in closing so that you can actually see what He said.  This is what Jesus says to the disciples on the road to Emmaus:  'What kind of conversation is this that you have with one another as you walk and as you are sad? (miserable and glum)'

Their conversation was causing them to be sad and the sadness was causing them to be blind, so when they stood in front of the same Savior they'd seen for three and a half years, they didn't even know it was Him.  Whatever is being fed to you, whatever you are listening to and speaking out will decide whether you're going to go blind or whether you're going to have that little pain cell give you blinking power so that you can have a lubrication of your spiritual eyes so you can see.  'Give us that sight, Lord God I pray.  Open the eyes of your Warriors and set us free as we take advantage of this, in Jesus Christ's name, I pray.'

I sense something about Nigeria right now.  Nigeria, you need to pray.  Nigeria, pray, pray, pray.  There is deep darkness that is wanting to emerge, a deep darkness that wants to come and control the children of light.  There is a fear for corruption.  Nigeria, pray, for the enemy is looking at you right now saying, 'What they decide will either allow me to do this great wickedness or stop me.'  I command your power to be broken right now.  The power of what?  The powers of darkness that would try and put fear into the masses.

Nigeria, God has great plans for you, great plans for you - but it is still in your hands to decide.  For the light of Christ wants to shine and bring destruction, yes destruction, to the opposing forces of hell.  They will try and say, 'We will outlaw certain Christian values.'  Pray, that what may emerge will be a Prince of Light, a Prince of Righteous-ness.  All of my Warriors, pray with me now.  This will affect things that will happen in Africa, in northern Africa, in the Middle East.  Father we pray that You would have Your way.  I pray that You would have Your way and let the Prince of Light arise.
We in America and Warriors from all over the world, stand together and pray that the Lord would have His way in Africa, and we give You thanks and praise for it.  Amen.

They will take to the highways and the byways and the backstreet alleys. They will declare He is alive, He is alive, He is alive!' Everybody say, He is alive!

The Spirit of God says, 'There's been a slothful spirit. There's been a slothfulness in My House. People say, 'this is an act of God.' Jesus rebuked the wind, rebuked the storm. Jesus never rebuked anything that the Father did. There are demonic activities that are taking place all over the world. Why do they say it is I, the Lord? Why do they say it is Me? God says, 'You have raised your ugly head again, and Lucifer, shall they look upon you and say, 'Is this the one who caused the nations to tremble?' Once again,' says the Lord, 'I will display my excellent glory. Who, who is there that will say the earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof? Is there someone in this nation who will say the earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof? Is there someone in this nation who will say the Lord is alive and His resurrection power is upon us!'

'These strongholds,' says the Lord - Hear Me O people - 'have said if we could get the agreement of the generals of this hour that this working is the work of God, we shall send confusion and division amongst the houses that have set themselves up to be houses of life and houses of spiritual righteousness. But alas, alas. To them,' says the Lord, 'there are prophets and apostles that have discerned the times and the seasons. It is not for Me to destroy that which I can raise up. It is not for Me to destroy that which I have planned for good. The enemy has said, 'Let us focus on the nations that are about to erupt with the glory of God.''

'Japan, Japan, you're about to erupt and Christ will be your king. He will speak through your children. They will no longer be warriors that will fight with swords. They shall not be warriors that chop with their hands and break bones within a second. They shall be warriors of the Most High God. They shall rise up,' and God said, 'the young people of America shall see them as heroes. They've looked at all these movies, all these animated movies,' and God said, 'They've become heroes. But a new hero is about to arise from Asia,' says the Lord - 'a hero that has the spiritual weapons of God. And this nation shall join hands with Asia and there shall be a massive revival that shall break throughout the earth,' says the Lord.
PROPHETIC WORD

I count it a privilege and an honor to prophesy. He's really just giving forth life, breathing upon death. That's the power that we have. For if He was prepared to lay down His life and if He could walk into Jerusalem, and He could say to His disciples, I will go into Jerusalem and they shall take Me, they shall scourge Me, they will spit upon Me, they shall kill Me,' and God says, 'then He said but three days later I will rise again. You'll know that the eruption of spiritual vitality and life has begun,' and God says, 'then you will no longer walk, but you will run and your run shall be a fast and a swift run and you will celebrate, shouting victory as you run,' says the Spirit of the Lord.

I see a president that shall come, and this is not to speak bad about this one. There is a president who will come. And God says, 'he will have absolutely no fear, absolutely no fear. He will be decisive, he will make decisions. And then in the middle of the restoration of America - rapidly because of a source of energy that shall come quickly, and because of medical breakthroughs, and because of agreements between nations, specifically China,' God said, 'they shall say, 'we never dreamed this would happen. They said that this in Japan would never happen.'' God says, 'Listen to Me. As the beginning of the restoration, as it begins, there shall be a woman that shall rise up - a woman that shall be strong in faith; virtuous. Beautiful in eyes, and her eyes shall be so beautiful. Her eyes shall be round and big. I have crowned her,' says the Lord, 'as I crowned Esther. And the people shall receive her. She shall have the oil of gladness for the pain and the mourning that has taken place, and she shall pour out the oil. (Is there some oil here, please?) She shall pour out the oil on this nation,' and God says, 'healing shall begin and then it shall flow rapidly. Schools will be free from potential damage and danger, shootings and murder, drug addiction. Cartels shall be afraid of a woman - a woman anointed by God; a woman set aside.'

And God says, 'they will say 'we hated her, but now we love her.' For she shall take the oil of healing and she shall pour it upon the scars of those left and those right and of the new party that has come forth and emerged where they shall say, 'Christ will reign and we shall not implement socialism at all.' Where they have said, 'we will make history without God.' No, you will not. No, you will not,' says the Lord. 'For I chose this nation before it was founded, before anybody came here, I chose this entire nation - all fifty states, every one of them, to send My gospel to the entire earth. Do you think I have changed My mind? Therefore, the healing that is necessary for this nation shall come at a time, in the middle of the presidency. There shall be a woman that shall come and God said there shall be oil that shall be poured upon the nation and they shall suddenly feel the healing and they shall say, 'it is well with my soul, it is well with our soul.' For the soul of America has been corrupted; the soul of this nation has been corrupted with bitterness and anger.' And God said, 'She shall say. 'no more bitterness, no more anger, no more division,' and she'll pour the oil that shall come from the Spirit of the Lord Himself.' If you as a nation believe, if you as a nation want this, lift your voice and shout one more time and say yes! Yes to Esther! Yes to Esther! Yes to Esther!

All this is a sign, similar to when, a few months ago, we talked about what happened with the phenomena of the birds and how it was a sign pointing to something, the day we've all been waiting for. In the same prophecy, you say "this is the time where complete poverty in the church must come to an end."

He's building His church; His church must grow, not only in America but Japan, in Egypt, in Sudan!
Sudan! Sudan! The Sudanese . . . I feel something about Sudan right now. Where is Sudan? Below Libya? (Fiona says it's on the east coast, just above Uganda).

Here's the Word of the Lord and I want to prophesy this right now. I want you to listen to me because I feel something about Sudan. I feel like there is going to be, south of Sudan, there's going to be a massive, massive move of the Spirit where even Muslim people will travel from the north to the south and say, "What is happening there? (Speaking about how Israel thinks they will be betrayed by the United States and how Israel sees Obama now. Kim recalls his revelation one year ago of betrayal in the White House, and how he saw people, some with Middle Eastern garb, gathered around a table. Kim was standing on the rooftop of a building overlooking Jerusalem, praying, and saw a glimpse of something in the Spirit.)

I caught a glimpse of an altar, and this altar was covered with coals. And this altar covered Jerusalem - it was almost in the sky over Jerusalem. I saw coals on the altar, and I realized at that point that this was similar to the vision that Isaiah had experienced in Isaiah 6. I'll just quote it to you: 'Then one of the seraphim flew to me, having in his hand a live coal which he had taken with the tongs from the altar, and he touched my mouth with it.' And as Isaiah exclaimed after seeing the Lord high and lifted up, 'Woe is me, I am a man of unclean lips and I'm surrounded by a people of unclean lips. So I cried out to God.' The seraphim were proclaiming, 'The earth is full of the glory of the Lord.' The thing is, why was I not seeing and proclaiming the glory of God in Jerusalem? All I could see was pain, misery, destruction, deception, grief, greed, and religious control, and it was affecting me. I started thinking there is no hope.

In America and in many western countries, few are truly seeking after the Lord. I'm not trying to insult anybody, but there are many that emerge after 'seeking the Lord' with an idea that many oftentimes, if not most times, becomes a mechanism to increase their influence for fame and riches. It's sad. You watch all over Israel; I watched it - people with their microphones and their cameras, trying to raise money because they're in Israel, doing what? Basically, saying there's no hope.

And I began to search and said, 'If the angels could say at a time when King Uzziah had just died, 'The earth is full of the glory of the Lord,' then I need to find out what glory is there for Israel. What glory is there at this time? Is our prayer, 'Pray for the peace of Jerusalem,' in vain? Is God able, or have we decided no, when they say 'Peace, peace, then sudden destruction,' then we have no hope. Will there ever be a move of the Spirit? Will there ever be a move of God upon the young ones? Will there ever be the shouts - possibly just for a season - of Yeshua in the streets of Jerusalem?

I will make sure that I do as I did on Mount Carmel in 2008 with 1800 people and thousands, and ultimately tens of thousands hearing that, shouting 'Yeshua! Yeshua!' Shouting His Name. It means Savior; Salvation comes to Israel. I believe that when we do this in September of this year as I end my fast, the same thing is going to happen. There's going to be an ushering in of something glorious. Why is it that we find this hard to believe? Why is it that we say, 'It's never going to happen in Israel because things are so staid and so predictable, that it's never going to happen.'

I don't believe it! I honestly believe that God is going to do something highly unusual. I can't tell you exactly in detail what it's going to be, but I know one thing: I saw the altar of God. I saw coals on that altar. I saw angels pointing towards Jerusalem and proclaiming the glory of the Lord, which means that there could be a shaking where God will actually move in and do something very, very unusual. I'm not talking about the two prophets and the witnesses - that's all to come. I'm talking about just something where there's a refreshing, there's a reformation, there's a time where Israel is magnified. The God of Israel is magnified by what He does.

Over the years, if you think about it, when Israel was outnumbered over and over and over, and God would protect them. He's doing it again. The reclaiming of land is going to take place, and I have so many other things. But let's just get back to what I saw. Moves of God, or revivals begin, then like a puff of smoke, they vanish with their dedicated followers grasping for what once was a glorious move of the Spirit and now has been translated from a burning bush into a pile of ashes. It happens all the time. Suddenly it flares up, and people stay at that pile of ashes when God has moved. Listen to me.

When God was speaking to Moses at the burning bush, Moses could have stayed there. He could have written books about it. He could have tried to sell and make money. He could have. I'm just saying, in our day and age, that's what they would have done. Instead, God took that fire and moved him to Egypt and then took the children of Israel out of their bondage into the desert. That same flame that was in the burning bush was there leading and guiding them. My point to you is this. Many times we stick in a revival and when the fire ends and the voice of God is no longer there, and it's just a pile of ashes, we stay there trying to revive it instead of moving to where God wants us to move.

In Jerusalem, I too was seeing this and leaning to criticism instead of prayer. It seems that Isaiah was correct in announcing that he was a man of unclean lips because he was surrounded with people that were saying the same thing. God started challenging me, saying, 'Son, what are you going to speak over Jerusalem? What is it, as a watchman on the wall, that are you going to pronounce and predict?' Isaiah's communication as a prophet must have been as those who surrounded him; irrelevant, redundant, and of no heavenly value.

I saw this altar, I saw angels, and just for a moment, pointing towards Jerusalem. I feel like God is about to magnify Himself like He has never done before. In other words, He's going to do something - listen to this, and I know it's hard to believe - He's going to do something that He's never, ever done before. If you think about the great things, and how Solomon said there's nothing new under the sun, God told me that He wants to do something in Jerusalem, in America, and some of the 'lion' countries, that He has never ever done before. I'm going to leave it at that for now because it has to unfold. When God wants to show His magnificence, He has to find a people whose lips are purified from words lacking divine revelation.

God wants to show His magnificence and needs a people whose lips are purified and that do not lack divine revelation. Isaiah saw the Lord high and lifted up, heard the conversations of angels and of God - 'Who will go for us? Whom shall we send?' Why? . . . because it's so difficult to find somebody that will actually speak what is being spoken in the heavens. Now this is what I heard and saw.

There's an altar over Israel and God is purging, He is cleansing, and He will show His magnificence again. There is an altar over Israel, and God is purging, cleansing, and will show His magnificence again. Lord, I pronounce that once again You will arise and You will show Your magnificence and as the enemies surround Israel, and as nations turn against them, You will rise up and in so doing, they shall say, 'Truly there is only One God and that is the God of Israel.' And Lord, as I speak that word and prophesy, I pray, touch the people of America. Touch the people all over the earth that are watching right now to get a glimpse of this. God is not finished yet. He's not finished with us.

I saw this altar over North America, England, parts of Europe, some of the 'lion' countries in Africa and Asia, or Australia, etc. Enemies will rise and fall in the presence of this altar. This is what I saw. In other words, if there was no altar, there would be no Presence. It speaks of sacrifice. It speaks of a whole lot of things - purification, purging. But enemies will rise and fall in the presence of this altar. We have to keep the altar alive. We have to keep the fire burning on the altar. God will purge betrayal, compromise, and the non-venomous snakes that have tried to suffocate the nation. What am I speaking of? The Spirit of pythos, which is of course, as you know, the spirit of divination. I know it sounds weird; I'm not talking about a bunch of witches standing and pointing. I'm talking about divination, my friend. The imitation of the divine; exactly what Fiona was saying. Satan cannot create; he is non-creative. This is what Islam is doing, and the spirit of divination - which is an imitation of the divine - is running rampant, and God is dealing with it.

The other thing I saw, and I'm going to read one Scripture - then I want every one of you to boldly make a proclamation today, because God is moving right now and I can tell that some of you are feeling encouraged. 'Well, Kim, things are going wrong in America.' I know that, but remember, God is purging, He's setting things straight. Even though it looks bad, that's how He does it. That's because He loves us. He loves those whom He chastises.
PROPHETIC STATEMENTS

He's chastising at this very moment in order to set things straight because there is an administration that is going to come forth, there's a new party that is going to come forth, an administration and a ruler that is going to rule with righteousness and there are going to be people that come forth and they're going to say, 'What has happened to this nation? It's gone from one extreme to the other.' That's right, and I'm not talking about radical Christianity in the White House. I'm not talking about that. I'm talking about righteous ruling and reigning, and that's about to come upon us.

Syria and Iran - what's happening? Before I read this scripture to you, I saw - and this is exactly what God said to me - 'I'm going to take Syria and Iran and bump their heads together and smash their heads together.' And what I saw was God setting ambushments against them. In other words, they will rise up together and they will plan together and they will try something very, very unusual and unique. And God says, 'In the process, I'm going to bump their heads together - not bump, He's going to smash their heads together, which means the political leading powers will be destroyed simultaneously.

Come on! Can you feel that? And that's what I saw as I was standing in Israel. That's what I pronounce to you as your prophet, as your leader, and as God's voice at this point in time, to Israel, I saw it. I stood on that rooftop, sick as I was, and I made that pronouncement, and God said, 'I will show My magnificence again.'

God has plans for Israel, beautiful plans, to do some unusual things even with a new source, a resource that will come. When they cut off Israel and say, 'We're not going to supply,' like from Egypt, God says, 'From its very soil I will bring forth resources and show again that I can make them wealthy and provide for them.'
A lion has roared, the Lord has spoken, who can help but prophesy. He's spoken over Israel; He's speaking over America right now.
II Chronicles 20:1 The story of Jehoshaphat.

'Thus says the Lord, do not be afraid, do not be dismayed' - why? . . .because that will stop the victory. 'Do not be dismayed, for this great multitude, for the battle is not yours, but it is God's.' The battle is not yours, but God's. The battle is not yours, but God's. Then He gives them a strategy (continues on with story - vs. 17), 'You will not need to fight in this battle.' So say I in 2011, a prophet - 'Thus says the Lord to Israel, thus says the Lord to America - you will not need to fight in this battle.' In other words, it's a short, small war. Position yourself, stand still, and see the salvation of the Lord.

Now we've heard the other side. We listen to the news, we listen to the prognosticators, we listen to the claims of what is going to happen. But what does God say about it? That's what I'm interested in.

Things are bad around you, it's happening, we know it's factual, but God has just said to us, 'Do not fear; do not operate out of fear and dismay. You will not need to fight because I'm going to be fighting for you. That's the word to Israel and that's the word to you watching me.

While I was here today, February the 24th, I had a mini-vision. When I say a mini-vision, it's just a flash. Visions can come in various forms and ways. It could be a flash, it could be in the nighttime when you're asleep; some people even go into a trance. I had a flash and I saw the head of Gaddafi rolling. For those that don't know this, I prophesied the decapitation of Saddam Hussein long before it happened. Even Larry King asked me at the time what I thought would happen. I prophesied that he'd be pulled up out of a hole and prior to that I prophesied about the decapitation of Saddam Hussein.

I believe Gaddafi is going there and sending his army there and killing his own people because he believes - I'm telling you, he believes that this president does not have the spine to do what Reagan did in his time. He believes this guy will do nothing. I honestly believe that. He's not afraid whatsoever. There's a bit of insanity there. I saw in a flash before I started this program today. I was in prayer for two hours this morning and I wept and wept today because there are innocent people dying.

What is God going to bring out of the madness that is taking place? Dictators are going to fall and you'll see today - I prophesied short men, and this is not an insult to short men. I'm not exactly that tall and I have short people working for me. God was speaking and saying these midgets - when I say that, I mean they have no moral weight whatsoever - will be toppling one by one like dominoes. We're seeing this happen. Unfortunately, it takes revolt to do it. I prophesied this being a decade of revolt and reformation and the changing of the guard. That was the word of the Lord. I'm saying all that so you that are watching can be comforted with that and you can take the words of God and use them to pray that wicked leadership that have been there too long topple and that something emerges out of the youth. I'm not talking about terrorism and radical Islamism. I'm talking about, out of that will come a group of people, and as we predicted, will join forces in the arts, in the arts, with the west, and a new music shall come forth.

Listen to the word of the Lord, it's coming now. A new music shall come forth. A new sound will come forth where God will take the east, the Middle East, and the west and there'll be music that will come out of it. There'll be art and all kinds of things that will come out of it.

There you have my word. I saw him - I think it's going to happen in the next 24 hours if I may be that bold. I think this Gaddafi thing is going to ignite a lot of forces of hell to scatter. Let God arise and His enemies be scattered.

That's actually happening to us now, and America is about to see that happen, too. Just to give you a little hint on it. It's happening in Israel and they're going to attempt it in America in a very subtle way. I got that secret from the Lord when I was in Detroit about these little submarines, or mini-submarines.

(After rest of video clip from August 22, 2010 in Detroit is played about enemies trying to rename Israel an America, Sunil shares about the Muslim cleric who is organizing a march to rename America the Islamic States of America and make sharia law the law of the land.)

He is predicting, and I am saying to him right now by the power of the Holy Spirit, and God says it - that will never happen. That will never happen. And even if God needs to strike you dead, that will never happen because He is the protector of this nation. He's told us why He's protecting this nation - for the sake of His Son, Jesus Christ and the Good News and the word of God to go throughout the earth. It will not happen. Get that straight, and my Warriors agree with me.
After discussion about the short men endeavoring to take power . . .
This is going to be like a domino effect. The young people are going to protest. They're going to come and say, "We've had enough."
Not much longer - the toppling of these men that are short physically and, of course, mentally and spiritually - and that, we are excited about.

What is being said in heaven right now? What is being said in heaven so we can declare it on earth - those are the keys of the kingdom. He gives us keys by the prophetic word and when we have those keys, we have the power to bind, we have the power to loose. That's the point I'm trying to make here. A lot of people don't realize that. He's giving us keys to bind and to loose. Jesus is building His church. If He desires to build His church in Libya, then it shall be built and it's not going to be a little church. I'm not talking about church buildings, folks, we're talking about the church that is in the streets, the highways and the byways, in the marketplace. That's where it's going to come.

In America, too. God's going to move away from the system and He's going to go into the streets and into the houses of people and the glory of God is going to cover America as the waters cover the sea. The knowledge of the Lord, the knowledge of the glory of God, I prophesy, is going to cover the United States of America, Canada, and countries all over the world. But I'm speaking for this nation now - as the waters cover the seas, I believe that's going to happen. We have the power to bind an lose - now get on and do that - bind the powers of hell in Tripoli, bind the powers of hell in Libya, bind the powers of hell in Egypt, bind the powers of hell in Syria and Iran. Let's bind the powers of hell so it can be done in heaven - that's our privilege. In the meantime, Christ is working in the south and the north and the east and the west. Christ is moving and He's touching nations. He's not just touching one single person at a time, He does that, but He's touching nations.
By the way, there was an earthquake in New Zealand, a huge earthquake. I pray, Lord, You'd keep the people of New Zealand.

New Zealand, I want you to know something. All along that way, and in the Christchurch area, I'm getting this by the Spirit, there's going to be a breakthrough with the young people - they're going to come out and give expression of the boldness of God with clarity. There's a spirit of clarity upon New Zealand. When I say clarity, there will be a defining - a definite understanding of what God is doing. The spirit of the sons of Issachar, knowing the times and the seasons, will come out of you. There are some great men and women of God all over - in Auckland - I was there in 1982. They are beautiful people that love me and took care of me. I want you to know something - God has not ended it yet. It's not the end. God's going to do something very special. Smoke coming from the mountain, smoke coming from the mountain; don't worry yourselves. The earth is preparing for the sons of God to manifest in that area.

Lord, we pray for New Zealand. I pray that You'd touch them and minister to them now. There's a glory that's emerging from New Zealand now and the islands all around, Lord God. Christchurch - there's a move, a very special move there. The earth is moving - something's happening. I know there's been an earthquake, but something else is happening there. Lord I pray that even as the earth manifests, even as it erupts, Lord I pray that God, You would erupt in the Spirit. Amen

"This city shall be known as a city of unity. I will break down the barriers; I will break down the racial barriers. I will break down the walls that have been built up. I will destroy the demonic power that has raged against this city. I will come before your Thanksgiving and I will tear down the very walls that have built hatred and animosity, and this shall be known as a city of unity, faith, leadership - and power shall come and you shall reach the unreachable and touch the untouchable. I will revive the economy and you shall be known as a City of Light.

This city will have no barriers. "I will not be stopped," says the Lord. "I will come in like a flood, raise up a standard of righteousness, and unite the hearts of the people and the heart of Detroit will begin to beat again. The revival shall begin - the heart of Detroit will start to beat again. Your children will run and they will prophesy. They will say, 'Come and let us go into the house of the Lord; come and let us go into the house of the Lord! Come and let us go unto the house of God! Your children will say it!"

Spirits of the ancient, listen again. Powers that have held tight, whispering, "What color are you?" They have managed the minds and emotions of people. Spirits, ancient dark forces that gatekeepers allowed to whisper. "Is there an uprising of the saints of the Most High God?" they say. "Prophets are gathering together; meeting at tables - apostles, teachers. They speak of a gathering of the redeemed. We must stop it! We shall whisper as we have before." Diablo, to speak, to divide. "Let us whisper as we did with the apostles. 'Who is the greatest amongst us? Who shall lead?'" But God says, "Ha, ha. I laugh, for they have attempted this throughout history, but could they stop Daniel while he was in exile? No, Daniel became a ruler. There is no exile. One word I shall speak, and the powers of hell shall scatter. And they hear you now and they say, 'Are these pathetic people able to turn the world upside down?' Yes, we are!!! And Yes, we will!!"
They call you pathetic, but says the Spirit of God, "I call you holy, sanctified, precious, redeemed."
"But ah Lord, I am but a youth. How can I speak?" "Jeremiah, before you were formed I sanctified you. Do not say I cannot speak."

Isaiah - "I am a man of unclean lips and I am amongst a people of unclean lips. My lips speak not the truth that the seraphim speak. What do they say? Holy, holy, holy is the Lord; the whole earth is filled with His glory." And Isaiah says, "What have we spoken? We've spoken death, we've spoken defeat, we've spoken as slaves, and yet that which is spoken in heaven is holy, holy is the Lord, the whole earth is filled with His glory."

Did you hear what the Spirit of the Lord said? I don't care what anybody says. I don't care where you stand. When God speaks and reveals to us the whispering and the torment of the powers of darkness, they are confounded; they've used every plan they can possibly use; they've pulled out every trick they could possibly pull out - and guess what? They have nothing left. They've stolen, they've killed, they've destroyed. And now Jesus has come with life and more life, zoe life, eternal life, about to be poured onto this nation. We are ready, we are prepared to run and not be weary, to walk and not faint, to mount up with wings as eagles, to renew our strength, to be resilient, to come back even better than before, to get to a better place. It's over; this year everything will change. It's already begun - we can feel it, we can sense it, we're ready to run. Now shout!!

(Singing, "I never want you to go away from me, so I built You a mountain; won't you live with me.") So he built Him a mountain, where he strengthened and fortified it, called Zion. He went and he found the Ark of the Covenant. At that point, it was in somebody's house. David said, "This, the magnitude of this, cannot be contained in four walls. It must be on an elevated place. So he took them and they carried the Ark of the Covenant on their shoulders.

The problem with Detroit is this - and I speak now, thankfully, as an authority. After eighteen years, I think I can say it. You see, David tried to carry the Ark of the Covenant on a cart that was built and copied - an exact replica of the cart that had been built by the Philistines and sent over their border to Israel. They had captured the Ark. So they built another cart - it was man made, a system, a formula. They carried it, but the oxen stumbled because the Ark didn't like being on a system, on a formula, a patent. God had already designed that patent. It was to be carried on the shoulders of those qualified - the priests. God is gathering priests in Detroit to unite together to carry this glorious presence to an elevated place together. It cannot be contained by one church. It cannot be contained by one man, and it cannot be transported by a formulated system called religion. We have what it takes in Michigan; we have what it takes in Detroit. We are not lacking. But we have contained it and said, "Don't take what is mine." God says, "I am about to disperse that. I'm preparing the shoulders of leaders to carry this glorious sound to a holy hill, where all the houses will be blessed by it; all the churches will be blessed by it. All the businesses will be blessed by it. The economy will revolve and change, and they will look at Detroit and Michigan and say, 'How could this possibly have happened?'"

It will spread and they will look at the United States of America and say. "How did this happen that you are salvaged from despair and economic embarrassment?" God said, "I created this nation. Before the pioneers came, before anybody put their feet on this soil, I developed its land. Eons of ages ago, I prepared the soil - the mountains and the valleys, the deserts - from sea to shining sea, and said, "One day, a nation shall arise and this nation shall spread the news of My only begotten Son. They will send His word to the ends of the earth. Do you think that I have changed My mind?"

For those that will not stand and carry, they shall be as the one who tried to stop the Ark from falling. But great shall be the rejoicing when the Ark, or the glory that I speak about, is placed upon the gatekeepers and the watchmen on the wall of this city and of Michigan. God says, "You know what will happen? The exaltings of David shall be multiplied in the city; as David exalted before the throne, before the Ark of the Covenant, and danced for thirty miles until he lost his clothes. And that which came out of the palace and criticized him went barren." And God says, "When this takes place, those who have ruled the city, at ease in Zion, shall be barren and they shall be fruitless. But those that join the parade and those that stand together shall be fruitful, fruitful, fruitful," says the Lord.

How many of you are ready to be debt-free? Don't think it's impossible because huge things are about to happen, and I'm going to prophesy it from the City of Light. And this big light of ours is going to shine all over the world.

How many of you in this building believe that God's goodness will lead America to repentance? How many of you believe it? It's not God's judgment but it's God's goodness, will lead America to their knees. (Singing) God's goodness will lead America to their knees. God's goodness will lead America to her knees. (kept singing) I believe it! I believe it! I believe it! I proclaim it! I proclaim it! I proclaim it!

The Spirit of Python, the spirit of divination, is being taken out of this nation. No more strangulation, no more suffocation. You spirit of Jezebel, you have no power over the prophets! I said Jezebel, you have no power over the prophets! There's a double portion that God has for this nation. If you believe it, say YEAH!
SONG

We will honor You; we will honor You in this nation."I called you friend, America; I call you friend." (God's saying this)"I called you friend; I call you friend, America,A friend to Israel."God says, "I call you friend, to America,I call you friend.

I'll take you way beyond the veil my sweet America, America.I call you friend to the lonely; I call you friend.I'll give you hope, America, I'll give you hope.You are My friend, you are My friend,You are My nation.You are My friend," God says, "You are My friend, sweet America.I'll lift you up, I'll show you off to the nations."
Did you hear what He said?"I'll lift you up, I'll show you off to the nations, to the nations.""I call you friend, I call you friend, I'll show you off."

"Hear, oh people of the Lord. This that has happened in this nation, and this that is happening throughout the Middle East - this that is happening in Africa is My doing. I have poured out the wine and intoxicated the people, for this is the changing of the guard. This is a time in your history where you will look back and you will say what man meant for evil, God turned it around for good."

"There are barbarians who want what they call democracy; they want freedom. The changing of the guard means reformation. This is the decade of reformation. I will change the guard in this nation. I will change the guard in Africa. I will change the guard in the Far East and in the Middle East and the Near East." God says, "I will remove and I will topple the princes who have taken advantage and drank themselves into a stupor. How dare they stand against My Israel? How dare they stand?"

"What I told Abraham was, 'Stand from that place and look, and whatever you see I shall give to you and your descendents forever.'" The Spirit of God said, "I did not say for a season, for a time, for a few years, for a few decades, for a few centuries, or for a few millennium. I said forever. Israel is forever. My church is forever. My spiritual Israel is forever." America, hear the word of the Lord. "Turn your back on Israel and I will scrape you from the streets." For God said, "For this president is toying and flirting with a dangerous, dangerous enemy. Familiarity is creeping in; therefore, he has invited the spirit of Jezebel who would say that the prophets are to be doomed and the church is to be shut and they'll no longer use the tax non-profit status, but rather to use the money to give to the sports teams." God said, "What will they do when they need prayer? Will they run to a quarterback? Will they run to somebody who runs fast in the flesh? No!" God said, "The sports will stick to their sport; the politics will stick to their politics, but My church shall endure in this nation," says the Lord, "and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it," says the Lord.

"The crowds shall increase. They shall erupt in a drunken stupor for power, for more money. They shall forsake the children, and they shall say, 'it is our good and well-being,' and they forget that the children are the future of this nation." God said, "This that has been done with the budget is a shame and a sham." And the Spirit of the Lord says, "I will remove from power those that will use and abuse the people and say that this shall not be as it was before, America shall not change. Reformation has begun. Your enemies shall rise from Africa, from Asia - they shall rise from all over and I will topple them one at a time," says the Spirit of the Lord. "I told you, they will try and come under your seas, and even now," says the Spirit of God, "they are trying, they are endeavoring to come under the seas." I see a type of submarine, but they're not submarines. They're like a mini-submarine - not a yellow submarine, but a mini-submarine. The Spirit of God says, "They will endeavor to come in and they shall stop them and they shall say, 'What is this that you have on board?' and they shall find tons of drugs. But the Spirit of God said, "This is only a plan to get in weapons of mass destruction into this nation. Do not think this funny," says the Lord, "for it is not. But I am already giving them and inventing something that will destroy these little submarines that shall try and come under the ocean to come on to your shores. Did I not promise in this building that they shall try and come near your shores? But they shall not make it," says the Lord, "for I will raise them up and I will chase them back with their tails between their legs," says the Lord.

The midgets; the midgets who are in power. It started way back - Napoleon Bonaparte, Mussolini, Hitler - all the small men. All the small midgets have endeavored to stand up high and prove their power. And God says, "Watch how they have tried it. Look at Kim" - not me, look at Kim in Korea. "These are small men but with great appetites for power." God says, "Watch" - listen to me all over the world because there are people watching on the internet now and they are hearing the word of the Lord. "I will topple the short men who have endeavored to take My power and use it," says the Lord. "Watch them go one by one. I'll take them out." The Spirit of God says, "Even those who are a little taller, I'll also deal with them for they are midgets in power." God says, "This is enough. What is this all about? I've heard the sounds of unbelief; I've heard the sounds of those that would say, 'There shall be national socialism; we shall create history without God.' What did you say? History without God? There can be no history without God. This is His-story; therefore, watch how I make history. Watch how I make history now," says the Lord. "And this nation, they shall look back and say, 'How did they recover so easily?' Restoration has begun," says the Lord.
Nations of the earth shall roar;They shall rock and roll under the sound of the Holy word of the Lord.The nations of the earth they roar, they rock and they rollUnder the sound of a new sound.

Don't you know that there is a new sound that is coming to the earth?Do you know there is a new sound that is coming to the earth;A sound that will draw the people to the upper room again.It's a sound that will draw the people to the upper room again.It's the sound of the Spirit of the Lord.There's a holy sound, a mighty sound that is coming to the peopleOf the Holy One, and they shall say,"America has been baptized with a holy, holy fire."

There's a sound that is coming to the earth;It's the sound of mighty, mighty, mighty power. People of the east will try and come and taint your name,But the Holy One of Israel says, "There is a baptism of holy, holy fire."Are you ready for the fire of the Holy One of Israel?Are you ready for the fire of the Holy One?

What is happening in Egypt is going to cause young people to be so dissatisfied all over. You see all these countries are going to have collapsing rulers. And God spoke and said. "I'm going to bring princes to dust and raise from dust and make them princes." And I even said this once before, even though this won't happen in a huge way, that your enemies, many of them, shall become your friends. And they won't be fair-weather friends. I'm not talking about the barbarians that are in terrorism; I'm talking about the youth. And they will sing, and He said, "They'll get tired of singing Allah; and they'll start singing about Yeshua." God said, "I can change a nation in one day."

dateLocation: February 8th, 2011 - The Sea of Galilee, Israel
paragraphs: God says, "In times past when Israel was forsaken, did I not bring forth a resource, or make things happen for them? I have always protected Israel. (Looking over the city) I've always protected you, I've always taken care of you; I've always looked after you. I've always made a way for you. Do you think I won't now? I've already found a resource for you. I've already made a way for you," says the Lord. "I've made a way for you, Israel, so that you will not need Egypt. You will not need them. There is a resource; there are resources in the ground. I will protect you."

"But they shall say, 'What has happened to Egypt and what has happened to the United States?'" And the Spirit of the Lord says, "Even as I protected them at that time with supernatural miracles, I will make a miracle take place. I will cause a miracle to take place on your shores. I will make a miracle take place and cause you once again to be seen as the light of the world. You will be seen, Israel. You will be seen as a mighty, mighty nation," says the Lord.

"And listen, they shall say, 'What shall we do now?' for another shall be raised up. And they shall say, 'What is happening in Egypt?' Then he shall be on for a while, and then another one shall be raised up again. And they shall say, 'Look, he has gone down as well - maybe we need the old president; maybe we need what we lost. What are we going to do now?'" The Spirit of the Lord says, "I will make a way for you in the wilderness as I did before. They shall say, 'Egypt is gone, what has happened? One has been toppled; another one has toppled. What do we do now? Mubarak, come back.'"

But God said, "It shall not be like that, for I shall do a very, very unusual thing," says the Spirit of the Lord, "that people shall not know what to say about it. They shall look around and they shall say, 'Where do we go?' And Israel, I will raise you up and I will cause light to come from you, and a resource where - they shall say, look, they do not need, they do not need Egypt, they do not need the surrounding nations. That is the promise that I have for you," says the Lord. "Therefore, do not fear; I am with you."

The Spirit of the Lord says, This that is about to take place is not a night of hope, this is a decade of hope, this that is to begin is something eternal. Oh Jerusalem, Jerusalem, Oh Israel, Israel, how I have wept for you and I have watched over you and for this time, this time, I have come to see what they would do. If they would pierce you again. But God said, that the garden that I have looked upon shall be a garden of fragrance and I will blow my north wind on this garden again. For I have cried out for the sounds of joy in the streets of Jerusalem again. I have cried out and I have heard the cries of the men saying 'Yeshua, Yeshua would you come, would you come?' and yes I shall come, says the Lord. I shall come and I shall be in the streets of Jerusalem. I shall come and I shall stand on Zion and I shall pour out of My Spirit. Why? Because the young people of this day are crying out for something to happen. The young people are dissatisfied. In Egypt they are dissatisfied. And they say 'But evil is taking place,' but God says, I will expose the enemy that is trying to bring forth this insurrection. I will expose them, says the Lord, and I will cause the young men and women to get dissatisfied with Allah, and they shall say 'Where is Yeshua? Where is Yeshua? Where is Yeshua?'

Even as you cry out, says the Lord, there is a state of hopelessness. They have watched this nation and they have said, 'What shall we do again to Israel? Shall we creep in as we tried to before?' And God said, I've watched you and I've watched the people as they've waited and waited. The young men and the young women of this generation shall not be satisfied with repetition, they shall not be satisfied. Even as Isaiah saw the glory of the Lord and he saw the Lord's train filling the temple, so this generation shall see the Lord high and lifted up and His train filling the temple and they shall say 'Who is it that He is calling for? Who is it that He wants?' And the Lord shall speak and He shall say 'Who is there that will go for us? Whom shall I send?' And a generation of Jews shall look up and shall say 'I will go Lord, I will go for you.' And suddenly in the streets there shall be a sound of rejoicing and a sound of joy and I shall give hope back to this nation and to the youth of this nation because of you and because of this night of hope, I will make it a decade of hope, says the Lord.

Jerusalem, Israel pray, pray pray. For even as Isaiah said, 'Lord I am a man of unclean lips,' what did this mean? This meant that he was understanding that he was a man of spiritual irrelevance. He was totally unknown in his speech to men. And God said, so a generation is saying 'Why can we not affect the spiritual things of this world? Why is it that we cannot bring down the powers of hell?' All things shall change, says the Lord, for this is a decade of reformation, this is a decade of the changing of the guard and so as this night of hope begins, watch how I show myself to you. You have gathered and you are at the right place at the right time for the right reason. Allow me to manifest myself in a very special way. Do you expect me to do it? Is there an anticipation for me to show myself in a way that I've never shown myself in Jerusalem; is there an expectation from the people of God? Do you anticipate a manifestation? Then based upon your faith, I will show myself tomorrow. Do not despise the words of the Lord. I will show myself tomorrow. I will show myself in the sky, I will show myself on the land and as my word goes forth, something shall break and on the Pentecost time, I will manifest myself and my Spirit shall come again and it shall do something spectacular and the men and women, their lips shall go from lips of redundance to lips of power and lips of anointing and they shall speak with stammered lips and My Spirit shall manifest itself in the streets of Jerusalem and in Israel.

"For the days of restoration have begun.  The building of the Tabernacle of David is taking place.  The restoration of that which was holy is about to be restored. The times of refreshing that you have called to heaven for, they have already begun.   I'm going to crown you with loving kindness, tender mercies.  I'm going to fill your house."

This morning about 5:15 I had a dream and in the dream I was shouting to all of you and I said, "If you believe it, run to the front."  And everybody started running to the front and I realized there were too many people and they were pushing each other like in a soccer stadium and they were trampling one another.  And I said stop, and in the dream I was afraid that people would die.  And the Lord spoke again and said "The mushroom; there is a mushroom - a mushrooming.  It is so big that you cannot contain it in this building.  And then I was taken to the French Riviera and there were boats and all of you were on these boats singing all throughout France and God said, "I will give you a place.  It looks like a mushroom, where you will gather together in the city of Paris - not only here.  And young men and women shall come.  This place is only a stage of your building.  You will explode in the streets.  I told you before.  It cannot be contained in this building.  It cannot, it cannot.  If you believe it, say yes!!

"Paris, France, Europe, this house, this man, and those who are in place with him, great shall be the benefit, for the governing powers, the political powers shall change.  There is a changing of the guard.  As you saw in Egypt, the young people will no longer tolerate religious control, and so it is in France.  The young people shall arise, but they shall not shout the name of Allah - they will shout the name Jesus!

The heart cry of the Father, the heart cry of the Father, that you would be one.  This is the prayer of the Son, make us one.  It is attainable - it's not impossible.  Churches worldwide are falling apart because of the breaking of covenants; it is refreshing for me to stand before you and I can smell the air of unity.  The enemy has endeavored to draw you into a war, this nation.  But God told you He would protect you, and that He will.  "What happened in Egypt is just the beginning of the changing of the guard.  I see papers from the governing powers of this nation, and I've said this before, they will come to you and they will say, 'will you look after the elderly?  Will you show us how you achieved so much with so little?  How did you achieve so much with so little?'  And I will make you an example and you shall have divine favor with the governing powers at the changing of the guard," says the Lord.
Started singing:  They will say of you, "This has never ever happened before!  This has never ever happened before!  It's a miracle, a supernatural miracle."
That which God has begun, He will complete until the day of Jesus Christ.  They will say about you, and it's about to happen. People will say this about you - "this has never, ever happened before!"

What you are doing is you are proclaiming with me what they are going to say about you - not only this church, but you as individuals, as families.  They will say, "how did this happen?"  They will proclaim, "This has never ever happened before, it's a miracle a supernatural miracle!"
He's about to do the greatest work He's ever done!!

He's moving all over this place; the Spirit is moving all over this place.  He's writing it out.  He's writing it out.  This shall be said of you, this has never ever happened before!  Not in the history of France!  Not in the history of Europe!  This has never ever happened before!

"Alzheimers, dimentia, there is a cure coming very rapidly from the earth.  It will be known as a disease of yesterday.  But in the meantime, I prophesy for those that are old and dying, you are still full of years.  You don't have to die, and I decree, come back to life now!"
"There is a new well that God has already prepared for you but you cannot see it now."

There is a well that God has for his house, and remember when God says this house, it is for you as well.  If you are in covenant with this house, with this leadership, if you are sowing and giving, there are rich rewards because whatever God says and speaks to this house, you are also a recipient of it."
KIM'S DISCOURSE ON EGYPT

Hello, Warriors.  I am presently in Paris, in the city, and preparing for my meeting tomorrow morning.  It's going to be very exciting and I wish to report back to you once this has happened.  However, we are in a situation right now where we are seeing a prophetic word being fulfilled and many of you have watched as the crisis has unfolded.  Now they are calling it a revolution in Egypt and it's important that we know the mind of the Lord and the will of God, that He is working even though there is much evil.  In the beginning of 2010 when I had my gathering in Los Angeles and I prophesied about the decade that was to come, I mentioned that there was going to be a reformation and that there would be a revolution, a turn around that would be demanded.

I also spoke about the changing of the guard at this time, and we're seeing that this is happening and a lot of people are fearful. But the word that I got regarding this, and this was a few weeks before - this actually happened, and then of course, as I'll tell you now, in a few minutes, in 2006.  Egypt has a crisis; the Middle East has a crisis; Islam has a crisis.  And the words that I heard that were written on the wall as Daniel interpreted them were, "Mene, Mene, Tekel, Upharsin.  Pharaoh, your God has numbered your kingdom and finished your rule and you've been weighed in the balances and found wanting."

Recently on my internet broadcast, I repeated a statement that I was prompted to say to Jane and my team while driving to the Seattle airport, and this was a Prophetic Alert broadcast from the Den, which was January 22nd, 2011.  "Egypt is going to go ballistic; Egypt is going to do something radical; they're going to go ballistic. They'll do something crazy."  I just feel like when God shows me these things and it starts surfacing, then we can know the Lord has warned us and we cannot fear.  I said that on my broadcast because I knew that something was brewing in Egypt - not from any natural understanding, but from the prophetic insight that I'd received while in Seattle.

At the gathering in Hollywood, California in July of 2006, God's Spirit released a surprising insight through what seemed a very insignificant prophetic word, and this is what the word was:  "Egypt - I speak to an Egyptian; I speak to Egypt.  Watch, Egypt," says the Lord, "an ally."  And then later on in that prophecy, I say, "Egypt, God is going to rattle you, raise you up.  He's not finished with you yet."  The significance of this prophetic insight is that God was preparing the hearts of the people and warning us of the heralding of a new, Arab, post-Islamist revolution.  The prophecy says, "Egypt, I speak to an Egyptian." I believe that He was speaking of the present "Pharaoh," President Hosni Mubarek.  The writing is on the wall and his days are numbered.

The present uprisings raging from Tunisia to Egypt to Yemen are signs of a post-Islamist revolution. The youth have turned on their leader, who has failed to provide them with their dignity and justice and a better life.  So what we are witnessing today is a fulfillment of what I prophetically described in 2006 and two weeks ago - a radical change in Arab politics.  Things will never be the same again in that region.  Please listen to me, Warriors.  Our praying, our prophesying, our declaring, our proclamations; the glory of God shall cover the earth as the waters cover the sea, is happening, even though there are times of great distress.  Isaiah, the great prophet, prophesied, and he said, "In the year that King Uzziah died, I saw the Lord high and lifted up and His train filled the temple," and he saw angels and they were crying out, "Holy, holy to the Lord; the whole earth is full of the glory of the Lord." And immediately Isaiah realized that he was a man of unclean lips. The word "unclean" there means that he was "irrelevant" or "spiritually insignificant," his lips.  He was speaking all the evil that he was hearing around him.  Isaiah was obviously surrounded, as he said, by people with unclean lips.  The word "unclean" means "spiritually redundant" and "irrelevant."  So he was basically saying what they were all saying, yet when he heard the heavenly language, when he heard the heavenly discourse, it was "the earth is filled with the glory of God."

When Isaiah looked around, what did he see?  Did he see the glory of God?  No, he didn't.  The trouble with us is that we see all the evil.  We hear all the bad reports.  We are constantly bombarded by the news media with all the bad that is going on.  And yet, there are some other facts that we're not seeing and that is that the Spirit of God is speaking about His glory on the earth and the things He wants to do as well.  Instead of us repeating what He's saying, we continue saying what everybody else says.  I believe that what we are witnessing today is a fulfillment of what I prophesied about the radical change of Arab politics.  And now I'm saying to you again, things will never be the same in that region.  Propelled by the youth and the digital revolution, citizens will demand nothing less than the right to choose and to change the leaders in the future.

I must remind you, my Warriors, of my New Year's - the decade-eve gathering on the 31st of December, 2009, and the significance of this prophecy.  I said that this decade would be the decade of reformation.  What we are seeing before our eyes is a reformation.  Arab societies are more educated and better connected than ever before due to the phenomenal growth of secondary and university-level education. Literacy rates among the region's youth have skyrocketed in the past 40 years.  I've prophesied time and time again over the past eight years that God was doing something very special for the youth in the Middle East and amongst the Arab nations.  I've even prophesied about a genre of music that would emerge because of an amalgamation of eastern and western music - music from the youth of the Middle East and the western world, mainly the USA.  The number of mobile phone users and internet users has spread rapidly to hundreds of thousands since the technology was introduced to the region over a decade ago.  No wonder the people have finally snapped at the lack of opportunity and representation and the high levels of corruption and control that characterize their lives.

I want to say something to you today.  More has united the protesting people than divided them.  I'll say that again - more has united the protesting people than has divided them.  The multiple calculation between supporting stability on the one hand and the risks of unprecedented regime change, especially the rise to power of Islamist parties, no longer holds.  The people of the region are deciding.  The irony of the whole thing is that it is largely between USA-created technology - the internet, particularly Facebook and Twitter - that has sustained the spread of the Arab revolution.  This is a revolution we are witnessing.  In the case of Egypt, the most populated Arab nation and the symbol of leadership, the transition will be particularly important to us.

Now finally, as I prepare to go to Israel after I have ministered in Paris tonight or tomorrow morning, I am praying for insight regarding the two nations - Israel and Egypt.  We've got to understand, while the relationship between Israel and Egypt is frequently described as "cold peace," the two countries maintain a significant intelligence and security ties and God has shared a secret with us by telling us that He would be shaking Egypt, that He was not finished with that nation, and then suddenly revealed to me that Egypt would go ballistic.  And then He tells me that this is a sign, once again, of His interest for the Arab people, specifically for the young people.  I looked up the definition of  "ballistic" because God used that word and He said Egypt was about to go ballistic.  The word "ballistic" means to "become enraged" and "frenzied violence."

God has given us insight about His Christ being spoken of and sung about in the youth of the Middle East.  Could this be the beginning stages of it? I want to encourage you please, as you pray for me, that you be comforted with these words - that God said this will happen and this will bring about positive changes as well.  For you Warriors that are prophetic, you can see in the Spirit with me, I want you to continue praying for the people of the Middle East, for Israel, for America.  The enemy has risen up.  Just before I came to Paris, Osama bin Laden stuck out his head and told France to keep out of Afghanistan and all kinds of threats.  Here I am in France; I feel the freedom and the liberty of the Spirit coming upon this nation and upon Europe and upon Israel.  I'll see what happens when I go there.  I'm just one voice but I'm a voice for the Lord.  I want to thank you for your love and protection and for your provision.  Today as you watch the teaching that I give you, please continue to support us.  Stand with me, pray with me, give so we can continue these broadcasts and touch your life with them.

"This force is at hand," says the Lord.  "This force is at hand.  However, I have spoken it and am waiting for those who respond and say, 'Even though they are present, even though they are advancing, God has spoken a word that the same angel that led Daniel, and the same angel that fought in the heavenlies to overcome the Beast of the East is presently with the Son of God and the Living Word fighting, and will overcome it.'"  The people must pray according to the perception that is being given to them.

"I see victory.  I see the streets of Israel filled with people wanting God; hungry and thirsty for righteousness.  Fill us, O Lord, fill us!  Send the Holy Spirit, that there'd be a baptism, Lord God, a baptism of fire once again.  Let our lips speak forth Your things."
