The Spirit of the Lord says, "Do you hear the sound of the drum beating? Do you hear the sound of one solitary drum beating? That is what I hear when one life, when one human being begins to pray with faith. God says that this shall increase. What you hear is what the enemy hears when one life decides enough is enough. And that person is not concerned about their stage of existence. Daniel was in exile; one man caused the war in the heavenlies to be won. The angel came to him and said, "When you, Daniel, alone and in solitary exile, put your mind to understand and began to pray, the Lord heard your prayers."

The Spirit of God says, "What is about to transpire over 2011 and 2012, I will take one solitary human being and hear their prayers, for this is the sound of war." You say, "Lord, we want no more war." And God says, "The absence of war means the absence of heroes, and this generation are crying out for heroes. They are saying give us someone who'll do as David did by himself when he stood before an army of Philistines. Where are you? For this nation is trembling and the nations of the earth are in fear because of the princes of the east. What shall we do for they are coming nearer to us? But listen, one solitary drum beat shall chase a thousand, and two shall chase ten thousand, and three shall chase a hundred thousand, and so it shall go and so it shall go and so it shall go."

"For this next year shall be a year of my people doing exploits. It shall happen with women. Sarah Palin shall be a solitary figure that shall make history in the next five years." God says, "There has been an abuse of women and therefore I will take women like I did in the Old Testament and they shall be one and alone, like Esther." And God says, "I will change the kingdom because of one heartbeat for Me," says the Lord.

"From the rising of the sun to the going down of the same," God says, "My glory shall be seen, for I will change everything. Everything that I have promised shall begin to manifest," says the Lord. "It is now the beginning of the destruction of debt, and do not say, 'That is impossible for my bank book looks so bad it makes me cry.'" God says, "There will be no more tears, for you are entering a season of unique demonstrations from very powerful people who are unknown. Now, they are crying out, 'Give us heroes! Please, we want heroes!' Those who are afraid of war and those who are afraid to take a step do not stand with the opportunity of becoming a hero."

God said, "Listen to that drum beat; it is the sound of war." But you say, "We've had enough war." God said, "We're talking about a good fight. We're speaking about a war that I have initiated," says the Lord. "It is a war of the Spirit, it is the war of the world." God said, "It shall be in such a way that there will be those that will say, 'Look at the nations of the earth. They've cried for revival in the church, but look what God is doing. The tabernacle of David, which has fallen down, is being restored again.'"

"What does this mean? It means," God says, "that whatever was in the tabernacle of David when it fell down shall be restored back to the earth." And they shall say, "Is it possible that they have found the Ark of the Covenant?" For God says, "It shall be that there will be signs of it and many shall fight it and they shall say, 'This cannot be for it is fallen down.'" But God says, "What was in the Ark of the Covenant is about to be manifested throughout the earth and on Israel's mountaintops," God says, "on California's mountaintops, and the mountaintops of America and Europe." And God says, "Even the Middle East," God says, "there shall be a glorious sound of the trumpet of God as the Lord begins to sound His voice."

Are you hearing what the Spirit of the Lord says? You hear that drumbeat? God says, "It is the drum beat not of war only, but a drum beat of victory." "Yes," God said, "it sounds like one solitary person, but you know why? It sounds like one solitary person because a spirit of unity is coming upon the people, upon the Warriors of God. It shall not come upon the religious. They shall always fight, they shall always demonstrate, and they shall always say, 'This is not enough, it's not good enough.' God said, "I'm going to take away cheap grace and give you back costly grace. I'm going to remove cheap grace and show you what costly grace is," says the Lord of hosts. "A movement of grace, for they will understand that it is unmerited favor, and that's what I'm going to give."

Are you people ready for unmerited favor? Are My Warriors prepared to shout and say, "I believe that this is the beginning of unmerited favor?" It will be a favor that is so different that people shall say, "this is not fair, this is not fair! Why did he get it and I didn't get it? Why is it that God poured Himself upon that family and not ours?" God said, "It is a tribal movement, it is a tribal thing. I will restore the tabernacle of David which has fallen." And God said, "There shall be an unusual and unique move of My Spirit where people will begin to do exploits in My Name. Discoveries will be made in a way that you would have never imagined. I will take the households of faith and I will unite them as they have never been united before." Therefore God says, "Begin to shout and rejoice, for this is going to be a year of great rejoicing!" says the Lord.

Christmas time, God said, they celebrate my Son on Christmas. But I'm going to give you a gift, all of you. God says I'm going to give you a gift. "How can you give me a gift at Christmas God?" Hello? If I was God I would do a lot of things like that. We just have to look for it. We don't look for it. He said if you search for me, Jeremiah 29:11-13, I know that the thoughts that I have toward you, thoughts of peace, not of evil.

There's a melody for you. God says, there's a song of love I sent. It was My Son. They'll sing, and every day, and every night, in their pain, in their joy, they'll sing my song. God says, on Christmas and the Christmas seasonmaybe some people don't understand what I'm doing. I don't think a prophet is ever understood. He come and pours out what's in there. We have to be like the sons of Issachar. We must know the times and season. We must know what God has planned for the season. If we don't, we are blind. God says, I want to bless, and you watching me on the internet, it's because I sing well? No, I don't. It's because I sing the heart of God and tell you what He wants to do.

The word of the Lord has come. He says, (besides all the great things he spoke in the first meeting) Christmas is always a special time for many, and for many, a very painful time of the year. Somebody in this building and somebody watching me on the internet lost your family on Christmas Day. It's one of your saddest days.

God says on this Christmas season, I want to give you a gift, a gift that will come from My hand to yours. Some of you are in unbelief already. (that's a pagan holiday) It's a pagan holiday that we insert Christ and every person on the earth remembers that He was born, never to be forgotten 2000 years later, still known as the one and only that was raised from the dead. Still the one that is known as the Lord of All, the King of Kings, the One that is called Wonderful Counselor, the One that is called the Redeemer of Mankind. One that is called the Lion of the Tribe of Judah. One that is called the One that died as a Lamb but He rose as a Lion. He is still alive and still being announced throughout the earth!

And the Spirit of God said, on this very strange motion from the Courts of Heaven, if you'll search for me with your whole heart, I will visit you in a way that I never have before. But the key, says the Lord, is that you search for Me with your whole heart. And I will grant something to you that will take you into 2011 and I will do something unusual in this land with woman. In 2011 I shall do something very unusual with woman. The young girls, the daughters that have been raped and rejected, do not forget that in this holy church, the lame take the prey. If you remove spiritual warfare from the constitution of the church, you have opened the door for the enemy to come and reside. What you did this morning was you conducted spiritual warfare the way it should be. In the presence of your enemy you began to shout and celebrate, and when you did that, I told you what happened to the enemy. When you did that, a declaration was made from San Jose, California, that we do not see the bars of restriction and exile. We will not accept boundaries set by our enemy or the religious. We have been given a great heritage and our lines have been set for us.

Lord, I receive the gift that you gave over 2000 years ago. What more could we have? But we receive this that You have spoken, that over this season that You are celebrated, that you will give to us the miracle that we need in our homes, in our business, in our bodies, our minds, our souls, our spirits. We receive it with joy. We are ready to feast at Your table. Amen.

Something is being turned upside down right now.  It is standing right side up and it doesn't belong to be right side up.  No prognosis puts you ride side up.  Whatever your enemy is, you have the power to destroy him by saying, you're never going to stand upright.  You're an idol that does not belong and you cannot stand upright now.  I think there are things in the United States of America that are standing right side up which need to be turned upside down.  Do you agree?  They try to take God out of our school and out of our kids.  That's not going to happen.  There's nothing right about that.  It's about time that we turned that upside down and put the right thing right side up.

The Spirit of the Living God is preparing a great wind.  There is a tumultuous heaven right now.  There are spirits whispering,  "Europe, we made you so cold.  We have hardened the hearts of the youth," demons say.  "They cannot take what we have chained; they cannot." The demons are saying, "we must stop this."  But the Spirit of the Lord says, "Hear, oh Europe.  Hear, divided Europe.  Your sons and your daughters are dissatisfied, as was Martin Luther.  This is the beginning, says the Lord, of a reformation.  Watchmen on the wall have died.  Oh watchmen, watchmen, what of the night?  Watchmen, what of the night?  Watchmen, watchmen, what of the night?! Watchmen, what of the night!"  "It is still," says the watchmen, "but it is not.  It is not."

"There is a storm brewing," says the Lord, "but this is not an actual one."  And God said, "There will be a great, massive fight - just one war.  One war shall manifest in four different countries.  The beast of the east who has said, we will remove Christianity in total from Europe, America, Israel - we will remove their God and we will bring Allah."  There is a storm brewing, but God says, "I have already prepared the angels.  I have already prepared an outpouring and that which is dying shall suddenly come back to life."

"Italy, Germany, France, you made an alliance. You were an ally to the Third Reich.  There is a fourth one arising from the east to take over your streets, to take over your children and remove Jesus."  But the Spirit of God said, "Truth will prevail.  A cause will not prevail, and the people will begin to arise from the streets and I will manifest Myself in whorehouses, I'll go to red light districts, I'll begin to take them from their place of pain and turn it into a place of reign," says the Lord.

God said, "There's going to be a reformation, but this time God said, I'll use Germany, I'll use Italy - yes, I'll use Holland, the Netherlands.  I'll use France.  They will stand and they will stand against the spirit and that will be the countries that I'll begin a great reformation in, and there will be an abolishment of the laws of men and your young men and young women shall rise, rise, rise and shout, shout, shout!"

Everybody in this building, say this with me:  Those who are with us are greater than those who are against us.  I'm talking about the angels of the Lord that are with us.  If you don't believe me my friend I want to tell you something, we're blind.  "God is raising up young Davids and young Samuels.  They're going to begin to prophesy to the dead bones and they're going to bring life to this nation and to Europe again," says the Lord. "Those who are with us are greater than those who are against us."

PROPHETIC SONGThere is a rain, there is a rain coming, a rain like you've never seen before.  And then you will say this could be the day we've been waiting for.  And then you will say this could be the day we've been waiting for.  I'm going to send the rain, a rain like you've never ever known, and miracles will come, sign and wonders will fill your streets outside the church.  Listen to the rain, listen to the rain, listen to the rain.  Abundance is coming if only you can see it.  Many of you will say this is the day we've been waiting for. Then they will see things like they've never seen before.  God says "This is the day every one of you have been waiting for.  This is the day many of you have been praying for - the day of rain, the day of abundance coming your way, coming your way.  Lift up your hands for the rain, lift up your voice in the holy place.  Lift up your hands in the holy place right now, let it rain. Many of you that have struggled with darkness, many of you that have cried in despair, you'll say this is the day that I've been praying for.  Hallelujah."  (musical interlude)This is the day we've been waiting for, send the rain.  This is the day we've been waiting for, send the rain.  (kept repeating)

SECOND PROPHETIC WORD"For this rain is like a rain that we've never seen before.  This rain is likened unto the rain that came when Elijah prophesied," says the Lord.  "This rain will bring freshness to the soil, freshness to the church, freshness to the people, and Europe shall arise and a flame shall come forth, just like the flame that came on the altar when Elijah said to the Lord, 'Here is our sacrifice, now consume the sacrifice.'"  As we give unto You praise, Oh Lord we pray, send the rain, send the rain, the rain, send the rain (keeps repeating).

THIRD PROPHETIC WORDThe soil of Europe has been plowed by people like this.  It brought some of the greatest composers.  It gave to humanity Beethoven, Bach, Chopin, Mozart.  I could go on and on.  The one thing that I have kept for Europe is a very specific music that will come.  And in this reformation, says the Lord, there will be modern day Mozarts, Beethovens, but they shall be, of course of a different stock. They will begin to combine different genres of music and I shall breathe upon it, says the Lord. And songs, sacred songs shall come from them. They will begin to prophesy as David prophesied on the harp.  Your children, some here, that are even to be born, watching all over the earth now, in your womb, there is a sound, a leaping like John lept in the womb at the presence of the unborn Christ.  Some of you pregnant right now are about to bring forth a sound, bring forth a sound, a sound that is going to touch the untouchable, reach the unreachable, prophesy to dead bones - it will antagonize the devil.  But out of Europe shall emerge children that were removed, that were removed - the Second World War, that were supposed to be born.  Can I not pay back, says the Lord?  This is the day of vengeance."  Are you hearing what the Lord is saying?  Why do you think little ones are being aborted?  Satan is afraid of the sound of David that is about to be born. Alleluia.  Alleluia.  Spirit come upon Your people right now.  Alleluia.  Alleluia.  I break the power of death in the Name of Jesus Christ.

November 6, 2010 - From The DenInflation, inflation. This is what they're saying, but the Spirit of the Lord says be aware of this, that if you will pray, this will not happen. Deflation. No, what of inflation? What of the properties? What have I promised to you about the properties? What have I said to you about rescuing you as a result of the changing of the guard? What about that, for the care and the burden of inflation? What will happen to our properties? What will happen if there is inflation? What if the government does this? And so the Lord says, I have to prevent this so that My promise can come to pass, that there'll be the resilient America can be restored quickly, and therefore the discoveries that I've prophesied about will begin to happen so that this can change the course of a government in order to print more money, in order to inflate. God said this will not be good; this will not be right. So, as I hear the word of the Lord, this just came to me now - as I hear this word inflation, it's like the Spirit is striking it and saying, No, because He wants to salvage the properties. He wants people to be able to keep what is theirs and not lose the value of it.Lord, this is your desire. Why did you tell us about Ford? You told us about these things before they happened so that we could invest and, Lord, You could prosper your people. Again this is going to happen with a new source of energy that You know is coming forth. So Lord, we look one way, we have tunnel vision. Open our eyes, let us perceive what You want to do, Lord God. Place righteous people as economists, Lord, to do the right thing and I thank You for that and we praise You and honor You, Lord.

Dallas, TX - September 19, 2010How many of you are excited about what God's going to do in Dallas? God wants to know, what if you fill that big stadium full so that other teams could win? Don't you think it's time for the Dallas Cowboys, as a sign? Do you want them to win? How about a sign from the Most High God. Let's prophesy! "Big D,  little a,  double l,  a-s, be blessed!" This is Dallas, and God wants to restore Texas again and bring forth something that will shake the nation. How many of you believe that God can shake the nation? Let's go! "Big D,  little a,  double l,  a-s, be rich Be blessed ! Be right! " How about, "Big D,  little a,  double l,  a-s, you'll win, you'll win!" PROPHETIC WORDThe Spirit of the Lord says, there has been trouble, sorrow, bad reports, economic change in the State of Texas and in many that I've chosen to bring forth a sweet fragrance to the nation. There is a new party, a political party that is arising, and God says, it will challenge both sides of the coin, and I will bring righteousness into the schools and the universities again. Yes, I will! I will begin in this state. This is a pioneering state and God says, I listen to your praise. I listen to your voice. I listen to the sound of victory coming from you. Enough of sorrow, enough of defeat, says the Lord. It's time to arise and shout like Jehoshaphat shouted in the presence of his enemies! These words that Jesus prayed are incredibly powerful, but God says, I want to show My greatness on the shores of this nation. I want to show My people who have prayed and prayed and prayed that I have not forgotten them. There is an imminent war against Israel, and the Spirit of God says, they shall say we will get to their shores and under their ground in America. God says, even their pathetic mosque shall be removed from the presence of the place that changed America's course. In November there shall be a surprise and many of you shall say, at last, the Lord has broken the power. God says, I am rising up for you. And God says, I will use the earth and the sea to demonstrate My power and God says there shall be a tidal wave and the enemy shall not get to the shores. They shall say, we are baffled, why does nature stand against us? And America's great men shall stand and say, it was not nature that stood against you, it was the Lord God Most High!One president shall go, another shall come. But I am here to say that you have offered Me great presidents in the past. They laugh now, but soon they will say, give us back a Bush. We want a burning Bush. God says, I will draw from the State of Texas another candidate; God said, a young man he shall be, like your present President. And God said, he will slay the monster of the east with the words that he speaks that I placed within him before he was even born. America, listen to this prophet, your greatest day, your greatest revival is upon you. For I breathe My breath into your children and children's children and so it shall be as it was in the days of David, as in the days of Jehoshaphat, as in the days of Paul, it shall be, says the Lord. They shall jump and there shall be sounds of victory in every house in the United States of America, says the Lord!
PROPHETIC WORD FOR DETROIT AND THE NATION:

There is something written and inscribed on the stone for Detroit and that is the word "liberty." Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty. Why have we turned to sorrow? Why have we turned to despair? Why is this nation bowed, but not in reverence to God, but in fear and trembling at the gods of Baal? God says, no more idol worship. There is enough idol worship that has taken place in this nation. Idolatry is about to be brought down and it shall only be brought down by the praise and the liberty of My people, says the Lord.
(Singing, We want the liberty written and inscribed on the stone)

Now you've said it and you've prophesied it. The Spirit of God said, the restoration that is coming, it has already begun. But the force that you are speaking about is a force that has left this nation. That same force of a great anticipation is being returned to the hearts and the minds of the people. They have said enough is enough. And when I made this nation, you had already been formed. Your destiny had already been formed. Yet the liberty has been taken away. You don't have liberty of the Spirit, there is only liberty of their own rights. And God said, enough. I'm about to send my Spirit for the dove is looking for a resting place. Even as you praise, there is a force that is coming and it's coming mightily, says the Lord, to bring resurrection power back into the Kingdom of God so the people will open their mouths and when they praise, something will come to life, says the Lord.
(Cheering, Kim throws water)

Don't worry about getting a little wet. The rain that's coming is going to make you a whole lot wetter than that. The rain that's coming is going to damage the very powers of hell. Rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain!!
PROPHETIC WORD FOR ISRAEL AND AMERICA, RUSSIA, OBAMA:

The Spirit of God says, listen to me. This shall not be a place of slavery. Slavery is a thing of the past and yet my people are enslaved right now. There is a bondage that has crept into this nation, a dependency. It insults me, says the Lord. It insults me that the dependency on the almighty has shifted to dependency on government. What can they offer? Am I impressed with the strength of men's legs? Am I impressed with horses and chariots, as there are so many numbered. Some trust in horses and some trust in chariots, but who will you trust in? I have not left the nations of the earth. They have looked upon My Israel. They have looked upon that little land and said we want you. And the Lord said, are not my promises clear and evident? And I Myself will be the captain of the hosts, the general of the army that will shake the earth as Iran creeps forward. As Iran comes and says this shall be the final battle, so I the Lord say to you, watch as I display My magnificence. Watch as I display My splendor and prove once again that the earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof.

They have said there are two nations, America and Israel, and we will name them by other names, they have said. Once we have captured them, we will rename them as Daniel was renamed in his captivity, so America shall no longer be called America and Israel shall be called Ishmahel. For the Spirit of God said, dare they insult Me? Dare they insult Me? Who was it that was placed upon the altar of sacrifice? It was Israel, and therefore God says, I say to you this day, when Abraham took his son, it was for this purpose and for this day that he saw. Therefore, I will show you My magnificence, says the Spirit of the Lord. They will come against you, America, and you shall not even need to look, for I, God says, shall ruin them before they even get to your seashores. I will show you the great display of a tidal wave that shall not come for the judgment of this nation but for the defense.

And God says, I will move into Israel. I will surround them, I will surround them says the Lord. And suddenly they shall say, what has happened? What has happened to our plans? For God said, as Israel shall no longer, as they say, Israel shall no longer be called Israel, so God says, America shall be called by no other name. For they will stand together. For God said, the Islamic influence, the Islamic influence, the wickedness that is trying to creep in, has succeeded and God says, thus far and no more. Thus far and no more. Yeah! Thus far and no more! God says, thus far and no more! God says, thus far and no more! God says, thus far and no more!

Russia, you wimp! You doubled-minded, deceitful liar. You plan behind their backs, smile to their face with your crooked teeth. And God said, I will not, I will not tolerate this indignity. For it is actually the Spirit of God that they are doing it to. Now the grief has come and the grief shall go, for it has affected My body, the Church. The fires have been low, the people have been low. Enough of low, says the Lord. Enough of sorrow. Enough of mourning. Enough! Now let My rain come to You. In the four months, says the Lord, let it come to you. I've begun something that no man has seen, barring a few.

For God said, it shall come to pass that as they approach, subtly, and they say we have a friend in the White House. They say we have a friend, those of the Middle East, Syria, Iran, we have a friend. His name is Obama. And the Spirit of the Lord said, it shall not be so. And unless there is a love, a captivating love from that president, this king that I placed to speak to America, to teach them a lesson. If there is not an embracing and a love for My Israel, I will remove him. If he would embrace and he would take on the stance that America has stood for all through the years, I will indeed bless this nation in a way that they have never, ever seen before. Therefore, God says, pray for this president and pray for your nation that I may come and pour My Spirit out, says the Lord.

I have built an altar. I have built an altar in Detroit. It shall not be desecrated. And those who will touch it shall surely die. To take away the sacredness and the years of toil and sweat. Tears, blood. This shall remain a holy altar. It is not in this building, it is a spiritual altar. And I will join the hands of those who have this vision throughout the city and it shall be a sound that shall come, says the Lord. They shall not, they shall not defile what I have called holy and pure. Beware, touch not that which is holy, says the Lord of hosts. Amen

The first thing I do in the morning is I never make known my needs, I made known his deeds. And I remind those that are living outside of what we are master of - time, we own time. God gave it to us. We can do whatever we want with it. We can be late. We can waste our time, get in the car, God doesn't stop us. We are master of it. And yet we can take that time and do something incredible with it and keep in step, in rhythm with the Spirit. And so when you take time and you give it to God he always multiplies the time that you've given to him. Because in essence you're taking time to do something good. And when you do that, when He multiplies it not only the offering or the gift, but He multiplies your time.

You know something I noticed about Abraham, he always built altars. And you know what an altar is; an altar is a place of sacrifice. He always built altars. And what he would do when there was trouble he would go back to that and remind God. When he had to go down to Egypt because there was a drought, and eventually when he got out of there he went back to the altar that he built so he could hear from God, because God speaks when you sacrifice. Whenever you do something good it requires a series of sacrifices. You open the door for a lady, it requires sacrifice, when I say that it means you're going out of your way to do something. Or you go into a hospital and you spend time. Do you really think that God does not notice that? He notices.

And I looked at Abraham and how his whole life, and I noticed that he was the wealthiest man in the world, he was also the healthiest man and he was complimented by God and the hosts of heaven that he was the friend of God. So I did a search and I basically taught my entire School of the Prophet about Abraham and destiny and how he knew that he had a destiny and in Genesis chapter 15, he's frustrated. He's frustrated because he's getting old and he's got a problem with that because he's been promised a son. And he comes to the Lord and he says look at me and my age and nothing has yet come so is Eleazar of Damascus, the chief slave of my home, is he going to be the heir? Because in those days the culture demanded that if a man was childless then the senior slave of the household would have to become the heir. And so he suggested this to God and God said, no, Abraham, the heir shall not come from your house; the heir shall come from your body. The promise that we have is in this body. It lives in here; it is within now space and time and it must be spent in our lifetime. And so Abraham said I'm getting old and somehow that didn't seem to be bothering God. And God said to him, look at the stars, let me just tell you - it's coming from your body.

And as long as it is contained in your body, you have to live. You will defy death, you will defy defeat, you will defy sickness if that promise has not yet been born from your body, your spirit, your heart. And I remind those that are outside of time, that don't have the restrictions of time, that angels, the cherubim, the seraphim, I remind them and say 'We in time don't have it as good as you do, but I want you to know that even in our time and space, God is operating! And I want you angels and the cloud of witnesses to remember that in these restrictions God is still doing great things!'

My conclusion before we do something holy is this. Abraham believes God and God accounts it to him to righteousness, puts it in his account. What is in your account? And so when he does that Abraham has a second issue 'I have a vision problem. I cannot see further and I am restricted in my vision and I need an expansion of vision. How do I know that I will inherit this land because I cannot have an heir without land? And he said how do I know that I will inherit this land?' And God said something; he said I want you to bring me an offering and he specified that he wanted this offering and it was a prophetic offering so that Abraham could have an expansion of his vision so he could see further. He said I want turtle doves and I want you to cut them in two and I want a blood sacrifice, by the way the first ever, now I'm talking about Abraham. And this blood sacrifice was going to be the first that would be launched into another time and era. So he says I want the offering from you. First of all so I can take you further than what you can see because if you cannot see it you're not going to survive.

So he takes the exact offering God tells him and he puts it before the Lord and guess what happens? The vultures come because they want to steal. When you give an offering in the presence of a prophetic anointing there is an expansion of your vision so you can see further. And so he gives the offering, of course he gets rid of the vultures. And God puts Abraham into a sleep once he receives the offering, the blood offering. And he puts him into a deep sleep and this is what he shows him.

He shows him not the child, but the nation that is not yet born, and he says this nation, your nation shall be in bondage for 400 years. He's not even telling him about tomorrow, he's telling him centuries ahead of time. And he said but they will come out of their oppression with great possession. Your offering will dictate the possession that your promise will come out with after the enemy has tried to destroy them and wipe it off the face of the earth. It's a prophetic offering. You are putting possessions into the future. I'm not talking to you about hundreds of years, I'm talking about next week, next month, next year. You know what I find so beautiful about it is it was then that the Lord said at the end of that 400 years, to the day, he said I want you to put blood on your doorposts and that was the beginning of what Abraham started in that offering. Today we know the Passover.

How deep this is to give to God and say 'you know what, I have restrictions, I have total restrictions around me; sometimes I really don't believe.' And yet as this prophet spoke tonight I'm hearing you talk global interruptions catching the attention of the financial communities world wide so you can cast a few thousands pigs back into the sea so that the whole city will come out because it affected their economy. And yet the church is getting stronger and stronger. It is, His church. I believe tonight that we must give to God. I want you to say to the Lord 'You spoke to me tonight. We were watching to see what God is going to do and the Spirit of the Lord told us so many incredible things.' I want you to say to the Lord 'I want you to show me as you showed Abraham what I am to put at this altar and when I do it I want you to take the promise that is within me, release it, and show me the outcome. Show me months, years from now that I may have the faith and the hope to move on. And then I want you to take my promise that you've given me and with my offering always cause it to come out of any attack with great possession.' How many of you believe that God will save you and your promise will come to pass. Say this prayer together with me 'Lord I have come to celebrate life, not only the life of Christ, the life of Michael Babin, but also my life and my children's. This promise that is in my body, my heart will come to pass and I will not die until it is born. I want to give you an offering tonight and as I do, I pray expand my vision and expand my spirit. Now speak to me and show me what to give and as I give it, I receive every promise that was given tonight.'

I was in Nashville, Tennessee and we were doing meetings on the weekend in Nashville broadcast throughout the world. I started getting heart pains, which I don't have - right now I'm on an 18-month partial fast that the Lord put me on and I'm having incredible experiences. And I have a very good heart because I'm very athletic and I do a lot of sports, and I eat right and I started getting chest pains and I got high blood pressure which I don't suffer either, so at the bottom it was 111, and I had never experienced that before. So we were contemplating on checking me in to see what's going on and it got worse, and eventually I told Jane this is so unusual, I don't feel good. I feel like I'm having a heart attack. That was on a Saturday and a Sunday.

So we finished the meetings and we flew back Monday and stopped in Dallas where we were delayed and I saw a number coming up and it was Gabriel and Gabriel basically told me that his father had collapsed; he had to carry him himself, this is a big man, he is almost seven feet tall. And Gabriel carried him and got him to emergency, and I'll let you guys tell the rest of it. And the first thing that happened to me was he said, my father has gone into cardiac arrest and they have resuscitated him three times and they will tell you what the doctors said, and that he is now on life support and he is in a coma. And immediately I sensed from this young man; I call him my hero because the thing that he did was stand in his father's place and decide 'I'm not going to let this happen.' Now, I'm not saying, Cookie that you didn't, I'm saying I was communicating with him. Maybe you could tell a little bit of what actually happened, Cookie. I call her 'Cookeela,' because it is an African name for Cookie.

Cookie: God bless you Kim. It is truly an honor for you to do this. Early morning Michael when he called us by his side, he asked us what hospital should we go to. Michael doesn't usually ask to go to a hospital, but I knew this was serious so I started getting dressed and so Gabriel came. I called Gabriel. And then he told us, we agreed that we would go to Sharps Hospital.
Kim: You just tell it Michael.

Cookie: So to make a long story short, we went down to Sharps hospital. And that was the first question they started asking Gabriel when he pulled up to the hospital, why did you pass all these hospitals and come all the way down here? And we said simply because it's Michael's request and we knew by the Spirit that's the hospital he wanted to go to, and Gabriel can tell this.

Gabriel: Well, when we put him to the hospital the paramedics were standing outside and I told them, I screamed to them we have an emergency, my father - he cannot breathe. And on the way to the hospital the closer that we got my father started telling me 'I can't make it. I can't make it.' So I was praying in tongues. And I told my Dad 'we're almost there, just hold on.' And he kept saying 'I'm not going to make it' and then as soon as I pulled up I screamed to the paramedics and they were moving very slowly so the paramedic told me to go talk to the woman at the front desk so I ran inside and I told her and she started asking me questions about his background, so I immediately stopped talking to her and I went back outside and there was a paramedic woman there that opened the door and started asking my Dad questions while he's taking his last breath. And then I started screaming at them to get a gernie and get my father and take him.

I'm screaming and telling them to get a gernie for my father and my Dad called me over to him and he told me, he said 'Gabe, I love you, goodbye.' And then paramedics was telling me move out of the way, move out of the way, and then they grabbed him and they dropped him on the floor. And there was about four or five of them and I told all of them to move out of the way and I picked my Dad up and I put him on the gernie and then I commenced pushing him myself, and they took over and said 'no, stand back, stand back' and they took him up into the room.

Michael: Let me take it from there. I said let me take it from there. First I want to thank North County for coming out and get the wind of the Spirit and hear what the word of the Lord is through the greatest prophet in the land. I've declared for over 20 years that he is the greatest prophet in the land and it is great to be his best friend. And this is not the first time that he has had the word of the Lord in his mouth to bring life and to bring me healing. He's done it for over 20 years and I'm grateful for him and Jane for his family and for his ministry and I'm grateful for all of you that have come out to hear the word of the Lord and to get a fresh breath of what God is doing in his resurrection power.

Now to get back to the story, that morning when I called Cookie to the bed, and then Gabriel to the house, and my daughter Christina was there, I had no more use of my legs, and I did that night. But that morning I had no more use of my legs and I had no more use of my arms. They did not work; I tried to make them work to get dressed and I could not. They had to dress me, and I did not know that I was dying.

I told my wife I wanted to go to Sharps; I always get confused between Sharps and Scripps, but it was Sharps. And when Gabriel was taking me to the hospital, and I don't know how to explain to you that when you know how much breath you have, and I know how much breath I had left, and I was trying to hold on to the breath that I had because it kept coming up higher and higher and I knew when it got up here that I would be done. And when Gabriel drove up and got into the front of the emergency of the hospital, I had had my last and I told him that I had my last breath, and I told him that I loved him and I died. But let me say this, the man that was there at the door from the hospital, I knew that he would drop me. I'm not playing; I knew in my spirit that he would drop me and even though I dropped dead, he did drop me.

And Gabriel said to me, I don't know how long - months and months before - you should be glad I am here and I told him that 'I don't have no reason to be glad, I said, because I made you.' And I said and I made sure that I would bring somebody like me back! I always had the strength of ten to fifteen men and I had no more strength left and what are you going to do when you don't have no strength left. You got to have people that love God and know God.

And I don't think I have the time to go into, and maybe Kim will actually share, because he had the word of the Lord in his mouth every day. And he prophesied into a microphone and they put it to me when they had put me on a medical coma, they induced a medical coma, they put me on ice and literally you guys I had ice on me so I was cooling out. My wife said for three days they had me on ice. But the prophecy that Kim gave they put it in my ear and then every day he was prophesying and my family was eating on the prophecy and on the Word and they said 'What did the prophet say today?' And they said 'Tomorrow in 24 hours there will be a rapid and a miraculous change!'

Kim: I want to say something here Michael, just what happened to me, and Cookie, I want you to share something too, because a lot of people think that when you give a promise or a prophetic word that it just has to happen. And it doesn't because somebody has to apply that and use that as a weapon. And I remember when I heard the news and initial there was sadness because he is so dear to me and I went to my texts, and I don't talk a lot to a lot of people and Michael once in a while, I'll talk to him. And he gets frustrated and says 'You know I haven't heard from you in weeks.' And I just felt before I got to Nashville to write him a word, and I never do this, but when he was in Detroit, how he traveled with me to Detroit, for all the years that I was in Detroit ministering and working there, he would come there and be a part of every meeting, we would do 5 or 6 meetings at a time. And I would give prophetic words out and I prophesied over him about 4 times in Detroit, and I remembered one of those prophecies which I gave him which was 'You will meet Michael Jordan and you will have something to say to him.' Well that was years ago and I actually typed out a text just before the weekend.
Michael: I have it.

Kim: And I said 'You will meet Michael Jordan.' That's the word I got before he died so it was unusual that I just took a little bit of that which was in Detroit and just shoved it into a text and sent it to him not knowing that he would actually face death. And then on the Monday when Gabriel called me, I immediately strengthened myself, and I said 'Okay, what exactly do you want to say Lord?' So first of all I know you want him to live because you know he hasn't fulfilled this. He said 'Well Kim, you were taking on some of his, the burden of his illness and so that he would not actually completely die; or he will die but he will come back.'

So I said to the Lord 'I'm going to pray' and I don't ask God for signs but then there's nothing wrong with it. And so I said 'I love the wind' and I'm always inspired by the wind, because when I hear God I hear it in the wind and I said 'I want you to send the wind to Camarillo where I live' and there is barely any wind there, and barely any wind and for three days every second of those three days, the wind blew so hard and I could hear the Lord in the wind.

And each one of you is that special to God that he would fight for every one of you. It was sort of a sign to me because it was like God was going to breathe into you. So that's what happened to me. Then I kicked in and I said I need some precise things to happen and I need to give them to Gabriel so he can use them because Gabriel was so adamant. He said 'the doctor just walked in now and the doctor said that and I will NOT receive that' and he got so adamant about that! And he would text me, and eventually I did get the word of the Lord that within a 24-hour period and then subsequently they would take and Cookie, this is what I want to ask you, because you talk a lot when you're not on the platform so I don't know why are you so quiet.
Michael: That is right.

Kim: You know Jane has said this before, when Cookie talks we actually take a breath for her, because she talks and she doesn't take a breath, and we tend to go (take a breath). So Cookie, tell us you know the unbelief that was surrounding you guys and then Michael will get back us on what actually happened.

Cookie: The very minute that we arrived at the hospital we weren't allowed to go through the door, they took us, you know they were trying to help Michael. And as we were sitting in the waiting room the doctor came out and he said 'Michael already had three cardiac arrests' and they go 'I don't think he's going to make it.' If he had another one 'we don't think that we could take him up to ICU.' And we just started praying, Lord God, you promised, and we just stood on the Word and we just believed God and we just prayed that he will leave; we will leave this emergency room and we will make it up to ICU. And that was the first step that we started seeing when he got moved and when we got upstairs in ICU they still was like 'we don't want you to be too excited because he won't make it because he has all these different types of problems in his body.' And so we just kept praying and believing God for the whole time. And every time the doctors came it was a negative report. It was bad and that he was not going to make it, but we still believed and God said 'If you delight in the Lord' in Psalms 37, He said 'If you delight yourself in the Lord, I will give you the desires of your heart.'

And that's what we decided to do, I said no matter the report, we go 'Whose report shall we believe' this is the amazing thing when we heard from Kim. And I was like he gave us a call, he gave us flowers and he said God bless you, Cookie and your family. And he didn't say nothing about Michael, does that mean Michael's not going to make it? And I just started praying and praying and saying 'No, God promised.' And when he called back, when Gabriel called back and he said 'in 24 hours you will see a change' and the doctors kept saying 'don't be moved by his body movements because all of that is medication.' And we were 'No, we know God is moving.'

And I didn't know Kim was praying and moving by the wind of God. But that was the word that God gave me, the wind of God, the breath of God - God breathe your breath of God right back into his body in the name of Jesus and I commission all of his angels to come to into his room and I preached all his sermons because I said it is not time to pray something different because his faith is so connected with God. And I just, Lord, I believe your Word, I stand on your Word, I said because we need miracles here. And He said whosoever believes in miracles will have them. Only people who believe in miracles will have them and I said, 'Lord I believe in miracles. Michael believes in miracles.' And Michael always said to me 'Cookie, when the two of us touch and agree, God said there are going to be miracles between the two of us, that He would make miracles.' So that night when the word came from Kim, I touched him and I couldn't sleep the whole night. This was like Saturday night and he said 'starting Saturday night into Sunday you are going to see a dramatic change.' But at the time the medical report said that we are going to remove him off the ice and he's going to have to function on his own and then we'll see how much brain damage, if he has any brain reaction at all. And I said 'I rebuke that! I pray from the top of his head to the soles of his feet, that whole night I commission the death angels to leave his room, I command all the angels' and I started singing all of his songs what he used to say, and I just thank God for hearing our prayer. And there is so much more.
Kim: That is beautiful that you applied the word.

Michael: Yeah I wanted to say to you guys is that I had one thing in my heart and the one thing is a natural thing and then it goes into the spirit so listen to me. I always told my wife and when I came back from the dead and came back into my body and then I did what they said I could not do. And then they wanted to send me to rehab after I had already did everything that they said that I could not do, and I told them 'No, I'm not going to rehab, I'm going home.'

And I said to my wife after I was back at my house, I said to her with tears in my eyes, I said 'Cookie, I told you and I promised you that I would never leave you until I had beat down, we have beat down hell and our family and until we get everything that God had promised I would not leave you.' And she can tell you that I always told her that and I came back because of the promise I had made.

Listen and the other vision that God had given me about North County and this whole California from Mexico to Canada and this whole nation - I saw Jesus mighty and powerful and lifted up and a tremendous move of God came and it was here and it swept the whole world and I had that Matthew 16:28 'Jesus said that some of you standing here shall not taste death until you see the Son of Man coming in his power and in his glory.' Listen you guys, and even though I died, I did not taste death. I did not have the sting of death.

And when I came to I was in what Kim says, the garden of God, because I was in the place where there was roses that cannot be described with the human eye and the human mind. I saw roses and my eyes touched them and they were the biggest roses I had ever seen in my life, and they was the greatest red and when you looked at the red, it never stopped going into the red, and it never did. It was awesome.

And then when I came back into my body and woke up in the hospital I thought I was in Detroit. And everybody that came to me, I was like, my son Clifton came and Crystal came and the boys came and I said what is wrong with all these people coming, they came all the way to Detroit? Because I know how expensive it is and the first person that was in my room was my first male pastor, named Steve, he was in my room with his wife. And I could not talk and they just took - I call it the horse's bit - out of my mouth. My wife said it was the ventilator. To me it was the horse's bit in my mouth where I could not talk and the first thing I saw was this pastor. And I was trying to say to him 'You are crazy. What are you doing here, you came all the way here to Detroit?' and I did not realize I was here in California.

Kim: Let me just share something about that because in Detroit Michael would be at the altar all the time and when we were on the platform ministering, Bishop would be standing on the right and he'd be fighting with us. And during that time he had sacrificed as well, sacrificed being away from his family, sacrificed his time and came just to support me and to be strong with me as we built what we built, what we called the warriors of the new millennium, a kick devil butt generation! And you kicked serious butt, but what happened was during that time he built altars there.

The woman that gave to the prophet Elisha a room with a bed and a lamp stand and a desk, a table, she gave that to him as an offering so that he wouldn't be passing by, and that she would move from visitation to habitation. She didn't want a visitation of the prophetic. She wanted a habitation of the prophetic and what happened was she had a promise and when the promise died, the child that she was promised, she took that promised child and placed it on the bed, the offering that she gave and drew from that offering. She said 'I gave this to you.' And that's what happened to him because so many promises were given to him in Detroit, Michigan, that he actually, I believe that the Spirit drew him into those promises so that he would live off them because man shall not live by bread alone but man shall breathe, succor - breathe, by every word that proceeds out of the mouth of God.

Michael: Now let me say something. When Kim is talking about the offering; I was in Detroit, he was talking about the offering as he did tonight, and I said you know when it's time to give, I said to the Lord 'what shall I give tonight?' And I got my money out to hear what He would tell me to give and He told me to give, He told me to 'put yourself on the altar.' And I said 'Lord don't you want me to put some money?' And He said 'No, I don't want any money' so it was so funny, but not funny, but it is very prophetic what Kim is saying. And He told me to 'Go put yourself on the altar.' He said 'I want you and I want you to go put yourself on the altar.' So we had, I don't know four, five hundred people there, and they all came to the altar and I made my way and I laid up on the top of the altar as God told me to do. I gave Him what He wanted. He said He wanted me and when the death came because of disease, it could not take me, and I'm here to finish what God told me to do and my prayer is to my dear friend, that as you built the altar in Detroit, I pray to God that we have enough people here that will say right now and say it in their heart 'We want the wind of the prophetic here in North County.' I don't want to go to Dallas no more. I don't want to go back to Detroit - I can't say that. I don't want to go to Atlanta. I want an altar built here in North County. I want an altar to build here! I want an altar!

Kim: Okay! Is that prophetic or what my friend! Okay. That's beautiful. Now the Rose, Detroit, tonight the Lord sang a song to you and I don't know if you understood it but He was saying what you didn't know happened to you. I sang it and most of you heard it.

It was 'You were standing in the dark and you didn't know why there was not enough light and where God was because and you were screaming out where are you, where are you? And in this dark, He was there, but He could not show you Himself because had he done that you would not have come back.'
Go ahead Gabe.

Gabriel: That was definitely confirmation and what I want everyone to understand is the power of the prophetic. What the prophet and the apostle were talking about, it changes everything. That day, the day that my Dad was in the emergency and they were resuscitating him, the doctor came back and said 'We have already resuscitated him twice. Do you want us to continue with this vicious resuscitation processes, and you know, if not,' basically he was just asking us 'Do you want us to stop if his heart stops again, do you want us to stop?' And of course we said, no, you preserve life. He was saying Well, if we can't sustain him, we wanted to get him up to ICU and he's not going to make it to ICU because if he goes in there his heart is going to stop again.' And I told the doctor, I said 'Doctor, his heart's not going to stop again and he is going to go up to ICU.' Because they needed to perform emergency dialysis and they in order to do that we have to get him upstairs. So I told the doctor thank you for what he did, but he will make it upstairs. And then we went, me, my sister and my mother, we went into a violent prayer, as the prophet was saying just because you have a prophetic word doesn't mean it's just going to come and happen. You got to fight for that, you have to fight! And it's not against flesh and blood, it's in the Spirit, it's the warfare of prayer and as I was praying what he said about the darkness, my Dad was standing in the darkness screaming out, I saw my father completely surrounded with darkness and he was swinging the biggest sword I've ever seen. He was swinging the sword, I mean it was black as black and it was just him outside of his body and he was swinging a sword and I heard him tell me 'Gabe, I'm not leaving.' I heard that. When I heard that, it was like no matter what happened, because every day this is what you've got to understand. Every day they were coming and saying 'he's not going to make it.' And every day I had to tell them he is going to make because look you said he wasn't ever going to do this, he did it. You said he couldn't do this and every day it was something and they were still saying he's not going to make it. And we had family conferences; we had other family members there; some were in unbelief, and you have to stand firm.

And as the doctor said what he said, I would make sure that the last thing that was said was 'he is going to make it; he is going to make it' and I would put that in the atmosphere; that was the last thing put in the atmosphere.

And the prophet was calling me every day and giving me words, and the first thing he told me was go and kiss your father on the forehead and tell him that God kisses him. Tell him that God kisses him. And then when he called, I said I think you should call and talk to you him in his ear, okay when you're ready for me to do that I will do that. So he called and I put the phone up to my father's ear and what he told him, he said 'Michael, this is your brother. This is your friend for eternity and love and he said I am here as a prophet and he said I'm calling you back from that and come into your body. He said that I know it's beautiful; I know that it is pretty; I know everything that's going on but come back to you body now. And then he said within 24 hours we will see a change.

The next day that was - Monday was when he had the heart attack. On Tuesday he was on the ice; he was medicated; he was sleeping; he had ointment on his eyes, fully sedated and he was on paralysis medication. When I walked in and I told him 'Dad, it's Gabe.' He opened his eyes and looked at me and he moved his arms us and he moved his chest. You're not supposed to do that fully sedated in a coma. He opened his eyes and looked at me. And every day he would do that, he would open his eyes and look. You're not supposed to be able to do that. So that's evidence that the spirit realm, his spirit was strong as ever. His body was just resting. But it was the prophet every day, every day he was calling on prophetic words.

Let's all stand. I said we came to celebrate a life tonight. And in the beginning when I started I said 'say to somebody I'm glad you're alive.' I want you to turn around and tell that to someone. Michael, I'm glad you're alive.
Word to Gabriel:

Gabriel, a mantle has been given to you. It has been passed on to you even though the Elijah of your life has not gone. Elijah did not taste death. There is a spirit of Elijah that is present, the defiance of death upon this generation. This mantle has been given to you and you are being raised up as a prophet that will pastor and reach a double portion not of what your father got or had but what this prophet had. And you shall speak and the kingdoms of darkness shall shake. You will be gentle and even in your gentleness of speech they will shake and they will say 'We remember the day that he stood in that hospital room and defied us!'

You defied the kingdoms of hell. You defied the defeated one and they have trembled to think that you may do it again. And God says you will over and over and over and over again says the Lord! Death, you have no victory sting at all. And God says you are the beginning of a brand new generation of life savers, and life givers. You will not only breathe the breath of God but you will breathe with God and then you will 'Zo' succor' which means you will breathe out the life of God and bring to life a generation that have been doomed to die. Young men and women shall be free. And God said I will do it through a means that you don't even know that you shall do. Take it my son, for God has anointed you with a double portion tonight says the Lord!

Raise your hands up everybody. I want you to say these words:I receive the wind of the Spirit. I receive the resurrection life. Whatever is assumed dead, whatever is assumed dead is not. It shall come back to life. We receive the double portion right now. Our children, our children's children shall prophesy to dead bones: Live and they shall live!
Now give God a shout of victory everybody!

Without a revelation you have nothing. We are talking about the revelation of Christ. I'll tell you a story of love, a story of sorrow; a story that saves some and a story that destroys others. I am the smoke which spreads over the field of battle where men die with me on their lips. I am the revelation of Christ. I am close to the marriage altar, and when the grave opens I stand nearby. I call wanderers home. I rescue souls from the depth and I open the lips of lovers and through me the dead whisper to the living. I serve one as I serve the other. I serve one as I serve all. And the leaders I make my slaves as easily as I subject their slaves. I am the revelation of Jesus Christ. I speak through the birds of the air and the insects of the field, the crash of the waters on the rock ripped shores. The sighing of the winds in the trees and I am even heard by the soul that rejects the pleas of great orators and the derelict who refuses the cries of desperate mothers and fathers. I am the revelation of Christ. I open a vista to the universe and after experiencing me you will feel that there is meaning to life after all. I am revelation. I am the Christ. I come by revelation. I reveal myself. I'm there all the time. I am the cool of the day. I am the burning bush. I am the whirlwind. I am the still small voice of Elijah. I am the voice crying in the wilderness. I am the water in the rock. I am the rustling in the leaves in the mulberry tree. I am the writing on the wall. I am the sword of Gideon. I am the 'It is finished!' on the cross. I am the revelation of Jesus Christ.
When he speaks it goes throughout the earth. His revelation is there when you cannot be there. In other words, he will reveal himself where you cannot be.
Now Lord, you revealed yourself tonight and we want to thank you for that love.

Song: I've been longing to See Your Face

Kim singing: I found someone who would walk with me. Yes I found someone but I know He really found meI know He really found meWhen I needed someone, when I needed someone you were thereYou were always thereAnd I like to think that I found you but it was you that found me lying in the dustLying in the dust, you found me, you found me, you found me-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We are here today to recognize and celebrate mothers, motherhood and maternal bonds in general as well as the positive contributions that they make to society. So today the song that we sang was not really just for the Lord, but it's a song about mothers. You found someone in your mother that would walk with you, that would pray with you, that would fight for you. And lift me up and stand with me and when I'm weak you make me strong and when I'm down you lift me up. That's so, so beautiful to think about that as a mother's characteristic and nature.
So I'm really glad that I'm not a mother. I'm glad I'm a father because I've seen what mothers do, because my wife has been a mother five times and still is.

I'm going to invite my family up here because we are honoring Mother's Day. Jane is a phenomenal mother; she is a phenomenal everything, but she is a phenomenal mother because she had a phenomenal incredible mother. I want to share something with you about that. For all you mothers, well done, congratulations!

I want to say a few things to you before I get them on. My daughter, Donne is here on my left, and then Gloria is sitting in the middle and there is Jane my wife. We are going to share something but what I said was a great mother makes a great mother.
Jane: I agree.

Kim: Well I agree. I know that a great mother makes a great mother in you; the transference of the mother spirit, that's what I'm trying to say. So I have firsthand experience right now with mothers. I have a mother too. Most of you don't even know it because you never see her, but she is still alive and she is in South Africa and I honor her as well. I don't even know if she's watching because the time is different, but she may see this. I have sent her beautiful flowers and I even sent Jane flowers.
Jane: Beautiful flowers and Mom.
Kim: You are with me at the Den for Mother's Day special celebration. I want to share some facts with you before we get to some of the stuff. There are 84 million Moms in the USA.

Kim: August is the most popular month in which to have a baby. How many are born in August here? About 4 million women will have babies this year. The median age of a woman giving birth for the first time in the U.S. is 24. Daughters keep in closer contact with their mothers than their sons. There are more phone calls made on Mother's Day than on any other day of the year. The number of people calling their Moms in recent years on Mother's Day has declined due to email and other electronic means of communication which I think is very sad. Nearly 83% of Americans will buy a card for Mother's Day and 80% percent of the cards will be purchased by daughters. Do you know what the official flower is for Mother's Day?
Donne: Carnations.

Kim: There we go - carnations. Mother's Day is the third largest card sending day as well. Mothers' Day is the busiest day of the year for restaurants. ------------------------------------------------Kim: Today when I was reading the Bible as well, in Genesis 3:20 Adam named his wife Eve because she would become the mother of all the living. I love that - the mother of all the living.

Jesus also honored his mother in John 19:26 and 27: When Jesus saw his mother there and the disciple whom he loved which was John, standing nearby, he said to his mother "dear women here is your son", and to the disciple, "here is your mother." And I believe that was because he was disconnecting and leaving the earth and he was handing that responsibility over to John. So it's interesting that in the disconnection, the fact is that Jesus said to her "woman" so he was no longer referring to her as "mother" for it was time for him to disconnect and of course from that minute onward the disciple took her into his home. The point I'm trying to make is that He cared for her and He cared about her future and what was going to happen to her even though He was taking the position of being King of Kings and Lord of Lords. He knew that physically on the earth He wouldn't be - or there would be a point when He wouldn't be coming back.
You know what I want you to do is read the little poem that somebody wrote, the "Dear Lord" poem. Listen to this cute poem.
Donne:

Dear Lord, it's such a hectic day with little time to stop and prayMy life's been anything but calm since you called on me to be a MomRunning errands, matching socks, building dreams with building blocksCooking, cleaning and finding shoes and other stuff that children lose Fitting lids on bottle mugs, wiping tears and giving hugs A stack of last week's mail to read so where's the quite time I need Yet when I steal a moment Lord just at the sink or ironing boardTo ask the blessings of your grace I see them in my small one's faceThat you have blessed me all the while and I stop to kiss that precious smileWhat if Moms were mean and grind and also rather unfair and unkindWould they scream and bite or hit and call people numbskulls, bird brainsOr nit-wits? I bet that might happen if you forget to celebrate Mother's Day and instead play croquet!

Kim: A little Chinese girl wrote this one: Mommy, Mommy you are sweet, Mommy, you are niceDon't ever leave me 'cause you make the best rice!--------------------------------------------------------------Kim: Okay, let's talk, Jane.

The one thing that I must tell the people is that Gloria in 1996 received a word from me, and I don't give my family prophetic words from platforms, so to speak. I do write them out and give my children words so they can know their future. But I got a prophetic word for her and Oral Roberts was actually in the meetings that weekend.
Jane: She was sitting behind him.

Kim: And what happened was I was speaking of Abraham and many of you know that one of my favorite characters in the Bible is Abraham, and I was sharing at the scripture where God says to him, "As for you, you will live to a ripe old age." And I swung around to her and I gave her this prophecy that she would live to a ripe old age. And what I want to say is whenever God says something Satan usually attacks what God says because he wants to discredit him. He has always tried to discredit God and a way that he can do it is through God's creation and that's what he tries to do. So what happened was when I said that, in the May of that year she had caught bacterial meningitis.

Jane: Bacterial meningitis which is very dangerous; it's a lot more dangerous than the viral meningitis. And a lot of people don't make it if they have bacterial meningitis. And my Mom having it at age 74 is even worse. So there she is still living and she's here and she's almost 85 and she's made it another 15 years, how many years has it been Mom? Nearly 20 years since then, and she died three times; they had to bring her back to life. They said she'd never - she'd probably be blind, deaf, and not remember that we were her children. And to begin with, when she was first recovering, we didn't think she was going to remember who we were. She didn't know who we were for at least three or four weeks, yeah, she didn't know who she was. Would you like to say a few words about it?
Gloria: I didn't know what was happening, did I?
Kim: But you do remember when you came around they were there.
Gloria: I don't when it was but Jane and Caleb came to see me. Kim sent them over in a place, and I actually saw Kim at the airport -
Kim: This is while she was in a state.

Gloria: - and he was by himself and I asked him to please help me because I was flying all over in a plane looking down at deep water and I was afraid. And he said you have to fly this plane by yourself. And that's all I can remember of that but apparently that's at the time when he put Jane on the plane and sent her with Caleb to come and see me. Anyway that's what I knew about that. It goes to show that when you are in that state, you are all over. It goes to show that you are not just in where we were living, but your spirit isn't confined, your spirit is alive.
Jane: That's the best way to describe it.

Gloria: And then Jane arrived and they had taken me out of intensive care and she arrived there with Caleb and she was actually pregnant at that time with Elizabeth. And I hadn't even recognized anybody until I saw these two walking in and I saw Caleb and straight away "Caleb" that's what I said, because you know Caleb was my little baby. And Jane was there and then he came up and he was the first person I recognized after this happened. But I still remained in hospital a long time after that.
Jane: And it took you a long time to recover, approximately a year or two.
Gloria: That's when I came to stay with you.
Kim: The thing is they predicted, the prognosis was -
Gloria: The doctor told me that I was lucky that I was walking; I should be deaf, I should be blind, or I should be in a cemetery.
Jane: You were almost in the cemetery. Tell them about when you saw the three graves and your Mom who died. How long ago did your Mom die?

Gloria: My mother died in 1970. I had a sister who died in May in 1934. And my father died in 1988. And when I saw three graves and the headstones; I was kneeling on the grass next to my mother and there was this other headstone there and my Mother said "Write your name down here." And of course all I had was a piece of chalk, you know the chalk you get at school. And I wrote my name "Gloria Dulcie Barnes" and underneath "Nee Ladson" because "Ladson" used to be, was my maiden name. And my Mother said "That's no good. Wipe it out." She said "Write it again" and so I wrote my name again "Gloria Dulcie Barnes" and I could hear the chalk squeaking, and my Mother said "Just forget about it." So I forgot about it.
Jane: That must have been when you came back to earth, Mom.
Gloria: I don't where I had been - somewhere; but I was with her.
Jane: You do see your family.

Gloria: I think that we do. My brother in law told me that he believes that we do see our family gone before us. So the three people that had died before, and there was mine ready to go but I'm still on earth.
Jane: You made it Mom!
Gloria: And that was 15, just about 15 years ago.
Jane: No you said 20.
Gloria: It was in 1996, so that was 14 years ago, and in August I'm going to be 85 so Kim prophesied I was going to be old and hoary. Well here I am! Jane: Kim, you better explain what that means.
Gloria: It just means old!
Kim: I think in the King James Version, the word hoary is in there, it sounds terrible. But in those days I was using the King James Version of the Bible and the King James says hoary old age.
Gloria: Very old.

Kim: Very old. For those that misunderstood that. I remember Matt Crouch was with us, and afterwards, Matt and Laurie were in the room and Matt to this day, I can hear the way he screeched laughing because she said "what is hoary?" What is that supposed to mean?
Well that's great and that's just incredible what God did and I think Michael Babin experienced a very similar thing; he died three times, came back and I'm praying for the same for him.
Jane: And you know what he said, he said "I've been in Detroit all this time."
Kim: You know, I explained to people last time what that meant.
Jane: And it just made sense because that's exactly what happened to my Mom. She was also flying around.

Kim: You know what I explained last week on the Den, I said that when Abraham, whenever he built an altar and he gave to the Lord, it was after God has spoken to him, and when he went to Egypt, there was a great famine in Egypt and when he went back, when he was finished with Egypt he went back to the altar that he built to draw from it and I said to the people wherever you've built altars and you've sacrificed and given, you can go back and draw from that well, from that place and say "I need this now."

And that's what I think Michael did because he came to Detroit with us how many times and he went over and over for over an 8 year period, and he received prophetic words there, gave offerings there, sacrificed and during that period of time I believe, when he died, he went there to draw from those altars. Isn't that beautiful? I really believe in that. It's not a physical thing; it's a spiritual thing.

This is the most important. There are people watching us; some have Alzheimer's, some are older and are handicapped, crippled. Whatever the case God can do a miracle just like he did here with Gloria. And so I want you to get some hope today because God is able to do it. If He can do it for her, if He can do it for Michael Babin, and thousands of other people and He can do it for you as well.

And I pray that if you have a need today that you would relate to this and draw some faith from this and say "God if it could happen to her, it could happen to me." And there are some older, older people watching, very much older that come to our show and love it that are feeling the presence of God right now as we say this. And I want to tell you that all you have to do is get a promise from God and you've got it in the Word, many, many promises. You can draw from that and God can reach you and release you from that in Jesus' name.

We together pray for you as a family, for your family. We pray that you would touch them now Spirit of God. Holy Spirit, I pray that you would move; you are omniscient, you are omnipotent, omnipresent. You are able to go into any home at this very second. Heal the broken hearted. Heal every life right now Lord no matter what the problem is. Touch them and strengthen them, bone diseases Lord God, deterioration of, bone diseases, spinal diseases. We pray for a miracle right now. We call upon you to move into every life as they join with us, and our faith is with theirs Lord God, for we take the promises of God which are yes and amen and we release them into every life and every home right now in Jesus name, amen.
Okay so you've got something to say now.

The heart of a matter is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness. No matter how old a mother is she watches her middle aged children for signs of improvement.

Brown, born July __, 19__ and died '" And he fell on his knees weeping and weeping and that was his mother. And she died but her prayers were still in the spirit. The prayer doesn't die. Kim: How powerful a mother's prayer is. You can never underestimate a simple little prayer that comes from a mother. Jane: You are becoming more and more like us.
Donne: More and more like you.

Kim: I'll never forget something you came and said to me once. I don't know how old you were but you were growing up and you'd been through your things and Donne said "You know, I've come to realize you are real people. You are actually - you have a life; you're not just Dad and Mom." I know what you were trying to say but I can't explain it. It's almost that you came to the reality that we have our own life; that we are - I don't how you said it but it was something that just dawned on you.

Donne: Actually well you know when you're a little child, your parents, when you look at your parents it's sort of something you take for granted because they're always there so it's not like when you meet a new person you find out about a new person. So I think that's probably why that you know you reach a certain age and you realize these are human beings and they get sad and they struggle and then you realize how difficult it is to be a good mother or father.
