I believe that when something dries up God is getting ready to supernaturally provide, so America can have faith. God loves faith, and there's very little faith when you've got everything. And He wants to bring America back to the place where they have faith again. "I need you God. I'm going to use my faith." He wants us to use our faith.

Today I want you to use your faith. What did Elijah do? Elijah left the place that had dried up, and went down to a little town and guess what he got? There was a lady that had a little bit of oil. You know that. She had a little bit of oil; she only had a little bit of water, and you know what happened? He came in there and said, "I want you to give, I want you to give this, give to me, because as a prophet I carry the future." Elijah literally looked at her and said "I carry the abundance of rain." The gift that God gives the prophetic is to carry the abundance that is about to come before it happens. And he said "sow it into me and the abundance will come out of me into your little house" lady that was about to die with her son. And she did that, and as a result - of giving him the water and the bread - he said to her "from this day onwards until the end of this drought, the oil will not be used up. You will have it; you will have provision in your house," and from that point onwards she had a continual abundance that never dried up until the Lord sent the abundance.

And so we are in that position right now. God wants to do something special for each one of you. I want you to do me a favor. You've heard comforting words. I've come out just to talk to you about this. I want you to pray right now and I want each one of us to pray this prayer.

Lord, you are so wonderful, so perfect. We will not fear because once again You have sent your word. We take authority over the powers of fear and every prognosis that has tried to steal our joy, to steal our faith, every prognosis that has come forth to break our confidence in the Christ and the God whom we serve. We take authority over you and I release them from that bondage. Now Lord, go ahead and act; go ahead and do what You have to do in this great nation. We want you to do it and we encourage You. NowLord, we pray that You would take what we give to you today. We pray that You would take it and we are going to use our faith to give to you. We are going to use our faith to give to you today.

So Lord, speak to every one and show them what they should give right now.I want you to realize something. God wants to do something supernatural, not only for America, but for you. You are sowing, even though it's to my ministry you are sowing to the prophetic and to the abundance of what God's about to bring to us not only for this country but for yourself. Now I want you to pray and say to the Lord "Tell me what to give" and I'm going to play this piano while you do that. And God bless you.
Thank you so much for joining me and thanks for being a partaker with me. Let's carry on praying like Daniel prayed and look at the breakthroughs that are about to come. Thank you.

Kim praying:Lord, as we gather around what is your throne now, no longer do we have a piano, no longer do we have that which men focus on. We have the throne. No one else deserves the praise and worship that you do. As we gather around I pray for every life that has joined us; that you bring to them the peace that they need in the midst of a great amount of evil, bad reports. I'm praying that today you will touch every life and bring a good report for them. Most of them don't even understand that they are a testimony in the making; that even though the thing that is bothering you the most may seem to be pulling you down, it could be that this could become a testimony. So I pray for your peace, I pray send a word, send a word just like you did when the Centurion came to Jesus, and said my paralyzed servant is at home. Maybe there is someone that's in your house that is paralyzed, and it may not be physical paralysis; paralyzed by a drug problem, paralyzed by alcoholism, abuse; whatever it is Jesus is able to send the word. He gave us this which is His Word, the Word of God. He breathes life into it in your life when you trust him. Now Lord I pray that you'd remove the paralysis, financial struggle, paralysis that exists in each life that may have been brought about by themselves or just encountered, but it doesn't need to be there. Release them today. And I thank you Spirit of God that you are present; in Jesus' name, amen.

Thank you for joining us. It is so good to have you and I know that there are thousands of you watching all over the place, all over the world actually, and we love it that you have joined us today. We love you very much. As you can see, we love to worship the Lord. We don't necessarily just do this so that you can enjoy a bit of music. A lot of people say to me "you know, you're so musically skilled and yet you keep it so simple." Well I do that because first of all I like people to focus on God, and when you do too much you know they start hearing it and they focus on the talent. And I like to keep things simple when it comes to worshiping God as I do.

Thank you again for joining us. It's really great. I've got a few little guests here today. Every now and then we get people coming in and joining us and they are very special guests, but YOU are the most special person today aside from Christ being in our midst. He's in your home right now and can do so much for you.

So we are live; right now we are live in beautiful California, but also all over the world so this is not something that we pre-tape, this is live. So if you have a need, I want you to write us at live@kimclement.com and just send us your prayer requests. A lot of ministries say send us your prayer requests and we are going to look at them, and a lot of times they don't look at them personally and we cannot look at every one, but we do go through the prayers requests, in fact we have one person that goes through every request and that's these girls' Mom; her name is Pam, then she distributes them as well, then my wife Jane looks through them and picks out the ones that she wants to speak about. But she's not here today; she has family in town and had to go to the airport and all kinds of stuff.

So we will still carry on doing that, but you are very special to us and we are expanding and we are getting to a place where we can offer more to you in terms of our ministry and we have a lot of things going on right now. God put me on an 18-month fast after I had a vision, most of you have heard about it - about betrayal in the White House - that does not need to be explained. We do not need code breakers to explain it; Fox News, CNN - they are all explaining the whole thing to you. They are telling you the facts. What is going on right now is shocking.

But the Lord also, you know what I love about Him is that he offers a solution whenever there is a problem, there's always a solution that came prior to the problem being made known. That's what the power of the prophetic is all about. The fact is that we have a solution before the problem began. He gives it, not only through His Word, but He also breathes it out, and that's what the prophetic anointing is here for. That's what I do, and many others and so God will show us the outcome before the problem. And so many people are conscious of their problems and they think about their problems all the time, and I want you to know something - I always think of the solution whenever I'm confronted with what they call "demonic" I think there's a dynamic that's in the midst of this; I've got to see the dynamic that is in this. And there is always a dynamic. Now we behave like heathen crisis comes. And we do, and we all do whether we like it or not. You know crisis is crisis, but you know as I said before and I don't know why I'm always quoting these Chinese words, because there's no such language as Chinese; I don't know if you know that. There is Cantonese and Mandarin. And so you know the Chinese word for crisis exists in two meanings; they always have two means for one word. The meaning for crisis is hidden opportunity and potential danger. In your potential danger there is a hidden opportunity because that's the life of the Spirit. If you're not reminded of that by your preacher, get out of your church, because I don't like people that constantly speak about their problems (not their problems) the problems that are on the earth and then lead people to believe "don't worry, just hang on for dear life - Jesus is coming back."

We cannot wait for Him to come back to solve out problems. He came the first time to give us a solution to our problems. "For this purpose was the Son of God manifest that he might destroy the devil's work." But the actual - another version says "to destroy the devil's ability to work." If you want to know more and get more details I have a Tuesday night Bible study "From the Matrix." It's very, very informative and it's not the stuff I do on the platform and it's very, very informative and I'm going to show you a few clips of our platform stuff. We do have live events that are incredible. But Tuesday night for about 45 - 50 minutes I teach from a prophetic prospective out of the Bible and people are learning so much; I'm getting all kinds of tweets and emails about it.

So you joined us together today; let's pray together for you. Let's start this whole program inviting Christ, even though when we were worshiping Him we did that, but let's pray because there are specific needs that God wants to meet and not only that; something that I said was that you could be a testimony in the making. Your problem could be turned into something incredible for you to help somebody else out.

Remember what Jesus said to Simon Peter, he said "Simon, Satan would like to sift you like wheat but I am praying for you that your faith be strong." He didn't say, I'm praying for you that you will survive, or pray that you'll get through this; he said, I'm praying that your faith be strong so that when you return you may strengthen your brothers. Whenever there's a problem we return from that problem potentially to help somebody else. Your problem may actually be a "setup." Listen to me. Your setback could be a setup for God to do something unusual and something big for you. And so remember that your present situation could be turned into a testimony. I was there and now I'm here.

I'm going to give you an incredible testimony of something that just happened yesterday. I traveled 7 1/5 hours to go and see a miracle that took place, and a lot of it took place because of a prophetic word that I gave. I don't give myself any credit, but I give credit and glory to God, but I was obedient to him and it takes a bit of intestinal fortitude to get something like that out sometimes. People are afraid that they can lose their reputation, what if you make a mistake. So what if you make a mistake! I've made mistakes, yes, but I don't make mistakes all the time and as I've said before, you know the future is ahead of us and God has given me a gift to be able to see the future and interpret it, and sometimes I don't always interpret it perfectly, and so I don't want you to be scared to step out and do something by faith, and especially when you feel God's behind it.

Lord, today you are absolutely incredible, unique, different. Oh God, we want that in our lives; we want to be relevant and we want to be relevant Lord not only in the mundane; we want to be relevant when radical things are happening Lord God. We want to be relevant during every season whether it be in a season of war or a season of peace, we want to be relevant. And I pray today that you'd touch every life, meet their needs, we specifically come before you today with our hands raised to you to say to you "God, thank you for what you've done for us, and thank you in advance for what you are about to do and what you're going to do" as my song says that I sang today. And I pray that would happen. Bring out a testimony out of the situation that they are in. We give you thanks and praise in Jesus' beautiful name, amen.

Okay, so we had Jordan here last week; and we had so many good reports about this young girl that I brought here from Colorado and she was just such a blessing. Look at the way that God hand picked her through me and thank you for what you did as well, Miranda, for helping her and for taking care of her, Pam. On so, have you heard anything from her?

Miranda: Everybody's telling her that there is something different about her in school and they don't know what it is, and she thinks it's cute and funny because she knows what it is and they don't know what it is. And she's perceiving a bunch of little things going on around her it's good. She has a lot of good things to say. She was really, really touched by the whole experience.

Kim -We want to start a Kids Club that deals with kids. We want to start an online thing, where we can help kids and even bring them out here once in a while and send them to a youth group. I think there is some connection where we can reach these kids; not everybody's in a bad situation. There are kids that are not struggling with those. Every kid struggles with something. But some kids are having a real bad rap like you know, parents breaking up or verbal abuse in the home and somehow I want to be able to connect with those kids. And if you're a parent and you have a situation like that, please don't give up. I know there are churches and you need to get to a church but it you're in a place where you just say "I cannot do anything about this" you still have a lifeline right here where we are with you, and we may be thousands of miles apart but we are close because God can still touch you and we want to help you, firstly with prayer, advice, and what develops; please write in to live@kimclement.com.

So we want that to happen as well so you can see, my dear warriors, and the restrictions are that technology has afforded us so much but it's sometimes not affordable and when you give we are purchasing all the time. There is equipment that we are purchasing. Your donation is vital to us. You are on my show right now; it's called "The Den" and it is where I share things that I feel God has shown to me and that way we can minister to you. The least you can do, and I think one of the most powerful things you could do, is to give an offering, and give to the Lord and it's very important that you do that. Any time during this broadcast, you feel anything I want you just to go ahead and to give. You will feel God talking to you about it. Right now our big thing is to advance all our equipment, and just recently we bought some equipment because we were able to raise money to do it. It is helping us to get to this next realm which is to build The Den because we want to go to another building. We want to build it out so that we can reach people and you know with so much better.(Announcements about conference in Chicago - Rock the Flock)

When a disaster strikes and we haven't been informed before it, we don't know what to do and then we behave like heathen in that crisis. That's why I'm saying what I'm saying, because you can see throughout the Bible God always warned in advance what was going to happen. I love Abraham's story where he's frustrated; he needs an expansion of vision which I'm going to speak about today. He cannot see further and if you don't see you cannot get there. You have to see it, and he says to God, "how will I know that I'm going to get this land?" And God says to him "give me an offering and I'll expand your vision." Why would God ask him for an offering? Because God wanted to take that offering out of time and place it into the future and then he said "The nation that is in you, that is yet to be born, shall be oppressed for 400 years, but when they come out from under their oppression they will leave with great possession." In other words he told him already what the outcome would be, but he took Abraham's offering and applied it to the promise that he had inside of him that had not yet even been born.

Now expansion of vision simply means that you want to see further so you can know what's going on and what's going to happen in your future, and when you find that out you are equipped. I will deal with that in a few minutes; I don't want to start that yet, but that's very interesting.

So, when you come to my conferences or the Rock the Flock or wherever you go, there is a prophetic anointing there that will expand your vision and you'll find that you are in a different state of mind, and there are so many things that happen. So, please join us.

A lot of you sitting out there say "you know, Kim, you talk about these finances - oh that's not important in my life, I'm a spiritual man!" Stop it. God blessed every man spiritually; he prospered him for the purpose of his kingdom. It's not just for you to be wealthy; it's for the kingdom of God, and I totally believe in that kind of thing. Listen to the prophetic words that are coming out. Some of you have been watching on "fire point" and Dave Nehi had an incredible thought about the power of "fire point" and the interpretation of it. Keep looking there. It will make you a lot of money. Don't let's give it to the ungodly, please; we need it in the kingdom of God.

Finally, San Diego, May 16th, I never planned this, get down there to San Diego May 16th I'm going to Bishop Michael Babin's church for one meeting only and the reason I did that is because he has just been raised from the dead. Yes you heard correctly - he has just been raised from the dead. You say "oh that doesn't happen today" oh really. Who told you that? When last have you been in Africa where they have this kind of occurrence regularly, you know why, because they don't have medicine, some of them, they don't even know that there is such a thing as science telling us that it is impossible to be raised from the dead; they just believe it.

Now, my dear friend Bishop Michael Babbin, who has been a friend for 25 years, some of you remember - he's a tall 7 foot African man and he travels with me a lot. And he received prophetic words from me when he went to Detroit, Michigan. You guys remember when we were in Detroit, Michigan, God told me in 1994 when my arms and my wrists were smashed and I had that death experience, He said I want you to go to Detroit, Michigan and I want you to start regional meetings. That is where I found Hannah and Miranda, Dave Nehi - these were all young people when I was there and we imparted upon them the warrior spirit.

And during that time when I stayed in Detroit and I ministered there on a monthly basis, sometimes weeks at a time, I remember prophesying many big things over Michael Babbin, and please listen to me because this is about destiny; this is about your life. Your life is so important. You only have so much time on this planet and then we go onto the other side, and while you are here, God requires you to find out what it is you were placed on this earth for. And so I was in Detroit for that period  but Michael came.

And Michael got very, very ill and to the point of death, and what happened was a week or ten days ago, we came back from Nashville two weeks ago. I got a call from his son saying "my Dad has had three heart attacks and he has died; they resuscitated him; he's on ice; he's in a comma." The reports from the doctors were he will not come back without some limitation, handicap in his life; he will never be able to speak. Okay, but that may be correct and right in terms of medical science, but they were desperate and it looked very bad after a few days, he had not come around and they said he was going to die, his heart was so bad.

And I sent a word to Gabriel, I said "the Lord told me (it was on Saturday last week) I said in the next 24 hours there will be a drastic change and he will start coming around." Well in the next 24 hours, they took that word - his entire family - and they sat around his bed and said these words to him, and then they asked me to get on the speaker phone and I prophesied into his ear. There was no response from him whatsoever but then he started responding and eventually, this is so touching. The Monday, I then sent another word that I received from the Lord "by the end of today he will be speaking." I don't remember exactly what I said. I said he will begin to talk and communicate and there will be nothing wrong. That day the doctor came in and said "even if he lifts his hand don't misinterpret that because it doesn't mean anything because he's probably going to be a vegetable. He'll not be able to talk or anything and you don't want that. And they said "well we just heard a word, a sure word of prophecy and we believe that he's going to come around" and they believed it.

I want you to understand that, that when you know that God said something in his word and you take it, and you take the prophetic word, in fact some of you prophesied when I told you on Tuesday night to prophesy to your situation, because you're taking it out of the word and you're breathing it out. When you do that, God is able - write that down: God is able - you enable God by your faith. So they said this to him over and over. I hadn't seen him yet because I couldn't get away; I couldn't get down to San Diego. I had all kinds of things going on.

This is what happened. He started moving his arm; he moved his other arm; they asked him and I think I told him this last week about the L.A. basketball and he nodded and then he went "no" so he couldn't talk or anything. And so they sent that report back to me and listen to this, this is incredible. They eventually got him a pad of paper and a pen. You're going to love this. And he wrote his son's Gabriel's name, you could barely see it; he wrote something else; and then he wrote KIM clearly and big and boldly. And they showed me when I got there yesterday and clearly he wrote my name because he knew there was a strength there.

Well I went to see him yesterday and I was stunned. There is nothing wrong with the guy. Before he went into this coma, 10% of his heart was working and they said it will only deteriorate. Yesterday the doctor came in, a woman from Pakistan, she walked in there and she said your heart has gone from 10% to 77%! It's literally impossible to happen.You can have the same type of miracle. There is a God, a God that works and He looks at your faith. He's alive today. And I want you to know something, that he can do the same for you at this very minute. I don't care what your problem is; he still intervenes in peoples' lives.

And I came in there and of course I cried, he cried, and I kissed him. We hugged and Caleb was there and Caleb cried. Why? Because life was present; I said I've come to celebrate your life; I took him a scroll and his whole family was standing around. And he's normal; he's talking; his heart went from 10% to 77% and he's back; he came back from the dead. So I said, "Michael, what happened, what happened when you died?" And remember something he died, three times it happened. He went into constant cardiac arrest. And he said "I died and went to Detroit." I thought he was joking. He said "I died, and I was in Detroit all the time."

And it brought me to the understanding of - and I will read this quickly, then we will move on. I know a lot of people are being ministered to right now. In Genesis chapter 12, after Abraham was called out of Ur of the Chaldeans, it says in verse 6 of chapter 12, Abraham passed through the land to the place of Shechem as far as the terebinth tree of Moreh, and the Canaanites were in the land. Then the Lord appeared to Abraham and said "To your descendents I will give this land." Do you notice God speaks about the future all the time because he owns it, and there when God spoke to him and said "To your descendents I will give this land" God's given him a promise, and when Abraham heard that he built an altar to the Lord who had appeared to him. Every time Abraham heard from God, he built an altar, made a sacrifice and offered an offering to God, every single time. But listen to this, this is what I saw, I had never seen this before. God says to him "to your descendents I will give this land." He's giving him a promise. Abraham builds an altar to the Lord and even names the altar. He says this is what happened then and he places his offering on the altar. Then he moved from there to the mountain east of Bethel and he pitched his tent with Bethel on the west and Ai and the east and there he built an altar to the Lord and called on the name of the Lord.

So, every time he moves from one place to the next, whether spiritually or geographically, he gives an offering and builds an altar to the Lord. So Abraham journeyed going still towards the south, and then this is what happens. There is a famine in the land. He's got a promise and famine comes. Why do we think it is so unusual that when God give a promise then we say "well why is there a famine, why does something go wrong?" Well there is a famine and God says to go down to Egypt and dwell there. Of course Abraham goes and he tells a lie about his wife and I don't know why God didn't strike him dead then but he had a promise in him, and then God redeems him from that. In fact he's so wealthy that Pharaoh is quite upset about it. Anyway he leaves Egypt and listen to this now, he leaves Egypt and goes back to the famine, or the end of the famine, and Abraham went from there and Abraham was very rich and he went on his journey to the place where his tent had been in the beginning - Bethel and Ai. He goes back to the place; he goes to the place of the altar which he made there at the first and there Abraham called on the name of the Lord.

Now, I'm telling you all of that because this is what I believe. I believe that when you build altars and you give to God in a certain time; that God takes you back to that place so you can receive from that. Because he needed to hear from God after he had come out of Egypt so he went back to Ai; he went back to Bethel and rebuilt the altars and said "I want to hear from you and now I'm drawing on what I sowed and gave at this altar."

What happened to Michael Babbin is he gave of his life, came and joined us there, gave of his finances, built altars with us in Detroit. When he was dead, he went to the place back to Ai where he built an altar and said "I'm drawing from this now." People don't realize when you give to God in that type of setting; when you give to Him and you build an altar when you do that; when things go wrong you can go back to that place and say "I'm drawing from you to give me strength to do a miracle for me."

I just feel so strongly about that right now. So many of you have built altars you can go back to and say I'm going to draw from that. There was the woman that couldn't have children and she built a room for Elisha and I know this is ministering to you. She built a room for Elisha and Elisha went and lived in their house and she gave to him and then Elisha gave her a promise and said "You're going to have a son." She said "Don't lie to me" because they couldn't. And of course the next year they have a child the following year and that child dies later on and she comes to the place of her altar; she comes to that place that she gave, she comes to the room of Elisha - of course Elisha's not there - she lays her son who has died on the bed saying "this is where I built my altar; now I'm drawing from you to give me strength." That is what she did. That's what you can do as well and I feel so strongly that you should do that at this very moment before I teach you anything further.

I want you to just pray right now. You say "Kim, I suddenly understood something." I want you to give to God right now. I want you to sow an offering and say "Lord, you have spoken to me about where I'm going and what I'm going to do one day, the promises you have given to me, and because of your appearance to me, I want you; I want to give to you and build an altar right now to you."

You see when you do that God receives it and establishes something because he's speaking to you right now and he wants to bring you to a better place, to a greater place, out of bondage. And if something has happened to where the power of death has come against you, I want you to know he can change that right now. Now I want you to pray with me and say "God I want to give an offering at this particular time for my life and I want to build an altar right now because you are appearing to me. And I pray that you'd intervene as I give to you." Just do what he told you to do; then we will move on.
Hannah sings: Spirit Come.

Kim praying: Lord, as we have built an altar to you; altar speaks of sacrifice; it speaks of obedience. We have given to you and I pray come and minister life to them and take their gift and when the time comes for them when they need, Lord God, something like Michael needed, to draw on that they gave; do something for them as you did for Michael, amen. That's how I love to give. I love to give, not give under pressure with people telling you that you must give because we've got this problem or that problem, you gave as an offering to the Lord and I love you and thank you for it. That's the good news I gave you about Michael.
Pam, she is the one that takes all the prayer requests and then gives them to Jane and then Jane joins us from time to time to do that and we pray over them. Pam, what praise reports do we have?

Take advantage of this when a promise comes and a good report, because this means that God wants to touch our lives and minister to us. What else?

Kim: I remember that specifically and I even wrote back to you and I remember saying to you is there any way we can help these people, because we do care. You may be in that situation right now, in fact I sense that there are some kids watching in the same situation and you are desperate and you don't know how to communicate with me. Don't worry. You can still ask for prayer. Look, we couldn't even do much for these people except pray for them; we did; I carried that burden and that's what God has called me and other ministers to do is to carry a burden, to pray for you to get out of the situation. All you need is just a little bit of faith. I'm so glad that came up because I'm really concerned about that.

There are some of you that have even been suicidal; you're in such a very abusive situation, that you are in a place of suicide. I feel there is someone by the name of Faith, as well, even though you've got that name you don't have your namesake, and I want you to know you do have faith and Jesus said if you have just a little bit of faith, just a mustard seed, you can move a mountain. That's all you need sweetheart, just that mustard seed, just a little bit of faith and just call out to God and say "please help me out of this situation." He can and he will do it, and I pray for you and every abusive relationship and home. God can salvage it; he can do it. And Lord, we pray that that would happen today. I feel so many people watching me are in abusive situations and as I pray that you delivered Rhonda and them and the kids, please Lord touch them and minister to them right now. ----------------------------Before we go, remember something, this is a time when we have to expand our vision. To expand your vision, just like Abraham did, means you can see further and you can live longer - why - because I'm not in a place of fear and "what's going on, are we gonna make it?"

What does it mean to prophetic? You know I will give you a few words very quickly to describe the prophetic. It means to be predictive, perceptive, foretelling under divine inspiration, but it also - there's a word that I use as well - "pre-sageful." It means to have wisdom before its time. Everything we're doing on this show is to give you wisdom before its time so we can know when it happens, "oh I was warned about this; I know exactly what's happening." Do you understand? God spoke about Bush before he became the President and what he would do. And of course you're going to have contradictions of things happening in any presidency, but he warned us and told us before it happened. And so it's receiving wisdom; that's what happens.

The word "providence" is very interesting. What does providence really mean? It provides vocabulary so you can recognize what you don't see. Now I know that sounds crazy but let me just move on and I'll explain that to you. The word providence comes from the Latin word "providentia" and that means foresight or prudence, from the word "pro" which means "ahead" and "videre" which means "to see." So it means "to see ahead." That's all it means. Every one of you - you have the power to see ahead, why? Because you're a spirit being and Paul says in Corinthians "all may prophesy" all may have foresight; all may have prudence. All may have the knowledge to see ahead of the time. It is the knowledge of the future. Now you don't know it all, but you have an idea of what it is.

The initial meaning of the word "providere" means to provide. We know that. That's where provide comes from, but providence takes a little bit of a different slant. Now I want you to see what it means. It means "to provide information from the future." Everybody wants that. I want to know how I'm going to die, or when I'm going to die, if I'm going to live a long life. He doesn't tell us all that stuff but he provides us with information that is necessary for us to survive and move on and press on and press forward to the higher mark. Each one of you has a higher call, a higher state of existence. When you get dissatisfied with this state of existence and when the brook dries up, it means you're going to a higher state of existence. So I'm telling you that sometimes when there's not enough provision it means you have to move to the next place in order to get that provision.

And so that's what happened to Elijah. The brook dried up, the ravens no longer fed him; he knew it was time to move on. So there's a provision of information from the future that comes to you as you pray, as the prophet speaks to you, as many other voices come to you. It also means to take precautionary measures so you can know what you've got watch out for. That's what prophecy or the prophetic is all about.

And so it's a whole brand new world we are talking about. You have to expand your world view by multiplied vision. What does that mean? Your vision must multiply or it must go further so you're not stuck with now, now, just a little bit you need to know why is this happening? Where is this taking me to? I need knowledge from the future. Every one of you needs knowledge from the future.

It's important that you understand about your world view. John the Baptist knew who he was, but how did he know what he was? By knowing who he was not. Now doesn't that sound crazy. When they came to him they asked him, are you this, are you that? They brought these various titles and he said, I am not, I am not, I am not; I think he says it three times. He said, I am not this, but this is who I am. You'll never really know who you are until you know who you are not. There's a lot of people that dream about things but who are you? What is your DNA? Who are you spiritually? What is your spiritual DNA? What are you equipped to do? So you can say I am not that; I know what I am not.

Kim Clement knows he is not a pastor. If I was a pastor, it would be a disaster; they'd call me "pastor disaster!" I'm serious. I am not a pastor. So when people say, I am not a pastor. Well what are you? I am not this, I am not an entrepreneur. Who are you? I am a prophet. Are you ashamed to call yourself a prophet? No because I'm prophetic. Just because there are some crazy guys out there does not mean I'm not allowed to call myself what God called me. And so you have to know your identity and once you know who you are, you are able to get to your destiny. Jesus Christ never denied himself once. It didn't matter how difficult the situation was, he always looked at them and said "I am the Son of the Living God." "I am;" he wouldn't be afraid even when he could have gotten out of when Pontius Pilate, when he stood before him and the people questioned him, he did not deny who he was because he knew that if he denied who he was, he would not reach his destiny.

And that's what I'm trying to teach my students about knowing who you are and knowing who you are not. Once you know who you are, it will get you to your destiny. Even on the cross, Jesus said "I am." He knew who he was and would not deny it.So because of that, when God spoke to Jesus, He told him who he was. This is your identity: "You are my beloved son in whom I am well pleased." That's what he said to him. The first thing that Satan attacked was IF you are the beloved son, if you are what God just called you, then prove it by doing something. And I tell people that you don't have to prove anything. You are who you are; you don't have to prove it. There's that performance oriented generation that says "well, I'll believe it when I see it." I am who I am because God told me, not because I necessarily have to perform to prove who I am. That's a big problem in peoples' lives.

And the first thing that Satan attacked was what God said about Jesus. IF you are, then do this and I'll believe you. Well, Satan, we don't care what you believe. I'm more important; I'm the one that must believe it.What is your world view? Everybody has a world view. What is a world view? It's the overall perspective from which one sees and interprets the world; so it's how you interpret the world around you.

What is the world view of the Taliban, for instance? You will read what their world view is, and it is steeped in religion and evil religion most of the time, because the West has gone to Asia and it's gone to the East and it has infiltrated them, and affected them. So their whole world view is based that religion so they don't mind killing for that; and that's their world view.

So your world view is very, very important. A collection of beliefs about life and the universe held by an individual or a group of people; eventually an individual will affect a group of people with his world view.

Now we've go to have a kingdom view if we are going to get anywhere in life, but your world view is very important as well. And your world view has been shaped by various interventions by God. Jacob is running from his brother; he is basically a deceiver; and he's on his way, trying to get away. That's all he's thinking about and his whole world view has to change. He hates the place he is in; he has landed in Luz; and he doesn't know what to do. He falls asleep, puts a rock under his head and God opens up the heavens and a ladder comes down. Angels are ascending and descending, and a voice comes out and He speaks to Jacob and says "nations of the earth, multiplication; you're going to be a blessing throughout the earth." And Jacob wakes up and his whole view of the world has changed. He says "God is in this place and I never knew it. This place is awesome." And he suddenly renames the whole place because God has changed his world view and infiltrated it with a kingdom view.

Every individual has a world view. It may have been constructed consciously or it could simply be the product of our environment but it governs our behavior and God has to persuade you to stop fighting the culture. You see because a lot of Christians believe that the culture controls that which is true and that you have to enter mortal combat with the culture, when in fact we are supposed to infiltrate and reform a culture. That's what Jesus Christ did. He went right in there and changed their thinking.
Proverbs 23 verse 7 says "As an individual thinks in his heart, so is he."

Our world view or outlook if you wish creates certain presuppositions that either motivate or restrict our personal behavior. Simply put, our world view is the interpretive lens through which we perceive the whole of life, how we interpret life. If you know your identity you will reach your destiny. God always addresses your identity in accordance with your destiny. "Daniel, man greatly beloved; Gideon, mighty man of valor," and what Satan attacks is your identity to get you to hate yourself, to despise yourself. What God addresses, Satan attacks. So whatever He tells you, that's what the enemy's going to attack because he hates God and he hates seeing God in you, and he wants to take God out of you.

Because our scientific world view is built on the concept of cause and effect, as a culture, we tend to doubt and deny experiences that aren't measurable and verifiable. So we have to have measure and it has to be verified. When events coincide in startling ways, the first words we hear or say are "oh, it's just a coincidence." And that's not true because God's putting this whole thing together.

Researchers in communication have found (and I share this a little bit in my Destiny course which you really need to come and be a student of because you will learn so many things on how to get to your destiny) but researchers in communication have found that when we lack a word for an object or a concept, we cannot identify it. And this can happen in the most literal of ways. Let me show how. In China, there is only one word for red. But there is only word for red, so if it is pink, it is red; if it is crimson, it is red. They call it one word. They don't see it as 5 different things, just one; meanwhile it is 5. There is rose, there is crimson, there is pink, there is scarlet and so to them there is nothing else but that one word. So everything's red, and so they lack vocabulary and therefore they lack the perception that red comes in more than one shade. And so they cannot identify it at all.

So what I'm saying is that God has to give you words so you can perceive things that are really there but you think they are all in the same category, but they are not. And that's what prophecy is. It gives the word to identify what you are actually experiencing. You think it's the same thing; you think it's the same old attack but it's not, so he gives you a word to describe something that's there all the time but now it becomes identifiable and it becomes visible. You say "Oh I see that's what it is." For instance, when you watch a 3-D movie, you put on special glasses and suddenly you see images emerge that were invisible before.

Jacob did not see the glory of his place because his whole world view was about his life and his identification with Esau and that's all he saw. And everything changed; God identified things. "You're a great nation." "Me?" It suddenly comes alive.

Many of you watching me are saying "you know I've seen the same thing happen in my life and it's just the same old attack." How do you know? It may be something leading you to something else. And that's what I want to tell you is that God gives words to identify what it is that's appearing before you. You may think it's the same thing, but it's something completely different and leading you to a better place.

Your whole world view has to change, our view of mankind, and we've got to get a kingdom view of things and that's what I'm praying for people today. Whatever your problem is, no matter what it is, God is able to do exceedingly, abundantly above all that you ask or imagine.

We are in a place, a beautiful place right now where we are able to take that which God has given to us and interpret it for somebody else, though we don't understand at the time what's going on. You realize of course that he could be leading you to a far more beautiful place in your life. I don't want you to give up, I don't want you to let go. I want you to stand and watch how God can break the power of a situation. You know I often say this and I use this in one of my teachings, that your place of pain could become a place of reign.

I believe that as you understand today your situation or where you are may be the greatest place on the planet right now. "Kim, you have got to be crazy." And you think I haven't been through it. We are going through something right now that I'm starting to realize that what I thought was the biggest demonic attack, which it was, could actually be the greatest breakthrough that we've ever had. Isn't that weird? How could that be, I don't see that.

Well neither did Jacob. Jacob didn't think for a minute he was an incredible nation that was about to bring a prophecy to pass. A nation would be born. So Israel was to come forth from him. Think about it for a minute. When Jacob was in a place of pain, God said to him this is a place of reign. Jacob's world view was it's a place of pain. God's view was it's a place of reign. And when Jacob woke up, he said "God is in this place and I never knew it."

Could you think for a minute that the place that you're in, you may just come around and say "you know God is in this place and I never knew it. This place is awesome." He changed the name of that place and called it Bethel, the house of God, the dwelling place of God. Then he said something absolutely wonderful which I read it over and over and over and I realized that he had nothing but he knew, he was compelled, "I have to give something to God. If God has given me this whole change of view and perception I have to give him something." And so he took a stone that was in that place and he anointed it and gave it to God. And he said "God, if you will bless me and keep me and bring me back to this place" -you see they always wanted to come back to a place where they offered an offering or they built an altar to God. He said "then I will pay you ten percent of whatever I get." And you know he became the wealthiest man in the world at that time.

And I believe that same opportunity is here right in front of you. So dedicate yourself before you go, and say "God I offer you something in this place. I want you to take my place of pain and turn it into a place of reign."

I speak the name Daniel to you.

For God says a President shall come to you from this State again and this President shall rule with righteousness, he shall not be one who will stand back. God says, your enemies will be subdued in a way, in a fashion as never before. For this one will sing the song Amazing Grace. This one will say, the Lord is His Name. This one will not be afraid. Once again God says, Texas I thank you for what you have given to Me. I will take again from your hands and I will bless this Nation and the Nations of the earth with a President that shall rule and be Spirit filled and shall love the Lord God Most High says the Lord. God said the American dollar will never crash - they've tried it once, they tried it twice, they've tried it a third time now and their attempt is to bring down the American dollar, the U.S. dollar. The Spirit of the Lord says it shall not take place. In fact, God says that within a few years it will be the strongest that it has ever been before because this is My Nation and this Nation shall call My Name only.

dateLocation: March 1st, 2010 - "This Is Your Day" with Benny Hinn
paragraphs: The Spirit of the Lord tells me to tell you that this that you have received, this that you have dispersed to others over the years and over the decades, everything will be accumulated into one moment in time which starts in March. And this eruption will happen through you and a few others that I've chosen. God said it is a responsibility because the enemy will come and he will fine tune it because he will say "I must focus on him." But God said as he attacks you I will give you more access, more access into the world, the Middle Eastern world where they will come and they will say "will you come and will you be the prophet to us because you understand our culture, you understand who we are and you are able to speak our language." And the Spirit of the Lord tells me to tell you I have spoken about the fact that young men and young women in the Middle East are dying for God's word. They will literally die and you will present them with Christ but in a fashion that only you can do it. They won't be able to do it. The people of the West cannot do it, they don't understand, they abhor them. They will not listen to them. But God said I've anointed you and I will give you words. Even though thousands may surround you and you will say these words to your servants "Can you not see those who are with us are greater than those who are against us?" You will have visions and insight before meet with these sheiks and these great men and God says I will raise up - it will be the youth that respond to you. The youth will cry out and say "Let us go to this man that speaks so powerfully and when he speaks something happens to our skin, something happens to our innermost being." These young men will be raised up and Christ shall be given to them. They will come out and they will join with the West, some of these young people, and music will be created that will be a combination of Western and Middle Eastern music. And even the artwork will change, God said. And because you have been obedient understand that the miraculous that shall be taken from this nation through you to them will raise up a generation that shall say "We believe Christ is the One. We believe that He is." And they will not be able to stop them for it is an army, says the Lord, that will come because you will prophesy to dead bones, says the Spirit of the Lord!
In Song:

Every time you lift your voice and praise me, every time you shout my nameI can hear your voice and I rejoiceEvery time you honor me with praises, every time you shout my nameI rejoice over you with joy, I rejoice over you with joyEvery time you move your feet and dance, every time you lift your voice with praiseI rejoice over you with joy, I rejoice over you with joy, I rejoice over you with joy Every time I hear you say my name, every time I hear you shout for joyI rejoice over you with joy, I rejoice over you with joy, I rejoice over you with joy I rejoice over you, I can remember the time when I brought you outI look at you with sweet surrender in your eyesEvery time I look at you I remember the day you raised your voice to me andSaid I am the one who needs to surrender to youEvery time I look at you I remember when you gave everything and like a childYou entered into the door that I opened for youI remember when you opened up your hands to me and said Lord, I've giving upI surrender, I surrender to you I surrender everything I've got just to you, everything I am now belongs to youI surrender, I surrender to youI surrender everything I've got, I give it to you, and everything I own I give it to youI surrender, I surrender to youI surrender, everything I've got I give to you, everything I own belongs to you nowI surrender Lord, I surrender to you tonightI surrender everything I've got belongs to you, everything I have belongs to you tonightI surrender, I surrender to you tonight. And I remember what great lengths you went just to bring me inHow I walked away from you hoping one day another timeThen I found myself lying in a street and I was dying and I wondered if you'd come there and touch my life and there you were standing right next to me, and I cried outI surrenderI surrender, everything I've got belongs to you and everything I own it belongs to youI give it all to you, I surrender Some of you are hoping God would look at youAll he wants from you is an open hand and an open heart and say, Lord won't you comeThose watching me right now, you know I feel I've lost outGod has created an altar for you. He's not going to get any closer to you than what he did on an old rugged cross, when he cried out and said 'It is finished.'  All you have to do is cry out and say 'I surrender to you.'

The Spirit of the Lord says all I need is somebody to agree with the prophet. Beginning in the month of March everything's gonna be turned upside down.  The prophet warned you that there would be earthquakes even greater and worse than what took place in Haiti. The reason is your enemy wants America, your enemy wants theUnited States of America, he wants to shake the ground, he wants to destroy you again. But God said he will not touch this land. You see the earth shall shake, but God said the people of the Lord shall survive. Yeshua, the Lion of the Tribe of Judah has saved the people. The Spirit of the Lord says the ground has shaken but the powers of hell have been buried. Their powers will not control nor manipulate what takes place in the house of the Living God. Because in my house there will be a shaking of another kind, I said a shaking of another kind. There will be a shaking of another kind and I will shake sickness, and I will shake poverty. I will shake witchcraft, I will negativity. I will shake poverty. I will shake Jezebel. I will shake religion and I will shake hell! Rap: Shake, shake, shake the powers of Hell! I will shake poverty and I will shake witchcraft, I will shake religionAnd I will shake hell itself. I will shake darkness, I will shake sickness.I will shake passivity and I will shake Jezebel!Shake, shake, shake the power of religion!Shake. Shake, shake the power of sickness! Every mountain that is on the earth has been placed there to possess. There is no mountain that cannot be possessed. Caleb said 'I want the mountain with the giants.' God says there are mountains that have stood before you, mountains that have been waiting to be possessed, darkness has been filled them. Now these mountains and those that have possessed them must be dispossessed.   The Spirit of God says for me to tell you tonight there are mountains that seem as if they will never be taken because you have listened to the voice of majority 'We cannot go to the mountain, we cannot take this land because the land is filled with giants.' Ha! Is there, is there, is there a Joshua, is there a Caleb who will say 'Give me this mountain.' I said is there a Joshua? The Spirit of God says there are kingdoms that must be possessed. I have found the people that will take them, warriors scattered throughout the earth, waiting not be taken away nor are they waiting for the strong hand of the Lord to deliver them. They have been given the command.  The land is yours, the land is yours. The Spirit of God says the land is yours to take. And in 2010 I have given the command to 9 angels, one of them fought for Daniel, the other fought for Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego. Another one fought for Jacob to become Israel. The other one stood with Paul. The other one was with Peter to get out of the prison. The other angel was with Moses.  Every one of these I have sent for this time on the planet earth, 9 angels that are acquainted with warriors, angels that have stood and watched Daniel in a lions' den, the angel that stood in the fire with Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego. That angel is standing here, that same angel is standing here and he says 'I want Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego shouting the fire, Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego shouting in the fire! There's a fourth man standing in the fire! There's a fourth man standing in the fire!' God says think it not light that that same angel is watching the plans that are trying to consume the servants of the Most High God by a prince of Babylon, the same prince that tried to destroy Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego and Messiah, the same one that tried to destroy Daniel. That same prince of the East has come to this nation to take captivity those who declare the name of the Most Holy of Gods. But God said He will hear the same sound of Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego praising in the fire, Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego shouting in the fire, there's a fourth man standing in the fire! There's a fourth man standing the fire! The Spirit of God said I have sent 9 angels and you know your prophet doesn't speak lightly of angels. I have sent 9 angels that have stood with the greatest of warriors. They have come and they will come in March. They have come for the distinct purpose of fighting for you, fighting for America, fighting for those that declare the name of Christ. They will war at your words. They will go to war with your words. They will go to war with your praise. They will go to war with your words. They will go to war with your shouts!!!

A great and mighty army is being raised up in 2010, the likes that the earth has never seen. Never in the history of mankind am I raising up America, South America, Central America. I am raising up a band of warriors the likes that the earth has never seen, They shall not be afraid of the lions' den, of the '666,' they will not be afraid to storm the gates of hell. They are you and your children. The Spirit of Elijah is upon this generation for the fathers and the sons to be one voice, and all that I am raising up, the likes that the earth has never ever seen before says the Lord!  I will raise up bass guitarists like this; they will touch one note and the kingdom where they are standing, arts, entertainment shall saturate the sound of the Holy Spirit through the sounds of their instruments. There shall be a movement amongst the gays. The gays, many of them will come out and say 'We lost our father, we lost our image, we lost our manhood, but we have found Abba, Abba Father, therefore we shall arise!'

Beginning in the March of this year of the decade of 2010, mountains will be taken, kingdoms will be possessed, demonic strongholds with be dispossessed. And a movement amongst children likened unto Samuel shall begin to transpire. Once again the great cloud of witness will hear the same sound that they heard. That's right. They hear the sound of Daniel lifting up his hands while surrounded by death. They hear the sound of David, David as he danced before the Lord as he shouted in Zion. They'll hear the sound again, the sound they long to hear coming from us. America will release the strong grip of secular humanism, the power of controlling organized religion. They will say 'How can we abandon the Ten Commandments. These were the laws that God gave to protect us.' Groups shall be raised up that once protested and said 'Away with the Ten Commandments, away with Christ's words in the schools.' God says a movement shall be raised up by these and they shall win. They will say 'We tried to keep him out of the schools, we tried to keep him out of education, out of the legal system, but He came anyway.'  God says America, once again I walk your streets. Don't take this lightly. I will take the lion nations and they will roar. Africa will not be stopped. It shall be like the roaring lion that shall be after the prey being the power of darkness that has brought them to poverty and violence.  Europe, Asia and Africa shall join forces in a movement that shall bring salvation to many millions of lives.  China will endeavor to try and come and rise up against this land and against Israel with a pact that they wish to make with Iran, but there shall be betrayal from Russia that shall make them angry and they shall withdraw. For there shall be another time, and time and a half of time and again a time.  It shall be given to the Saints of the Most High God a judgment shall be made from the Supreme Justice in favor of the Saints of the Most High God to not only possess, to not only receive, but to possess the kingdom of Almighty God.
Kim Sings Prophetically:

Even though its snowing outside I can feel the warmthEven though its cold outside I can feel the warmthI can feel the warmth in the airI can feel the warmth in the air outsideSummer is comingThe sun will shine, the sun will shineShine for your familyEven though its rain and even though it's coldEven though its snowing a day is coming soon you will feel the sunshineI can see the sun about to shineI can see the sun I can see the sun it will shineThe sun will shine, the sun will shine every single dayThe sun will shine the sun will shine shine on your familyThe sun will shine, the sun will shine every single dayThe sun will shine, shine, shine every single dayThe rain will fall, the rain will fall every single dayLet it rain, let it rain every single day (the rain of the spirit)Let it rain, let it rain every single day (Everybody lift your voice to the Holy One, Worship the Lord, Lift your hands to the Lord of Hosts)We know you are HolyWe know you are worthyWe know you are HolyWe know you are worthyWe know you are HolyWe know you are worthy
Every single day of my life I'm going to lift my voice and say You're Holy. Prophetic song:

Let your enemy hear the sound of victoryLet the demons of hell hear the sound of victory in your voiceOne will chase 1,000, two will chase 10,000 make a noise tonightOne will chase a 1000, two 10,000If you lift your voice I'll do it tonightDo it tonight, do it tonightHe'll do it tonight, He'll do it tonightOne will chase 1,000, two 10,000If you lift your voice I'll do it tonghtHe'll do it tonightDo it tonightGod says, one will chase 1,000, two 10,000 if you lift your praise I'll do it tonightIf you lift your voice and give Him praise He'll do it tonightDo it tonight Prophetic Song:

Standing in a garden alone asking them to pray with meI'm standing in a garden alone listening to everything I createdI'm standing on the very spot, the very ground that I drew '.I'm standing in the garden alone wondering if they'll ever know that I was the one who created themI pray a prayer Father won't you take this cup from me?I'm standing on the very ground, I stood there Abraham looked into the skyI told him can you count the stars, can you count the stars because I created them to tell you the story of your tomorrow.Look into the dust what do you see?Can you see tomorrow on the ground you're standing on?Can you see the future in the sky, in the stars because I created them for youNow I'm standing in a place called GethsemaneOn the very ground that I stood where I gave lifeI prayed to the Father, if it be Your will will you take this cup away from me?If it be your will can I walk away Nevertheless, Nevertheless thy will be done, nevertheless, nevertheless Your will be done.Lord I pray today would you take this cup away from me?If it be your will would you walk away and I can see but nevertheless, nevertheless your will be doneNevertheless, nevertheless your will be done
If it can be so, can I walk away from this pain I know I'll feelIf it be your will take this cup away from meNevertheless, nevertheless Your will be doneNevertheless, nevertheless Your will be done
Your will, only Your will be doneLord I pray today, nevertheless Your will be done

Song:The nation is crying out because they've been in famine for the rainCan you hear the sound of abundance, can you hear a sound of abundance today?Can you hear it?'Cause the rain that I'm sending to you is the rain that is coming fromThe Spirit of the Living God, it's gonna rainI can hear the sound of abundance, I can hear the sound of a mighty, mighty rainLet it rain, let it rain as I lift my hands, let it rainLet it rain, let it rain as I lift my voice to you, let it rain The Spirit of God says this nation has faced war, heartache, sorrow, anguish, bitterness, grief. The previous decade brought about demonic seasons. But you have entered into a new decade of divine opposites. The exact opposite to what you experienced in your previous decade shall take place in an abundance says the Lord! There's a rain coming that you've been praying for, rain on your industry, rain on your ministry, rain on your artistry, rain on every 'tree.' I am sending a rain and many are not prepared for it says the Lord. Many have not built the arks, the ark that will protect them, but many today have built the ark. The rain is coming says the Lord not for destructions, but for the removal of the hindrances that have been in your way says the Lord of Hosts. Raise up your hands to the Holy One of Israel. Let the prophet prophesy and breathe upon you the words of life that come, for you have gone through the season of war, pain, death. Now God says the divine opposite is about to be released upon you beginning in the month of March of this year it shall begin slowly, little drizzles and then God says by the summer it shall be an outburst that shall continue on for the next seven years. People will say 'what difference will there be, how will we know?' God says you will know. But I said I will rain upon you, not only r-a-i-n but also r-e-i-g-n. I am about to rain, the divine opposites are about to take place even politically. The spirit of assassination is against this President. I will prevent this says the Lord and I will raise up and honor my servants who have prayed. I am sending a rain and I will rain upon your business, your industry, your ministry, your artistry and every 'tree' that is ready for my rain says the Lord!  (Song: Let it rain, let it rain as I lift my hands to you, let it rain, Let it rain, let it rain as I lift my song to you, let it rain.) The Spirit of God says if you are one of those that are prepared for this abundance that is coming, do not harden your hearts to prophecy. Do not say 'I have heard before of God's acceleration.' Yes there were moments of it in your previous decade, but now God says there won't be moments, it will be a season of continual breakthrough, one after the other says the Lord!  Song: I'm ready for the rain to come. I'm ready for the rain to come. I'm ready for the rain to come. I'm ready for the rain to come.  The Spirit of the Lord wants to hear faith, He wants to hear life, He wants to hear Himself coming from His people.  Song: God will do it again, He can do it again Today may be the day that He will do it again We will not forget what you have done for us in a hardship in times of recession. We will not forget during our hard times how you kept us. And now as we enter into a season where there will be fruit things will begin to prosper, rains will come in their season and we forget you, we have needed you so much. Now we hear that you are about to change the seasons. The Spirit of the Lord says, when you go into that land, your enemies have been subdued, when the callous opponents have been stilled, will you remember Me? When heartache is no longer in the forefront of your prayers and great need and poverty is no longer the priority of your petitions, will you remember Me?  I've come to announce to you that a season has come to an end, a season of war, a season of anguish. Yes you will still suffer these things. Yes you will still have hardship that will never go away, but it will not be the forefront and the priority of your prayer life. There will not be a declaration of your needs but a declaration of His deeds. The Spirit of God says that heartache, destruction lays in the ruin, and it is no longer the building in which you would have to destroy. And when the time comes and prosperity is raining in your business, and ministry and industry and artistry and every 'tree' is flourishing: there is fruit on your tree, there is water in your well, will you remember Me? Will you remember Me? When your spring is welling up, when your garden flourishes, the smell of flowers, the fragrance comes to you, will you remember Me again? Would you raise holy hands and tell me 'I will never forget to love you and I will never ever forget the sacrifice and I will never forget the circle of love, I will remember.'

The Spirit of the Lord says let the prophet prophesy from Dallas Texas.  You see there have been ten years of sadness, grief, war, resistance, sorrow in this nation. The world turned against you except for a few lions. But now God said the demonic and the divine are about to change places for your season, your season of sorrow, of fear, of war is now ended. Now is the time for divine opposites.

The divine opposite is going to happen for this nation. For that which is lodged in the earth, in this country, in the soil is going to be released for the energy crisis to bring it to an end in this decade, so that America will be prosperous and debt free in 2010!
Rap: Your children will say:We're gonna go to the house of the Living God.
Whoever creates something owns it. When I create a song it has my nature in it. Did God create you? He owns you unless you disown Him.  Kim ministering at piano in song:

When all is said and done, when all is said and done, when the work is done, you are mine. When all is said and done when the work is done, you are mine. You are mine. Jesus tells me to tell you: I am praying for you, praying for you every day. I am praying for you, praying for you every day. And when all is said and done, when the work is done, you are mine. You are mine. I'm praying for you, I am praying for you. When all is said and done, when the work is done, you'll always be mine. You are mine. I am praying for you, praying for you, every single day I am praying for you, praying for you every single day. When all is said and done, when all the work is done, you remain mine, you are mine, and I am yours.
Song:

God is with us and greater than those who are against us! There are angels that are surrounding us in this building! Are you ready to take your promise? God's given us promises, it's yes and amen! Yes and amen!

I hear the sound of abundance. I hear the sound of refreshing. I hear the sound of an abundance, of restoration. Words have been given to you, promises have been made. They cannot return to me, says the Lord. They cannot return to me. Some of you in this place, some of you in this building have waited. The Spirit of the Lord is speaking. From this day onwards something will open up. Something will open up in the heavens. You have plowed, you have spoken, you have prayed, you have fasted. You have taken a hold of the altar of the Lord and you refused to look back. I have watched you, says the Lord. I have watched you from a distance. I have watched you from close. And I have listened to you. You sound like my servant David when he danced before the Lord with all of his might. I said you sound like David when he danced before the Lord with all his might. You sound like Daniel when he prayed in the lions' den. And God says, I'll do the same that I did for David. What I did for Daniel I'm going to do for you. My right hand is about to save you and raise you up to a higher place says the Lord! Rap: I'm gonna take you up and raise you to a higher place. I'm gonna take you up and raise you to a higher place, raise me to a higher place The Spirit of the Lord is speaking today. When the prophet hears an abundance it is a sound that is advancing towards you, therefore rejoice today. I have heard your prayers and I am advancing towards you swiftly with acceleration. Therefore rejoice!

Song:I found you when no one was searching for you. And I found you when nobody really cared. And I saw you waiting for me, says the Lord. I found you waiting for meAnd I saw you, everybody walked away from youI heard your cry and nobody would listenAnd you were waiting for me, and I was waiting for youAnd I found you, I dressed you and showed you to the worldIt's only because of my blood, because of my sonHe told me to look at you and I saw you were aloneAnd I raised you up to show you to the worldI raised you up to show you to the world Gods speaking about you, this house,you were standing in a place of lonelinessyou were a wretch waiting for my graceand I found you, you found meGod says, and I'm raising you up, raising you up to show the worldAnd I'm raising you up, raising you up to show the world He's raising me up, he's raising me up to show the world And in Europe tonight, there will be a light because I found youI opened up the veil to come in and meet me to look me in the eyesGod says, I want to show you my glory He's raising me up, He's raising me up to see His glory God says, there's a world that's crying out for My holy presenceAnd I have looked to the north, to the south, to the east, to the westFor someone who would prayAnd I found you hidden in the darkness so that I could bring the lightI'm gonna raise you up, raise you up to show the worldI'm gonna raise you up He's raising me up, He's raising you up to show the world I'm gonna take your children and place them in the streetsThey're going to show the light of Christ not outside the cityI'm gonna take you to the city and let them see the lightThey will say, surely the Lord has raised the city of lightWith the light of the world, the light of the world, Christ is His name He's gonna raise me up, raise me up to show the worldHe's gonna raise me up, raise me up to show the world The Spirit of the Lord says you will not be disappointed. I sent you a prophetic voice like I sent Elijah with a sound of abundance inside of him. The prophets of Baal who stood around him to defy the Lord Most High, they stood around him, they were the politicians of religion making rules to stop the sound of the word of the Lord. I will do something great for you, Pastor Pedro, and this house, I will do something amazing. I will bend the rules, I will break the law for you, says the Spirit of God! Where the legislators have said no, I will bend it. These are politicians of Baal. They shall stand one side as you sacrifice before the Lord Most High. I will bend the rule. I will cause one politician to make the change. I will break the law and give you access. I will give you a place in the marketplace at the right place. I will not allow my word to be held back, to be stopped. Who will stop the word of the Lord? Who will say no to the Most High God? Who is it? Let Me see him. For the Lord says they will change the law just for you!  They will do a strange thing. The city, those who are in control, shall say "why should we give a grant to them? The government has nothing to do with them." Who says so? I, the Lord Most High, will give you a grant of finance and you will go to that place, build the altar of the Lord, speak the word, prophesy to dead bones, raise the dead and pronounce the Kingdom of Almighty God has come into the city, says the Lord! I'm hearing so much! As Elijah stood, as Elijah stood and prophesied before the politicians of Baal, so I have sent you a prophet who would not stay outside the city, but be directly there at the place of the execution of the king. There will be a changing of the guards, a death of one, and a raising of another so that you can be favored. I will do this for you says the Lord!
In Song:

Strike your hands togetherStrike your hands togetherAs you strike your hands together you will strike your enemyAs you strike your hands together you will strike sickness'cause demons bow their knee when you strike your hands in gleeYes! In the midst of your shouts, in the midst of your shouts and the striking of your handsI the Lord am rejoicing with youWhen you shout, says the Lord, then I will shout with you!Can you hear him? Can you hear him?  There is a note, there is a note, a note that is being hit right nowIn the realm of the Spirit, the powers and the principalities that have stood for centuries in this place at the gateway of France,Has stood firm. God said today and tonight something is coming down. Prophetic Rap: The City of Paris at the gateway something is coming down, downIt stood for so long holding on but tonight Paris is coming downThey have stood and they have wondered 'what will happen with these people? Are they going to attempt to come into the city? We can allow them to come into the city. They will damage our counterparts, they will destroyIf they come into the city we will come down and meet them face to face. But what is this that we hear? There is a sound that we have not heard for centuries.It's the same sound that David had when he struck the keys.It's the same sound that David had when he stood before the giant with one stone, he struck him downTonight a principality will come down in this city, says the Lord! I saw Satan fall like lightning from heavenI saw Satan fall like lightning from heaven The Spirit of God says, the sound that the enemy has heard is the sound of unity. No longer is there a sound of two or six or ten or a hundred. Now there is a sound of one. It is the sound of the Lord's trumpet. You are that sound. The principality's coming down in this city tonight! I saw Satan fall like lightning from heaven! Prophetic Song:I brought you, I brought you from a lonely placeAnd I brought you and carried you to a higher placeAnd I will carry you, carry you to a higher placeAnd I will open up the scroll and I will open up the veilThat your enemy has feared, has feared, he's afraidWhen the veil is opened up, when the veil is opened upI will arise and bring you inAnd I will carry you to another place, man will cry and ask for the holy placeYou will take them there to the holy place, you will take them there to the holy placeAnd I will open up gates for you, says the LordAnd I will open up gates for you so that you can go in You will take them to a holy place, you will take them to my holy crossYou will take them to a holy place, you will show them I, the Lord, can healI'm taking your families, bringing them inAnd your children, they will prophesy!And I will take you to the holy placeIn this building now deliverance is taking place 'cause demons hear the sound, the sound of light! And I will take you to the holy place as you lift your hands to MeAnd I will raise you up, raise you from the dead, I will raise you upYou will walk with Me, and I will free you nowDemons hear the sound of lightBe free! Be free! Principalities, you have ruled for too long. This city shall be free! God says, there's a holy place, a place that I've prepared for youThere's a holy place I've prepared for you, just for youI speak to this house: and I will give to you the keys of this city.You will open doors and no man will ever shut. Because I have opened up the heavens unto you today! I have opened up the heavens unto you today!

The Spirit of God says what I am planning to do is somewhat of a surprise. I'm about to take two continents and cause a fusion to take place, between Asia and Europe, shall come a sound as has never been heard before. I will move from this house, this place shall be history. For there are two properties that shall be given to you, one by a grant by the government and people will say 'This is impossible, the French government has never done this before.' The Spirit of God says what has never been done before is about to be done. Hear the prophetic word today. What has never happened before is about to happen. What has never happened before is about to take place. You have entered 2010, a decade that will give you what you never had before. It shall be said about you 'this has never happened before ever!' Early this morning I had a vision, it was a dream, and I saw a mushroom, a building that looked like a mushroom. It was round on the top and this was yours that the Lord said will be given to you not outside the city but in the city. And they will say 'We apologize to you for the way you were treated.' For the Lord said it is now time for me to honor you. I have guillotined your previous enemy. He has no head. I have removed the head. I have removed the brain. I have removed the head in exchange for a sword that I will give to you. I want to hear my people celebrating today!
