This has never ever happened before! This has never ever happened before!It's a miracle, a supernatural miracle! It's a miracle, a supernatural miracle! The Spirit of the Lord told me to tell you, I want to do something that I've never done before. When Jehoshaphat overcame his enemies, he did something that he had never done before, he began to sing, he began to praise and his enemies were sent to flight. You have a power today to set your enemy at flight. The prophet has prophesied you are about to see something that has never happened before. Therefore He wants to hear the same rejoicing as Jehoshaphat did! You have called upon me, you have said give us what is necessary to be a relevant sound to take the streets. God said I have looked at your youth. They need to be released into the city. These are the warriors of the Lord! These are the warriors of the Lord! I will give you, I keep saying this because I hear it: God will bend the rules, break the law, to give you the key to the city. You cannot hide in catacombs and say we will yet pronounce the word. You will not hide in the cave afraid that the government will arrest you. I have said to you in the presence of the politicians of Baal and those in the synagogues of Satan who have made pronouncements against you, I will shut them up!
Death to Baal, death to Baal, death to the prophets of Baal!

The spirit of the Lord says, you have entered into a time of rest; you don't believe it, why? Because the Spirit of the Lord says that a spirit of divination has rested upon this nation for two years trying to suffocate the people of God. Trying to strangle you, and take away your energy and your breath.
The spirit of the Lord says that tonight a declaration shall be made; this season that you are entering into is a season of rest from all of your enemies.

Hear what the spirit of the Lord says; Satan has ruled too long. Hear America, hear, the redeemed of the Lord, I am removing the strangulation and taking you into a season of rest. There will be 3 deaths this year. The first one will be the death to debt, for I have opened the book. Do not despise the Prophet; do not despise the faith of the Prophet who stands before you. It has not happened yet, what I have spoken in Heaven is about to come to pass on earth; taking place between those on earth and those that are in heaven.

Two clocks, there have been two clocks, so there have been two times, but there is only one time and that is the timing of the Lord. He says, you are at the right place at the right time for the right reason and for the right season. Because you have made it, I am going to revive you and raise you up. Raise you up in a place where you will be free of strangulation.

You have come to hear the word of the Lord. You have not come to hear a man. I am going to neutralize the spirit of suffocation. I am going to bring death to a spirit of divination that has come against My people. I am bringing death to the spirit of religion. Listen to Me; you say, "It will never end." It will. I am sick of the sacrifices that have come from the places of religion that mean nothing and in their hearts they despise each other.

The Lord said I am bringing a stop to that and death to division. I am going to bring a unity among the brothers and the sisters. I am going to bring unity among the apostles and the prophets. I will bring a unity in the house with men and women. I am bringing unity back into My house. I will not be defied, but I will build My house and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.

I was praying this afternoon and God said, you walk out on that platform, no matter what people might think and tell them that they are entering into a time of rest. There is a day that I promised; the children of Israel did not get to that day of rest.

Therefore, the Lord says, is it possible, that you have come to a place where you are the chosen? You have struck the power of disbelief and unbelief down, to enter this time of rest, from your own works. But even as God rested from His own works, so shall you rest from your own works. Yes, you have worked, yes you have labored and you have tithed. Yes you are worn out but you have come to a point where you will no longer receive the Kingdom, rather you will possess the Kingdom. It is time for you to possess the Kingdom, says the Lord.

Don't be discouraged; I have got some good news for you today. God says, you are no longer going to receive, you have been receiving and receiving and now you are going to possess what you have been receiving. Take possession of your promise tonight, says the Lord.

There is a war going on, there is going to be a breakthrough. In the dungeons of hell, there have been conversations, by demonic strongholds and principalities. I have allowed My prophet to hear the conversations of demonic strongholds, planning against His people, planning against His chosen. They are afraid; they are frustrated by the words that were written by John on the island of Patmos. These are those words, What God has opened, no one can shut.

Therefore, there is this frustration in the kingdom of darkness. They keep saying over and over; "do the people really believe that what is about to take place is the greatest, most powerful move of the spirit in the history of mankind, ever!!"

They have said, "What shall we do? What shall we do, how can we cause them to walk away and not heed this? Why would they believe that God is about to do His greatest work, open doors that have been shut for years? Why would they believe that what God did for David, what God did for Daniel, what God did for Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego; He would do again and even greater. Why would they believe that the Lord God of Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, would possibly come to them and give them even greater prosperity than they had in the day of Abraham and Jacob. Why would they believe it?"

And He says to you, has many adversaries, but God says this time the adversaries have been removed. It will be two years by the year 2012 there will be not an inclination of debt, every building will be paid off, every property and God says an international door has been opened in the Middle East, India, Asia, Africa specifically Morocco, Cuba and God says doors will be flying open waiting for someone to take possession of them. I want to bless the body; I want to bless you financially.

Therefore, the door that I have opened up is the biggest door that has ever been opened in the history of mankind for the church. I know you have kept My word, but you have little strength, but you have not denied My name. So, I will make those that are of the Synagogue of Satan, who claim to be the chosen of God; though they are not, they are liars, I will make them come and fall down at your feet and say they know that I have loved and favored you.
Therefore, I am pronouncing to this people and to the kingdom of darkness, God says, the greatest favor ever has come and I am releasing it tonight.

God said, this is a day that you must remember. The death that has happened as with the Ark of the Covenant that has fallen. It fell off the cart that was built for it. Now it rests on the Priests of the Most High God. Because of this, there will be a Kingdom breakthrough that shall be global. I will take churches like this (Without Walls) that seem to have disturbance and frustrations. I will turn everything around today. Do not say it cannot be done, because in one day I can change everything.

I can take everything and turn it around, in one day. Listen as you gather around the prophetic voice. What are you looking for; I bring from Heaven a word. My servant Oral Roberts has been received. It was spoken years ago by this Prophet and when he dies and soon after Billy Graham. There shall be a piercing of two veils that will bring about the next great move of the Spirit. Evangelism has never felt or tasted, since time began. There will be miraculous things taking place and will cause people to say, "This has never, ever happened before." I will do it in one day. The opposing Jezebel's Spirit of witchcraft has been annihilated, it has been disposed of. Why? Because you have fought, endured and you have made it to this point. They have said in the year 2012 when the world shall come to an end; there will be those who will enter in. To a whole new level of understanding of the Kingdom and from that point on I will take you into the decade debt free. I will cause you to touch kings and to touch queens and to touch royalty and to touch paupers. I will open prison doors. I will set the captives free like you have never seen. I will cause presidents to make declarations that Jesus is Lord and this nation shall tremble under the power of this revival.

I see Daniel's, Ruth's, Moses', Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego's. The Lord says, I am going to place those anointings on this generation. A double portion of everything that they had. There are those in this building that have that portion and are going to prophesy like Isaiah, like Amos, Hosea. You are going to see it happening right before your very eyes.

The Spirit of the Lord says I have been searching throughout 2008 and 2009. I've been searching, waiting to hear a sound that would draw Me, waiting to hear a people that would release victory. I have heard begging, I have heard complaining. But the Spirit of God said I told the prophet, wherever I send you in the first month of 2010 is where I will pour out my Spirit in an extravagant way, says the Lord. I told my prophet, I told him, if you put your feet in these few places I will remove the scourge, I will remove the things that have held them in captivity. I found a place in Indiana. The Spirit of God said, you drew Me; you did not run from Me, you drew Me. Therefore it shall come to pass that I will remove the power of debt says the Lord! Listen to Me. The Spirit of God says this year will be the beginning of death. The Ark of the Covenant has fallen because the oxen have stumbled. There has been a death of religion; there has been a death of dictation. There has been a death says the Spirit of God and now I speak to you on the death of debt.

And they say, "What about Obama and what about America?" God said, so what! It shall be My people that shall rise up and they shall rise to the occasion and they shall dictate the financial well being of this nation says the Lord!

It is My will; the Spirit of God says, you've heard how from Thanksgiving things would turn around. Now God said you've entered into a new decade. You've entered into a zone that you've never ever entered into before. I will clear the religious houses and fill them with youth, youth that will sing, youth that will paint, youth that will dance. God said, do you realize that some people are saying "why would this happen, why would this be spoken about, do you really believe that He could do such a thing at this day and age? How could God possibly say that He's going to do what He did like He did in the day of Daniel, Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, Moses and Ruth, and Mary, how could He do the same thing?" You know why? Because that's what God said!

We defy the prognosticators, we defy the prognosticators! We defy them who have a prognosis and speak as if they were the oracle of the Lord. God said they will be defied. The governing powers will scratch their heads by the middle of this year and say, "what we thought was going to happen has not happened."
"This President is losing his mind," they will say, but what will happen it is because of a deep, deep-rooted experience that he will have with the Holy Spirit of God.

For God said I will not bring shame to the African American race, and I will raise up a woman as the President who shall come of the African race as well. That's right. God said I will prove to you that I will take that which looks foolish and turn it around and confound the wise, says the Lord.

For even as the earth shook in Haiti and some have cursed and they have said "this is the judgment of God." God said be careful what you say, for you see I diverted the earthquake, for it was due to happen in this nation. The Davids of the hour and Daniels who fasted for 21 days prayed and prayed and My hand was stayed. And God said many would say "Why would this happen, why did He not even remove it?" God said it was to happen and therefore I removed and took the course another way. It is not something that they will understand.

But the Spirit of God said there shall be a shaking like you've never seen before in this nation but it shall not be one like unto that. For there shall not be deaths, but it will shake the political powers. It will shake the laws that have been made. There will be a shaking this year, a fiscal shaking, and the Spirit of God said your finances will suddenly have a shaking as well.

For the discovery of a new source of energy shall emerge in 2010 says the Spirit of God. There shall be an emerging of the new source of energy and this nation shall be the ones that will propagate this. And they look at the beast of the east and they will look at the Middle East and say, "ha!" What about you now! We do not need you. We do not need the raven to feed the eagle. We do not need the raven to feed the eagle. We do not need the ravens to feed the eagle, that's what you shall say, says the Lord!

For those that want to invest, hear these words, for when it does come they shall say, "It is not going to be of anything." Fire Pointe, Fire Pointe - remember it, when it comes of those words it will be something that will accelerate the ability and a technology for us to minister throughout the earth within seconds and get into homes without the need of television. I've seen it; I know it sounds completely crazy. But I've seen it, and information, Daniel say, men's knowledge shall increase, men shall go to and fro across the face of the earth, and knowledge will increase and that's exactly what's happened, within minutes, in seconds we could transfer one file across the earth. Knowledge is going across the earth. God says this is just the beginning. For My prophetic word shall go throughout the earth.

Jesus is going to walk the streets of New York. God has not forgotten you. Listen to what the Spirit of the Lord says. I'm going to take New York; I'm going to raise them up. I'm going to do something greater than they've ever had before. They're going to say, "Let's go to the Apple so that we can get the truth." God says, they'll say that about you, something's happened to New York. I sent the rain, I sent the wind and they didn't listen to Me. Then the fire came and they still didn't listen to Me says the Spirit of the Living God. What I'm about to do isn't a destruction of fire. Neither will I send the wind or rain again. There will be a combination of the three, Fire, Rain and Wind.

I can hear the Lord saying, the power of division that has stood so long and divided the church and the people, this division has come from Diablo. The spirit that speaks to divide, your enemy, he speaks to divide. The Spirit of the Lord says, the spirit of suffocation has come upon the Nation, but I'm removing the spirit of python, I'm removing the spirit of divination. I'm taking away the suffocation; God says I'm going to breathe on you.

It shall be the young people that shall come forth out of the dungeons and they shall be the prophets of this hour. Your children and your children's children they shall prophesy. They will find any instrument that they can and they will bring down the powers of hell as they lay their hands upon it says the Spirit of the Lord.

Something is being unveiled. Something is being broken not only in New York but this Nation and all over the world. 2010 has come and God has said enough is enough. And I will give you a double portion of that which the enemy has stolen. I will repay back to you with a double portion. I release that right now in the name of Jesus.

My very own people I bought you with a price. Listen to Him. They have said about you, America and New York never again will you ever experience what they experienced prior to the Azusa Street revival. God says, I'm bringing it back but I'm not going to bring something that has already been in existence but I'm going to take something that was supposed to happen in the Northeast of this Nation but it did not happen because of the disobedience of men and I'm going to make it happen. A move of the Spirit that was supposed to happen from 1795 to 1845. There was greatness but it did not happen as men stood in the way. Now the promise that must be received shall be received by a people of a vast different understanding therefore the portion shall be far, far, greater than what it was supposed to be but it was kept for such a time as this. A move of the Spirit that shall take place that shall far, far, supersede the Azusa Street Revival, the '48 Revival, the Charismatic Revival and all the various moves of the Spirit shall all come together in one and it shall come upon this Nation, New York specifically.

You see, the spirit of Jezebel has stood in the streets of New York, where in Long Island they've been waiting for the sound of darkness. But God has some light for Long Island; He has some light for New York. There's going to come a sound from the heavens and break the power of witchcraft!

God says, watch and see the salvation of the Lord. New York is going to shout again the power of His name in the streets and the back street alleys. They'll say, "What's happened to New York?" They'll say, "What's happened to new York?" New York will answer with: Jesus! Jesus! Jesus!

God said I've waited until the year 2010 to tell you that something so unusual is going to happen. This is not a day for the church to be filled. God said, this is a day for the church to be sent forth. The power of witchcraft that has had a strong grip on New York and the Northeast is coming down, down, down! It's coming down, down, down!

On the soil of this city that was raging with fire, the same city that was raging with pain, anguish, as they penetrated your soil, as they penetrated your houses and your homes. This same very city that was attacked, pierced, has now risen to another level.

The year 2010 is upon you and from your very soil shall emerge the weapons that shall be used to destroy the weapons of mass destruction, weapons that have been invented and nobody even knows about and your President has been clueless until this point. God said from this city shall emerge a weapon, it shall not be a weapon that men shall be able to control for this weapon that I speak about, says the Spirit of the Lord, is the weapon of the Word of the Living God, says the Lord. Some say that we already have the word. God said I have spent all these years sharpening the sword, the two-edged sword that shall pierce your enemies. There shall be a culmination of a sound that shall emerge. Young men from the Middle East and young women from the West and all the continents shall suddenly search after the Lord.

But from the soil of New York there shall come forth a revelation that shall reach into your President's ears and into his heart, and he will rise to the occasion towards the middle of this year. A great revelation shall come upon him as it came upon the Apostle, Saul of Tarsus. Suddenly there shall be a light that will blind him to anything that anybody suggests and that light shall reveal to him the one and only source and the power and the energy of this nation. And they shall say, "it is no longer the White House, it is the Christ House!" They shall say, "What has happened?" God says hear the prophet as he prophesies on the soil of this territory.

Unashamed, unafraid, with great passion this nation is about to go to another level and nations of all the continents shall look and say, "will it never end, will they never stop loving this Christ?" The Spirit of God said there shall come a very unusual summer air. A wind shall blow in the Midwest; the wind shall blow into the Northeast. They shall say, "This is unusual wind blowing." This weekend, says the Spirit of God, as I give you a sign, a prophetic sign, even in the weather and they shall say, "What is it that we are facing?" It is who will destroy the notion of politicians of Baal suggesting the global distractions of warming.

And I will send a sign to this city and to this nation in this place. The Spirit of God said men shall say, "Already the Lord has sent us a sign, the destruction of the city of light as a plane flew over."

I will unite the Dutch and Europeans that have rejected the people of this nation. God said I will connect them together and there will be a pact made, a pact between Europe and the United States of America regarding terrorism. And as piracy was out-ruled so shall the terrorism of this day be out-ruled because of the word of the Lord that has come to you tonight says the Lord.

For the Spirit of God says the desire of the wicked one has been to watch this nation to bring it to nothing. He has looked upon my house and upon my people and he has said 'I will divide them and I will take the spoil from the saints of the Most High God.' Your enemy has watched you and said 'There is no way that they will ever get to the higher place.' He has looked upon the families of the saints of the Most High God and the elect of the Lord and said 'I will take your children, I will capture your teenagers, I will remove the light from their eyes. I will remove the light from their hearts and I will take them away from you.'  The Spirit of God says, I have spoken one word and that one word has destroyed the plans and the efforts of the enemy of your soul. God says as you take a step into the new year it is not a new year, it is a new dimension, it is not a new year, it's a new realm says the Lord. It's not a new way. God said it's a whole brand new lifestyle. I'm going to take you to a higher place and your children will say 'I want to go the house of the Living God!' Your children shall be the ones that will raise the dead. Your children will take the spoil that the enemy took from you. For God says your enemy has said 'I will raise them up and I will pull them down. They will never make anything. I will take them out of the marketplace and they will be the Daniels of this day.'

God said I've got a Daniel waiting in the back street. I've got a David waiting in the back street. I've got a Peter waiting in the back street. I've got a Daniel waiting in the back street. I've got a Samuel waiting in the back street. I've got an Esther waiting in the back street. I've got a Mary waiting in the back street. I've got a David waiting in the back street. I've got a Daniel waiting in the back street.  The Spirit of God said, did you hear what I said? I've got a Daniel waiting in the back street.  When the enemy raises up someone like Nebuchadnezzar I've got a Daniel waiting in the back street. The Spirit of God says when the enemy comes to get your children, he takes them and puts them away, I've got a Samuel waiting in the back street to raise a David up. When the enemy comes to break you down to take your joy I've got a David waiting in the back street.  God is saying I'm going to raise up Daniels from your house. I'm going to raise up Davids from your house. I'm going to raise up Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego from your house. Listen to the prophet of the Lord. Listen to the words of God for He says, the fear that you had shall be removed from you for the Lord says in 2010 it will be the year of the death of debt! God says there will be a death in 2010, the death of debt!  The Spirit of God says let me hear my people worshiping me, let me hear my people shouting the victory! Don't stop! Shout as loud as you can! God said I want you to shout, I want you to take your shout into the next decade, I want you to take your praise into the next decade. I want you to take your shout and your victory, let your enemy hear your shout! Why do you think something's not gonna work out? Do you realize that I am the Lord and I will raise you up? Do you realize your enemy is under your feet? Why do I think that they will win this war? 'Cause that's what God said, that's what God said, that's what God said! How do you know that you will raise the dead? Your enemy is standing right next to the Word of the Living Lord saying 'How do you know your children will raise the dead? How do you know that your children will heal the sick?' Because that's what God says! Now I hear the words of the enemy saying 'how do they know that the light of the world will come to them?' Your enemy is says 'I've been watching them and trying to bring them down, taking away their money, all their cars, their life, and their land. So how can they rejoice over words from above? How can they know that something good is going to happen in the year that I have said that nothing good will happen, because 2010 is not a time for them to win. How will they know that it is time for God to rise for them? How will they know?'
'Cause that's what God said, that's what God said, that's what God said!

The Spirit of the Lord says there will be a mantle, for you see it was spoken that the words of life will come, that when Oral Roberts dies the heavens will be pierced, for when that general dies and now he is with me, says the Lord. I will cast upon you a portion that the church has never seen or felt before. God said when this general died I made a promise that in 2010 that shall be the decade for men to come out of the den, for men to come out of the caves like David came out.  For I am casting a mantle upon my people that they will take the portion that is rightfully theirs, the kingdom of the Lord, that they will cast down the spirit of this age and the principalities that have tormented you shall no longer have a say for you shall torment them says the Lord! God has something incredible for us. He's going to give you land and property. He's going to open up doors that no man has ever been able to open. This is the decade of death to debt says the Spirit of God. For many of you will come out to the middle of this next year free of debt says the Lord. How shall I do this? How? Who am I, says the Lord? I am the one that created you. I created the earth, I created the stars. I created the earth and the fullness thereof. I created the gold and the silver. God said I will show you a sign that I will take my people, the elect of the Lord, and I shall wipe their debt says the Lord and I shall do a miracle for this nation! How can they know that I'm gonna not take away the silver and the gold? Satan says 'what have they been told that I don't know about?' There is a mystery that's been unveiled says the Spirit of the Lord and my people will see the secret of the Lord, and they wont' walk, they will run for sure! How will they know, how will they know? The Spirit of the Lord says I want you to listen to me. You have gathered together tonight for the purpose of entering in beyond the veil of limitation. You have entered into this building and many of you watching throughout the earth so hear this. I speak to all men. There shall be a strange invasion of the Christos, the Christ, into every Muslim territory. Islamic women and young Islamic men and girls shall begin to defy the beast of the East. They will unite together says the Lord. America, you have been chosen to take a sound and unite it with the Middle East and this sound shall be the most unusual sound. The Spirit of God said the sound will be the most unusual sound, a culmination of the music of the West and the Middle East. I will take men who can compose and they will write music. And young men shall sing the same song that has been dictated by the Spirit of God.

There is a divine invasion into the place called market, once controlled by the lords and witches of the dark castles and palaces. These are uninhabited and they have been emptied for you possession. We need to withstand this control of the marketplace.  God said from 2010 there shall be not only an aggressive but an accelerated invasion of the marketplace in every kingdom that stands. Christ disguised in you shall be revealed. He has been disguised.  This is what the Spirit said that I must tell you: The disguised Christ in you is about to be revealed. There's something inside of you that has not yet been revealed and in 2010, the minute you take a step in beyond the veil, God said that which has been hidden inside of you, that which has been disguised, that which has not been seen, that which has been invisible shall suddenly become visible will suddenly come to light.

The Spirit of the Lord says hear the prophet tonight; Words that have come forth in the past five years are about to be fulfilled. Yes I will take the households of America, the households of My Redeemed, the households of the Elect, and I will bring to them a baptism. Not one shall be left out and your children, your brothers, your families, you shall declare "As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord!"

I hear the Spirit of the Lord telling me to tell you; Some of you have looked behind you and said "I hope we don't have a repeat of history." The Spirit of God said I must warn you history might repeat itself but it will not be because it was in the plan. I have intended to make history for you and cause you to be a part of my history - after all it is HIS story. God said you shall stand as giants in the land. For they say "what about the big shaking?" The Spirit of God said I have spared you, for the shaking that you will see shall be every kingdom that can be shaken will be shaken. Every house that can be broken down will be broken down. But God said as for you and your house, the Lord says, I will cause their hearts to be open so that they will hear the voice of the Lord and they will heed it, says the Lord. And a fresh baptism shall come upon your house says the Lord of Hosts.

God says once again and I tell you this because of what I've said before. This is the time that was spoken of by the prophet a few years ago. Where this that they call the Jesus Movement, there will be a culmination of Azusa Street revival, Jesus Movement, and it shall be born in California. Once again California shall lead the nation and lead the world as it takes the kingdom by force, says the Lord!  God said what's about to emerge in 2010 shall cause California to come out of its financial doldrums and people from all over the earth shall come to California as they went to Brownsville, as the went to all these other places, but God said this time the fire will not stop burning. This time the fire will not stop burning says the Lord. This time I will take multiple men and women, youth, young people, I will raise them up and they will go into the highways and the byways. God says they will go into the kingdoms of the earth and they will shake it says the Lord.

There is a man who is filled with my Spirit. This man is in Anaheim who will come and invent something that shall give men access to the knowledge of God but in such a mysterious and unique ways that even the ungodly will be researching and searching and they will be filled with knowledge. And they shall come as the Saul of Tarsus came. God says they will come in because of the invention of this unusual key. It looks like a star but it's missing one point. Please keep your eyes open for this. "Kim, why are you telling us this?" Because I'm seeing it, my spirit has connected with the future. Why? Because this move of the Spirit that shall transpire out of California, Southern California, this that shall come out and emerge shall come out in such unusual fashion. Men shall buy it to listen to. They will sing it. They will speak it. But they will be speaking the Word and God say my knowledge shall spread through California to begin with, like the fires that you've experienced, the unusual fires. So God said the knowledge of the Lord shall fill the hearts and lives of men and this move shall not only reach the church but it shall go to every kingdom that exists and every area, the media. And God says people will say "We no longer need to do it in a fashion that puts people off. This is a brand new innovative way of reaching the unreachable and touching the untouchable." God said I'll raise up the prophetic voice and it will bring inventions and people shall prosper because of it says the Lord!

The Spirit of the Lord says there has been a boundary line. The enemy has said 'I will not allow you to come any further. You will not take possession.' But Jesus spoke these words 'Occupy until I come.' There is a territory that has not been taken by any generation. There is a force that has not been brought down by any generation that will be dealt with, says the Lord with this generation and in this time. There is a line that he has drawn, your enemy, and said 'you will go no further.' The church - did I not tell you that I am building my church and the gates of hell will not prevail against it. Tonight I will break that boundary line. I will break that boundary line, says the Lord and give you access! Come to us tonight, Spirit of God. Give us the fire that it will take. Who shall survive the everlasting fires? Who shall survive the burnings and the fires? For the Spirit of God said those who shake their head and say no to a bribe, those who block their ears to the stories of bloodshed, those who close their eyes to evil, those who walk before the Lord with fear. These are emerging says the Lord, therefore, you will survive the fires, for there shall be fires that shall burn, and God said it shall be a sign. For surely there is a baptism coming to my people, a baptism of fire. Some will survive, some will not, but those who survive will revive and set fires and set ablaze and I will give you access says the Lord to territories that the world is waiting to access, but you will get it before the world gets it, says the Lord.

God says, as you pray tonight, as you gather together making one sound with one voice I will open up the heavens. And when the enemy's tried to close the doors I'm going to open them again. God says, you're gonna pray, you're gonna pray, you're gonna pray with the prophet tonight. As you pray says the Lord I have opened up the heaven to you.

God said when they light the tree, when the trees are lit and they say there's Christmas, and they say this is a time of celebrating the Son of God, they are trying to take away the name of the Son of the living God. They are trying to take away the power of the name of Jesus. But God said just you watch me now as I make the change tonight.

The Holy Spirit speaks these words: Seattle, I have not withheld from you. You have survived in a big way. I've told you how the heavenlies are going to be dictated by those that are the saints of the Most High God.  Four horns that suddenly got to be swiftly entangled, four horns, four attacks: north, south east west - they have come against my church. But the Spirit of God says I have raised up four carpenters; I have raised up four craftsman that will deal with these horns, even the horns of the altar, where they have brought displeasure to the Lord. I will raise up craftsman that will go in and fix it up. God said the problem has come first. The horns speak of principalities that have risen against this nation. They have come and now they are devouring one another. Now I have raised up four, and that speaks not of four specific - but from the north and the south and the east and the west I have raised up one craftsman for each to deal with it, to take them out. Four anointings that deal with the four principalities shall be placed upon your children. Young men, the apostles and the prophets of tomorrow shall deal with the four principalities. God said, over the Christmas season I will send a sign to you. There will be a sign in the heavens; there will be a sign that shall come to the earth. I will show myself in a very strong way, yet invisible to the eye, and yet tangible to others, and these four principalities that have brought curses to the families of the United States, to the governing powers of the United States, to churches in this land and to the economy, the Spirit of God said these four are now being dealt with and annihilated says the Lord by the four anointings that I'm releasing upon you tonight says the Lord!

The word I get is 'severing' - He is severing the stronghold of the curses that have come by invitation, by forces in the political powers in the political arena, they have invited them. And who shall control this nation? Who shall control my children in this nation? Shall it be the powers that be in the political field? No. For God said my church is the ruling power and I speak not of the system, I speak not of the religious system. The Spirit of God said I speak of my church, the Spirit filled redeemed, the blood washed. You have a blood mark on you, says the Lord. I purchased you with a price. You are my destiny says the Lord!

Who is going to control my children? Who is it that will control what's gonna happen for the youth? Who is it? Though they legislate God said I will break it down. In 2010 there will be a change in the middle of the year, an assassination attempt against your President which I will cause to hold back three groups that shall rise up. But the Spirit of God said I will be merciful. Then there will be changes in the man's heart, huge changes. There will be a turn to the true Christ, not the false Christ, not the false Christ, the true Christ! Liberals will say 'We are in danger; we are in danger of such a change. Even his countenance has changed, even his eyes have changed.' God said who do you think that I am? I am the one who can take kings and turn them around by the scruff of their neck. I have the hook that I placed in many kings' mouths and caused them to go into insanity because of their disobedience.  It shall not be so for this nation I created and brought into existence for my purpose and for my destiny says the Spirit of God. The Spirit of God said I am listening to the rejoicing of my people for this nation has come to a place of intolerance of Christ because of the system that has misrepresented him. That system is being crippled says the Lord, annihilated. Every kingdom that can be shaken will be shaken.

God said the corruption that you have felt, the fear that you have had because of the predictions of a long year of recession, have I not laughed at that and showed you that could not happen. When this prophet prophesied that Ford Motor Company would not go down, it would be a sign to America that I will salvage its heritage. And I will take cars from this nation and I will send them throughout the earth and you will be known as America the great again. And God said, this that has brought fear to your lives, God said I will change it over the season. How? It will begin to change over the season. And the Lord says as you enter into 2010 I will restore everything that the canker worm has taken away, everything that the grasshopper has stolen from you, God said this restoration shall manifest quicker than before. Therefore rejoice tonight, you are my portion, says the Lord!
This nation will not remain under the power of the prince of Persia. God is releasing the new source of energy and it shall come, it shall appear, it shall manifest in 2010, says the Spirit of God!

The Spirit of God says do not think this strange that this presence has come amongst my people for this shall be a regular attendance. All over the United States of America angels have been beckoned, angels have been beckoned by the warriors that have prayed and praised and the people that have sacrificed. The soil is prepared. You have plowed and the hard soil is finally broken open. God says the angel of the Lord shall come to this nation and visit the churches, visit my church. Do not think it strange tonight that this prophet has spoken it. Now God says in the midst of you angels are warring over you.

(In Song) On Christmas day I will show myself strong. Look to the sky, look to the sky, there is a sign. America watch, the angel of light who visited before will come in the night. The angel of light will come in your night bring you the star. God says, the angel of light will come in your night and bring you the light.

God told me that this Christmas something very special is going to open up. It doesn't matter which day Jesus was born. There is an actual birthday and there's an official one. The Queen of England, her actual birthday is in August; her official birthday is in April. It's doesn't matter. Christ was born! The Spirit of the Lord told me to release what he is going to release in 2010, on Christmas day the angel of light is going to bring something for us from the heavens above!

That which was unlawful to utter ten years ago is lawful to utter today. That which was unlawful to speak about or to show and could not be spoken in clear language now has been released to the people of God. The earth and the soil, the resources that we have waited for are suddenly going to appear. Science is being accelerated for the purpose of our goodness and our health. So what about our government? My government is the government of God. He has already told us what is going to happen in the middle of 2010. I tell you people, we are on a road to speedy recovery.

I'm hearing these words that are coming out of this place that has opened up and I cannot say them. We are retarded in our speech and we are unqualified because we have become repetitious and now God is saying a brand new language is being given to his people. A brand new language is going to be given so that they will have tongues of fire and they will speak a language that is relevant to this generation. A relevancy is coming by the tongues of the preachers, on the tongues of the people, the witness of God.

The Spirit of the Lord says everything that you have hoped for, everything that the prognosticators have told you would not happen - there's been a change of guard, not of this guard, but a change of guard. For the Lord said the watchmen on the wall that have attempted to make decrees to the cities in America, there is one city that I have kept my seal upon and it is changing rapidly, progressing. It is the city of Los Angeles says the Lord! The Spirit of God says do not think for one minute, just for one minute that I don't choose certain regions. They have dumped at you California; they have mocked you. They have said 'they will go to the dogs.' But the Spirit of God said there is a barrenness that has transpired and taken place within California, specifically Los Angeles, but the barrenness is only going to bring about a birth, a spiritual birth, in another region, says the Lord. The Spirit of God says, is there a sound of triumph in the voice of my people?

The Spirit of God said what I'm putting on you is audacity. You have the audacity and the capacity to do the impossible, to prove your enemies wrong. Let the prophet speak. For the Spirit of God says people are saying bad things about you, California. The Lord says at the end of this year there will be a sound, a triumphant sound that shall come from the soil of California that will change everything overnight says the Lord. Do not say it's impossible. The economy will recover quickly. The spirit of resilience has been upon California. Doors that are closed are suddenly going to open again and God said there will be no foreclosures on my people anymore, says the Spirit of God!

I heard a sound. I heard a sound that was different, unlike any other sound just for a second. Did you hear it? I heard that sound just for a second, like hearing a bunch of children then hearing some other voice. This is unlike any other sound I have ever heard. The earth is crying out for the manifestation of the sons and daughters of God. I couldn't see it but it was just for that second I heard something. It was almost like this sound will be, this sound will be embraced or taken or grasped by a few. They will put it into writing. They will put it into designs, in science, into art, movies, music and the world will clamor for it and say, 'We have never attained this, we have not, where did you get it?' The things of the kingdom shall become apparent to the world and the foolishness of this world that has confounded the wise will astound the wise. And God says they will be brought in because as there was a sound on the Day of Pentecost, when they were gathered together and that sound filled the room and changed their linguistic, changed their languages, changed the sounds and the tones of their voice, and fire appeared, so what is about to be born, says the Lord, is as nothing the earth has ever had, aside from the Christ, of course. This I heard.

The Spirit of God says I am building a stairway. Jacob saw that stairway and called it a ladder. There is a stairway that I am building and have almost completed, for they have said it is impossible to get to the one place that the Apostle Paul was taken to. God said the scrolls are being opened up, the keys are being given to unlock, and those that have said Christ He comes soon, yes He does, but occupation, the occupation of one grand territory that has not yet been taken has been given to the hands of my people and in California I shall release this, says the Spirit of God.

God says on Christmas day something unusual is going to happen.  They'll see my glorious one.  They'll open up their eyes.  Your children will stand upright, no longer fight for the right on Christmas day. Christmas day, hear the prophetic word of the Lord.  Somebody wrote to me and said you know I heard you say to somebody in a prophecy that this Christmas is going to be one of the greatest.  I believe it so tonight to those who are watching us all over the world, we're not speaking about a pagan holiday, we are talking about the celebration of a holy child, the King of Israel. The wind of the spirit shall blow on this nation and all over the world on Christmas day.

The Spirit of God says hear the prophet tonight. What is about to be revealed in the earth is so much greater than what your forefathers ever experienced.  There will be encounters; there will be experiences that have never been encountered before.  Do not despise prophesying and say "we've heard this before."  Yes there were those that heard it and their ears were deafened, but there were those that did not only listen but they heard, and faith was imparted upon them, and the result was they were able to carry it and you know what they did?  They began to live and the spirit of Caleb came upon them, and young men, who became old men, became older then and they took the mountains. God said tonight I want to speak to you about taking my mountain, for there is a mountain that I want to give to you, says the Lord.  It is the highest mountain there is; it is the highest place that you have ever been to; and I am about to bring it to the nation, says the Lord.  Do not say it is impossible for I've shown you before that it is possible for you to reach that place. Therefore, get ready, for what is about to be encountered and experienced is greater than your forefathers have ever experienced before.  A manifestation of God which will take your children and your youth and cause them to run, run! They shall have feet like hinds feet.  They will run through a troop and leap over a wall.  I said they'll run through a troop and leap over a wall.  With their God they will do it, says the Lord!

We read the other day: Ford is out of the black.  Ford made $1 billion profit!   And the word of the Lord that he gave to me years ago, before anybody fell, before anybody was bailed out, He said this is an icon in America.  I will never allow it - in fact the other day the Lord said to me:

The Spirit of the Lord says there is a new sound that shall arise from this generation.  The sound of praise like it has never been heard before.  The Tabernacle of David is being restored.  The sounds that David brought in Christ are about to visit the earth, a sound that will bring not a visitation but a habitation of God.  A sound that will cause your enemies to flee and to scatter.  The sound of praise that is about to arise from My people shall cause the enemies that have overwhelmed you to flee and to scatter a thousand ways.  Are you ready says the Lord to do as David did?  In the presence of his enemies he praised and worshiped.  In the presence of his enemies I made a table and set a table before him.  God says in the presence of your enemies I'm going to set a table with the finest delicacies in the presence of your enemies.  Get ready for your rejoicing is going to be turned into a greater dimension of praise.  Your mourning will be turned to dancing says the Lord of Hosts.

"For there has been a scheme and a plan says the Lord, against the President of this nation, to suffocate him.  God says, The enemy has planned in 2010 to bring shame to the first African President. So that they will say, 'Never again shall an African American be the President of the United States.' This will not happen says the Lord.  This will not happen.  This will not happen. There shall come a change in the early part of 2010 and they shall say, 'Look things are not quite as bad as what it seemed,' for those who have murmured and those who have spoken, those who have spread words out to bring shame to this race.  God says, It has been my desire to raise up a man that would honor me. And they say 'But the policies, what about the policies?' God says, I told you I will change everything in the mid term of this President. However, the enemy has planned an assassination to suffocate his voice.  This will not be completed says the Lord.

This will not be successful. This will not be the desire of the people says the Lord. There are three groups that have planned this, and the prophet has heard these words.  For the one who prophesied this President into existence will not regret the words that God placed into his mouth."

"Three groups are putting this together to bring shame to the USA in 2010, but it shall be, says the Lord, that I will take my angels and I will cause them to hear the prayers of Daniel, Daniel of old, and the prayers of Daniel shall be placed into this time and into this moment.  For they shall say, 'What is happening with the prince of Persia?  Why is it that there is a battle going on?'  God said the spirit of Daniel is praying that this will not take place. I will bring freedom to Persia. I will bring freedom to Persia. I will bring freedom to the Middle East but there will not be a peace treaty.  However, the salvation of the Lord shall begin to take place in the Middle East as never before.
God says, Your President shall have a great conversion in 2010 which will bring about changes to this nation and because I have spoken.

"Your prayers and your praise shall bring about a change in the atmosphere; your praise and your shouts bring about a change, for you don't understand the significance of these sounds. I'm not listening to the journalists or the prognosticators. I'm not listening to CBS or NBC or ABC or FOX. God says, I'm not listening!  I'm listening for one sound and one sound only. The prophetic sound that comes from My people as they shout out the victory; for there is a victory that is coming that is greater than ever.  A spiritual renewal in 2010 will break the cycle.  I will break the cycle.  For they have already predicted, 'This President is in line to die in office.'  But God says, hear the word of the Lord.  I do not see men the way men see men.  I see men through my eyes. I know their hearts.  I know that the changes you desire politically and economically are not happening. No one can change anything in this Nation but the Lord God Almighty. No one can.  A prosperity is about to come upon the Church in such an unusual way.

God says, Athletes are about to arise and penetrate the kingdom of darkness.  Economists are about to come forth from young men and young women and the African American people shall rise up and say, 'We have been given the honor and the privilege to go into the marketplace and to build pulpits, and to bring people to Christ,' and so it shall be that I shall put my mantle upon this nation says the spirit of God.

There shall be an exposure; a corruption that has been taking place in the political arena shall be exposed, says the Lord.  And they have prayed for this President to lay face down in shame. And they shall say, 'How is it that he (Obama) was the one who brought the truth out and this that took place, this corruption that was taking place, was not revealed by the journalists of this hour but by the President of the United States?' Why? Because this President sought the Lord, got onto his knees and prayed out for God's blessing upon the nation.

God says, I will honor the prayer in the Easter of 2010.  I will break the cycle.  For they have predicted another one shall die in office.  It shall not be so.  For this President shall leave this office, bringing honor to the African American people.

God says, Some will say, 'Now will there ever be another African in the White House?' Yes, there will be another. It shall be an African American woman whom I shall raise up to stand in office and you shall be proud in Memphis, TN, for you celebrated the word of the Lord. "I've loved to listen to you over the centuries as you have sung.  You sang in pain, you sang in bondage and you sing in freedom.  They will never take your song away. You sang as slaves, as bondswomen, you sang of freedom.
And that sound has risen to me today again. Certain people of this nation who are enemies of the cross have said, 'We will bring to shame this race.' Are you not Americans - Citizens of this Kingdom?

No, you will not be brought to shame. There will not be another unnecessary death.  There will not be another unnecessary assassination.  For your song and your breath, the fragrance that is upon you has come before me, says the Spirit of the Lord."
October 17, 2009 - Philadelphia, MS

For God said that which comes, comes quickly.  That which is imparted and will be released in the month of November shall happen swiftly and quickly and suddenly. Suddenly! That which comes, says the Spirit of God, and oh yes there is a whirlwind that is coming in the month of November; in the month of November a whirlwind as you've never seen; we speak not of tornadoes but God says the whirlwind that comes from my Spirit. The kingdom of God has convened.  Angels have been set aside for the breakdown of demonic powers - the beast of the east in your November says the Lord. There shall be a break in the atmosphere and then people will say "what has come, what has come, what has come?"  The Lord says, even as I opened the heavens for Jacob, even as I opened the heavens for Elijah, so the heavens are being opened for my people at a time when it is greatly needed. Manna shall come, truth shall come swiftly.  Acceleration will begin and people will say "suddenly something happened."  But the Spirit of God says you will not forget - mark these words - the turnarounds that are taking place; it's happened before, why can it not happen again? Therefore, God says, rejoice for I'm taking you to the happiest Christmas.  You've had good Christmases before; I've made promises to you before and you've made it.  But the Lord says, this will not be an unhappy Christmas!  I will reconcile.  There shall be reconciliation and there shall be repayment, says the Lord.  For what I will do is I will pay you back and the enemy will begin to payback was stolen from you. I will give back to you a hundred fold, says the Spirit of God!

God said to us this same angel that visited Abraham Lincoln, George Washington and the founders, and that angel came to this soil to bless America has been fighting a principality because it knows that its time has come to an end.  And I suggest to you tonight, I suggest to you tonight and not only suggest it but prophesy it: In Philadelphia, Mississippi that that angel is being released to once again bring a wave of the Spirit capturing every race, capturing denominations, capturing every kind of church and every kind of human being and bringing upon this nation a rain like we have never seen.  I cannot stop prophesying it, I cannot stop saying it, I truly believe it with my whole heart!

I looked down at this clock and I said "911" and the Spirit of the Lord said something to me.  He said, the people have been fearful of another attack because of this present President.  But God said it shall not be so and it shall not be so because of the awareness of the people of God and the prophets that have prophesied and men and women of God who have stood up.  God said that beast has moved positions.  It no longer can focus its attention upon this nation and though they will attempt, it will never happen again, not in your lifetime nor your children's.  God's Spirit says they don't need to do that to the twin towers because they are doing it to the minds of the children, your children, and therefore the exposure shall be that I shall expose them in a very unusual technology that is going to come forth and they will have no power to do this.  For God said what I'm about to release is a technology that will go that will enable every person in every home to be able to hear the Gospel of Christ and it shall go like wildfire.  The terrorist attack that they are attempting through the minds of the children, the young people, shall fall - it shall fall on their face, it shall not be successful.

For the Lord shall begin creative miracles where the people shall say "we need not follow from somebody else's skill" for a new heart shall be given for God said great creative miracles shall begin to happen:  Alzheimer's, diabetes, certain forms of cancer shall be out-ruled, shall no longer be, for the Lord God in this next season shall bring creativity forth and create things so that many shall live longer, says the Spirit of God.

The Spirit of the Lord says hear the word of the Lord; Throughout this nation a spirit of divination has rested upon my people. The spirit of divination which is a python that suffocates, this force has suffocated you and strangled you.  And the Spirit of God says tonight the strangulation, the suffocation has been dealt with by my word.  I'm giving you back your breath, I'm giving you back your energy; I'm going to fill your houses with delightful delicacies from the house of the Lord. For the Spirit of God says men have complained and they have come to me and they have acted unwisely with their money and with their finance.  And the enemy has come in and he's got close to you and this familiar spirit has come and suffocated, has suffocated and taken the very breath and life away from my people.  Enough says the Lord!  You are coming out of a season of suffocation.  You are coming out of a season of suffocation. The Spirit of God says I have taken the python. This python is a spirit, it does not bite; it gets close to its prey by the sense of dust and chemicals in the air.  There has been too much dust which speaks of flesh.  And this python has come close to my people and it has begun forces of suffocation.  Your energy has been lifted, your faith has been suffocated, your finances have been suffocated, but God said some have recognized it.  I have brought this beast to a place where it is now no longer able to suffocate.  The beast has become my feast says the Spirit of God! Do not think this strange for the courts have come to a conclusion and a decision.  The courts of heaven have watched the people as they have suffered suffocation.  Your breath has been taken away, but God says you have survived, and because you have survived I will release you.  I will bring signs and wonders back into my house says the Lord.  Great revivals have been suffocated.  Great movements that I sent have been suffocated.  Men have suffocated as this familiar spirit has taken them away from family and friends.  God says families have suffocated. The suffocation has caused men to say "we give up." God said do not fear, for I am breathing on the land that has been plowed by praise.  I am breathing upon the land that seems dry and my breath is going to revive you in a way that you've never seen before or felt before says the Lord!

The Spirit of the Lord says hear the word of the Lord; Throughout this nation a spirit of divination has rested upon my people. The spirit of divination which is a python that suffocates, this force has suffocated you and strangled you.  And the Spirit of God says tonight the strangulation, the suffocation has been dealt with by my word.  I'm giving you back your breath, I'm giving you back your energy; I'm going to fill your houses with delightful delicacies from the house of the Lord. For the Spirit of God says men have complained and they have come to me and they have acted unwisely with their money and with their finances.  And the enemy has come in and he's got close to you and this familiar spirit has come and suffocated, has suffocated and taken the very breath and life away from my people.  Enough says the Lord!  You are coming out of a season of suffocation.  You are coming out of a season of suffocation. The Spirit of God says I have taken the python. This python is a spirit, it does not bite; it gets close to its prey by the sense of dust and chemicals in the air.  There has been too much dust which speaks of flesh.  And this python has come close to my people and it has begun forces of suffocation.  Your energy has been lifted, your faith has been suffocated, your finances have been suffocated, but God said some have recognized it.  I have brought this beast to a place where it is now no longer able to suffocate.  The beast has become my feast says the Spirit of God! Do not think this strange for the courts have come to a conclusion and a decision.  The courts of heaven have watched the people as they have suffered suffocation.  Your breath has been taken away, but God says you have survived, and because you have survived I will release you.  I will bring signs and wonders back into my house says the Lord.  Great revivals have been suffocated.  Great movements that I sent have been suffocated.  Men have suffocated as this familiar spirit has taken them away from family and friends.  God says families have suffocated. The suffocation has caused men to say 'we give up.' God said do not fear, for I am breathing on the land that has been plowed by praise.  I am breathing upon the land that seems dry and my breath is going to revive you in a way that you've never seen before or felt before says the Lord!

We command you to surrender the arms.  They will be exposed.  America I have watched over you since your 9/11.  For God says now there will be a surrender.  There shall be a surrender.  They will surrender arms that have been hidden.  The Spirit of the Lord declares What they plan to use against this nation, against Israel, against Europe, the United Kingdom will be surrendered one by one.  And finally the Beast that has been in hiding shall be brought out for the world to see.  They shall say is this the one that terrified the whole world?  Is this the one who frightened the nations of the earth?  Is this it?  So shallow shall it be says the Lord.  But I will draw the beast out from the caves and the fields and America shall once and for all shout as one nation, and in one moment I will wipe out the division that has been brought to this nation by the spirit of python says the Lord.

There shall be a cry.  They shall say this has not been right, let the courts decide.  For God said what courts can decide the guilt of a man.  I will show you which court shall decide.  In one moment this nation shall stand again as they stood in the steps when 9/11 took place and they sang together, and now years later there is division, hatred, scorn, shame, debt.  God said they look upon you not the way they shall see you.  For very soon God said they will look and say the nation has brought themselves together, and now they are one.  They are praying together.  For I have caused the beast to surrender and the surrendering of the arms will stop a potential war in Israel and in America, and God said I will stop it in an instance, for My Word has been declared and so shall it be.

Lord, we shall not live by bread alone but by every word that proceeds out of your mouth.  We are not faced with a giant.  Why have they told you there is a giant that you are facing?  God said, there is no giant; there is only a dwarf. There is no giant.  God said, this is nothing that you are facing.  Lift your hands up and behave as courageous warriors, and make declaration of His power! The Spirit of the Lord would say tonight, do not listen to those that say this will not come to an end and Israel is being punished.  Do not say this, for the Spirit of God said, I am declaring something fresh.  I told you that through the summer that there would be change. Now God says the guard has changed.   There has been a changing of the guard, believe it or not.  And now there's an upturn, God says.  Why?  Because I told you in summer I would turn things around, and I will make it possible for you to have access to those things that you needed. God said, what you are prepared for is going to happen, a moment where suddenly God will come in and supply and make things work for you.  Therefore praise Him and give him thanks!

The spirit of the lord says hear the word of the Lord tonight.  For I am not here to bring shame to nobody, I'm not here to bring anybody down.  There has been a theft and the priestly garments that once stood to sanctify the pure have been defiled.  Ashes have come upon. This nation is about to have an eruption of the priestly anointing.  Men shall rise to the occasion.  I'm not talking about the men in the pulpits, I'm talking about men in industry, men in artistry, men in ministry but most of all men in family. I'm about to bring together men from all over the nation.  I will cast upon them an anointing.  They will pray again, they will seek My face and the authority shall arise back into this nation.  Men shall take their stand, they shall say we will pray and they will fight.  God says because they have chosen to do that, I will bring a fresh new anointing into the house.  This is My promise says the Lord.  You shall see fallen ones raised up  You will see young men who have gone away come back.   I cast upon you a mantle as I walked into the field of rejoicing where Elisha stood and cast my mantle upon him so God says tonight I will cast my mantle upon the men that stand for their families and will pray.  In this nation there will be an extreme unusual movement amongst the men.  Ed Cole brought it before, T.D. Jakes brought it to the women, many came to speak to women and men but this thing that I am about to do will shake the very core of this nation. Shake it.

This came directly from Heaven right now.  What I have heard is as great as what I heard when Jehoshaphat stood before the enemy and God sent ambushments against the enemies so they were confused.  Again America is faced with three enemies, but now not from the outside from the inside. For God said these enemies that have raised their heads will endeavor to cripple from within, but has My promise not come to you as a nation that  from this summer I will break the power of this that has tried to cripple you.  For I have been hovering, says the Lord, and I have been brooding and looking for a place to rest my feet.  I have been looking as the dove to find a place to rest my feet.  For even as the dove went forth from Noah to find a place so that it would not return, so God says, I have looked for a place to rest my feet.  God says I have found a place in Illinois.  For the Spirit of the Lord says even though Chicago is known as a windy city there shall be a strange wind that shall come and that wind will blow for a long period of time. It shall be a sign from God that the wind of the Spirit that this prophet has been prophesying will bring the unaccountable impulse, will bring the 'suddenly' to this country.  This wind will blow and shall move upon the states surrounding Illinois.  The Midwest shall be known as the place where God rested his feet. It shall be known as a place where God found a resting place. The spirit of the Lord said tonight you sang to me open up and give me the keys that I may go to a place you have kept for me just for this time. And God said you are opening up a door in the Heavens.  Hear me not only this state, but hear me this nation.  The three enemies that are inside will endeavor to assassinate, will endeavor to cripple and will endeavor to steal via the taxes of the people.  For there is a wicked system that is bei ng concocted, that is being put together to take from your hand what is unnecessary.  I will cripple it says the Lord!  And I will take lawmakers from the Midwest, lawmakers from the Northeast, for what has happened to the Kennedys, says the Spirit of God, was spoken of.  Now I will join hands between Democrats and Republicans and do an unusual thing, says the Spirit of God. They will say 'what they tried to increase now they are decreasing.'  And God says it shall be a sign.  Even now that the Kennedys have come to this place - I spoke about it - that there would be a massive out-breaking and outpouring in the system in this nation, the political system.  The three enemies that shall rise up and are already on their way, I will take them, I will set ambushments against them, they will confound themselves and this nation shall rise above the occasion and come to oneness with God, says the Lord! The wind that shall blow through Illinois, Michigan, Ohio - it shall blow and strange shall be the wind that comes.  For they shall say 'there is warmth in it, why is it not ice cold, it is warm.'  It is a sign to this nation.  I will take you from your roots, I will remove the scourge that has been set upon Chicago and bring a healthy, holy name back to you.  This wind shall blow in such a way that politicians shall say 'there is only one way we can go.  We've tried every place.  We've looked to the South, we've looked to the North, we've looked to the West and the East.'  God said they have said 'we've looked to the White House' and they shall say 'we find that there is no answer in the White House.'  And so God says and therefore I shall bring them to my house.  That's where they shall come, says the Lord of Hosts!

A few months ago I prophesied that there would be a very unusual thing happening to Chicago, through Illinois.  I'm standing here tonight on the outskirts, and I feel such a strong powerful anointing.  I feel like God is changing the time. The wind is changing course.  Now God says, prepare yourselves, for as I cripple these three enemies that rise from within I will expel any suggestion that will bring any more burden on my people and begin to suddenly bless my house.  My house is your house and your house is my house, says the Lord.  Therefore the heavens have opened, fresh revelation is coming, rejoice!

The house that we call God's house has become a very poor representation of the Kingdom of God.  We are places of worship that have no kingdom authority, joy, righteousness, peace.  It is a pathetic sound. God said out of the death I will blow and the wind shall come and suddenly bring life from that place they have put on one side and said 'Look at this pathetic movement, look at this pathetic place called the church.'  They have scorne d the church. Leaders of the church have fallen.  Why have they fallen? Because they have had no strength to recover.  The priests and the high priests of the nations of the world have been weakened.  And God said, a holy movement is taking place with men first of all.  That means the priest is going to be set in order, the high priests of the home are going to take their authority.  Then he said I will take the nations of the earth, and from this valley, the valley representing the church that has been crippled and weak, I'm not talking about the true church that may not even be gathered in a building.  But I'm talking about that which represents the church and He'll take them and there will be a reformation and God will breathe - you heard about the wind in Chicago and in Illinois and all of these areas - a strange wind is going to blow according to the prophecy and will continue blowing.  And they will say 'this is so strange, this wind.'  You see the wind has changed in the presence of the prophetic.  Why?  - you do see many changes that take place in the weather with prophets. God said I want you to take it as a sign. A wind is going to blow, very unusual, to bring a holy reformation and that which was empty shall be filled and that which is filled shall become empty.  And God will breathe and bones will come to life.  And the soldiers and the warriors that fell because religion killed them, have fallen on the dead bones of a truth that was once alive, the dead bones of the prophet. There was a warrior that fell in battle and died, and to hide him the soldiers took this dead warrior and threw him into a tomb, and that tomb happened to be the tomb of Elisha.  And so much truth and so much revelation was in the bones that once his body hit the bones he sprung back to life.  There is truth that has been buried, prophetic words that have been buried in the ground and people have said 'it's gone, it's over.'  But even in the tomb there is truth.  And God said I will take that and bring them back to life.  This generation is about to experience the most unusual move of the Spirit.

The spirit of God says there is a mighty army coming forth.  God says, there is about to be a huge revival with men.  Men should be greatly touched.  Men will begin to shout out, men will begin to dance like David danced and pray like Daniel prayed.  When Edwin Cole died many men began to pull away from the great truth that he taught.  Ed Cole nurtured men and then there was a great men's movement again.  Suddenly it went.  But the Lord says this time I shall raise up men, gather them together and there will be priests of the Most High God shall be raised up says the Lord.

The Spirit of the Lord says, there has been unnecessary warfare, unnecessary wars - I'm not talking about your natural war in Iraq. God says there have been wars in the kingdom, in my church that have not been necessary. Why is this? They have taken my Joseph. They have taken the prophetic voice from amongst the brothers and sold it to the world. Therefore, the world has embraced the prophetic gift but they have mishandled it, they have not understood it, and therefore they have prospered in any event.  God says Joseph is about to return. The prophetic voice is about to come back. The prophetic sound is about to come back to the earth, to this nation. This nation has been void of the prophetic voice and even though prophets have endeavored to speak there have been many that have walked away and said "will God ever return?" And so they have pronounced things that I have not said. They have said judgment, judgment, judgment, and God said judgment has already begun in the house of God. It has already taken place. There is no more unnecessary judgment. I am about to restore and during the summer of this year I'm about to open the heavens and bring restoration and renewal says the Lord! Some have said but summer is going to be filled with judgment. God says though there be earthquakes, though there be hurricanes, I will turn them into signs. I will turn them into signs of wonderment, signs of an experience where people will say "why did the people not die? Why were there so few lives taken?" They will say is this truly judgment or is the earth beginning to sound, is the earth beginning to rebel? Is the earth beginning to say we want the manifestation of the glory of the God? We want the manifestation of God's sons on the earth. That's what it is! This is what it is says the Spirit of God!

The Spirit of God says, draw near to me because there will be things that will take place that will be completely different. You see when Paul was in the prison and God said at the midnight hour the voice of God was heard through the sound of praises of Paul and Silas. You see life came into that place. And God said there is going to be a shaking during the summer but this shaking shall be a sign that the earth is awaiting the manifestation of God's sons and daughters. For there will be a glory that shall come forth with unusual signs, unusual miracles, unusual manifestations that shall come as a result of this shout that is coming from the earth, says the Spirit of the Living God. Even though the earth shall shake, and even though the heavens may rumble and even though the winds may blow and hurricanes may come, God said it shall be a sign that I am coming to this country like a mighty rushing wind, about to raise you up and give you one sound with one voice, says the Lord!

The voice of God is coming throughout this nation. They thought they could sell the prophetic voice, but said the prophetic voice longs and yearns to come back. Now this nation will embrace it.  For your present President is afraid. He has had fear which he will not share, but the prophets know. He has fear of an attack like 911 so that they will blame him. How can they blame him? For the Spirit of God said I have placed watchmen over this nation. Watchmen that are Spirit minded men and women and your President shall join them in that spiritual watch, says the Lord!  There's a mantle of transcendence that's taking place. Transcendence, we are going to transcend beyond the normal range of natural things.  One of the first appearances shall be in the State of Florida, yes it shall. You've always been a pioneering State. This will not end, says the Spirit of God. I sent this prophet into the midst of you that you may hear the Word of the Lord clearly.  Your President shall join spiritual watchmen on the wall in a very, very unusual and spectacular experience that he shall have, not with Christ for he already has, but with the Holy Spirit, the "paracletos", the one who stands along side. I promised you. I promised you says the Spirit of God, that when I place a man in that office, though there may be controversy about it, I will raise him up and make him look through spiritual eyes. Fear will not capture him. And even though policies may not be aligned with My Spirit, that matters not for I will do things that will cause an embarrassment amongst the Senate. For God says there will be deaths, unusual deaths of political leaders. But the one thing that will take place that will be from My Spirit - I will replace those who dishonor the laws of God and those who dishonor what your forefathers prayed for. I will replace them, says the Spirit of God. That's what I'll do! This nation has been purified, it's been purified. This nation has been purified. The purification has taken place and is still to do so. The industries that have fallen, God says, out of their ruins I will bring and structure something that will bring great pride to this nation again. And people will say we are proud of our vehicles.
