We are proud of our industries and we are proud of our innovative strength. We are proud of the creativity that was once lost. Why is this? Is it because the government has stepped in to solve the problems? Ha! God says do not make me laugh! This is a joke.  But what is not a joke, says the Spirit of the Lord, is that once you place a prophet on the soil and the territory and the prophetic is invited back into the house of the Lord. As Joseph stood on the soil of Egypt the presence of the prophetic brought great, great, great prosperity for a seven year period.  Beginning, says the Lord, of this summer there will be a rebuilding, a restructuring, there will be a revolving thing that will take place and during these next seven years, starting next year, there will be a death of debt that will take place in the United States of America. And many of you that have served and many of you that have given and have been faithful will see the death of debt in your lives, in your business and in your families, says the Spirit of God! For even as the prophetic stood in front of the Egyptian pharaoh, so God says, Egypt has profited enough. The Middle East has stolen too much. Now God says, with the prophetic revival that is coming back and because of the reviving of the prophetic anointing and prophetic insights market place will be invaded. God says your economy, the resilience that shall come as a result of this, the quick and rapid recovery during the summer months which will bring shame to the networks that have been the prognosticators of this nation and this hour, says the Spirit of God. They will shamefully say "we were misguided, we were misguided. We now realize that the recovery is far quicker and greater than we expected." They will have to apologize for certain things to your previous President who stood as a watchman in the house of God. Yes they will, says the Spirit of God! Forget your ideas and the wrongs and mistakes. Let's talks about certain truths. God said those prayers are yet to be answered, and those prophecies that have come forth are not to become to be made manifest. So Joseph has returned and now unity of brothers is going to take place and those who will not join the army, that have been raised from the valley, those who will not join the army that were once dry bones, you will only be knit together and flesh will only come upon you when you embrace the full gospel and the doctrine of Christ. If you reject the miraculous, if you reject the supernatural you will be as fleshless people. But God said because of the prophetic revival there will be unusual signs and unusual wonders and unusual miracles. The type of miracles that have never been seen in the history of mankind are about to manifest in this generation at this time says the Spirit of God. If you would embrace that I will put flesh on your bones and I will make you a mighty army in this nation says the Lord!
December 14, 2008- Humble, TX

Oh Israel, Oh Israel, I have gathered you under my wings. They shall try and they shall arise coming forth. Once again they will say "it shall be your end." But I have gathered you together from every nation, and I am yet the Lord Most High. Blow the trumpet in Zion, sound the alarm! There's a mighty army that's coming forth. Sound the alarm!They have mustered for war again. They have said "we must cripple Israel one more time." God said over the New Year they shall gather and I shall foil it. I shall fool them and I will trap them. I will set ambushments against them just like I did in the day of Jehoshaphat, for the three nations rose up: Mount Seir, Ammon, Moab and they rose up and came and they said there is a great multitude of people that are coming against Israel, against Judah. And once again, says the Lord, I will be your defense. And from the city of Houston, the prophet shall speak to the land of Israel. For there are those that have stood the test of time and My people shall not fall to the ground in shame nor dishonor, but God said I will arise and I will capture those who have planned in many different nations to do what they did in India. God said tonight, sound the alarm, let the powers of darkness know vengeance is Mine, I will repay, says the Lord, and it shall be so!Sound the alarm! That's right, who would mock the Lord, who would mock Him and say He is not able to save His people. For they shall stand; they shall piss in their pants for it shall come to pass that they will no longer be men for I will cause them to fear. They shall not fear the armies of men; they shall fear the army of God. They shall fear the army of God. And they shall stand as they stood in those days and they shall begin to shake and their bowels shall no longer contain, and God said, this is what I speak for the New Year. Your President has fought not only in battle but in prayer. And God said that they would throw shoes at him, yes they shall because they shall be bound barefoot. And they shall not be able to contain and they shall stand in the and they shall say we cannot walk any further. For God said this nation shall be protected. Israel shall be protected and even those that have been unrighteously dealt with. You are not dealing with man anymore. You are dealing with the Lord God Jehovah. This night I speak to the terrorists of this day. I speak to the terrorists of this day.

December 13, 2008 - Humble, TXGod said, that in my kingdom, I switch things around so swiftly and men are not prepared because the presuppositions that have been planted in their minds by secular media, by prognosticators of the age, the new age, that the voice of my prophets are drowned out.  What is it that we would believe that the economy of this day cannot be changed by the Lord God and his kingdom?Because He has said tonight I speak of keys, the key of David that has been given to a generation.  It has already been granted and sent forth.  To do what?  To unlock the mysteries of the holy Scriptures, to unlock and unveil the mysteries that Daniel spoke about, that John on the Isle of Patmos spoke about.  These mysteries are about to be revealed to bring great treasures into the kingdom of God and into the earth, says the Lord Most High.  The key of David to unlock that which has been kept back from mankind, God said, tonight I desire to hear the sound of surrender from my people, and if you would do that, not only you but the thousands that are watching and will watch, this prophet is telling you: That God wants you to enter into the New Year shaking off every past throttle, every past stronghold, shake it off, so that you may enter into a time of festivity.  For God says in 2009 it shall be known as a year of festivities.  Why?  Because I'm setting a table before you, I'm setting a table before your enemies, I'm setting a table that you will eat from.  And God says in the presence of your enemies I will set a table for you to feast on and they shall say "it has not been as the prognosticators have said, but we have prospered and we have entered in with victory and vigor!"   God said there are so few that would kneel, that they cannot see enough of the earth to be able to take out of the earth the buried treasures that I have laid there before man even set his foot on this earth.  America, you that call yourselves a new nation, you were there long before you became a nation, and I planted into your soil things that will be discovered in 2009.  I planted things into your soil that over the time, over the time, over the process of time and putrification, that God said you would discover at the perfect of time, because of erosion you will come to a place.  2009 is that time where something out of the earth they shall dig, and they shall find stuff that I want them to find for your energy and for the prosperity in this nation.  For God said, do you really believe that I would allow this nation to carry on the way that it has carried on?  No!  God said you will discover in your soil that which will prove four great and mighty things in my Scriptures, for the Key of David shall unlock and unveil facts in the earth.  And they shall say "it will be a stronghold against the forces of agnosticism and atheism" and God said, you will see as I have told you before that there shall literally be scientists that shall be overwhelmed by what you discover in your earth.  This is a time to be excited about.  God said, you are not going back to Egypt, but you are going forward to a land flowing with milk and honey.  You better see it, because if you see it, God says, I'll take you there, in the new year it shall begin, says the Lord!The fish of the sea, the creatures of the sea, on the land, the soil, right from the beginning, God said, I gave it to you.  I said the earth you shall subdue, you shall have dominion over the fish, over the living creatures, and those within the sea.  Now that dominion is going to be restored to mankind so that they will take authority over the creatures of the sea and over the land and subdue it in order to bring forth the prosperity.  For God said the earth is waiting for the manifestation of sons of God that will prophesy to it so that it will yield its produce to bring to this nation the prosperity that it's going to bring, says the Spirit of God.  Rejoice for this is a time for you to rejoice!There shall be, there shall be something called "the Atlantic," "the Atlantic soil" and they shall say it comes from the Atlantic.  Let me call it "Atlantic soil."  God said keep your eyes open, spirits of men, keep your eyes open, spirits of men, for God said, I wish to prosper you as I prospered Abraham.  I wish to prosper you as I prospered Jacob.  I wish to prosper you as I prospered Isaac.  Is it not so that the blessings of Abraham have upon you because of he that died on a cross, for cursed is he that is crucified and that has died on a cross so that you may receive the blessings of Abraham.  God said this is a time when the blessings of Abraham are about to come upon my people for God said, cursed is he that hangs upon the tree, but he has been cursed so that the blessings of Abraham might come upon you, says the Lord.  The Gentiles who have come into the tree, that has been grafted in, God says get ready, open your eyes sons of men, open your eyes, for I want to prosper you and cause you to kill your debt, so that there will be a death of debt by the year 2010.  A death of debt, says the Spirit.  Don't say it won't happen - it shall be so!  On the Internet right now, business men get ready, pastors get ready, leaders and those that are ready to take and offend those who have laughed at you, God says the key has been given so that you may once again take authority over the earth.  For the earth and creation awaits the manifestation of the sons of God, those who have the spirit and have the kingdom mentality and that say we will not be driven down into a place of fear, we will not be driven down into a place of poverty.  We have the blessings of Abraham.  Therefore, the earth is waiting to yield its produce.  The earth is waiting to yield its produce.  It is waiting for the commandment and the timing and the perfect alignment of the sons of God.  Therefore God said, demons have come and they have tried to hide, but can they when angels have also come - the angel that came to Abraham was Christ My Son.  The angel that came to Gideon, the angel that came to Jacob - God said do you understand that that is the Son of the Living God?  This is a day for my people to shake off your fear, shake off the chains and the bondages.  Where are the Daniels of this day?  Where are the Davids of this day?  Where are the Ruths of this day?  Where are the Esthers of this day?  Where are they?  God said I am calling them forth so that they will take authority over the earth, says the Spirit of God.  And they shall say, "do not touch this plant, it is poisonous, it contains a deadly poison."  And God said, they shall say "you cannot eat that, you cannot consume it."  But that which once brought death by consumption will actually bring life and energy, says the Spirit of God.  For a plant, for it shall come from a soil, that a thing that would kill the human being, in a tree, God said so it shall bring a cure to many cancers, says the Spirit of God.  Why would I tell you this? For it is time for the prophets to get above all of these fears and all of these commandments that they give.  My prophets must begin to prophesy the cures that will come to the human bodies.  My prophets must prophesy the cures that must come.  For God said, did I not tell you to go and cleanse the leper?  There is leprosy out there.  Alzheimer's disease is leprosy, it says, the Spirit of God, I command you to cleanse the lepers.  And therefore the prophets will prophesy that from the earth shall come healings and it shall begin to manifest even though some of those have already happened, the next year I will show you great things because a revival of healing from the earth shall take place, says the Lord. A revival of the healing from the earth shall take place!Now berries, these are berries, berries - poisonous - shall bring healing. I'll tell you what God's gonna do this year, He's going to turn the lights out.  God said it shall be the end of a dark era!  Lights out!  Death of debt!  Death of debt!  Death of debt!  Death of debt!  Death of debt!God said, it is the end of a dark period.  And you shall enter into the New Year and suddenly from all four corners the lights shall come on and I will reveal things as the light comes.  For God said I will take you out of a dark era and I will bring you into light, into light, into light, into light!What does this speak of?  It's a new era.  No, this is a new era, light of the revelation of Christ, the illumination to bring out of darkness and out of hiding the things, the lofty things that have controlled this nation.  There shall be light as you have never seen it.  And I will reveal the things which have been prepared long before the earth came into order.Because God said, I'm raising up sons who will manifest my glory.  I will bring daughters that will manifest my glory. They will manifest, what do you say manifest?  They won't talk about it.  They will walk into buildings and the lights will come on.  They will walk into meetings where they are discussing the progress or digression of medical science and as they walk in, the light shall come on.  These that shall manifest shall not need to speak much.  They will walk into hospitals, and the light shall come on.  God said, too many men that I trusted with my gifts of healing and the working of miracles have taken credit and fallen to the ground. Now this that I am bringing is the revival of the shadow, for there cannot be a shadow without light and the shadow of Peter fell upon those who had no ability to walk.  God said with this light shall there be no need for commanding words.  But God said, the very shadow that shall come from those who have light that has been shone upon them shall come in and this shall be the era of the shadow of light, the shadow of light.  And God said they will walk in and suddenly the lights will go on, miracles will happen, people will change, conversions will take place.  They will just stand and God said the light shall come on. This is an explanation of your next era in the Kingdom, says the Lord of Hosts!God said for me to tell you tonight, a new era is beginning, the key of David has been granted, the era of the shadow of light has come.  We cannot ignore the fact that scientists are bothered by time and space, trying to work this whole thing out, trying to find the end of infinity. What is wrong with that?  They are trying to find God, and guess what?  They will find Him! We are in for the most exciting time.  God took us into the New Year prophetically.

dateLocation: November 2nd, 2008 - Prophecy About the Election and Future of America- Nov 2, 08
October 13th, 2008 - Kim's Prophetic Insight Regarding the Economy (Email)

paragraphs: There is a new dimension of praise. There is a new level of worship, offering you the Key of David. I am opening a door that no man can shut! Tonight I'm giving you the keys. Take them, says the Lord. For I am taking you to a higher place. In the middle of your crisis I will be exalted. In the presence of your enemies, shout!

Nations all over the earth are praying right now. From the soil of Florida where great war exists, where angels make declarations tonight and they have this week: this is a day to remember, for your distress, for your crisis which has tormented you and tried to ride you and drive you is coming to an end, says the Spirit of God!

We beseech you, oh God, Your Kingdom come, Your will be done. It is the end of a season. Prophetic prayer is to command sight to see to those that wish to see and blindness to your enemy, for you shall not have to fight anymore, the fight is over. You shall pass through them for through your God you can leap over a wall, you can run through a troop. So pray, there is a sound of an abundance coming to you, says the Lord.

Our greatest time is upon us. Though everything seems to be falling apart, though we face our greatest crisis, God is looking for a way, an opportunity to show up, show off and take all the credit. God wants to be found guilty of taking all the credit! But He's looking for somebody that will worship Him.

The Spirit of the Lord says, for those that would listen and hear what the Spirit has to say: there is going to be a turn of events for the nations who have cried out to My Son. This is the end of a season. No more war! No more unnecessary war. The Spirit of the Lord said, do you remember Jesus, when they tried to kill him, he passed through the crowd; he didn't have to fight. God said, there's going to be a period where there will be no fighting, no striking. All you will do is speak and water will come from the rock. Watch Me now as I send an abundance in the presence of your prognosis. The media is lying. They do not tell My words. Tonight, I tell you My words! I will give you property, property, property! For the earth is the Lord's and the fullness thereof, the silver and the gold is Mine, the cattle on a thousand hills.

Therefore, hear what I have to say tonight. I am changing the season for you. You have steered your crisis away. Now it's time to get to the other side, resurrection power has been unlocked in South America, Central America, North America, Africa, China, Russia, Italy, France and many other nations, says the Lord. It is finished! Now rejoice!

Every nation represented here tonight, hold up your flag. God said, there is no country that I will turn away from. Some would say "what about the plague, what about the plague of Islam?" God said, do not speak of such things. They could not keep Me from going into the Soviet Union and they won't stop Me now from going into Russia. There is no country that can banish Me. In fact, the Spirit of God says, that even this night as you have gathered with one voice, I will make you one. There will be a unity amongst nations. And do not say "this cannot happen." I have already sent the cloud over the countries. There will be an unusual baptism of the Spirit because of this unity that's about to take place. You see men have prayed for revival and revival I sent. But visitation cannot remain visitation. God says, would you like to prolong My visitation? For My visitation must be prolonged so that it becomes a habitation.

God says, I want to leave something in every one of these nations by the prophetic word. You say "judgment is coming." Judgment has begun in the house of the Lord. A cleansing of the Temple has taken place. Therefore, this next season shall be the season of the double-fold. For even this hour they have said "we have heard of the double portion." You have not tasted of it yet. I want to multiply and accelerate upon the children of your nations. Yes the children. For God said, they have come against the children. Now every nation that is represented here tonight and for those you are praying for, the Spirit of the Lord says, I will take your children four years of age, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten and eleven, and I will fill them with a spirit of Elijah, says the Lord of Hosts and no one will stop Me! No one will stop Me!

This restoration that is now going to begin will cause a payback unto your children five times the amount! Now the Spirit says, I want to baptize in this building you and your house with a fire that is fresh that is new, that will give you an expression that will touch the untouchable and reach the unreachable.
July 18, 2008 - Bakersfield, CA

The Spirit of the Lord says hear the word tonight you have come because you are hungry. You have come because you know that there is something great on the horizon. The contempt that I feel for those that have sneered at My state, California. The fires that have been ignited by those who have desired evil but now I will change it for good says the Lord of Hosts. There is a time and there is a season for everything, I will take this and make it a sign. For when the Lord your God says take this as a sign then it also means that very soon you will lift up your hands, lift up your eyes for redemption draweth nigh. There is a redemption that is coming to the economy of California. They shall say let us destroy the grapes, let us destroy the wine. God says there is a new wine that is coming, a wine that is only fit for kings, a wine that is only fit for queens, a wine that is only fit for royalty is about to come in earth that has been scourged by the fires. Now hear the word of the Lord says God. Even as they say, "We have dried up the land, droughts must come." NO! I will send rain, rain, rain, rain, rain, rain. For even as you stood, even on the soil of California, in this the grape basket; so I think of My Israel, My nation.

Those that in contempt would say, "We will rise up secretly against them." Even as in the days of Elisha, I will expose the secrets that are discussed in their bedchambers. They will have no secrets against Israel. They will have no secrets against Jerusalem. For my God who is speaking now says for me to tell you, I will take away the headship of that nation, replace it and there will be freedom from compromise in Israel, says the Lord of Hosts. Iran you have raised your ugly head too many times. Now I will invade your purposes. I will invade your purposes and your strategies so that twice they will fail and it will be public before the nations that you attempted to come against My people and you failed miserably says the Lord of Hosts.

Hear the word of the Lord tonight.  Your enemy, the adversary, has tried to steal, and he looked and he mocked you.  He said I have taken from you what is most precious, now I will mock you and say you cannot heal yourself.  But it is not so, for God says, it all belongs to Me.  It all belongs to Me!  Therefore, may I surprise you tonight with these words, whatever was stolen from you has been placed back into My hands, now I have prepared it, I have strengthened what has been stolen from you only to give it back to you with a hundred fold anointing!  Are you prepared to take it back?  Lift your hands and take it back, take it back, take it back, yes!   Take it back, take it back, take it back now.

The silver and the gold, they are mine.  The cattle on a thousands hills, it's Mine.  It all belongs to Me, says the Lord.  You will not leave this building until you have taken from My hand what you thought was stolen from you.  Are you prepared to believe, are you prepared to believe that I, the Lord your God, can give it back to you tonight in a portion so huge that you'll be glad that you lost it in the first place?  There is restoration that is taking place in this building.  Listen, I'm hearing the Spirit of the Lord saying, because the powers of darkness that have surrounded Miami, that have come into Florida, looked at you with a mocking look, hear the sound tonight of God in your voice.  One shall chase a thousand, two shall chase ten thousand.  What do you think you are chasing tonight?  Lift your voice and one more time, shout!
It's coming back, it's coming back to you right now, right now, take it!

I'm restoring, says the Lord, a greater portion of prayer, I'm giving you the ability tonight with just a few words of prayer to release what you need:  just one word, and the paralyzed servant in your house will be healed, just one word and all paralysis in your life, in your home will be destroyed, just one word from the mouth of Christ - that word is here tonight, take it!  Pray, pray, call Me, call Me, that I may come with the greater portion. Heaven's opened up to every person, to every human being, to every sect, to every family.

There is a presence of celebration for the prophet and when my people celebrate my gift, my voice, I reward it.  When the King of Israel stood before the prophet Elisha, Elisha would not prophesy.  He would not speak about the water, he would not speak about the abundance, but standing next to the King of Israel was the King of Judah, and at the presence of Judah, the prophet prophesied.  Judah means praise.  At the presence of praise, when you make praise, your King God speaks.

There are 77 families in this building that God has set aside for the Spring months to do something that they never expected.  He will take the curse and replace it with a blessing for now the exact opposite to what you are experiencing is about to happen.  Your children are coming back.  28 of you have husbands that are not here, not even close.  Before the Summer they shall bow their knee in this building and shout "Jesus, I want You!"  4 of those families, your children, are gay:  2 lesbians, 3 of them homosexuals.  God says, I will turn it around through the Spring into the Summer, I will surprise you at how quickly this shall happen.  Tonight I am taking one word and striking paralysis out of your house, no paralyzed person, nothing in your house paralyzed anymore.  It's coming to life as the prophet prophesies. It's coming to life!  I want those families to wave your hands right now.  I release it to you in the name of Jesus!
They are no longer somewhere in the future, they are right here in the present.  Your future has just become your present, says the Lord!

October 5, 2007, Seattle, WAYou will hear My Name in the streets of Jerusalem. You will hear My Name. You will hear them shout, you will hear them praise Yeshua. The enemy will rise up and try to bring them down. How many times have they tried to stop Jerusalem, but they will hear My name. The children will shout Yeshua. You will hear My name you will feel My presence in the streets of Jerusalem. There will be a breakthrough in 2008. Pray for the peace of Jerusalem. Pray for the peace of the Middle East for it will come for a season. They will shout My name in the streets of Jerusalem. Pray, pray, pray for Israel. Pray for Jerusalem. There's a leader there that I'm raising up in Israel. He will not look to the left, he will not look to the right but he will proclaim with all his might, I trust in Jehovah. There's a man that I'm raising up who will lead the people of Israel. He will say I trust in the name of God; the ancient God with the ancient covenant. I will raise up a voice in Israel but for the first time since that little nation has come together, in 1948. This man who will lead Israel shall be filled with My Spirit says the Lord. Pray, pray, pray for Jerusalem. The mountain shall try to condemn them, the rocks shall cry out. There's only one rock that will cry out tonight. Pray, pray, pray for Jerusalem. Pray, pray, pray for China. They will stand as your friend America. For a season they will condemn the deception of Iran. I will do something unique in 2008. I will raise a voice out of China. Pray, pray, pray for America. Smile saints, smile for 2008 for who I place in your White House shall know the Spirit of God in a way. A very unique thing I will do, I told you before, there will be joy and celebration for the man I place in the White House shall not be filled with My Spirit when he goes in but when he settles down I will baptize him with fire and the Holy Spirit. Pray, pray, pray for America. The land of the brave, the land of the free, the Spirit shall be free. America you are free. You are free from the oil crisis. Soon and very, very soon there shall be five sources of energy that will have to choose from. Rejoice for you are going to see celebration of My choice in this nation. America you are the salt of the earth. You are the light of the world. America you are free. The Spirit of the Lord says you know the word that was spoken before, tomorrow about this time things are going to change. God says do you realize that I have the power of tomorrow in My hands? Do you realize that I have tomorrow and tomorrow is about to become your today? Do you realize that what I've spoken is already in existence, is already in the atmosphere, is already in the making? Do you realize what I have promised and what I have spoken is becoming reality; it's going from a spiritual dimension to a physical dimension. God says I'm about to bring something that has never appeared on this planet into existence. This is the month of October - I spoke about the month of great favor. Many of you will end this month saying it is impossible that this took place, this has never ever happened before. God says, yes many of you will make the proclamation this has never ever happened before. For this is the day of things that will happen that have never taken place before. Take this word, this is your promise. This has never ever happened before shall be yours says the Lord.

dateLocation: May 5th, 2007 - Orlando, FL- The Treasure is a Sign of A Great Energy

paragraphs: February 18, 2007, Toledo, OH

When Billy Graham dies there's going to be a mass of evangelism throughout the earth but it's going to start in the United States of America where he was born, where he was raised. God says I'm not going to take this to another soil, I'm going to take it from this soil. When Oral Roberts dies there's going to be a double portion of prosperity, a double portion of the miraculous that's going to be released upon the young men and women of this day and age. They're not going to do it the same way, they're not going to have the same style but God's going to give them a double portion and it's going to happen in this nation. Therefore the young men and women of this nation are going to become the preachers of the new millennium, which means they will have a new sound.

I can stand before somebody that's about to be the President of the United States and say don't worry about the oil crisis because God told me there's going to be a new source of energy -  it's called the big E. What's the big E? We know about ethanol. God says, No there's something else which came from Einstein that you're going to find out. And this nation will tell the Middle East "you can take your oil and shove it", because God says I've got something new I'm going to reveal to you.

Your children have been set aside and desired by God. God says the desire of Israel is upon your children. Do you understand that what you have cherished and put to bed at night and prayed with what you carry in your arms and what some men have even beaten is my precious treasure that I have raised up for this hour and for this time says the Lord. If they do not build places to have refuge for my children I will have to find places within governing circles. This must not be in the hands of government says the Lord. I want to raise up houses where children have a place of refuge, education with Christ at the helm. This is about to take place and is already happening. Your children have been established by the Lord before they were even born. This generation they cry out and say we want God show us God. They will be visited by angels, they will be visited by visions. They will not be the ones to carry the fear but the boldness of God. Look at your children they don't want to be fed unbelief, they want to hear the sounds of victory, the sounds of music, the sounds of praise, they want to hear the sound of tomorrow. Therefore, your house shall be visited by the Lord, says God, this year. This year there will be a divine visitation that will take place God says, I will come to your homes, search out your children, and look for them so I can raise them up. If you have lost children, God says I will raise up two that will come forth out of the womb so that they can establish what was suppose to be established with a double anointing. God says this is my will and my word for your family.
February 3, 2007, Seattle, WA

Something significant is going to happen in this nation by a very insignificant event.People are going to ignore it and God wants them to. God wants them to think it is not worth anything of no value.God's going to take of your dust, He's going to take of your trash, He's going to take of your soil, He's going to take of your bugs something insignificant and make it the greatest source of energy for the world. There will be a major move of the Spirit in south Florida. There's going to be a shaking in Indiana. There's going to be a major major revival, restoration all along the Northwest. Watch your mountain, watch the puffing, this is a sign that there will be an eruption like you have never seen in the Spiritual realm affecting specifically your children and your family. Acceleration is beginning.   There is a battle going on in the nation. An unusual battle shall arise, a spiritual battle. I will not end this year with defeat, I will end this year with victory. My Spirit says the Lord has been grieved as I've watched the division that has taken place in this nation. God says that the abolishment of the United Nations is one of My key tasks. It shall come to pass that I will pour out an incredible amount of favor, grace and prosperity. This is a year where I will hasten things, I will take what was slow and speed it up. This year many things will fall down and they shall say we thought it was judgment against our nation. God says it is not judgment against this nation but judgment against the powers of the air and the principalities of this nation. There has been a mockery of the servant, Christ, now there will be a mockery of the serpent. Babylon the great is falling. Do not judge and say God does not love the nations of the Middle East - Yes He does. He would position a Daniel in a lions den in order to reach the kings of Babylon, he would position Shadrach, Meshach and Abendego in a fiery furnace in order to reach the kings of Babylon. Your children will be the prophets of this end time. The Spirit of God says there is no such thing as political battle - that is useless and futile. Religious battles can never be won. I'm not giving you a solution on the terms of religion or politics. God says watch me through the summer months again and you will see how significant I shall make insignificant. The United States of America shall encounter its greatest victory before November of this year. Seeing it, Saying it and Seizing it. What you comprehend you will apprehend. A great revival will come to Iraq. Indiana you are about to be visited by the Lord God. Indiana you're about to have one of the greatest breakthroughs. A time of refreshing has come. God says I'm going to touch certain regions in this nation. One of the first things God told me was where the first tornado, hurricane or great storm hits, I'm going to give a great, great, great breakthrough. The tornado that hit Florida on February 2 was something they say does not happen. Look at that town, the town that nobody knows. I took a pastor of that town and put him on Larry King and showed the example of a servant of the Lord. I'm going to take the insignificant and place them on the secular media. This generation are about to have a new appearance of Christ. The same yesterday, today and forever but a new appearance. The voice of the Father will say to those that are around hear Him, this is My beloved Son. Your children are about to be raised up as the Daniels, the Esters of this generation. I will go to the Middle East and I will show Myself says the Lord of Hosts.
November 18, 2006 - Humble, TX

There is a light coming to this nation like never before and is going to destroy the darkness in this nation. The Spirit of Elijah is upon the children of this generation and they will not tolerate the prophets of Baal, they will strike down the darkness by building the alter of the Lord in this nation says the Spirit of the Lord.

The Spirit of God says, watch over the Christmas season, for there shall be the igniting, igniting of fires. You have heard of the fires on the west coast and the sign that I gave you when I spoke through My prophet that the summer and the heat shall go through to November. This was a sign to My people that I am causing things to accelerate. I'm causing everything to multiply so that you may have access into the bitter things of the kingdoms of darkness, for they have ruled for too long. And My Kingdom is about to appear. Yes, it's about to appear, as it appeared to Daniel, as it appeared to Joseph, as it appeared to Isaiah, as it appeared to Enoch. Four great anointings are coming on to the earth. And God says, I will give you access to the market place. For God says, Acceleration has begun. Acceleration has begun. I'm hastening My word to perform it, and you will not have to wait much longer says the Spirit of God.

Iran do not arise any further. Let not they who call themselves the kings of Babylon arise any further lest the Lord himself remind them of the disposition of their forefathers, Darius and Nebuchadnezzar. Would you be mad to eat the grass and the hay for seven years? The Spirit of God says for seven years I will cause madness and blindness upon the regions and the nations that would rise up with murder and hate against children and against women. It is the children and the women that I am going to rise up to do this thing. They have said we will take them during their celebration of their Christmas or their Christ. God says watch me for these things that have been plotted and planned shall come to nothing for I will do as I did to their forefathers, I will give them nightmares. I will show them the King of Kings and the Lord of Lords in their dreams as I showed the Pharaohs, as I showed Darius, as I showed Nebuchadnezzar, I will show them in nightmares and dreams that there is only one answer. They will be afraid. Once again as I raised up The Passion of the Christ, so I will raise up another movie that will go into the Middle East and they will flock and they will say we have heard of the Christ the first time but the second time we must receive Him for the Spirit of Christ shall go there says the Spirit of the Lord.
They shall return to Me says the Lord. They shall say we are Messianic Jews but they shall come and dancing in the streets of Jerusalem again.

God says there is no nation that I cannot take in a day if I wish. You listen to your news media and you are fearful. I have not given unto you a spirit of fear but a spirit of love, power and a sound mind. I'm listening to a sound mind in praise, I'm listening for power in praise. I'm listening for love in your praise. God says the perfect love of God casts out all fear. There is no nation that I cannot take. There is no atheist that I cannot take. There is no religious force that I cannot take. There is no culture that I cannot take. I told Abraham to come out of the Caldes and made him the father of faith. I can take somebody from Babylon and make them fathers of faith. Do not say "this is the worst time in American history," for it shall be turned into your greatest time in the world history, says the Spirit of God. Will you allow me to take nations from this nation? And when everything looks at its worst, when everything looks at its worst, I can turn it around and make it the best, says the Lord. When all has been subtracted from you, I can turn it into a multiplication, and I will.  For God says, you have every Babylonian nation staring once again, but they are not staring at Democrats, neither are they staring at Republicans. They're staring for the Spirit of Daniel. They are afraid that a David might arise. They are afraid that somebody might come forth from the prison like Joseph and arise. They are afraid. They are looking for the signs of a David emerging; they're looking for the signs of an Isaiah, of a Daniel emerging.  They're looking for the signs of Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego emerging. They're afraid that if they do, once again Babylon will be invaded by the power of the Living God.

The Spirit of God says my servant, Billy Graham, shall rest his head. God says the people must not morn for I speak to you of Isaiah Chapter 6 in the day that King Uzziah died Isaiah said I saw the Lord high and lifted up and his glory filled the temple. When my servant Billy Graham dies and is brought into heaven, the people shall see the Lord as they have never seen Him before and a realm of double portion evangelism shall strike this nation says the Spirit of the Living God. My servant Oral Roberts shall also be received very close and the Spirit of God says when he is received a prosperity shall come upon my people as it has never been. God says do not lose sight of what they carried, not the men, but the mantle. For you shall see the men going but the mantle shall remain says the Spirit of God.
October 14, 2006 - Dallas, Texas

The Spirit of God says to the people, even though you may not understand this, there is the sound of an abundance in the atmosphere. This nation has withstood and stood the test of time. My people have arisen in the summer months and believed my promise. Because you have believed my Word, I have accounted it as righteousness for you says the Spirit of God. Therefore, even as I have reckoned it as righteousness for you I'm going to turn your economy around says the Spirit of God. Because this is a season of multiplication and you have chosen to believe it. God says now watch me open up the heavens and send you a rain like you've never had before.

The Spirit of God says there is unusual weather that has come and pinpointed the Northeast of this nation. Do not concern yourself for I am bringing about unusual manifestations into this nation. I'm bringing about unusual rebirths in this nation. I spoke of a visitation that would come into Massachusetts, that would come into the Northeast. And God said, I will literally shake. As I have shaken the Republican Party I will shake the Democratic Party as well. And God says it shall be for a good purpose for I am cleansing the house and making it white again. I am cleansing the house says the Spirit of God.

And wherever there is a manifestation, a manifestation in the atmosphere, in the elements. God's spirit says, tell My people that whenever you see this in the next few weeks, know that I have pinpointed certain regions for a breakthrough. God's spirit says, even in good old Texas. Have I forgotten you? No, says the spirit of God. I have not forgotten you. I spoke of unbuckling the Bible belt and revealing and exposing the nakedness. Well, God says, be thrilled about this, when I have exposed nakedness I clothe with garments of righteousness. And this is what shall take place in Florida. This will take place in Massachusetts. This will take place in the Northeast. This will take place in Texas. This will take place on the west coast. I'll go as far as Oregon but God said listen, there is going to be great exposures of nakedness and then I will clothe with righteousness and this nation shall experience a breakthrough and a revival as it has prayed for, for 100 years. It shall shake this nation, says the Lord.

There shall be something unusual happen in Austin, TX. Mark my Word, music shall come forth. I shall raise up a praise and worship from Texas that shall be highly unusual. The unusual happenings in the elements are just signs of a cleansing that is taking place. Unusual miracles that will begin to manifest in the homes and the lives of those who have faithfully trodden upon serpents and have faithfully praised and shouted for the walls to come down. Your prayers and your faithfulness have not gone unnoticed says the Lord. Now get ready I placed it into your account for righteousness. Therefore watch me now as I take you from being a blessing to becoming a blessing says the spirit of God. And there shall be an unusual shaking in this month which will cause the people to say at last we will have the happiest New Year we have ever had and so shall it be says the Lord.

dateLocation: August 26th, 2006 - Albany, OR- Word to Salem, OR
July 30th, 2006 - Detroit, MI- God deals with Iran, Peace for a season in Jerusalem
July 29th, 2006 - Detroit, MI- something drastic in Great Britain
July 28th, 2006 - Detroit, MI- Summer of Harvest
July 15th, 2006 - Humble, TX- Word to Israel
July 8th, 2006 - Hollywood, CA- Word about Korea, Japan, and China

paragraphs: For the Spirit of the Lord says, even as you are gathered together and even as you have made this proclamation tonight, that now is the right time, surely the Lord says, now is the correct and accurate time. For surely as you have entered into this summer it is going to be a season of multiplication, says the Lord. For God says, it is My desire to multiply to those that have experienced subtraction. And therefore God says, if the enemy has stolen away from you, I'm going to pay you two back. And if he's stolen two things from you, I'm going to pay you four back. If he's stolen three from you, I'm going to pay you six back, and so on, and so on, and so on.

The Spirit of the Lord says, even though there are those that have come here tonight and you've said, God what is it that you have to say? The Lord says, even right from the beginning it is My will to prophesy to the dead bones that have surrounded so many of My people. For the Lord says, they will not say go to the valley or go to the high mountain, for God said, it's not going to be in one place. I'm going to spread throughout the region where My rain will come to you. And I will pour out of an abundance of My blessing. Don't be afraid because now is the right time. Tomorrow about this time things are going to change!!
Sound the alarm! God said, salvation is coming, deliverance is coming, because this is the summer of multiplication. It is coming to you. God's going to multiply.

God says, the summer of hurricanes is over, the summer of destruction is over. Now the rain is a sign that I'm raining upon the political powers. I'm pouring my rain so that this Nation will not turn its back on the God that brought them into this land. The Spirit of God says, men who proclaimed, men who proclaimed as Voltaire proclaimed: there is no God, shall stand as the lightning strikes and as the thunder rolls, and say, God, God, please help me. For the Lord says, there is an unusual revival that is going to take place amongst the democrats and the republicans. Believe it or not. They don't want, they don't want a spiritual movement in a political movement. But God said, this that I'm going to do is a very unusual thing. For you, America, have waited for the rain, not the rain of destruction but the rain, the rain that would raise up people, that would cause the cattle to come forth, to cause the harvest to come forth.

Now the Word of the Lord comes to this region. Did I not tell you that there would be discoveries? Did I not tell you from this region that there would come inventions? Did I not tell you that there would be cures that would come from this region and from this soil? Now let Me tell you a little secret - also from this region, says the Lord, shall come the divine intervention of God regarding your energy. For it shall happen, says the Lord, as I have promised. Watch and see. For they will say, "this has been spoken of, how can we drive a vehicle and yet it costs us less?" God says, even as the prophet Elisha came and said, "tomorrow about this time you will be able to buy flour for so much, and wheat for so much." God says, this prophet would tell you that in just a very few short years you will not pay $3, you will not pay $2, it will come below that. And you shall say, "How could this be possible?" God said, do not say it's impossible. For if you see it today, you will take a hold of it and I will change the economy of this Nation.

The Spirit of God tells me to tell you, there are those that have said, it's far too late and I cannot make it. But God said, in these summer months even going into November, there will be an unusual heat that shall be upon this Nation. But God said, it will be a sign that I am going to change everything for you. Those who have suffered and they have had a subtraction it matters not when the subtraction took place or how it slowed you down. The spirit of multiplication means I'm going to speed things up so you can catch up, so that you're at the right place at the right time for the right reason, says the Lord. And if you are willing, if you are able, God said, I will do exceedingly abundantly all that you ask, all that you imagine. Tonight I pour upon you My multiplication and My double portion, says the Lord.

The Spirit of God says, there are going to be many many unusual appearances of My Spirit - God says, with people that did not understand and could not see will suddenly see. The blindness that has made atheists out of great men, the blindness that has made alcoholics out of giants and kings, the blindness that has caused those that have been integrous to stumble and fall, that blindness, says the Spirit of God, is being removed. And during these months, great great opportunities shall come to each and everyone that is in My Kingdom. Those that have prayed, "Your Kingdom come" the Spirit of God says, listen - those that have prayed it - it is coming, it is coming, it is coming, it is coming! 2006 - this is the year, says the Lord, where I must multiply, I must increase your faith, your vision. And those that were once great and stood - blindness took over and caused them to fall into addictions. This is My promise to the men and women that stand in this building that have felt the power of subtraction and how the enemy has taken away, your enemy has no power. For even when he took away from you, I looked at you and said, because this illegal action has taken place I will return to them and multiply and bless them in a way that they've never been blessed before, says the Lord.

For even as the Northeast is being flooded this time, God said, this is no small thing. For God says, this shall happen all over this Nation, and it shall even happen in the desert. And they shall say, why? Why what is the sign of rain? You ask Me what is the sign of rain, do you not understand? It is a sign that there is an abundance coming. It is a sign that the power of Jezebel and witchcraft is being brought down, says the Lord.

The power of witchcraft is being brought down to nothing, in the schools, in the colleges, in the universities, in the campuses. Oh there shall be crusades on the campuses of America. Oh yes. And they shall arrest; there shall be arrests; they shall arrest them on the campuses, even here. Tacoma, Tacoma, Tacoma, oh how they want you, how they cry out for you to stumble and to fall down. But God said, you shall present to the Nation the truth for there will be campus crusades. God said, I will raise up crusaders. They will have the zeal of God. They will have a burning jealousy. They will say, we are jealous for God and if we are to be thrown in prison so it shall be. What a shame for this Nation that once said, Christ is our King, to now legislate, to now arrest and to throw into the prisons those that proclaim My name. God said, did they not understand that as they threw my disciples in prison it was from that place that I erupted, that I shook the earth, that I saved the warden, that I saved the Roman centurions, that I saved the utmost. God said, listen, it shall be that as they arrest them, as they arrest them, God said, it shall be a sign. For Larry King will even call and say, enough of this, we must speak to these, we cannot allow this. God said, can I take a Jew? Can I take a Jerry Lewis and cause him to speak on My behalf? Oh yes can I take a Muhammad Ali and get him to speak? Oh, the nation of Islam, you have held these too long. I'm going to raise them up and they are going to speak My Word, says the Lord!

Oh when I say that there is a sign where the soil of this Nation shall be soaked, soaked and soaked, God says, do no fear and say it is destructive - very few deaths. God said, it shall not be destructive. There are certain destructions that shall happen. But God said, listen it is a sign - for God said, don't you understand that when this rain comes and it has already started that the soil shall be soaked and they will say, oh is it bad. But God said, listen, it is good. Even as I told you that it shall cause men to run and accelerate as Elijah said, run for your life for there is the sound of an abundance of rain. And it came. Even so Jezebel was removed. What else will the rain bring? The rain will bring an Elisha spirit. A double portion shall be raised up for the Kingdom of God, says the Lord of Hosts!

Gatekeepers of Tacoma: Gatekeepers of Tacoma: Hear the Word of the Lord. Protect My sheep. Feed My sheep. Feed My sheep. Guard, stand at the gates, stand on the walls and be watchmen. For God says, you are responsible to bring in this very next move of the Spirit, the great harvest that shall begin this summer - to reach the drug addicts, the atheists, to reach those that we never thought would come in. For God said, Tacoma, it is upon you, and I am putting it upon you to take this. For in Belleview there shall be great sounds - sounds of victory, sounds of outreach, sounds of breakthrough. But the greatest move of My Spirit shall be upon the campuses and in the prisons. And God said, rejoice, for in those two places there shall be a holiness that shall reach into the hearts of young men and young women.

May 19th, 2006 - New York, NY- Season of subtraction has come to an end, Da Vinci Code and 2 more movies coming
May 12th, 2006 - Las Vegas, NV- God's word to Las Vegas, the season of Multiplication
May 7th, 2006 - Huntsville, TX- Good changes including the economy
May 6th, 2006 - Huntsville, TX- God's word at work in TX

paragraphs: March 10, 2006 - Long Beach, CA  (SONG) There is a rain that is coming to you, a rain like never before. There is a rain that is coming to you, a rain like never before, is coming to you. There is a rain that is coming to you, a rain like never before. Because you said, send me the rain, give me a shower. Do you understand that there are showers of blessings, showers of blessings?  There is a rain that is coming to you, there is a rain like never before coming to you. There is a rain that is coming to you, a rain like never before. Do you want the rain? Do you want the rain? Do you want the rain as never before? Do you want the rain?  Do you want the rain to come to you, like never before? Do you want the rain, do you want the rain to come to you like never before? God is asking you. Do you want favor, do you want miracles like never before?  There is a rain that is coming to you, a rain that is coming like never before. The shower, and showers, many many blessings that God has in store. America, do you want the rain? America, do you want the rain like never before? Because it is coming to you. California, do you want the rain, do you want the rain like never before?  If you want the rain, lift your hands up and shout for the rain. Lift your voices and say, I want the rain. Say, I want the rain. I want the rain, rain, rain. God will send the rain tonight. God will send His grace tonight. The Spirit of God says, I want to send you favor like you have never had before. I want to send you favor like never before.  As you prayed to Me every single day, as you prayed to Me every single day, and I have heard, I have heard. And as you prayed to Me every day, as you prayed every day, called to Me, as you prayed every day, called to Me, and I have been there watching over you. And I have been there watching over you. Do you see the cloud? Do you see the cloud? It is only the size of a man's hand. Do you see the cloud? Though it be small, it will bring a storm. Though it be insignificant it will bring a miracle. Do you see the cloud? Do you see the cloud? Do you see the cloud? Can you hear the sound of favor? Do you see the cloud? Can you hear Me say, not tomorrow, but today? Can you hear the wind whispering?  Not tomorrow, but today, I will come your way with favor. I can see the cloud. I can see the cloud. I can hear the voice of favor in the wind. I can see the cloud, I can see the cloud. I have hear the voice of favor in the wind.  An unusual favor. Elijah sent a man to watch as he prayed on his knees. He asked him seven times, can you see the cloud? On the 7th time he came crying out for joy, I can see the cloud the size of a man's hand. Elijah sprang to his feet and said, run for your life, there is a rain that is coming, coming, coming to you. I can see the cloud, I can see the cloud, and I can hear the voice of favor in the wind. I'm ready, I'm ready for the rain! I'm ready, I'm ready for the rain!  The Spirit of God says, listen to Me, do you understand that there is a great favor coming this Nation? This is not hope, this is not wishful thinking. The Spirit of the Lord says, there is coming something that has not yet been seen in the nations of the world. Would I have the freedom to announce it from Long Beach? Do I have the freedom to announce it? Do I have the freedom, says the Lord, to announce this tonight in the midst of a people that don't realize that when the spirit of prophecy comes it shall set you in a position, or position you, it shall position you. Therefore, tonight even as the people have cried from this Nation and said, where is the revival? Where are the miracles of yesterday?  God said, fooey! The miracles of yesterday are gone, they are over. I have a new package. I have a brand new package, says the Spirit of God. Do not look back and insult Me by saying I am not the God of tomorrow, Alpha and Omega. God says, I have a brand new generation, I have a brand new sound, I have a brand new source of energy that I am giving to this Nation first. No it shall not come from other nations. But God said, this hour is an hour that you must not forget. For it shall come to pass that I will grant unto the people the favor that I said I would. There is a Gift of Faith that is being set aside for you in this day and in this age. Do you understand what the Gift of Faith is, says the Lord? It is not something that you have earned. It is something that I am unlocking and giving to you, says the Spirit of God. And upon the sea that is not even far from here there shall come young men and women. They shall be on ships and they shall announce that God is amongst the youth, that God is amongst the young people. For tonight I will join families together, I will not allow you to leave this building the way that you came. I will not allow you to leave with the burden that you came. I will not allow you, says the Lord.

This is another day, this is another time.God said, It shall come to pass that the very things that science has been baffled by shall become something of an everyday affair. And they shall say, "What we did not understand, did we really think in dung there would be life? Did we really think that beneath our feet within the ground that there would be a source of energy?" God said, I laugh at the enemy of your souls who has held you captive to the calling and the dictations of the Middle East. Are you hearing Me? For the Spirit of God says, I am going to take from nothing and make something. I am going to take from refuge and make it something. I am going to take from dirt and bugs and dung and make it something. And I will laugh at your enemies and say I can even take the nothing of this world and cause it to become something just as I did your life and just as I did with humanity. I took you from the dust of the earth and raised you up and made you something. So this Nation shall once again become a great force to be reckoned with because beneath your feet in the soil I will provide the trillions of dollars that are needed to make you deficit free.This is not a joke. The Spirit of God said, if you believe it, shout and I will give it to you as well!

Allow me to prophesy. Allow me to prophesy the Word of the Lord. You said, I want a prophet, do you really? God said, did you look for the Armanti suits? Do you look for fancy ties? No, this is not wrong, but listen, when you call for a John the Baptist figure do you expect a man to come with fine eloquent words that come from the castle? No, but God said, it is time for Me to go back to the wildnerness, it is time for Me to go back and show you that from the wildnerness I can raise up, from the prison I can raise up, from the nothing I can raise up and make something.  For the Spirit of God said in your midst is a doctor, one that has grabbed a hold of a truth that shall be mocked by some. Dr. Saxion, listen to me, God said you have not linked yourself with a prophet with no reason. You come out here and stand at this altar. Come and stand before this prophet that has called you by a certain name. For the Lord said, there are those that have mocked and they have said, this is a fallacy, this is something that will never happen. God said, do you realize that you have cried out for a miracle for yourself and I will indeed do it. For even as you delve in and you say I am tired or yesterday's dictations and I am tired of the one that tried to hold me down so that I could not breathe and suffocate me. Now you will bring life into the lungs of human beings for there shall be an incredible discovery that shall come, says the Lord. For one just died, says the Spirit, of a lung disease. Do you understand that there is so much anger because of this? A man who was paralyzed, Christopher Reeve, and then his wife, a child that is left. God said, listen, this child will not go fatherless, this child will not go without a mother. God said, I will see the miracle works through this child. Why am I telling you this, dear doctor? For God said, do you understand you are on a pathway that has disturbed the powers of darkness? You are on a pathway that has caused the powers of hell to say, we must stop her because she is bringing life into science, and she is bringing life into medical science. You are bringing God back into the books. And God said, they will acknowledge you in 12 years from now, for something that you will discover in the next 2 years will bring millions of dollars into the Kingdom of God. I have anointed you and I have linked you up with a prophet so that you can be sent to the places and you can go to the places with an anointing that is second to none. No one will stop you. You have been stopped twice. You won't be stopped the third time, says the Spirit of God, for the anointing is upon you tonight for it.  Let the Spirit of God resound in the house. You called for a prophet in the midst of you, and yea, would you have me to preach? God said, what is this that men desire to be tickled in their ears, to be tickled by fancy words? There are no fancy words tonight. These are the words that come. There is a sound of a mighty rushing wind. It shall change the language of the Christians from an irrelevancy to a relevant sound that will draw the nations of the world. You are in the beginning phases of a four-year breakthrough, says the Spirit of God. This Nation will not be forgotten because God said, you have given blood to protect the gates of many other nations. Therefore, as the prophet prophesies and stands right here in Long Beach, and says you have opened up a soil. God said, your own soil shall be blessed, your own properties shall be blessed. For there are those sitting in this building that will attain properties because I am giving favor to those that desire properties. God said, do you understand there is a fresh new grace that is coming upon you, an economy of grace that will bring your children out of the prisons, that will bring your children out of captivity, that will bring you to a place that you have never been before. I can preach if you want me to preach, but I am going to prophesy. I'm going to breathe upon you the words of life.  For God said, no man shall stop what I am about to do. No religious overtones will be set in the dictionaries and the volume of the Book shall be spoken out because Jesus Christ is the volume of the Book. God said, do you understand the volume of the Book, the Bible is Jesus Christ? Do you understand that no one will stop Me from saying what I want to say? For God said, you have called Me and you have prayed, now allow the Spirit to reveal to you some secrets for I will do nothing until I reveal My secrets to this My servants the prophets first.  Lift your hands up, for each one of you represents ten thousand. Do you think I can do it? Yes I can and I will, says the Lord. For a spirit, a spirit of unbelief has been destroyed, a force of witchcraft has been destroyed over three schools. And God said, there will be three schools within a 28 mile radius of this place that will receive of My Spirit in a way and in a measure they have never had before.  Listen to Me, I have decided that California, the only shaking you will have is the shaking of the Spirit of God, for the kingdoms of darkness shall be shaken until there is not one voice that can contradict My Word, not one voice that can contradict My Word. My promise is yes and amen.  For the Spirit of God says, even as I am bringing from your soil, even as I am bringing from the dirt, and some of you are saying what are you talking about? Energy! Energy! You say, why would God choose under our feet? For the Spirit of God said, I said to you, trample your enemy under your feet. And spiritually, the enemy has been trampled by many, a great man and a great woman in the Kingdom. I am going to take of nothing again and make it something. I will take something, I will even take the dung, there are other words to use for it, but I will be decent to tell you that God said, that is how mighty I am, that I can take from something that has no use to anybody, and I will bring forth from it energy, a source of energy that will cause you to say, we are free from the dictations of the East, the Middle East.  And God said, you will say, now it is time for us to give again. For America, as you have given, so now it shall come back to you. For a period of prosperity beginning in the church, God said, shall continue for a four-year period. And you will see that I will keep in the White House for a period of time a Christian President, one that believes in the truth. There will be three of them. And God said, I will not allow the White House to be defiled, I will not allow it. Because prosperity shall come to this Nation, and each one of you in this building are about to see favor, favor, favor from your houses, your children, those in your family who are atheists, those in your family who have nothing. God said, I will raise them up. And some of them have been called dung. Some of them have been called waste. And God said, I will prove it by the very thing I do naturally, I will do it spiritually as well. Therefore, allow Me to say what I want to say. At this very point in time you have not gathered in vain, but you have come to hear, not to listen, but to hear. You have come to see, not to look, but to see. And therefore, because you have come, and you have seen that there is a phenomenon that shall begin, I will allow you to have favor this year and no one shall turn you down.  Your little ones will run with the vision.  Forget sermons. Touch Him. Let your spirit connect with this atmosphere right now. There is nothing too hard. No problem. God said, I don't care what your problem is, it is no problem. I hear the angels say, no problem. There is no disease, no sickness in this atmosphere.  Do not be afraid of the future, says the Lord. Many of you are standing in this building saying, God, I don't know what tomorrow is going to bring, but the Spirit says for me to tell you, would you believe that I am not a man that I should lie? I am God and if I say to you that in the next four years your families, your children, your relationships, your finances, your business, all of this shall change based on the fact of the truth that I have established. Favor and the season of subtraction has come to an end. The season of multiplication has begun.

paragraphs: "'There are four regions in the United States of America where cleansing will take place,' says the Lord.
'There are four regions in this Nation,' The Spirit of God said. One shall be a Twin Territory. And God said, 'I will cleanse this Nation, for an odor and a stench has come before Me.'

And when it is all said and done, and the end of October comes, and they say, 'We will celebrate Halloween,' God said, 'There will be remorse, and I will end that day with My voice through this Nation.
'Four regions shall be cleansed. And I will cause this Nation to tremble.'They will say, "Where Next! Is it a Hurricane? Is it a furnace? What is it?"'
The Spirit of God said, 'But listen, the elements are crying out and reacting to a Heaven that is opened over this Nation.
Gatekeepers, gatekeepers, gatekeepers of America, listen to the voice of the Lord - 'I will stop discord and division - enough is enough!
'And when the cleansing has taken place, there will be a mighty rushing wind that shall come in and restore this Nation back to order,' says the Lord of Hosts.
'I will bring them back to the place that their forefathers dreamed. I will shut the mouths that have brought division.
'There is one gatekeeper that has prayed, your President.' And God said, 'I will show him in these three months, how a nation can be shaken and restored at the same time,' says the Spirit of God.
(Keep praying with me) Everyone is focused on this Nation. Everyone is focused. . . everyone is focused on California.

When will God come and judge? But the Spirit of God said, 'I've sent prophets together on the West Coast, to make declaration that God shall take the "fornia," the fornication, and the spirit that has brought so many untold millions of people to a place of degradation, and I will do something unusual.
'I will build an altar in the midst of the perversion, and show them who is in charge of the media. WHO is in charge of the media?
'I will take CNN, and I will take some of the most powerful voices, and I will change them. And I will say, "You will no longer speak as secular humanists, but you will speak as the voice of God."
'I created the mouthpiece. I created the fog horn. I created the trumpet. I created it.'
God said, 'I created the news media. Now I will infiltrate and take over and speak to this nation MYSELF,' says the Lord."

paragraphs: "Something in the atmosphereis raging. Many, many suicides all over the region. I sense suicide. Think of the word now. I see a cult arising from the ground in Santa Barbara. A cult that demands suicide. 'Theo Lama',

(Note: Many times when Kim is prophesying, by the Spirit he picks up on details such as a name. At this point we don't know what this name means, but we will post any information about this as it becomes available.)

I break your power by the power of Jesus Christ and I curse you right now! I see a cult, I see a cult arising. I see a cult arising of great magnitude to take your children and your unborn; a cult that shall arise to destroy. But there are promises for Santa Barbara and all the surrounding regions. All the surrounding regions, where they hide. I'm disturbed in my spirit. The soil is ripe for many deaths, but the Spirit that is here tonight says, I'll take the labor of your hands, the labor of your hands and bring down a powerful cult that is hidden. It shall manifest in 17 different states in the USA. One in Hawaii, one in Alaska. The Hot and the cold, then Miami shall be disturbed by the same cult. Children of Righteousness shall suddenly fall into its trap... 17 different states shall be entangled in this cult. This shall make Columbine and every other school mass death look like a joke. You must pray for it was born in this region. I will destroy it, but if your President beyond 2005 is not a praying man, Woe! Woe to your children. For it is not the politics of this Nation that matter now, what matters is there is a man who prays for children. Yet they take little Gerber and take the innocence and say 'let's poison', NO! But the 17 states that shall be effected by mass suicides, it shall start and it shall erupt and then shall suddenly stop for I shall take the prophet of this region to break its power as we prophesy to the earth and break the power of it." Father tonight I pray for this Nation.

(It is important to note that this word clearly shows God has attached a condition to the future elections, conveying that if our Nation does not put the correct President into the White House then the prayer that is needed in this Nation will diminish and unfortunately the children will be effected. Therefore, although God has revealed His intention for blessing our Nation, it is our responsibility to agree with His will in the earth, not only by prayer but also by our actions. Agreement is always necessary for God's promises to be manifest.)

The Spirit of the Lord says, There shall be one assassination attempt that will endeavor to destroy the plans that I have for this Nation... Tonight there are major forces of darkness that have endeavored to bring to nothing, this Nation. But I will supply a very special weapon to this Nation which shall have the ability to see activities of the enemies in a very peculiar manner. This night is a Saturday night. I require that my people stand in agreement with the prophet as he prophesies resurrection to America."
